1.title: The Start of a New Beginning

111.content: Now starts the character choices.
111.title: Title Characters Take Precedence

choices: After getting huge, Naruto goes to show off!
Naruto gets too big, and outgrows his house!
1111.content:
The nine-tailed fox, for sixteen, nearly seventeen years now, had been trapped inside the body of a boy. That boy was Naruto Uzumaki of the Hidden Leaf Village. Day after day, he had to remain in a seal, which binded his spirit to the young man.

Naruto had been gaining strength, sure. The nine tails had to admit this. However, what did Naruto have to show for it? He may have been a little thicker than he was before, but Naruto's body still was not the body you'd expect to hold a god within. At least, that's how the nine tails viewed himself; as a god. The nine tails couldn't take it anymore. Though he was a bit leery of the idea as it crossed his mind, he would soon be lending Naruto even more of his strength, making Naruto truly a worthy vessel.

Naruto had just finished a simple mission around the Leaf before he had the rest of the day to himself. He really disliked doing the small-time jobs. As always, he dreamed that he would get something bigger, more worthy of someone of his power! Still, like it or not, by Konoha's tradition, genin weren't allowed to take higher missions, nothing above a C Rank. Even though Naruto had power that rivaled that of even a jonin, heck, even more than a jonin, it was truly rare for him to be thrown a bone.

Naruto let out a sigh as he walked down to Ichiraku Ramen for lunch. The smell and taste of the ramen bar always put his mind at ease.

"Hey! Old man!" Naruto chimed in as he entered the stall.

"Naruto!" Teuchi, the ramen store owner, greeted, "How are 'ya, boy?" He asked, "The usual?"

"You know it!" Naruto said with a grin, sitting down at the stool. As he glanced around, no one else was there at the moment. "Slow day?" He then asked, making small talk.

"Nah, you just missed the lunch rush." Teuchi answered, serving Naruto up his bowl. "We ended up making more than we expected! This one's on the house!"

"Really? Cool!" Naruto smiled, taking his chopsticks apart. "Thanks!"

After his gratitude, he started to dig in, eating to his heart's content.

Naruto had a few more bowls, before heading on out. "Thanks again! I'll be back again tomorrow!" Naruto said as he left the store. He looked down at his stomach, which was bloated out just the smallest bit. "Oogh... Man, I'm full..."

Naruto made his way home to relax for a moment. After work and now with a full belly, it certainly made him tired out! As he arrived, he went over to his table to rest for a second. He sighed, rubbing his stomach, and without even meaning to, fell asleep in the chair!

The nine tails snickered to itself. The seal was still a little loose from previous encounters, so he was easily able to seep his power into the boy, causing what would be great changes within him... Naruto would soon have the body of a god, and all would know that it was this amazing child that held the even more amazing Nine Tailed Fox!
1111.title: A Worthy Vessel

choices: Naruto's morning goes on with him growing bit by bit.
Naruto's body is... absorbing the water!?
11113.content:
Only a few hours later, Naruto awoke with a surprise, his arms flailing as he awoke! In doing so, he fell backward, out of the chair.

"Ow! What the hell!?" Naruto shouted, looking down. He took note of his surroundings and immediately knew what was up. "Oh... I must have fallen asleep..." He mumbled to himself. He yawned once more, getting to his feet. "I'm still kinda tired too..."

Naruto stood his chair back up, yawning once more. "Man, I'm tired..." He said to himself. It was about evening when he returned home, and after his nap, it was nearly pitch black! Thankfully the full moon provided some light...

Naruto scratched his stomach which was no longer swollen and filled with ramen. Dragging all his limbs along, he made his way over to his bed and plopped down. Letting out one final yawn, he fell fast asleep, not even bothering to change his clothes.

"Curse it!" The Nine Tails grumbled to himself as he held still. "I must be more careful... Lest I wake the boy again..." With that, the beast closed it's eyes once more and continued to concentrate. Gently, he began to release a special energy into Naruto, which would slowly have it's way on the teen's body.

Naruto's sleep went undisturbed for the rest of the night. Before he knew it, he soon woke up from his peaceful slumber. He sat up, and rubbed his face, before looking around his room. As he did, a foul stench hit his nose. Naruto began to sniff around a little to find the source, only to see it was him! His clothes were dirty, and he still smelled a bit from working hard on his mission the previous day!

He stripped down until he was nude, tossing his clothes in a corner for now. Slowly he made his way to the shower, passing by a mirror as he did. He did a double take, before then moving to the reflective glass. "Hey there sexy!" He said with a confident grin, "Looking good!" He flexed a little, not noticing the small changes he had went through! His muscles were a little more dense, and he had grown at least a few inches in the night as well!

Not spending too much time, Naruto made his way to the shower, wincing a bit at how hot the water was before his body ajusted.
11113.title: Night to Day

111131.content:
After Naruto's shower, he dries himself off and looks into the mirror. He had noticed something. He seemed.... bigger. He saw himself with bigger looking pecs, biceps, and his six-pack chest. He looked like he had grown a few inches overnight. "All right!" he said flexing his just grown bicep. "See everyone be shocked at my new body!"

Afterwards, Naruto put on his clothes. He noticed that they were smaller and tighter, His pants were so short he could see half of his calf. "Oh well," The nine tailed fox thought in his mind. "I'll get some new clothes later" Naruto was very chill with his new body, feeling stronger and more powerful than ever.
111131.title: Naruto's morning goes on with him growing b...

choices: Naruto figures out it's the water! Back into the shower!
He's too tired to think straight. Maybe some breakfast will help...
111132.content:
Naruto sighed in relief as the warm water flowed over his body, washing away the grime, dirt and sweat of the previous day and night. He was going to have to make sure to do his laundry later too. No way was he going to lie down in a bed of his own filth! ...Knowingly anyway. Grabbing a bar of soap, the blonde haired ninja began to scrub up his body, getting those areas that wouldn't be cleansed just by good old fashioned hot water. He was still only partly awake, the warm water soothing him and making it harder to wake up then if he had been in a cold shower, so he didn't even notice as something quite...odd happened while he was standing in the tub.

The water that had been cascading down over his entire body, soaking him completely, was now only reaching his head and torso area, his lower body becoming completely dry! Somehow, his body was quickly absorbing the water. Even though he was standing directly under the spray, his body was soon totally dry, the water disappearing within his body as soon as it came in contact. It took a little bit for Naruto to notice this. Eventually, he opened his eyes up and looked down at his body. "Hey, what gives? Something up with the water?"

He looked over his shoulder. No, the water was definitely still coming out. He frowned in confusion as he looked at his hands. Getting an idea, he turned around and cupped them under the shower head, intending to collect the water in his palms. Much to his surprise, he couldn't do it. Not even a little puddle was forming in his hand. He tired to put his hands on his hips, but his right arm smacked into the wall. "Ouch! Hey, what gives? I used to be able to do that no problem!"

Naruto's eyes widened as he realized what had happened to him...and what was happening to him! Looking down, he saw his body slowly start to grow larger! His height was slowly increasing while his muscles all bulged and expanded, his shoulders broadening while his back flared out, his neck thickening to accommodate the new size of his torso, his chest bulging out in front of him, heavy, powerful orbs of muscle, his abs popping out row by row out of his once flat stomach. Down below, similar changes were occurring, his thighs thickening to the point that they were rubbing against each other, his calves popping out behind him while his feet grew longer and wider. Even his junk was undergoing a similar expansion, slowly stretching out longer and thicker, his balls swelling to match while his ass grew softer and more muscular, giving them a look that would make a person just want to reach out and smack it!

"W-What the hell is going on here?!" Naruto stuttered, confused but not unhappy about his strange transformation. His look of confusion was quickly replaced with a smile as he flexed his arms, watching as his biceps bulged out of his arm. "Woah! I bet I punch a hole through solid brick with one hit!" He was going to have to test that hypothesis later. He crossed his arms as he tried to think of what might be causing this. He suddenly took notice of the shower head as his arms brushing up against it, forcing the stream up into his face. Naruto took a step back, stumbling over his much larger feet, and slipping out of the shower, tearing down the curtain with him. "Ouch..." He muttered, rubbing his head.

He slowly got to his feet, the bathroom feeling a lot smaller now that he was so much larger. He looked at the doorway and noticed he was eye level with the top of the door frame. He had grown at least a foot or two taller, with muscles to match! He looked over his body eagerly...and noticed he had stopped growing. "Aw man! What gives? I was just getting into it!"

Naruto frowned and looked around, trying to think of what could have caused this...
111132.title: Like a Sponge

choices: Naruto makes his way to a clothing store.
1111322.content:
As Naruto looked around, trying to figure it out, he felt his newfound, tight abs rumble a little. His hand over his stomach, he looked down, just able to see his thick, burly pecs. He grinned, but it was soon wiped away as he felt the pangs of hunger once again!

"Looks like it's time to eat!" He said with a grin. He made sure to turn the water off, and got a towel for his upper body, which was the only part wet! After this, he squeezed out his doorway without too much trouble, and made his way to the kitchen. Of course, he stopped to look at his new physique in the mirror!

"Yeah... Nice and big!" Naruto said, flexing his two biceps proudly. He set his hands on his waist and began to bounce his pecs as he admired himself in the mirror. "Damn, any bigger and I'm gonna have to shop for a new wardrobe!"

With that final statement, Naruto then wandered away from the mirror and to his kitchen. Not even looking, he pulled a random ramen bowl from the box next to his fridge. Tossing it carelessly onto the table, he filled his water boiler and plugged it in.

Soon Naruto was sitting at the table, a little bored already as he waited for the water to boil. He was idly rubbing his thick, soft pec in his hand, sighing a little as he did. It felt nice, and it was helping him get used to his new body!

As soon as Naruto saw the water was ready, he stopped messing around and picked up the boiler. Clumsy as ever, he accidentally grabbed the hot part of the boiler, and released it in mid air! The contents spilled out, and onto his chest! Naruto had already flinched, bracing for impact!

... But as he stood there, no pain came to him! He opened one eye. Indeed, he had spilled the water, but surverying his body, there was not a drop nor burn on him! Naruto touched his bare chest, all the way down to his thighs, shocked to see not a drop on him! What Naruto didn't see was that he had shot up another good four inches! His biceps bounced out a little more, adding to their impressive size, as well as every other muscle on his body!

"That's really weird..." Naruto said, investigating everything. "I was sure I was gonna get hurt... Guess I'm not complaining though!" He smiled. Getting up, he got his towel and started to clean up the mess.

-----------------------------

After his usual ramen breakfast, and a little more growth thanks to the broth, Naruto put on a jumpsuit and started to head out. The top looked like a midriff, showing off the bottom row of his abs, while his once baggy pants now looked more like tight, orange capris. Naruto walked down the streets of Konoha, blooming with pride over his new body!
1111322.title: Figured It Out? Maybe Not...

choices: Naruto trains in the training field
11113221.content:
Naruto ran through time, cutting a path through the crowded village easily thanks to his size. Those who recognized him watched him pass in shock. Just yesterday Naruto had come back from a mission, perfectly normal sized! Now he was at least a foot or so taller and his muscles were enormous! The ridiculously small clothes clinging to his body just helped accentuate his size. Naruto could feel all eyes on him and grinned, loving the attention. He was soaking it up as much as his body was water. "Oh yeah!" He thought to himself. "Check out this hot body!" He clenched his ass as he ran, his pants hugging it tight. He made more than just a few passerby blush!

All of this attention was great but Naruto was starting to feel uncomfortable in his clothes. They were just way too small! He was loving his new body but the tightness was starting to get under his skin. "I need to get some new clothes pronto!" He decided, turning into the nearest clothing store.

The store was medium sized, most of the floor space being taken up by racks of various clothes with the check out counter crammed into one corner. The walls were covered with rolls of various fabrics in all colors. Most of the clothes that were sold here were also made here, seamstresses running both sewing machines and needle and thread (for the more delicate work) in the back of the store. As soon as Naruto stepped through the doorway, one of the employees caught sight of him. His jaw dropped. He had never seen a ninja so young with such a large body! The familiar face attached to it just made it all the more strange! Naruto looked around, a slightly confused expression on his face, before he made his way over to the man.

"Hey pops!" He said loudly, his voice carrying throughout the store. "I need some new clothes! These are way too small!"

He indicated his shirt which was riding halfway up his torso, his usual jacket which was totally unable to be closed, and his pants which were barely able to reach halfway down his calves. The man looked Naruto up and down and said, "I'm...not sure we have clothes that will be quite your size."

Naruto groaned and moved closer to the man, looking down at him with a slightly annoyed expression on his face. "How long would it take to make me something new in this style?"

The man gulped and said, "A-About three days! And with the amount of fabric it would take, it would cost quite a bit of money!"

Naruto pulled out his frog purse and opened it up, looking through his cash and change. "Hmm...Well, I DO need some new clothes right now...Okay! How about this? You start making me some new clothes for my new size and in the mean time I'll buy something around here to wear right now."

The man nodded and said, "That's fine! Just let me take some measurements."

Naruto held still while the man pulled a tape measure out of his pocket, moving around Naruto's body, measuring his height, arm size and length, leg size and length, waist size and foot size for good measure since Naruto's rather large toes were currently hanging off the edge of his footwear, the tops of them bulging alarmingly. "Alright, pick something out and then I'll help you at the register."

The man scampered off, leaving Naruto to look around the racks for something suitable to wear. Nothing really looked like it would fit him, so he decided to improvise. He grabbed an orange vest and a pair of brown shorts, both of them meant for someone of Choji's proportions along with a pair of sandals that barely fit him. Moving into the changing rooms, Naruto managed to squeeze them on, the vest only coming halfway down his back while the shorts were just slightly too short for him. Naruto looked at himself in the mirror and bounced his pecs with a grin. "No reason not to show off this awesome body of mine!" He flexed his arms a bit to test how much give the sleeves had before heading for the register.

"Okay pops! I'm going to wear this stuff out!" He said, dumping some cash out onto the counter. "I'll be back for the rest of the stuff in three days!"

"Thank you for shopping...here..." the man trailed off, Naruto already rushing out of the store.

"Alright! I've still got the whole day ahead of me!" Naruto said, a big smile plastered on his face. "Time for training!"
11113221.title: No Size Fits Naruto

choices: Naruto is still clueless about what's happening...
Naruto finally starts to catch on!
111132212.content:
Not too far outside the village, there was a tall waterfall. Naruto remembered it from back when Jiraiya was training him for the Chuunin exams. Naruto groaned a little. That quick thought instantly reminded him that he was still a genin. However, his bad mood didn't last as he looked over his new body.

"Heh, biggest genin... No, biggest NINJA in the village!" He said, giving his bicep a cocky flex. As Naruto walked on, he kept getting looks from everyone, which only inspired him to flex even harder! Everyone had to know who the manliest, buffest dude around was! Naruto showed off until the very end, until he was out those gates. He grinned to himself, breathing a little heavy. "Heh... Damn I'm hot..." He thought to himself, giving his groin a little grasp as he made his way to the water fall. All that attention really DID get him going...

As Naruto reached the waters edge, he looked out at the crystal clear water. He let out a happy sigh, living in his memories for a moment. After a quick moment, he made his way to the waterfall, not yet stepping in the water. As he arrived at the side, he stuck a hand in, which was quickly absorbed into his body, shooting him up a few iches, and pumping his body thicker. Naruto just shuddered.

"Cold!" He shouted out. He took his vest and shorts off, leaving him in his tight boxers. After all, as far as he knew, he'd need something warm and dry to wear when this was all done. Naruto chuckled once he had saw how big his manhood had gotten! He gave it a little pat. "Don't worry big guy, I'm pretty sure you'll get your chance to shine sooner than you think!"

With that, Naruto immediately hopped over, sitting under the waterfall. But he wasn't for long!

As soon as the teen's already strong body hit the water, it started to absorb the liquid like a dry sponge! Naruto suddenly rocketed upward, his pecs shooting out from his chest! His biceps exploded from their softball size to basketball... Beachball... Wrecking ball... Soon they were the size of the Epcot Center! His abs were now packed with muscle, even pushing out obscenely from his waist giving him a muscle gut! His legs burst from the boxers, growing like two large trees! Only bigger! His foot became a massive wall that pressed away everything near it! His tight ass were like two boulders that destroyed everything! Naruto's height surpassed that of the hokage house, and then the mountains! He was practically as big as the Kyuubi himself!

All this sudden change caused Naruto to fall over, which thankfully, also got him out of the water. He groaned as he now sat back up. He let out a moan of pain, "What the heck was that!?" He asked aloud, his voice booming.

As Naruto looked around...
111132212.title: My Cup Runneth Over

choices: No one answers...she's currently out on a diplomatic mission
Before Tsunade can speak to Naruto, there's a disturbance at the gates!
1111322121.content:
It had all happened so fast! One second, Naruto had been sitting underneath the water fall, and the next, he was a massive mountain of a man, standing taller than any structure in the Leaf Village...sitting down! Naruto scratched his head, having slight trouble reaching it thanks to his enormous bicep, and looked around quizzically. There wasn't much to see. His enormous body was taking up nearly all of his line of sight. Looking down, he couldn't even begin to see passed his gigantic pecs! He could feel his toes digging into the soft grass, a few trees in the area toppled over thanks to his mighty feet, but actually seeing them was impossible.

As he looked over his body, his thoughts drifted from trying to think about what might be causing this abnormal growth spurt, to admiring just how huge he was! He flexed his arms and was almost shocked to see how thick his biceps looked, the tops of them peaking above his his head, pumped full of pure strength. Bouncing his pecs, he smirked cockily as he heard them make a soft *thump!* noise as he worked the slabs of meat, his fingers passing through the crevice between them, his whole hand able to fit between them. He moaned as he lightly touched his nipples. They were erect and more sensitive than they had ever been before. It caused his mammoth cock to twitch, slowly engorging with blood as he kept touching himself. "Aw yeah...so big...so strong! No one could ever match me now! I'm like a god!"

He snickered as he thought about that. "Yeah...I'm the new god of the Leaf Village! Who needs to be Hokage anyway? That little stick house couldn't even cover my foot!"

An idea popped into his head as he thought about that. "Maybe it's time I paid the Village a little visit!"

Slowly, he turned his huge body around, looking over the few miles to the Leaf Village, which was totally unaware of his change. His beyond Herculean frame could no doubt be seen jutting up into the sky, but everyone within the village was too busy going about their daily lives to notice him! He was going to change THAT in a hurry! With a mighty step that shook the ground for miles, Naruto began to make his way to the village. Trees bent and cracked by the dozens under each of his feet, his shadow slowly casting the village into darkness the closer he got. In only a few short steps, the fox boy was looming over the village, his toenails just barely clearing the wall surrounding the village. Naruto crouched down and flicked the massive gates with his finger. The wood shattered like a bomb had gone off inside it, leaving the main entrance in and out of the village completely open. "Heh...we don't need that anymore! I'm the only security this place needs!"

He easily stepped over the wall, his feet nearly taking out a few businesses as each mighty appendage filled an entire street plus more. Naruto snickered and leaned over so he could see the tiny people around him better. "Wow! And I used to think this place was big!"

Shaking his head, Naruto fixed his eyes on the Hokage Mansion and started walking over there. It was slow going since the titan was making sure not to harm anyone or anything. No matter how careful he was, though, his massive weight caused the ground to crack and warp which, in turn, knocked down a few stores and homes. Naruto didn't seem to notice.

Finally, he arrived at the Hokage Mansion. Filling his powerful lungs, he called out, "Hey! Granny Tsunade! I've got some new rules to lay down around here!"
1111322121.title: The Times are Changing

choices: When Naruto wakes, he begins his reign!
The ninja of Konoha try to devise a way to overthrow Naruto!
11113221211.content:
Naruto stood there, grinning. He wanted Tsunade, or anyone really, to see him in all his glory when they saw him. But after a moment, he noticed there was no answer. "... Hey Grandma!" He said, trying to be as insulting as possible. He squatted down peeking through the window. "Huh... Granny?" He peered around, his giant blue eye wandering across the room. "Oh well." Naruto stood back up to his full height, stretching a little. "Guess I'll just have to have a little bit of fun until she gets back!"

Naruto turned to face the village. A grin spread across his face once more as he looked down on the people. He certainly had everyone's attention now!

"Alright, village, listen up!" Naruto said with his hands on his hips. His full, massive physique was on full display for everyone to see. "From now on, I am god! Got it!?" He decreed, bounching his full, powerful pecs as he did, making that thud sound that he so enjoyed, and make some villagers quake in fear. "Anyone who disagrees..." Naruto slammed in foot into the ground, making even more damage. Houses cracked, tons of pots shattered nearby. "Can come tell me themselves!"

Of course, with that, no one dared to say a thing. Naruto had established his position as the God of Konoha, and no one could dare say otherwise. Despite this, however, there were some who FELT otherwise...

"Now then... Your god is going to go take a nap, before he thinks of a way you can please him! So prepare yourselves!" With that final order, Naruto began making his way out of the village, causing endless destruction in his massive wake.

Naruto found a nice, clear setting for him to lie down in. Patting the ground down a little, he laid down and began to relax. Soon, his rule would begin, and it would be grand...
11113221211.title: The Begining of the Naruto Era

choices: Word spreads about Naruto and the other villages get concerned
Suddenly, thunder rumbles in the distance. Is it going to rain?
111132212111.content:
The ninja of Konoha were in trouble. The very second Naruto's colossal body had appeared in the distance and eventually arrived in the midst of the village, everyone knew dark days were ahead. Naruto had proven through the years to be a trustworthy and powerful ally for the Village Hidden in the Leaves, but the villagers also knew him as a trouble maker, a trickster, and a bit clumsy to boot! He had demonstrated these qualities by nearly leveling an entire section of the village without even meaning to...and then damaging a whole city block worth of houses and businesses on purpose! Looking at his massive body, with muscles bulging out of every inch of his body, it was clear that Naruto had somehow managed to make himself exponentially more powerful than ever before! It was clear that the gigantic fox ninja had a very good reason to call himself a god and claim his rightful place as ruler of the village...but that didn't mean anyone had to like it! Those closest to Naruto, his friends and comrades, and teachers both new and old, all agreed that Naruto would be a worthy ruler, if not a bit over zealous. However, they made up only a small portion of the village. Countless others respected Naruto and knew him to be a good person, but didn't feel safe in his rule. It was these ninja that were banding together to DO something about this hostile take over!

However, all of their efforts soon proved entirely fruitless. They started small, attempting to stab him with kunai to see if it would have any effect. They might as well have been trying to stab steel with all the good it did! The sharp blades merely ricocheted harmlessly off of Naruto's incredibly tough skin. Next, they tried bombs. They attached an entire row of them all over Naruto's chest before detonating them all at once! When the smoke cleared, Naruto merely scratched at the thick slabs of muscle in his sleep, not so much as a blemish visible on his godly body. Losing heart, they tried to feed him poison. Not enough to kill him, but weaken him to the point of incapacitation. Naruto gulped down gallons of the stuff, which only resulted in him belching up a cloud of noxious gas. This cleared the area of ninja and made it quite clear that they were not going to be able to harm Naruto. Fire, wind, water, none of the elements had any more success in touching him. It would no doubt take an equally massive ninja, on Naruto's level or above it to even be able to wound him. The village was just going to have to deal with their new ruler.

Naruto, after napping for a few hours, stretched and sat up, his back crackling slightly. "Man...I'm going to need to find a softer place to sleep!"

He pulled himself up to his feet, stretching his limbs until he felt fully awake. With a cheeky grin, he made his way back to the village. He stepped back in front of the Hokage Mansion and called out in his booming voice. "Alright you runts! The reign of Naruto Uzumaki the Great begins today!"

A few people groaned and rolled their eyes at this statement, but none who were in view of the teen himself. They probably wouldn't have lived to see the first second of Naruto's reign had he noticed them. Naruto cracked his knuckles, the sound like thunder, echoing around the village. "So! To kick off my new reign, I'm going to get rid of everything that reminds people of the previous eras!"

A few whispers broke out. Just what was he getting at? In answer, Naruto lifted up his enormous right foot, and brought it crashing down on the mansion, shattering it into thousands of pieces, the once proud structure now nothing more than a pile of rubble and splintered wood. "Aw yeah! First one done, one more to go!"

Naruto gleefully stepped on the remains of the mansion, grinding it into the dirt, before standing in front of the Hokage Mountain. He bounced his pecs and quickly put his hands together. "Sorry dad..." He muttered to one face in particular. "But you had your time! It's all about me now!"

Without further ado, he pulled back his fist and slammed it as hard as he could into the center of the mountain. A terrible cracking sound filled the air as lines radiated out from Naruto's fist, covering the entire mountain. Naruto smirked and gently flicked the Second Hokage's representation, the entire mountain crumbling into dust and rubble. Naruto turned to face the village once more, his hands at his hips, his whole torso heaving with excitement. "You all got that?! There's no such thing as a Hokage anymore! Now there's only Naruto Uzumaki, the God of Konoha!"

The villagers all broke out in a nervous applause, shaken to the core at the demonstration of Naruto's strength. He hadn't even broken a sweat! In fact...he had done such terrifying acts of destruction without even applying any effort! Truly Naruto was a formidable force to be reckoned with! Things were definitely about to change in the Ninja World.
111132212111.title: Demonstration

choices: The Great Nations got someone on the inside (from Konoha) on the job...!
Naruto's relaxing... When the people of the village rebel!
1111322121111.content:
Naruto's power was absolute. Word soon spread through all of Konoha, and soon, throughout the entire Land of Fire of it's new massive god. Naruto was not a fantastic leader, but under his rule, no enemy ninja could dare to hurt the village. Any who tried left one of two ways. Injured, and instructed to warn their village, or in a body bag. Or at least, what they could scoop into the body bag. When Naruto was done with them, they were little more than pancakes!

Word soon spread not only across the Land of Fire, but to other nations as well! The Land of Wind, Earth, Water, and Lightning, not to mention all the smaller nations as well! They immediately realized that with Naruto behind them, it could only be a matter of time before THEIR lands were also conquered, and forced to be enslaved to the gargantuan teen. What made it all the sweeter was that no one, not even Naruto himself, knew how the teen had got so big in the first place!

There were letters constantly sent to the various Kage of the land, making sure none of them ended up in possession of Konoha. The great minds of the land began to collaborate in secret, trying to think of a way to match this behemoth's power!

Naruto, all the while, remained ignorant. He taxed his people, demanding foot massages, and incomprehenisble amounts of food to fuel his massive body. He only got what water was needed, which resulted in minimal growth, which went on unnoticed. The village, safe as it may be, was starting to go into poverty. Those who were once trusting and willing to serve Naruto were begining to falter.

The Great Nations had soon devised a plan. They had created a warrior pill that would give the user strength hopefully beyond that of Naruto. It's effects would be temporary, giving them only about three day's worth of power. Doing so ensured that another "Naruto" would not arise! They had to give this pill to someone who they could trust. Someone who was good with control...

All the while, Naruto was back at the village, stuffing his face. "Keep it coming!" He demanded, shoving handfulls into his mouth. His voice booomed over the village. Whatever he said, everyone immediately knew.

"Yes... This is perfect..." The Kyuubi though, as it dwelled within Naruto. "They all see who is god... Now they all see who is the superior lifeform! I shall take this boy and make him the most perfect being to ever exist!" The demon fox laughed triumphantly, Naruto going on unaware. Everything, for Naruto, was uphill from here... Or so they thought...
1111322121111.title: Can He be Stopped!?

choices: Choji keeps growing, eventually surpassing Naruto! The power is getting to him..
Choji stops growing (for now) at Naruto's height and engages him in a fight!
11113221211111.content:
Little did Naruto know, complacent as he was in his new place as ruler of the greatest (and most impoverished, ironically) nation in the world, the leaders of the other Great Nations had discreetly developed a pill that, in the best case scenario, would be able to give a single ninja the same power as Naruto, boosting them up to a height and weight sufficient to topple both Naruto and his enormous ego. They were lucky that most of the ninja in Konoha, including those who had supported Naruto in the beginning, were willing to turn against their god like "protector" and jumped at the chance to take him down. Several candidates were screened for their abilities and their relationship to Naruto. They didn't want anyone to have a change of heart when confronted with the idea of having to hurt Naruto in the process of capturing him so they immediately disqualified all those he was in contact with on a daily basis. However, they wanted to ensure that the candidate also was close enough to Naruto that he would trust them and that they would know his fighting style if it came down to a brawl. One by one, they had narrowed down possible candidates until they were left with one. They had sent a messenger ninja to deliver the pill and it arrived within a day.

Choji gripped the pill tightly in his hand as he ran to where Naruto was currently lounging, stuffing his face with enough food to feed several hundred people, a nervous tremor in his step, but a determined look on his face. His family had been suffering greatly from Naruto's food consumption. The Akimichi's all consumed great quantities of food in order to be able to use their Expansion Jutsu. With Naruto demanding such large portions for himself, many of the lesser members of the clan had gone without food, greatly weakening their family as a whole. The very idea that not only was his family going hungry, but many others in the village as well spurred him on to take down Naruto once and for all! He had been chosen not just for his relationship to Naruto but also thanks to his techniques. His body was already used to growing many times its size, not to mention fighting while giant. These were valuable assets for the coming mission.

When he was a few yards away from Naruto, his enormous foot blocking an entire street in front of him, Choji popped the pill in his mouth and crunched down on it, swallowing it after chewing it a few times. Almost immediately he felt an incredible amount of chakra get released into his body, filling him with untold amounts of power. His body quickly began to grow, not only taller, but more muscular, his biceps bulging and tearing apart his sleeves, not even his super stretchy Akimichi brand clothing standing a chance against his rapidly increasing body. Choji let out a primal growl as he shot up two feet, then five, then ten, then twenty, his clothes practically exploding off his body, leaving him as naked as Naruto. His hips began to crash into the buildings on either side of him, his chest swelling out in front of him, his belly still has thick and bulbous as ever, though it only made him look more powerful when combined with his rippling back, ripped chest and arms, and massively built legs. Choji grinned as he looked down at himself, smacking his enormous belly with glee. He was starting to enjoy this new size!

Unfortunately for the Great Nations that had developed the pill, Choji's body had broken down the chemicals in the pill that stimulated this enormous growth and was now swiftly developing more of them, effectively ensuring that Choji would not only grow to a massive size (and continue growing at a constant, if slow, rate) but never return back down to his normal height. The plan had already backfired spectacularly, but no one would know until after Choji defeated Naruto...if he could!

Regardless, the now gigantic Akimichi teen grinned as he looked down at Naruto's sleeping form. He had apparently passed out after gorging himself. This was an advantage Choji couldn't pass up! He quickly began making his way over to Naruto, the villagers watching with bated breath to see how this would all turn out.
11113221211111.title: The Plan is in Motion

choices: Show those villagers just who the Hokage REALLY is.
1112121.content:
Naruto shrugged and pulled out one of the small pills. He held it in his hand for a moment, taking in all of it's mysterious powers. It was a deep sapphire blue color and pretty much a perfect sphere. He tossed the pill into his mouth and swallowed it.

"Huh," Naruto said after a few minutes of nothing happening, "I guess they don't do anything."

He decided to take the bag with him anyway, stuffing it into one of his pockets before walking away.

As he turned around to go back to his walk, his stomach growled loudly. Naruto placed a hand on his stomach and decided to head back home for a bowl of ramen. He raced back home, locking the door, and quickly made himself a hearty dinner (if you can call eating ramen three times a day hearty). Minutes later and the bowl was empty. Naruto patted his now full stomach and leaped into the shower.

Twenty minutes later, and Naruto emerged from the bathroom in a veil of steam, a white towel draped around his waist. He walked over to the mirror and stared at his lithe and limb body in the mirror. He frowned a bit as he flexed his almost non-existent bicep. If anything, couldn't that pill have at least added a little bit of muscle? He stood there a few minutes more before he felt a tingling sensation flow throughout his entire body that quickly turned into a searing pain.

Naruto stood there as he watched his body transform in the mirror as his body began to erupt with muscle. His pecs burst out from his chest as two slabs of marble emerged under his skin, creating twin shelves that stuck out from his once thin torso. His abs poked out from his stomach, one by one until eight solid balls of muscle stood out as the space between them grew deeper and deeper. His back surged outward, bringing his growing arms further and further away from each other. Naruto grimaced through the pain as he watched his arms expand to unimaginable sizes. His forearms thickened up and became as wide as two bowling pins. His bicep swelled with power, climbing to a massive peak that put his head to shame. Beneath them, his triceps were falling to the ground, making his arm look even bigger than before. Meanwhile, his shoulders were becoming obscene, rippling with untold power and strength. His lats spread like wings, pushing his arms up and into a 45 degree angle. ear his head, his neck was now thickening up as well as being swallowed up by the growing traps and muscles around it. Down below, his feet and legs were trying to keep pace, thickening and widening, swelling and bulging as they grew closer together. Naruto's towel was being strained to it's limits by not only his two legs, but a third that was quickly and happily dropping down, stopping just short of the hem of his towel.

Naruto laughed as he watched the transformation stop, leaving him a muscle-bound freak of a ninja. He could no longer see his sides in the mirror as he was now almost as wide as he was tall. He flexed his arms as watched in awe as his biceps soared past his head and above his clenched fists. He reveled in the power and strength and pondered what to do next. Would he take another pill? Or should he go out and show off his new musculature?
1112121.title: Naruto eats one of the pills

111222.title: Sensei-sama?

1112221.content:
Life was about normal in the hidden village of Konoha.

Which meant there was only 1 group of people out to kill everybody. The Hokage had ordered many procedures in perpetration for the fight with Akatsuki. Special teams had been assembled to respond to threats, and others to conduct research.

The research group had not shown much progress, so the Hokage decided to "motivate" them when she punched out a table that contained everyone's lunch. As it turns out, that DID motivate the team to research a way to boost the ninja's psychical power.

If an advanced ninjutsu user was as strong, or better yet stronger then the Hokage, you would have to pick up the pieces of Akatsuki off the ground. As you could expect, there was a problem. The only method they found successful had two drawbacks: 1)It involved draining the power from other ninjas (they could recover in about a week) 2)The process couldn't be reversed.

They couldn't go out and find volunteer to submit to being drained, so the research team (4 of them) would have to do that themselves. Which meant they had better get it right the first time, because it would take at least 18-24 hours before they could stand again. With that in mind, the test subject had to be chosen carefully...
1112221.title: choose your sensei

choices: Kakashi reports to the Hokage (stays good)
Kakashi uses the technique on other ninja (goes bad)
11122211.content:
The research team was slightly on edge, it was the defining moment of all their work. Things were behind schedule because the subject of their test, Hatake Kakashi, wasn't just late, he passed late 30 minutes ago.

About then, one of the team decided to vent their frustration "You would think a top Jounin could keep better time."

From behind them they heard the voice of the ninja in question "sorry, I was helping someone open pickle jar, then I realized there was a cat stuck in a tree."

"Wait, that doesn't make any sense." Kakashi just stared at him blankly, he never explained his reasons and he wasn't about to start.

"Never mind, can we just get on with this?"

"Sure, just run through what you have planned one more time."

"Fine, this is essentially the combination of two techniques, both of which I think you have seen before. The first is a chakra draining technique, except in this case we will be reversing it and sending the chakra in to you. In order for your body to be able to compensate for the added chakra, we have modified it to also transfer some of the body's base-strength and muscle tissue."

"Won't that be detrimental to you?"

"Not at this level, about 2%. Our chakra levels will be back to normal, and we will be able to rebuild the muscle tissue over time, so on our part there will be no long term repercussions. The second technique is the Hokage's strength technique, it will be applied before the transfer takes place. "

"Which accomplishes what?"

"For the purpose of your body, the drained strength is just that, so by inflating it with the Hokage's super strength, the boost to you will be much greater then it otherwise would be. Got it?"

"Hmm, no. But don't let that stop you."

".... well you heard him, everyone in to position and begin transfer technique."

"Oh, one last thing." Kakashi had the full attention of the research team as he leaned forward, and pulled up his headband to display the Sharingan eye. "Don't mess up."

For the first time since the silver haired Jounin had arrived, the research team got a small glimpse of the ninja behind the fierce reputation.

Two members of the team were in place in front of Kakashi and two behind. It was then someone should have realized a variable that no one had considered before: Kakashi's Sharingan . It was active and memorizing the technique, this had been expected, and part of the reason Kakashi had been chosen. But even though he wasn't using it to perform a genjutsu, there was still something, distracting if not mezmerizing about seeing it up close. To researchers, it was easy to get distracted by theories when you see something knew. Which is why they missed the cut-off point.

Kakashi was distracted by the actual procedure, and wouldn't know when they were supposed to stop anyways. The other two members of the team tried to get them to stop, but they were too lost in thought, and light headed from already going too far. So the unaffected pair did the only thing they could think of and went to grab the two that were continuing the procedure. Which only caused there to be something resembling a complete electrical circuit, and now the strength of all four members was being drained in to Kakashi, who still was too caught up in what was happening to him to pay any attention.

For Kakashi, it was easy to get lost in what he was feeling. At first there was just a twinge of pain as his body began to restructure itself, then the process of his muscles growing felt like the best workout of his life. He could feel as the building muscle pushed his arms outward his defined biceps become bigger then what you would ever see on a ninja, but not so big they would impair his range of motion. His body was taking a unique approach to maintaining it's efficient and increasing build. He was growing.

His original hight was 5 feet, 11 inches with an athletic build. Within the first minute of the transfer he was up to 6'6". His body kept pushing outwards as his traditional dark blue outfit was stretched to it's limits trying to hold him. At 6'8" the sleeves of his shirt were only covering his biceps. At 7' they began to tear. at 7'6" his pants were ripping along the seems. At 8feet his pants resembles shorts and his vest was beginning to feel the pressure. At 9 feet he sleeves were out of the way and his former pants were loosely held together cloth at mid thigh.

When he stopped growing at 10ft, there wasn't much left of Kakashi's cloths. As he became more aware of his surroundings he noticed two things: 1) the researchers all appeared to be passed out, and 2) his mask was gone. Clearly with this situation being unacceptable, Kakashi took what was left of his shirt and made a make shift mask out of it. Then he went to check on the researchers. They were all breathing, and their bodies showed the side effects of the draining process. Instead of an average to slim build there skin was very loose on their thin bodies. Kakashi guessed that approximately 50% of their strength had been drained in to him. They should survive, but unless the process was reversed, which would not be deemed too dangerous, Hatake Kakashi was stuck being at least twice the size of any other ninja in the village, and most of the known world.

On the bright side, he thought to himself, at least I should be strong enough to beat Akatsuki now.
11122211.title: Kakashi grows

111222111.content:
"I think i should report this to the hokage" said kakashi.
And he starts to walking across the village, while all the other people stared looking at him.
"Finally, the hokage´s room" said after all the scared looks of all the people.
since he was too big, he couldn´t enter through the door, so he broke it...
" I see you are here" said tsunade with a angry voice. " Looks like the process worked, and your strenght will be at double... i know you could do it".
Suddenly kakashi´s body started to grew even more, up to the roof. His biceps growth twice of his size, his pecs were two big rocks, then the growth stopped.
"Looks like there was a little problem with the jutsu...now your height is 15 ft, guessing by my broken roof"
"Yes but, im huge, if you didnt notice, so i will need the location of akatsuki if you have it, before i reach the 20 fts"

tsunade gave him some clues about akatsuki hideout, and he moved quickly before another growth...

"now, what should i do?"
111222111.title: Kakashi reports to the Hokage (stays good)

choices: Try the jutsu to weaken them first.
1112221111.content:
While Kakashi was making his way to track down members of Akatsuki, They were busy making plans of their own. With the recent losses of Hidan and Kakuzu they decided to make a more active push to get the rest of the tailed beasts. Their recent movement were how Konaha was able to get any information.

The good news about this is that Akatsuki would be divided so in a worst case scenario Kakashi would only have to fight against 2 at once (although with their ego, goading them in to 1 on 1 fights should be easy). The bad news is this could make them harder to find. Since the best he could do was chase rumors, Kakashi wouldn't even know who he would be up against until he got there. With the thinning out of Akatsuki's ranks, that left the possibilities as: Itachi, Kisame, Pain, Konan, Zetsu, and Tobi(Madara).

As luck, or possibly bad luck, would have it, the first ones he had managed to track down were Itachi and Kisame. Thanks to Kakashi's dogs, he had advanced notice and was able to stop before encountering them and come up with a plan.

Even at 20ft, attacking them head on presented a significant risk. On the other hand, he could use his modified version of the new jutsu to try and drain their strength in a sneak attack. The downside of that is he could be discovered, allowing them to get the first attack in, or he could be successful and get even bigger which would make it harder to sneak around tracking the rest of Akatsuki.

Either plan had the potential to work or fail about equally, so weighing the consequences Kakashi decided on the best course of action.
1112221111.title: I see Itachi over there!!

11122212.content: Going for a different story/Sensei
11122212.title: Change of direction

111222121.content:
The hidden village of leaf was rebuilding, again. It had been bad enough after Orochimaru's attack, now they had to clean up after Pain's assault which had done far more damage. Oh sure everyone was grateful for the lack of casualties, but no one was looking forward to all that construction work.

Especially not Yamato, after his first display of using his jutsu to get a lot of work done with a few hand signs more and more people were looking to him as if he could magically rebuild the village. It took effort, and chakra, and effort, and time, and effort! No one was even giving him respect for his work, they just thought he would drop whatever he was doing to come help with their project. Which goes a long way towards explaining why he had snapped at the ANBU messenger that had woken him up from a well deserved nap. It took a lot of Yamato's skills to sneak away just so he could get a small break.

The ANBU gave him a scroll, and a message from the new Hokage, Danzo. The message was simple and to the point "Test the jutsu on this scroll outside of the village. I want it done in the next few hours." When Yamato had looked up to question the ANBU, the figure was already gone leaving him alone with the scroll. Even if Yamato didn't like it, Danzo was the hokage and he was obligated to listen. The keyword was listen, not trust.

Yamato quickly made his way to find someone he did trust, Hatake Kakashi. He opened the scroll for them to inspect the jutsu, hoping they could figure out what Danzo wanted. After a brief analysis Kakashi said "well, there are some parts that look familiar, almost likes it's a combination of techniques. What the final result would be I can't say, but it looks like the basic effort is to boost your chakra many times over. I would guess Danzo wants to use your jutsu to rebuild the village quickly in an effort to make himself look good."

Yamato frowned, he couldn't pass this up if it meant helping the village, even if that meant making Danzo look good. "I guess there really isn't any choice. Here, take the scroll in case anything goes wrong, and you might want to put some distance between us as well." Kakashi nodded while receiving the scroll, then jumped off to what he decided was a safe distance. Lifting his headband to expose his SHARAGIN eye, Kakashi analyzed the jutsu while Yamato performed the hand signs...

After he finished forming the signs to release the justu Yamato felt a jolt go through his body. He was stiff right after and wondering if this was going to kill him. It was followed by a wave of pain that he was sure would kill him, then all of the sudden it relaxed. He watched the ground move further away as he stood upright, except he was already upright and it was still moving! Yamato was too stunned to even say anything.

He was growing bigger! He watched his boots push away loose dirt as they pushed outwards. He watched as trees around him were starting to look a lot less big then they used to. Then he felt something different, a pressure all around his body. He looked at his arms and to his further shock, his muscles were growing.

Yamato watched as his biceps swelled up with power. His sleeves went from being loose, to bunching up around the peaking muscle, to skin tight, to ripping away. He moved his arm in disbelief, they were at least 2-3 times larger then they used to be. That was just in proportion to his body, by now just one of his biceps might be as big as a normal person's head!

He felt the same pressure on his legs, the process repeating itself. Large and powerful legs quickly broke free. His pants were torn to tight fitting shorts, Yamato nearly sighed in relief when his legs were free. Now he was feeling a tightness on his chest, and by now it was no surprise what was happening. His chest was moving outwards as it filled with more and more power. Likewise his back was toning and filling up with muscle. Tears started forming everywhere in the black fabric, offering brief glimpses at the still expanding muscles beneath. His growing muscles eventually overwhelmed the shirt leaving his sculpted upper body on display.

Yamato looked himself over in disbelief. By the time he finished growing he was at least 100 feet tall, and his muscles swelled with power like never before. He flexed and touched every muscle as if to try and see if this had really happened to him. In a matter of moments Yamato had gone from jounin to muscle giant that overshadowed everything around him...
111222121.title: Yamato

1112221211.content:
Standing tall above the village the only thing Yamato could think of was "well, that was unexpected." He looked around, locating Kakashi moving towards him with a great deal of hesitation. Yamato certainly could understand that, he would probably be hesitant too. For now he took the time to analyze the changes that had occurred to him. Physically speaking he never felt better. While the remains of his clothing were less then desired, he couldn't help but note he looked pretty good without a shirt on now. Otherwise, Yamato was feeling relatively normal, maybe a little more refreshed, like he had tapped in to a new reservoir of chakra.

By now Kakashi had arrived at his feet, Yamato was amazed. The man he respected so much was not even 4 inches tall to him in comparison. Yamato carefully knelt down so that he would be able to hear Kakashi, who backed up at first when Yamato moved. Then Kakashi came closer, "how do you feel?" Even though he was so small Yamato thought he heard a bit of concern in the other man's voice when he asked that question.

Yamato paused to consider his answer then said, "To tell the truth I've never felt better. Before I was exhausted, now I feel like I recently woke up from a nap." His muscles unconscionably twitched from time to time, which was just serving to show them off all the more. "It doesn't even feel like I used any chakra, if anything it seems like I have more."

With this new information in mind, Kakshi reconsidered the jutsu. It appeared to somehow draw on outside chakra in order give an sustain the user's new size. If it was up to just their internal supply any ninja would quickly burn through it and shrink back down. Since Yamato wasn't feeling any weaker though, either the amounts were minuscule, or it was drawn in from nature itself similar to Naruto's Sage energy. Which would effectively mean there would be no way to shrink down a giant. "Why don't you do a simple test, like reforming a segment of the wall to see the difference."

Yamato nodded then stood back up. He walked to the edge of the village and looked to his left, and then his right. Everything looked so small to him now, that if he made something in proportion to his size it would completely overshadow the village. With that in mind he plotted the new structure he had in mind, performed his hand signs and then struck the ground. The frame for the new wall burst quickly from the ground, in no time reaching the height of the former walls. To an onlooker it seemed like the walls were spreading outwards continuing all the way until they had circled the village. In no time at all Yamato had done at least half the work of restoring the village wall.

He stood up again to survey his work, and then survey himself. While his earlier efforts had taken quite a strain on his body he felt like he hadn't done anything more complicated then forming the chakra to stand on water. In other words, he felt pretty good. Kakashi had moved to stand on top of the new wall, making it a little easier on Yamato who could now sit down next to it and speak to his friend.
1112221211.title: Kakashi talks to Yamato

111222211.content:
Kiba was on his way back to the Leaf Village, carrying an assortment of ingredients back from the mountains. The hospitals needed a few more herbs, although some of these plants Kiba never even heard of before! Like Agig Root, or Nagit Leaves... Such strange names... Kiba never expected such things to exist! They almost sounded as if they were something out of a child's fairy tale...

As Kiba was walking, he didn't even see as he and another crashed into each other, forcing Kiba to drop the bag, its contents spilling onto the street.

"Watch it, you dumb dog!" Naruto barked, rubbing his head.

"Me? Why don't YOU watch it!" Kiba snapped right back. He immediately began to gather up the plants, dusting them off. Naruto then stood up, and dusted himself off. He snickered as he looked down at Kiba.

"Heh, they still got you running errands, dog boy?" Naruto asked with a cocky smirk. Kiba just glared back up at him.

"You're the one to talk! You're still a genin!" Kiba said, feeling sure that his comment would be enough to win the argument.

"Yeah? Does just any genin get to take on a B rank mission?" Naruto replied back. Kiba could almost feel this air to Naruto, some kind of swagger, if you will, that reeked of superiority.

"Like hell you did! What are you doing!?" Kiba shouted back, finally getting to his feet with everything picked up.

Naruto pulled an official paper, signed by Tsunade herself, stating that Naruto was going to be protecting a young member of the land's royal family. "Sh-Shit..." Kiba mumbled almost quietly, but Naruto was able to hear. It brought such a grin to his face.

"That's right! Who's a stupid genin now?" Naruto laughed, walking off triumphantly. Kiba was steamed. There was nothing else he could say! He let out a big breath.

"Just... Wait... He'll get his..." Kiba thought to himself. He continued on his way, up to the Leaf's Hospital.

As Kiba entered, he looked around, trying to find where the herbs would be delivered. "Oh! You!" A doctor waved from behind the desk. "You have the fresh medicine, yes? Please, follow me!" He said, walking out from behind his position, and guiding Kiba off to another wing.

As they arrived, Kiba took note of how the doctors started to look less medical and more research. "Hey..." Kiba said softly.

"Yes? What is it?" The doctor asked, looking back at Kiba as he led him.

"What are you going to use these for anyway? I've never even heard of half of these things..." Kiba then asked the man.

"Oh... You'll see." The man replied, a sneaky smile on his face. As they entered the next door, they saw what appeared to almost be some kind of lab. "Here we are... Research and development. Where we're always trying to find cures to diseases!" The doctor announced.

Kiba was looking all around. There were strange machines he had never seen before, and various people mixing chemicals of colors one would only see in their dreams!

"So... What are these for then?" Kiba asked, holding up the back. The docor then took it, smiling at the boy.

"These are going to help us solve the problem of muscle loss!" He said, "Some disease, and even some ninjutsu can cause the deterioration of muscle! With these, we should be able to counter it, and help muscles grow back, and grow stronger than ever!"

"Okay...?" Kiba tilted his head. He hadn't really heard of such a thing, but then again, he was no medical expert either.

"Thank you for your help, boy!" The doctor said, "I'll let you see yourself out."

Kiba turned, and began to walk away, heading out to report back to Tsunade.
111222211.title: Mixing Business and Pleasure

1112222111.content:
The doctor was really excited...a bit too excited in Kiba's opinion. There was enthusiastic and then there was just plain WEIRD. Kiba half expected to see some guy wearing swirly eyed glasses with wild hair cackling about some experiment while lightning flashed in the background. He stopped walking towards the exit and blinked. "Man, I've got to stop watching those late night monster movies..." He muttered to himself, shaking his head.

Just as he was about to reach the door, something on the corner of a table caught his eye. He turned and saw a strange glass vial filled with green liquid set carefully in a rack. Strangely, despite the rack having spots for at least nine other vials, it was the only one there. Curious, Kiba walked over to it and, after making sure no one was paying attention, grabbed it. He turned it over in his fingers, examining it. It was sealed shut with not only a sturdy looking cork but also a fair amount of wax, holding the cork firmly in place. A piece of masking tape been wrapped around the small glass tube, hastily written black letters scribbled on it proclaiming: EX. 001. It didn't really look any more special than any of the other vials full of colored liquid scattered around the lab, so why was this particular one singled out? Kiba shrugged and was about to put it back when he remembered what the doctor had said. They were developing a chemical that could...uh...reverse muscle...something...deter...deterioration! That was it! In other words, they were making something that made muscles grow! Kiba grinned as he closed his fist around the vial. There was a very good chance that this was that same chemical! Kiba was not a scrawny weakling by any stretch of the imagination. His body was as toned and fit as any other ninja around, more so in fact when compared to several of his ninja brethren! But how could he let an opportunity like this pass? Why just settle for athletic when he could be more? Kiba could just imagine the stupid look on Naruto's face when he came back form his mission to find Kiba totally jacked, his pecs barely contained by his net under shirt, his biceps bigger than melons, his abs so rock hard that Naruto would hurt his hand just trying to punch it, his legs...

Kiba looked down and noticed that he was starting to sport a pretty sizable tent in his pants. The possibilities of having that kind of power was really turning him on...That pretty much settled it. He pocketed the vial and quickly left, hoping that no one would notice the vial was missing until it was already too late.

The dog ninja was eager to get back home and try out this chemical, but he had a duty to perform yet. He had to report to Tsunade that he had completed his mission. He quickly ran towards the Hokage's Mansion, hoping to get this whole thing over with as fast as possible.

As Kiba made his way to the Mansion, a young intern doctor who was just getting started today, was desperately searching for the vial that Kiba had stolen. He had a frantic look on his face as he tried to find where he had placed it. He had made sure to put it someplace where it wouldn't get lost but the rack he had left it in was now empty! "Oh man..." He thought miserably to himself. "If I don't find that sample I'm going to be in big trouble!"

"Boy! Where is the vial?" The head doctor called out. He made a habit of never remember anyone's name. If you were lucky, you got a nickname. Otherwise you were just "Boy!" or "Girl!".

"I-I can't find it sir!" The intern admitted. "It seems to be missing!"

"Missing?! Egads boy! Do you understand how important that vial is?"

"With all due respect sir, this is my first day! If it was that important why was I--"

"Silence you ignorant twit!" The doctor shouted, smacking the boy across the face. "Just find the vial!"

"Sir, you promised you would stop doing that to the interns..." A female doctor said, quietly admonishing the head doctor.

"Ack! I'm surrounded by insubordination and incompetence!" The doctor shouted, stamping his foot. "This is the culmination of my life's work and you all act as though it was a baking soda and vinegar volcano! That vial was the first and currently only dose of my muscle restoring chemical! We haven't even performed any tests on it yet! If we don't find it then all of this will be for nothing!" He grabbed a lead pipe and started smashing things indiscriminately. "Nothing! Nothing! Nothing!"

"Sir, please calm down! Remember your blood pressure!" The female doctor shouted, chasing after him with a needle. "Someone hold him down! I have a sedative!"

Back outside, Kiba groaned as he exited the Hokage Mansion. Tsunade had forced him to fill out a bunch of paper work relating to the roots and leaves he had gathered, so that the Nara Clan (the roots and leaves had been gathered on their property) would know what and how much was taken. But he was finally free and that was what mattered! He swiftly started running towards his house, the vial safely stored inside his pocket. He was about halfway to his home when he stopped to land on the roof of a store. He was starting to have some second thoughts...going to his house (where his whole family would be) might not be the best plan, especially if he was going to be taking some weird chemical. It would probably be best to go somewhere else...but where?

It was a peaceful day in Dragon World for once. All the alien, demon, monster, etc. problems had been taken care of and Goku was taking a well deserved break. It gave him time to reflect on the situation of the Earth. It seemed that everytime an alien threat was neutralized another, more powerful, threat rose to match it. He had already reached his limit several times, pushing past it to impossible levels of power, and yet he was at the end of his rope. Whatever came next, if anything came next, it would be too much for him to take care of. He knew that Gohan would be able to keep fighting for awhile, but for how long? How long would his power last with the life style he's chosen? One of books and studying rather than protection and fighting? No, it was up to Goku to keep the Earth safe. It always had been. There had to be a way to get stronger. Maybe Korin would know of a way. He was knowledgable of the Senzu Beans, magic beans that gave a person back his energy. Maybe there was something he could use to get stronger.

Having decided, he jumped up, put his fingers to his forehead, and concentrated on finding Korin's ki signature. It didn't take long and he was soon standing in Korin's Tower. Korin himself was just coming up from the downstairs area of the tower when he spotted Goku.

"Hey Goku." He said, walking over to the saiyan. "What brings you here today?"

"I need a way to get stronger." Goku said, getting right to the point. "There's no telling when another hidden threat could arise and this time I might not be able to defend the Earth against it. Is there anything you can give me?"

"Hmmm...." Korin said, tapping his walking stick thoughtfully. "I have been developing a new kind of Senzu Bean. It's supposed to increase energy and raise your strength. But they're still in the experimental stage and could be dangerous. Are you sure you want to risk it?"

"Yeah!" Goku said enthusiastically. "I don't care what the side affects are. I need to get stronger."

"Very well." Korin said. "I'll be right back."

Goku waited patiently while Korin walked back downstairs. He was only gone for a few minutes before he came walking back up with a bag in his hand.

"There are six beans in here. That's the best I can do for now. Don't take too many at once and report back to me any side affects you may be experiencing or if they're not working correctly."

"You got it! Thanks Korin!" Goku waved before jumping from the tower and flying back towards his home.

It didn't take long for Goku to get home. He opened the bag and pulled out one of the beans. It was red instead of the usual greenish color of the Senzu Beans and it was slightly bigger. He tossed one in his mouth and chewed it up. It tasted the same as any other Senzu Bean. He swallowed it and waited for something to happen.

1122111212.content:
Prologue
6 years before Buu arrival


"Eternal Dragon, by your name, I summon you forth: Shenron!"

The 7 dragon balls responded to the call, shining like tiny suns as the green dragon appeared in the thin air.

He looked down to his summoner and recognized him as the boy who was present in his last summoning after Cell's defeat, Gohan, despite having gained 15cm (6") in height and a stronger appearance since then.

"I need you to grant me a wish."
"Unfortunately, as I informed all of you last time, I can't resurrect your father. I can only bring back people who hadn't been resurrected." Shenron could read the young lad's heart and his deepest desire.

The face of Goku's son turned into a pout of sadness, but he contained his feelings and continued talking.

"I know. I didn't come for that."

A year had passed since his death. Although during that time Gohan was able to come to terms with it, a big part of him still missed him everyday... but also a smaller part resented him for wanting to stay in the Other World instead of with his family.

"And why did you call me for, summoner?"
"I'm the new defender of the Earth, but I'm not up to the task. I thought after Cell the world would be in peace, but a few months later an alien named Bojack appeared and almost killed me. I'm afraid new enemies will keep coming, each one stronger than the previous one. And I'm not my father, I don't know how to train well alone, I feel like I can't advance... and my mother wants me to study all the day. I can't tell her no, but that way I'll never get stronger and won't be able to match the next monster."

Shenron paid attention to every word of Gohan, intrigued about the wish he was going to ask to solve the dilemma.

"So please, remove every bad guy like Cell or Frieza in the universe."
"I cannot."
"Why??"
"One of my limitations is being unable to grant damaging or hard-altering wishes which affect beings stronger than my creator, with some exceptions. I can't kill them, making them weaker nor turning them into good people... Although maybe I could, if they were already dead, but that wouldn't be useful to protect your world."
"But... but..."

The shock made Gohan speechless. His plan was ruined.
The silence was absolute during eternal seconds...

"Then... Then I want to become stronger than any of them! I want to be the stronger being in the universe!!"
"T-That's..." The great dragon stuttered for a moment "I fear I can grant that either. I could not make such a radical change on you. You're greatly stronger than my maker. Even if you weren't, the amount of power you want if so enormous that's beyond my capacity to give, and would put you in the same untouchable category."
"SO WHAT CAN YOU DO!? TELL ME, WHAT!!"

The kid exploded, turning into a SSJ2 with the anger... and seconds after the screams of fury became a weak ply.

"...help me..." He muttered on his knees, back to his base state, almost sobering.

Shenron looked at the depressed boy with something that looked like compassion and pity and spoke.

"I could grant you a smaller, more progressive, wish."
"What? What wish?"
"You might ask for enhancements in your saiyan nature. You're one of the most powerful races in the universe, one that can break their own limits with training and sometimes just with rage. I could increase that feature in your metabolism so you would become stronger each day with the minimal effort of living."
"That... would be perfect."

The eyes of the deity shone, and the wish was granted. He didn't feel different, but that was expected.

"And for your second wish...?"
"Second wish?" Gohan didn't have much time to think about the other 2 wishes. "The namekians and other people had stated that I have a great inner power, a potential strength that I could unlock with time or their help... maybe you could make that potential grow like the first wish?"
"Done." The dragon said, and wondered about the implications of making his potential grows as well as his external strength. That would means he'll never stop getting stronger, without a real limit to it.

"And as my third wish, I want to never grow weaker in any circunstance, even if I spend months eating snacks without moving a finger." He wasn't planning on doing that, but was afraid that the scholar life his mother wanted for him could damage his power."There's only one direction I want to go."

The third wish was granted. Later the kid flew to his house. His mother was still sleeping and hadn't noticed his absence. He went to be and fell asleep with a smile, knowing that when he woke up a little stronger than he was then.

Vegeta was not overly sensitive about his height. After all, having enough power in his little finger blow up a planet was more then enough to make up for it. What he did hate was anything, absolutely anything, in which Goku aka Kakarot had over him.

Chalk it up to Vegeta's hyper competitiveness, or just to him being a guy. It really doesn't matter since the net result is the same. He wanted to be the best, the strongest, and ok maybe even sometimes in the corner of his mind he wanted to be the tallest. On the other hand gathering the dragon balls to wish for power seemed, too petty, beneath him. He was determined to become the strongest through hard work, by training on a level Goku couldn't imagine. Hours upon hours a day were spent in 200 times earth's gravity trying to achieve just a little bit more.

Naturally all this did not go completely unnoticed. Trunks spent more time in training with his father, and then another ally in his quest developed: Bulma. Setting aside the other reasons she had to help him there was a motive he didn't expect, science. She used computer mapping to track his training and development, then would use that data to find ways to make his training even more effective. Then to top it all of, she was able to develop a senzu-bean extract to add in with advanced protein shakes to make them roughly 1,000 times more effective.

Everything was going well: Vegeta was getting stronger, Bulma was happy with her scientific achievement, and nothing seemed like it could go wrong. (cue dramatic music).

To understand what happened next involves knowing one other key factor. Bulma always kept on of the dragon balls around. It was a handy security measure that made sure no one could collect them all (other then the good guys). She kept it next to the radar in her lab, until one day for unknown reasons, the nuclear core (think battery-sized) started leaking. This went unnoticed because it was all absorbed by the dragon ball. That became relevant on the day a power-up from Vegeta went particularly wild, broke the barrier of the gravity chamber, blew up half the lab, and knocked the dragon ball in the protein powder. There was an unexpected reaction on the molecular level, the results of which would soon be felt.

With his training session ruined for today, Vegeta went over to the machine Bulma had made to create his protein shakes, the one which had the now contaminated powder in it. Not knowing this of course, Vegeta drank it without a thought and then went outside to try and find Bulma to the gravity chamber fixed. He felt a little light headed, but that was something he would never admit to.

Once outside, the feeling became too much for Vegeta to brush off. He stopped while trying to figure out what was happening. Something was different, almost like it felt when drawing up energy to power up to Super Sayan. The next thing he noticed was that his clothing felt odd, tighter then usual. Looking at his arms, Vegeta saw them bulge up as if he was flexing, but all the while he had stayed perfectly still. His biceps swelled an inch larger as he watched, then another, then another, until in the matter of just a few seconds they filled out five inches larger. Likewise his chest swelled out until it matched the proportions of his arms. Vegeta even felt the power of his legs growing as the muscles became more defined then ever.

Fifteen seconds after it started, Vegeta's transformation was complete. His body had swelled with muscle like he never expected to put on. Tearing his gaze away from his own body wasn't easy to do, but when Vegeta did, everything looked different. It took a few moments to realize why, he was taller, by at least 6 inches. He stood in shock at the realization.

Vegeta suddenly found himself taller, stronger, and better then ever. His clothing was strained to hold his enhanced body in, and did little to hide the strong physic that was now his body. The only thing Vegeta could do in a situation like this was try to figure out what caused it...
