1122121.content:
Krillin arrived at the home/lab of the Briefs family, the short, bald warrior nervous. ''Bulma asked me here for an experiment and I'm honestly worried what kind of torment she'll put me through.'' He thought in worry. He knew very well declining her tends to make Bulma mad, and Vegeta would begrudgingly do whatever his wife says.

Arriving at the entrance Krillin was greeted by Dr. Briefs outside with his wife. "Oh hello Krillin! You here for Bulmas latest experiment?"

Krillin nodded. "Y-yeah."

"Well she's in her lab. Best get to her before she gets mad." The old scientist replied as he sat down and started to eat with Panchy.

Entering their home Krillin quickly reached the lab in question, where Bulma had parts all over the place, a massive mechanical chamber, and a silly looking gun at the table. She was at the table herself, overlooking notes on a blueprint for the gun.

"I'm here Bulma." The short fighter spoke first, hoping it would soften her fury for being late.

Looking up, instead of the usual frustrated blue haired scientist was instead a smiling Bulma. "Ah! My first test subject is here!" She said with joy.

"Yeah. I was hoping to learn what it was you said was so important for me to get over and test. I was trying to do something at the time." Krillin responded. Though he couldn't admit he was trying to impress 18 only for it to fail spectacularly due to her call. 18 just gave him a smirk before leaving.

"I want you to enter this chamber behind me and test it out."

"Is it dangerous?"

"No. I made sure to work any kinks out first." Bulma replied honestly, but that worried Krillin all the more.

"Any dangerous side affects? Will it turn me into anything weird?"

"Of course not. Im testing this invention on one of my friends afterall! Just get in there!"

Seeing she was strarting to get frustrated, he stopped asking questions. Looking at it, Krillin could tell it was nearly as high as the roof. The door to it was open, which showed the sterile and empty chamber within. Krillin hestitatingly entered the chamber, the door quickly shutting behind him as it lights began to turn on the outside of the invention. Looking at the outside, Bulma messed with the knob to set it on a taller sized man. With that a whirring began as the machine buzzed to life, a rthymic wave began to slowly push onto Krillin inside the chamber.

That's when he heard cracking. *CRACK* His bones broke as they started to repair themselves, his arms began to lengthen as they stretched downwards. His legs lengthened as his torso began to stretch upwards. "W-what's happening? I'm getting taller?" he thought in surprise as his body stretched upwards. His height rose higher from his original size as he quickly reached 6 feet and grew just a tad higher to 6'4.

"And why are my muscles shrinking?" Indeed, the muscle he worked to keep was soon replaced by slender arms and limbs as they vanished. "Should have known Bulma would have lied about there not being side affects." He sighed in disappointment.

Slowly the machine began to slow down as the lights began to fade to black. With a *DING* the door popped open and Krillin was let outside where he now towered over Bulma.

"So the first half of my invention works as intended. A way to make people taller!" Bulma said with triumph as Krillin looked annoyed.

"It takes away all my hard earned muscle though." Krillin sighed. He really should have just stayed and try another way to make up to 18. He figured out pretty easily she chose him cause he was the shortest warrior amongst the lot once he started to get taller.

"Not to worry! The gun I made was meant to remedy that part of the experiment." She said enthused as she brought it up. It had a sleek appearance and looked more appropriate for shooting lasers than restoring muscle. "And with this we'll increase your muscle mass back to normal on your improved body!" Then I can test this out on subject no.2 and 3:Gohan and Goku

Krillin let her shoot him as he felt energy pulsate across his form...

Adult Gohan descended from the sky to land in front of Capsule corp. The blie haired scientists had called him to test an experiment to help him keep up with his father and Piccolo, as his soft heart meant he didm't dedicate his life to it. As he walked to the entrance Gohan saw Bulma's parents happily eating together outside. "Hey Mr. And Mrs. Briefs!" Gohan waved to them before heading for the door as they waved back, only to fail to see before him as he collided face first with a thick living wall, knocking him back.

"Ooh sorry Gohan! Didn't see you there!" Krillins enlarged face on a massive body looked down, having to adjust his eyesight to lok over his new beefy pecs, the stretchable armor worn by Vegeta covering his new frame.

"K-krillin?! What happened to you?" Gohan said in surprise as he scanned him up and down. "You look great!"

"Thanks!" Krillin cockily flexed a bicep, 27 inches of beef rising "Bulmas new invention did this and I honestly feel strong enough to take on anyone!" His ki was definitely higher than before. Gohan even felt it rivaled Piccolo's and was still rising. Looking down the bald man smiled as he realized what was going on. "Figured she would try it on someone else though. Knew she wouldn't just do it to me."

"I guess so. She called me for an experiment to help me get my strength up." Gohan said as saw how the blue material stretched over every part of Krillins body, moving over to let Krillin move by and heexited the building.

"Well It definitely will! I'm going to go show off to and have a friendly spar with Goku." Krillin beamed. He was so excited to see Goku's reaction. He was starting to take flight to head to the Son household.

"Just don't get cocky. You know my dad will get stronger as you fight." Gohan advised as Krillin started to speed up, hearing "I won't!" as Krillin sped up as white aura of ki surrounded him.

Gohan was happy his friend liked the changes. He'd known Krillin since he was a kid and fought with his dads friend all the way to Namek. The warrior who shaved his head had spent his life unable to keep up with Goku. Putting his thoughts aside Gohan headed for Bulma's lab. There the blue haired scientist was prepping the gun for use again.

"Hi Bulma. Here as test subject number 2 for your invention."

She looked up, holding the ray meant for increasing muscle mass and ki. "Hi Gohan. By your statement you've seen Krillins new appearance?" His nod confirming it before she continued. "Was hoping to keep it a secret before more people found out. Oh well."

Bulma began to activate the gun in her hand "I'm only trying this one on you. You ready?"

"Yes. Seeing how much Krillin's ki increased I'm ready to try this."

With that Bulma turned the beam on him.

1122121122.content:
A second after hitting him with the beam, a flash of energy blinded Bulma and a blast wave broke every window in the lab and almost her eardrums, and throwing her body against a wall.

Something had gone really wrong.

She got up slowly, dizzy by the hit, and looked at his test subject. He was screaming as loud as he could, with his body covered with a saiyan aura, as the muscle growth ray kept bombarding him with more enlarging energies.

In a beat, all his muscles doubled its girth, ripping his clothes in a dozen of places. Another spasm, and they were doubled again, tearing them to shreds.

"Gohan, move!" Bulma begged to the boy, but he couldn't. His muscles were paralized by the ray, keeping them flexed while it enlarged them.

His body was similar to a hypermuscular SUPER SAIYAN THIRD GRADE, although Bulma could notice he was much, much stronger, and it was becoming even more powerful with every second

"AHHHHHHHHHHH!!"

Another wave of ki energy pushed the scientist back, who was fighting the air turbulences to reach the device to shut it down. The machine staggered, but it wasn't enough to make it fall. However, the trembling diverted the course of the grow beam, hitting Gohan's genitalia.

"Aah AhAaAaaH!!"

Suddenly, his screams became less painful and more pleasant. His penis became hard, growing bigger, surpassing the 15cm (6") mark... 20cm mark (8")... 25cm mark (10"), in a neverending, evergrowing erection. And with each centimeter it gained in length, it grew several more in girth, becoming impossibly fat.

When it was reaching the dimensions of a big bottle of wine the blast waves moved the device and the direction of the bean a third time, concentrating his power in his body.

An spasm, and his pecs became more and more similar to Broly's... like the rest of his body.
He was packing so much muscle his bones he couldn't move or breath... and eventually the increasing pressure of the growing muscles broke his bones.

"aAAAAAAAAAAAA" Goku's son's voice was again filled with pain.

Bulma had suspected the ray might have a greater effect on saiyans than humans due the physical superiority of those aliens, but she had never expected so much.

But the breaking of his bones was actually benign, making use of the breaks to lengthen them, making room for the muscle mass, reducing its pressure... until his ever-growing muscles filled again all the available room and broke his bones again, repeating the circle.

His head was rising slowly but constantly, whereas his shoulders and girth were growing much faster...
And the amount of ki inside his body was increasing so incredibly fast, exponentially, he feared he was going to blow up. The skies reacted to his colossal Ki getting darker and releasing lighting bolts around the lab.

The wind didn't let her getting close to the device, so she tried a different solution: turning off the
fuses (they were in another room) so the machine wouldn't receive more power. It worked.

Once she returned, he found Gohan laying on the floor. He looked huge, but Bulma didn't know how much until he got up.

His spiky hair was brushing the ceiling, meaning he was over 210cm (7 feet) tall now.
He wasn't as tall as Broly (although he wasn't far from him), but he had the same muscular build, with gigantic pecs, biceps bigger than his head, thick muscular neck and legs... and, of course, those incredible shoulders... His shoulders were three times thicker than when he came in and probably could only pass through the door sideways.

"Gohan...?"

Bulma feared the extreme transformation would have affected his mind, but fortunately that was proved false. The mixed race warrior looked at her and smiled.

"Thanks, Bulma... I can feel it now... I'm strong, so strong I feel I can match Vegetto's might. This is exactly what I wanted"
"Please, don't tell your mother I had something to do with your transformation..." Bulma knew Chichi's temper and knew she would take experimenting with his son the wrong way...
"Don't worry, she probably will think it's just a late growth spurt due to my grandfather's inherited genes." Chichi's father was really tall and stocky too.

He said goodbye to his friend and flew out to the sky, creating another blast wave that finished breaking the last remaining glasses in the windows of the lab.

"I hope this kid would learn how to control his power before he breaks everything in his home..."

Bulma had to decide what to do next. He wished to test his machine one more time with Goku, but after the disastrous results with Gohan she wasn't so sure anymore.
Also, she couldn't claim the ray's energy couldn't cause side effects or further growth later...

1131.content:
The sea was shining a miraculous blue, the color of which couldn't be found anywhere outside the Grand Line. The Going Merry was currently slicing that blue aside as it traveled toward the next island indicated by the Log Pose. Nami was situated at the front of the boat looking out into the ocean, the map uncurled in her hand. Her finger was tracing a path along the islands trying to figure where the Log Pose was directing them. Down in the hold of the ship Sanji was preparing lunch for the crew while up in the crow's nest Usopp was keeping a lookout for enemy ships and the island itself when it chose to reveal itself. Zoro was sleeping in the shade while Luffy was leaning over the edge of the ship staring into the water. Everything was pretty quiet all things considered. Of course things never stay quiet for long on the Going Merry.

"I'M SO BORED!!"

Nami turned around with a frown on her face and said, "So do something to make yourself useful! Why don't you go and fish or something?"

Luffy pushed himself off the railing and landed on his back. "Nah, I did that this morning."

Nami sighed and said, "Well...why don't you just be patient until we make it to the next island?"

Luffy just stared at Nami.

"Why are you looking at me like that? It's not like I have a bunch of activities planned for you if you get bored or something!"

Suddenly Usopp called out from the crow's nest, "Land ho! I can see the next island!"

Luffy ran over to Nami and jumped out onto the figurehead of the Going Merry, scanning the horizon with a big grin on his face. Nami pulled out a telescope and managed to spot the island which was slightly to the right of the figurehead, Luffy's body slightly covering it. She looked at the Log Pose and found that it was pointing directly at the island.

"Great! We should be there in fifteen minutes at most!" Nami said happily.

Those fifteen minutes passed quickly as Luffy ran around excitedly with Usopp wondering what kind of adventures or treasures could be found on the island. Zoro woke up when they were five minutes from the island and Sanji came up a few minutes after that to tell everyone lunch was ready.

"No time!" Nami shouted grabbing Sanji by the collar and pulling him towards the edge of the ship. "We've got to search that island up ahead for treasure!"

"How do you know there's even treasure around here?" Sanji asked, shaking himself from Nami's grasp.

She grinned and pulled out a map. "Surprise! I have a map! I bought it at the last island we visited and it just so happens that the Log Pose was pointing toward the island where the treasure is! Now come on! You and me are going to look for it!"

Sanji instantly followed Nami, hearts in his eyes and grand ideas of romance in his head. Nami, perhaps sensing this, collected Usopp to help as well. This left Zoro and Luffy to explore the island themselves. Luffy quickly charged ahead and jumped off the ship onto dry land. Zoro followed and both took stock of the island. It was standard fare, covered in a large forest as far as they could see. Hurrying into the trees Luffy and Zoro moved from clearing to clearing looking for anyone or anything on the island. Luffy was quickly becoming disappointed as there didn't appear to be anything special on the island. When they entered another clearing and there was nothing but a pool of water and a small grove of fruit trees he collapsed next to the pool and moaned, "This place is so boring! It's just trees, trees, trees!"

Zoro sighed and sat down next to his cabin. "Well what were you expecting?"

Luffy shrugged and said, "I don't know. Some kind of monster or really great treasure or some weird guy. Anything like that."

"Well it doesn't look like anything like that lives here. It's just an ordinary boring island."

Zoro laid down on his back and put his arms behind his head relaxing once again. Luffy splashed the pool slightly and looked down into the water. The water was surprisingly clear. He could see right down into the water. He dipped his hands in and pulled out a handful, slurping it up. It tasted surprisingly sweet, almost like a fruit drink rather than water. It left a strange buzz in Luffy's mouth not unlike an alcoholic beverage. He was about to drink more when his stomach started growling loudly. Walking over to the trees Luffy picked a few of the fruits and ate one. The fruit was extremely tender the flesh practically exploding juice in his mouth. He gobbled up fruit after fruit his stomach filling far more quickly than it ever did before. Sighing in contentment Luffy laid down next to the pool and drank more of the water. He drank and drank until his stomach was a sloshing ball. He turned over onto his back and sighed, rubbing his swollen tummy. In a matter of seconds he was asleep.

As he slept the fruit and water worked into his system, the power they contained filling every corner of his being. His stomach quickly shrank back down to normal as the water was absorbed into Luffy's body. Within seconds Luffy's body started changing drastically. His muscles pulsed and slowly started growing. His swollen stomach had burst open his vest earlier showing a full view of his pecs swelling outward while his abs deepened and rose like bread in an oven. His arms followed suit bulging upward as his shoulders broadened and his back tapered out. His triceps equaled his biceps while his forearms strengthened, his hands growing larger and stronger. His feet quickly broke the straps on his sandals as they thickened and lengthened until they could support the massive upper body that was being created. His thighs grew wider, pressing up against each other as his calves bulged outward straining his shorts to the point of destruction.

Luffy continued to sleep on as the changes finished, his body growing taller until he would have stood a foot above even Zoro. This put him dangerously close to the pool. Almost one half of his body was hanging off the edge, his body inches from the magic water.

11421.content:
It was an average day in Urahara Shoten. Urahara was inside, waiting for customers, fanning himself with his little fan and basically being lazy. When Tessai wasn't busy bringing in the new shipments or rearranging the store room, he would sit and chat with Urahara or go outside and break up a fight between Jinta and Ururu. Although, most of their fights were mostly one sided beatings Ururu being so meek. Jinta was getting fed up with his job. He was sick of spending all day everyday outside of the shop sweeping with only the gloomy Ururu to keep him company. All she did was nag at him when he wasn't always focused on the sweeping. She was boring to try and talk to because she was always worried about getting caught or getting in trouble. Finally, Jinta had had enough. He threw down his broom and went inside the shop Ururu watching him from a distance. Jinta was fully intent upon his mission of telling Urahara off when he noticed the store was empty. Whenever Urahara was out alone it was usually because he was with a customer in the back. Tessai was gone too. Jinta assumed this meant he was out back getting the rest of the days shipment. Fuming at his inability to release his anger over the manager, he stomped his way into the stock room to look at the new shipments. It was more of the usual stuff. A lot of it was for maintaining a gigai or soul candy or things like that. But there was one box that was different from the others. Jinta opened and found a bunch of bottles inside. Each one was filled with a green liquid. There was no identifying marks on any of them. Jinta checked the box and saw there was only one word on the box. Supplement. Jinta scratched his head, wondering what these things were used for.

Suddenly, he got an evil idea! He grabbed a bunch of the bottles and stuffed them deep into his pockets. Once his pockets were full of bottles he resealed the box and went into his room. He pulled out one of the bottles and opened it. It smelled strongly of rubbing alchohol. Jinta tasted a little of it and found that it didn't taste like alchohol. He had snuck a little from time to time from Urahara, and this stuff didn't taste like it at all. In fact, it tasted like mint. Jinta shrugged and chugged the bottle down. He pulled out a few more and downed those as well. He put the rest in a box he hid under a pile of clothes in his closet. That would show that lazy Urahara! Jinta wondered if he'd get away with it. Usually Urahara or Tessai could easily see through his pranks. He shrugged again and decided it wasn't worth the trouble to worry about.

114221.content:
Hitsugaya sighed in annoyance as he waited in one of the sterile rooms of the 12th Division of the Soul Reapers. His eye twitched as he thought about all the paper work he had building up, and he knew that his lieutenant with her giant fun-bags was behind it somehow. For some reason, Nemu, the 12th Division lieutenant had contacted him to tell him that it was necessary he get some kind of vaccination for a hollow related disease.

“We’re spirits, how can we even get sick…” he muttered, as thoughts of his fellow white-haired captain, Ukitake came to mind. Normally he wouldn’t even be concerned, but a rather amusing fun fact was that he absolutely despised needles. For all his centuries, he had the child-like fear of needles and it annoyed him immensely. Notwithstanding the fact his ice attacks could also involve needles. He swore he heard Hyorinmaru laughing at him. “We could be dealing with Aizen’s recent coup, or my paperwork, but no, need a stupid needle!!”

His musing was interrupted as the stoic lieutenant of Mayuri walked in, carrying a needle and vial with her. His heart skipped a beat, but he did his best to keep his face neutral. “Hello, Captain Hitsugaya, we’re here to give you your Soul Pox vaccine, since our records show that you never received it.”

“Soul Pox? I’ve never heard of that one.” Hitsugaya countered, eyebrow raised out of suspicion. He’d been captain for a while, but even he had never heard of that one.

“Most people usually have their vaccinations as in infant, so they rarely do, but due to your late coming to the Gotei 13 due to living in Rukongai, you’d never received it. So if you could kindly roll up your sleeve. This should be fast.” Nemu replied as she inserted the needle into the vial, and withdrew the serum within.

Her mind flashbacked to a strange request from her supervisor in the Shinigami Women’s Association, and coincidentally Hitsugaya’s Lieutenant, Rangiku. She’d had a very strange dream, something about Soul Society in ruins, return of Quincy’s, and an adult Hitsugaya. One who was sexy enough that Rangiku just couldn’t wait to see it, so she put in a special request to Nemu in exchange for a favor.

So after some searching, Nemu found an old experiment from Mayuri’s files. Serum XH-19, which offered some promised growth and maturity. After finding the proper serum, she immediately put the call to Hitsugaya. However, she failed to read that Mayuri abandoned the serum due to its instability and unable to produce consistent results, not limited to hypertrophy of the skeletal, muscular, and reproductive structures.

Applying a tourniquet to Hitsugaya’s arm and sterilizing it, she tapped the syringe to get the air bubbles out of it. She saw Hitsugaya tensed up, so she asked Hitsugaya how paperwork was going. “AGh, I wish that I could catch up. Every time I think I’m getting close, Rangiku always finds some way to make me get behind!” He ranted.

“And done!” Nemu said, as she wiped it down and applied a bandage.

“Wait, wha-? It’s done!” Hitsugaya looked on confusedly, he didn’t feel anything at all. Nemu smiled, rare on her face, since most people usually had that reaction.

“Please refrain from strenuous activity, and have a good day Captain Hitsugaya.”

====Seireitei====

Walking on, Hitsugaya was still fairly annoyed with his lieutenant, and as he was heading to back to the barracks, and thinking of his paperwork, decided to simply screw it. Heading towards the Senkaimon, he quickly had the Kido Corps apply his seal, and left towards the real world.

He figured he might as well tour Karakuri town, and went exploring since it was familiar, finding some curious and weird things, along with some shops with “toys” he figured Rangiku needed. He’d better note that…

As he explored though, he quickly found himself very uncomfortable, adjusting his clothes every now and then, since a weird heat had seized him suddenly. He wiped his brow of sweat, which he found very unusual, since he rarely got hot. He was usually cold as a matter of fact. “Did that shot have something to do with this…” He muttered, as it was starting to get disorienting.

He didn’t any different, his body looked normal. He waited for a minute, yet nothing happened. “Hmmm, properly just a dud” Mokuba said with doubt, “cheap waste”. Just before he was about to drop the subject, without warning; he felt a weird, tingling sensation going throughout his body, attaching his attention. “What the?” said a confused Mokuba, his heart rate slowly started to beat faster and louder as both his chest and body twitched with each beat. Mokuba never felt like before, then again how could he. He felt something growing inside him, and continued doing so. Mokuba had a feeling this was an effect caused by the balloon. His chest rose and contracted with every thump of his heart, up and down, up and down, again and again. Suddenly, he felt a great surging reaction erupting, which surprised Mokuba as he began to observe what was about to transpire.

“What’s happening to me!?” Mokuba gasped as he watched his body suddenly starting to physically transform before his eyes. It looked completely odd; but Mokuba seemed as appeared to be expanding or more likely, inflating like a balloon. That’s impossible! How can anyone go through with such a thing like this, it could only happen in a cartoon Mokuba thought. Regardless, it is actually happening right before Mokuba’s eyes. All he could do was to watch in shock as his body billowed outward and upward. However, there seemed something odd about this that caught Mokuba’s attention. Instead of pumping up into a huge, round ball of mass like that in common cartoons; instead parts of Mokuba’s body swelled. To his complete surprise, Mokuba was growing in masses of brawn; his body is being inflated with muscles. He couldn’t believe it, normally he would expect the option to happen to him, but instead it wasn’t. With each second, each of Mokuba’s limbs was swelling in well defined physique; they bulked and bulged in unison of his thumping heartbeats.

Mokuba observed helplessly as his naturally flat chest slowly, but tremendously began to puff up, a loud, leathery stretching sound emitted as his chest distended into twelve shelves of semi-bloated pectoral muscles while they are supported by his back, minimally flaring out. They widen and heighten before the feeling went upwards. “Huh?” said the shaggy haired boy as turned his attention around and nearby his neck. Both of his shoulders twitched, they slightly rosé and broadened for a brief second. The pressure was now surging into his lower body, his legs convulsed with the gaining energy. First, his thighs started to thickened, his dark blue pants started to strain with the widening going on, trying to get use to mass that Mokuba was going as the boy struggle to keep balance with the ballooning brawn. It for awhile before the minor expansion stopped, allowing his calves to be next for the growth to take place. They bulged before they slowly started pumping up, growing into tennis ball sized physique. With both legs pumped, finally both Mokuba’s arms became the next part of his body to feel the balloon’s magical effects.

Both of Mokuba’s averaged sized arms began to greatly expand; he freaked out when he shifted his notice and saw his left arm growing, his forearm thicking and his bicep inflated in pure size, rising, widening and billowing before his right arm undergo the same treatment. Seconds later, they were fully developed like the other muscles. Soon after his arms were developed, all of his muscles continued swelling after each one of them became the efficient size; Mokuba watched helplessly and minor alarm Mokuba wondered when he was going to stop pumping up, he felt scarred without his brother. He closed his eyes in fear, with no comprehension of the size he was billowing. Suddenly, just when Mokuba thought he was going to get any bigger, the tingling feeling slowly started to subside, along with the miraculous effects. Mokuba sighed in calm relief, knowing that it was going to stop. As his heartbeat slowed down, his physical transformation finally came to peaceful halt. The twelve year old’s eyes were wide in surprise as examined his newly gained buffed body, luckily his battle-city clothes managed not to rip apart.

“Okay…” said a confused Mokuba while he flexed a bicep from his left arm to see how big it had gotten got after being blown up. “How in the world I suddenly got this big?” He asked to himself before while he examined his legs. He remembered the package, picking it off the nearby table before reading it. “Manufactured by partnering Balloon companies, Air-abs allows anyone the chance to experience themselves as a superhero or a bodybuilder! The effects of the balloon allow the consumer’s body to grow instant Muscles while performing the inflation.”
Mokuba couldn’t believe what he was reading, this seems too ridiculous, “Buff-a-loon allows anyone the chance to experience themselves as a superhero or a bodybuilder!” he read to himself. “How can that be possible?” said a confused Mokuba as he gazed at his minimally pumped body. He never thought anything like this could happen to him or anyone. Mokuba thought long about this while he observed his transformed body.

“If this is possible, then that means I can gain these muscles in just a matter of seconds” Mokuba thought, “I guess that’s why this thing has such a weird name” said Mokuba as he observed the black balloon that was being held in his right hand, figuring out that this balloon is able to increase the muscle mass by the size of the balloon. Mokuba felt kind of glad that there was a way to get stronger quicker, in appearance at least. He did hate being picked on by the older kids back when he and his older brother were at the orphanage. Even though he felt stronger than what he was before, Mokuba suddenly thought that something didn’t add quite right. He may have bulked up, but what he is now wasn’t clearly enough. Mokuba did look enough to be a professional swimmer, but not a pro bodybuilder. Mokuba felt if he wanted to get stronger and look more powerful, he would need to get bigger. Mokuba wanted to be larger and more taller than he is now. Mokuba figured he would need to be like that if he was going to be stronger in his point of view. Another physical transformation is needed for this; Mokuba knew just what was needed for that. He wondered if he wanted to undergo another expansion to a much larger and pumped up form, thinking about taking the chance. Mokuba looked at the balloon, as a small cute smile formed on his face. “Why not.” He then said, “There’s always someway to get back to normal.” Mokuba had decided that another go was on the way.

Mokuba was ready for the transformation…
11512222211.title: Mysterious Effects

choices: Mokuba continues to Pump n Grow
115122222111.content:
Untying the balloon, Mokuba slowly prepared himself for the immense. Mokuba opened his mouth and inhaled as much air he could gather, wasting no time and no single second. He brought the balloon mouthpiece into the balloon and blew right inside. The balloon reacted, slowly then quickly began to expand again, wider and bigger in size. The twelve year old felt the inflated feeling inside him growing by every second, forcing his body to undergo another inflation, which he knew his stature body was going to be greater and even more larger than the first. His body convulsed with the increasing air matter within him, his skin felt tight, and kept getting tighter with the inflating mass inside. The shaggy haired boy became engulfed by sounds emitted by his burgeoning figure; hissing and like lead plastic squeaking, stretching, tightening, ripping. Mokuba couldn’t really hear other than that as it ringed in both his ears. It felt strange, but Mokuba knew this was the sign that his body was responding to the balloon’s miraculous effects once again.


He kept blowing air into the balloon though, too busy to check on his body. Whilst he do that, oblivious to his that not only his body was changing; he started growing; literally in height. With each breath, Mokuba grew from 4’11, to 4’12, then to a surprising 5’1, and continued to grow even further and taller. His body required a necessary height expansion in order to maintain the mounting muscles that had yet to appear. His arms lengthen, his legs extend, and his body still continued to reach higher. Like before, as long the balloon inflates, his body will do just the same. Grow, pause, breathe, grow, pause, breathe; there was a rhythm to his inflation. Again and again, he continued the same process. As he continued, his shadow even displayed the incredible growth taking place; Mokuba continued to rise, growing higher than he was before, but still Mokuba continued to blow more air into the latex orb; it kept on getting bigger as it looked overly inflated. Finally, Mokuba tied up the balloon’s mouthpiece and placed the balloon on the couch before beginning to observe his brand new form; a small cheerful smile appeared on his face, knowing that something is about to happen.

Finally, his muscles started to bloom again; the first noticeable change began with his pectorals. His striped shirt began to strain, stretching against the brawn that was more than outlining through his shirt. His devolving pectoral muscles swelled wider and outwards, both sides struggled against each other like two huge, inflating beach balls being pushed together. They continued to bulge and swell forcing his shirt to stretch wider and wider. His back flared out in unison with his expanding, god like chest. Next were his forearms, Mokuba turned his sights on them as they grew into great proportions. They rounded, they widen and they filled out; growing with the sheer mass the advertisement mentioned. His forearms suddenly stopped getting bigger as they started. His forearms had to make way for another part of his arms which are going under a great deal of growing: his biceps. They convulsed and twitched with the upcoming surge building within them, the strange feeling continued to mount until it couldn’t be contained anymore.

His biceps started to expand yet again, slowly but surely, they mounted upwards in size and width. The growth rate started to increase, Mokuba’s biceps rounded and grown into the size of tennis balls, then baseballs, then softballs, and beyond. Blooming, rising, inflating, pumping up, blowing up, they looked as if they were two individual, round balloons stuffed underneath his sleeves, blowing up massively against the light and sky blue fabric, they stretched with the rising bulk that a child couldn’t possibly have. “Whoa!” gasped Mokuba when his right shoulder bulged tremendously before the left shoulder started to follow; the sudden development caught him by complete surprise. Both his shoulders struggled, fighting against the pressure that tried to prevent them from going through the same treatment, in which lost the conflict. They started to rise upwards, like two peeking mountains, quaking with each of the inflating energy being put into them. They grew, they widen and they broadened; his skin felt taut with the mass elongating with the bulk and air overflowing inside his body as the pressure that forced his shoulders to buff up surged into his pecs, forcing them to expand them slightly larger than before, the mounting air pressure then flowed to his abdomen
115122222111.title: Hunking up

1151222221111.content:
Underneath his shirt, Mokuba could feel his abdomen developing several, smaller rows of muscles popping until he felt they were fully developed; Mokuba knew these muscles as a six pack, The twelve year old felt the inflating sensation moving downwards to his legs, his upper body had finally bloated into a perfect “V” shape, Mokuba chuckled in ecstasy seeing his body expanding. Mokuba’s pants stretched with the billowing legs, his thighs expanded slowly, and his calves began to distend incredibility with each breath. His skin pressured the dark blue fabric to stretch, while his legs took on the look of a trained sportsman. His thighs widen massively in frontal view, they pushed outwards in side view. Mokuba felt his pants getting tighter and tighter, but they were getting use to the mass he was gaining. Twenty seconds after his legs started to grow, they finally builded into a pure shape, the form that many others desired.

With a smile on his face, Mokuba continued warching as his body bloomed with the defined physic mounting. Every one of his brawny muscles still gained more and more mass and size, infact his body was still growing. Mokuba decided to close his eyes until his body stopped growing. He waited patiently as he grew taller and higher. Suddenly, the hissing, squeaking, stretching, tightening, ripping started to slowly subside, which with follow by an innocent, cute sigh of exhaustion filling the air. Mokuba slowly opened his eyes, wondering what he looked like. When he did, a small smile appeared on his face. He looked TREMENDOUS, his body had grown to an amazing shape, and no twelve year old has ever looked like this. Mokuba had grown to an astonishing 5’7 in height, but it was easily overshadowed by the incredible change. Mokuba didn’t feel like a normal twelve year old child, but he felt like a powerful young bodybuilder. Even though he looked older, his face remained the same as before, young and no growth development to his chin. His body was rich with glorious brawn, each more defined and larger than before.

His battle city clothes manage to stay intact and not even tear, but they seemed to hold on with a bit of trouble. Mokuba’s stripped shirt and vest strained against the swollen chest and shoulders, but still kept his vest in place as long they where along side with his balloon like biceps, they look massive. He took a deep sigh of shallow excitement, inhaling much air into his body; forcing his chest to greatly expand and inflate his swollen mass elongating against his battle city clothing; not before he exhaled the air that caused his chest to resume back what it was after the inflation. The black haired, muscle bloated child took his attention over his chest and to his legs, examining his muscular thighs and calves pressing hard against his dark blue pants, they strained from the expansion. A cute chuckle came out of Mokuba’s mouth as he flexed his bloated right bicep; it bulged with the sheer force, engorging into big proportions. The young boy turned his attention to his left bicep and flexed it to join his right one. His skin tightened with the bulking, emitting a rubber stretching-like sound. Mokuba quickly noticed his body was taller as well. “This is… kinda cool” he then said, “I’m like Goku from Dragonball Z!”

Mokuba felt happier since his body bulked up into a combo of innocence and brawn, becoming the glorious figure he stood as. This felt like some sort of a good dream, only that it is all too real. Another good thing is that somehow his battle city clothing managed to remain intact, even against his bulging muscles. In his buff, Mokuba looked almost enough to pop like an over inflated balloon or a beach ball. However, he didn’t feel like he was going to pop or burst at all, despite his appearance. “Let’s see…” said Mokuba in a wondering tone, “what should I do now that I’m huge beyond belief”.
1151222221111.title: Ballooning to a Muscle'd Mokuba

11512222211111.content:
He thought clear and hard of what he needed to do with his bloated musculature. Then he thought of something. "Why not imitate any of the Dragonball Z characters!" thought Mokuba before a cheerful smile appeared, "With a body like this, It'll be like I'm a part of the story." He then said with joy billowing within his inflated buffness. He then headed to the TV set and started looking through the Video/DVD cupboard in search for a DVD.

Mokuba then grabbed out one of his Dragonball Z DVD's, Vol. 53 Cell Games: Earth's Last Hope Volume 53. He easily remembered this mostly had when Gohan was at Super Saiyan level Two, owning Cell throughout the first part of their first. Mokuba couldn't wait to try out his new muscles with this; the excitement was getting to him. Mokuba begin playing the DVD, choosing Episode 172: Cell's Mighty Break Down from the DVD menu.

"This is going to be so awesome," Mokuba exclaimed as he fast forwarded the episode to his favourite fight scene: Gohan's emotional explosion. He pressed play and stood there, mimicking Gohan in every way. Punches, kicked, dodges, he mimicked them all. His bigger and buffer body easily allowed him to keep up with the diverse movements his favourite character executed on screen.

Half an hour later and Mokuba was panting, out of breath, and dripping with sweat. His shirt and vest lay on the couch next to him, allowing his full and muscular torso to be on full display. He rested for a few minutes before pulling his shirt and vest back over his body, having a few problems as the shirt was definitely too small for him, but managed to fit on afterwards. He smiled as he flexed his body once again, enjoying the strength.

He looked up at the clock and gasped at the time. Seto was going to be home in a few minutes! He didn't want his brother to see his little brother as a muscle bound freak. He found the buff-a-loon and quickly untied the end, letting all the air escape from the opening. At the same time, he could feel his muscle bound body swiftly shrinking back to its original form. He sighed when he felt his inflated sensation going away. He knew he'll remember this for a long time, his body finally returned to normal size and his clothes remained in perfect condition. "I tell Seto about the Buff-a-Loon sometime, I'm sure he'll understand" thought Mokuba, after all; they are family. He held up the balloon and examined it a bit before smiling and shoving it into his pocket just as Seto Kaiba opened the door to the room. Mokuba ran and hugged his brother, now having the knowledge that he would never have a boring day again.

11521.title: How about Inu

1152121.content:
Night had fallen over the village and the members of Inuyasha's group were all in different areas doing different things. Shippo was inside drawing with Kirara while Kaede made medicine from the many herbs that had been collected over the course of the day. Kagome had gone back to her own time for a brief stay to restock up on some much needed items such as to replenish her first aid kit and grab some more food. Inuyasha was waiting for her to help carry the stuff back since she always seemed to be lugging around that gigantic yellow back pack of hers and it was starting to put a strain on her. Pretty soon it wouldn't be a lie when her Grandpa told her classmates and teachers that she had a bad back!

And Sango was busy chasing Miroku through the woods, brandishing her boomerang and ready to clobber him over the head with it. A traveling group had passed through the village and Miroku had spent the short time they were there courting the young women in his perverted way. Sango had been dangerously calm and silent the entire time they were there, but as soon as their caravan was out of sight, she leapt up, grabbed her weapon, and began chasing Miroku threatening him violently all the while. This chase had gone on for at least an hour. Finally, Miroku was too tired to run anymore. Thinking fast, he threw down a few sutras and concentrated on them. Instantly he was cloaked from Sango's sight. He hoped she would pass by quickly and not linger because he couldn't hold the barrier up for long. Luckily, she did indeed spend very little time in his area once she ascertained that he wasn't nearby. When the sounds of her passing disappeared into the distance, Miroku relaxed and the barrier disappeared. He picked up the sutras and placed them inside his robe before heading back toward the village. He had barely taken ten steps before he noticed a hot spring to his left. He had never noticed it before but then he had never been in this part of the woods.

"After that chase, a short time in there would feel wonderful." He said to himself, walking to the edge of the pool. He stripped off all his clothes except for, of course, the sleeve covering his wind tunnel and got in. The water was very warm and relaxing. His thoughts drifted from Sango towards more unhappy thoughts. Thoughts of Naraku and their mission to destroy him and take back the Sacred Jewel. But it always seemed that no matter what the situation, he was unable to help in the fight against Naraku. His one weapon of great power, the Wind Tunnel, was constantly being blocked due to the Saimyosho and his spiritual power was nothing in comparison to Kagome's abilities being Kikyo's reincarnation.

"If only I could become stronger..." He said quietly to himself.

As he said this, the pool was suddenly illuminated from within by a deep white glow. The blinding light rose from the pool and took the shape of a beautiful woman, cloaked in a robe with long white hair and pure blue eyes. Her ears were pointed and her teeth were sharp. She was obviously a demon of some sort. Before Miroku could react the demon spoke.

"Be not afraid kind monk. I have shown myself to you because of your pure desires and wishes. You wish to become stronger in an effort to rid the world of the treacherous Naraku. I shall grant you that request."

"Who are you?" Miroku asked.

"I am a demon called Bettya. I speak my name freely as I have long since been dead. My power lives on in this pool, waiting for one to invoke it. My powers in life were great and many demons and humans sought me for my power. To avoid losing my power to evil, I sacrificed myself into this pool where my spirit became bound. If you were of evil intent, these waters would melt your flesh and bones and your soul would become trapped at the bottom of this pool. But enough of this talk. Drink from this pool and you shall have your wish. The more you drink, the greater the strength you shall recieve."

"But what if someone of evil intent drinks from the pool when I am gone?"

"Fear not! For any of evil intent who drink this water shall be dissolved from the inside out. Those of pure intent will find the pool to be nothing more than a hot spring. You may draw water from this pool and take it away with you to use at a later time, but be warned. Any who drink from the water once it has been drawn from the pool shall recieve its power."

Suddenly the demon's spirit flashed bright white light once again and began to disappear.

"My duty has been accomplished. My power is now safe. Use it wisely monk and may you accomplish your goals."

And she was gone. Miroku looked at the water thoughtfully. It was just what he wished, but was it safe? The demon may have sounded sincere but they were often treacherous. But then if it was poison, Kagome's modern medicine would be sure to treat him. So he carefully took a sip of the water. He felt the warm water flow into his body. He looked at himself. He didn't feel any stronger. Suddenly, his body erupted in a wave of warmth. He nearly swooned from the sudden increase in temperature and he pulled himself out of the pool. Once he was clear of the water, his temperature lowered, but he was still quite warm. He looked at himself again and was shocked by what he saw. His muscles were all slowly swelling larger. His biceps rising from his lean arms, his shoulders widening, his chest swelling. He looked down at his legs and saw them growing in much the same way, his calves hardening, his feet growing slightly larger. He felt his stomach and was surprised by the six pack that had popped up. His back widened to accomadate the sudden weight in the front and the growth stopped. From that little sip his muscles had grown quite a bit. He wasn't huge like a body builder, but he was noticeably larger and felt stronger, all of his muscles defined.

He looked back to the pool and wondered what he should do next. He could drink more and become even stronger or he could take some water out of the pool for later and risk it getting stolen...

115212122.content:
Miroku looked over his body in amazement as it continued to grow larger. His back widened further, his chest swelling outward into a shelf of muscle while his six pack increased to an eight pack his biceps turning from baseballs to softballs to slightly larger than softballs. His calves pumped up while his feet slid across the soft slightly damp grass and his thighs inflated larger forcing his legs apart. His viewpoint slowly rose higher as he grew taller as well. Luckily whatever was making him grow was also increasing the size of his gauntlet and rosary beads so his Wind Tunnel wouldn't be randomly unleashed. He stopped growing when the plastic bottle could be held between two fingers, about ten feet tall. All of that power from a single sip! It made Miroku's mind boggle. He looked apprehensively at the bottle in his hand. Now that he had taken the water from the pool anyone or anything could drink it and gain the power he was getting. If his friends got some it wouldn't be so terrible but if a random demon found it or if Naraku was able to get his hands on it the world could be in very great danger. Than again, he could share some with Inuyasha and Shippo too and they would be even stronger as a team. He didn't think Kagome or Sango would want this kind of power. Both were long distance fighters. This kind of size and muscle would only hinder them.

"Inuyasha might be stubborn about accepting outside help but Shippo would gladly accept more power." Miroku said to himself. "But I have to be extremely careful how much I give or take myself."

Miroku looked into the pool. One sip was enough to turn him into a ten foot muscle giant .How many thousands of sips were in the pool? The world wouldn't be able to handle him if he drank too much of the water. He pushed the thoughts from his head. This bottle was good enough to start with. He slipped the small bottle under his gauntlet making sure not to get it too close to the concealed Wind Tunnel and marked the pool. He wanted to make sure he remembered where it was. When he was sure he wouldn't forget this pool he turned and started walking back toward the village.
115212122.title: A Drop in the Bucket

115212221.content:
“Damn it!” The small cry echoed through the forest, unheard by anyone for miles, and merely passing by ignored by the various critters of the forest.

Shippo stomped, or at least tried to stomp, angrily through the forest. The problem was his feet were too small to make any noticeable stomp. He silently cursed his small stature, as it’d been more of an annoyance than a boon. He almost wanted to cry, but he wouldn’t. He was bigger than that. Well, mentally anyway.

He’d been training hard, so hard to pass the Fox Examination to rank up in the fox demon hierarchy. But when he’d finally reached the headquarters, Kurama, the chief fox demon refused to let him take it. The reason? He was too small!!

“AGH! IT’S SO UNFAIR! WHY DOES EVERYONE HAVE TO TREAT ME SO SMALL!” He shouted. Ever since Naraku’s defeat, everyone had moved on with their lives. Miroku and Sango had settled down, even Inuyasha and Kagome too. Heck, even Kohaku was becoming a proficient demon hunter, since Sango had her three kids to look after, working together with Miroku and Inuyasha.

He was still stuck. He hadn’t grown up too much, so everyone really treated really the same. Everyone had moved on, but he’d been stuck with the same treatment. All because he couldn’t be bigger!!

“It’s not fair!” He shouted, shutting his eyes in a blind rage, kicking a rock out of frustration. *ping * THWACK! “OUCH!” Shippo cried, because the rock had ricocheted off one of the trees, whacking him directly off balance, leaving him with a welt. “Wh-whoa!” He cried, knocked off balance from the impact, crying as he fell backwards, directly down the gentle slope nearby.

“OW OW OW OW OW OW!” He cried, rolling down the hill, until he finally came to a stop. “It’s not fair…” He whined, slowly getting up before collapsing to his knees as his foot gave out. “Ouch…” Shippo muttered, gripping his chest before feeling a warm, sticky liquid over his hand. Looking down, he saw blood dripping over his hand, and his shirt was ripped at the front, his chest scratched up. Slowly limping back home, he whispered almost like a mantra, “It’s not fair… it’s not fair…”

====Kaede’s House====

“You really do need to be careful!” Kaede chided Shippo, as she finished wrapping bandaids around his chest and foot. She looked down at the small fox, gently rubbing his head. She knew he tried so hard, but he always got so frustrated. He trained so hard, only for everyone to treat him like delicate glass pottery.

“I know… it’s just frustrating…” Shippo grunted, perking up a little bit as Kaede handed him his shirt back, mended. “Thank you!!” He shouted happily, glad to see his favorite shirt fixed. “Um… Kaede…” He continued, as he put his shirt back on over the wrappings on his chest. “Do you think you could rub my feet at least, they still hurt a bit…”

“Of course, Shippo.” Kaede replied kindly. For all his anger, he could still be so innocent. She smiled, eye shut in amusement, as she bent down to rub his furry feet, listening to the gentle purrs he gave off. “You know, they say that pains in your feet and hands are the sign of a major growth spurt.”

Shippo yawned, obviously tired from his journey. “You really think so? My hands have kind of been hurting lately too…” Kaede laughed, as Shippo swayed back and forth, eyes barely staying open as he struggled to stay awake. Eventually she decided to carry him over to his room, since he stayed with her, in one of the spare rooms she had, and she laid him to bed, covering him with his covers, and rubbing his soft hair, soft almost like a fox. “Who knows, maybe?” She said, as she began walking off.

“I just wish I could be bigger…” She heard him say, smiling sadly. She knew how much he missed his mother and father, but she was glad that she and Inuyasha and his group could help cover that. Right as she was about to leave the room, she could have sworn she felt a frighteningly terrifying presence. Turning around, she looked around intently, trying to see what it was, but she couldn’t see anything. “I must be getting old…” She chuckled, as she exited.

Although she wasn’t wrong as Shippo slept, gently scratching at the bandages around his chest. In truth, had she looked closer, she would have seen a familiar pink glow, from a particular shard embedded in his chest.

When Inuyasha had dealt the final blow to the Shikon Jewel with his Meido Zangetsuha, the good within the jewel triumphed over its evil, and it shattered, forever lost to history, or so they thought. As testament to the final triumph, a sole, pure shard had survived, one that had become embedded in Shippo’s chest, and one that had heard his wish…

1152122211.content:
As the days passed by, Kaede watched with a sort of joy in her eyes as Shippo got back into her training, She still wanted to keep the bandages on, which he somewhat agreed to reluctantly, although it was mainly because she threatened not to make his favorite meal for a while. She was probably just being paranoid, since as a demon he could heal very fast, but still, she wanted to be cautious, since he definitely took a fall.

It was interesting to see, especially since he seemed to have a new vitality. Every day he woke up, he seemed a little bit more energetic, and it made him happy, and seeing him happy made her happy.

Shippo seemed to be feeling the effects as well. He kept trying to develop new techniques. He always had his illusions. No kitsune could call themselves that proper if they didn't understand the basics of them. But he needed actual offense, so he'd been always trying to work on honing his Kitsune Fire. He'd been working on control first, forming a ball, then just trying to bounce it back and forth. The hardest part was simply keeping it in ball form when he tossed it up. Mainly because it exploded...

"Come on! I almost got it!" He muttered, sweat rolling down his brow. He wasn't sure what happened, but his fire felt so much more energetic, even he did. And he liked it. But he kept tossing the ball up, and catching it, and exploding, and he kept that up for a while. But finally, after much effort, he tossed the ball up, and caught it again! He blinked for little bit as he looked at the orb in his hands before a giant foxy grin that could rival another famous one appeared on his face.

"YES! I DID IT!" He shouted, bouncing up and down with glee, unable to restrain himself. Although he did stop once he smelt something weird. "Wait... what smells like its burning?" He muttered, looking around to try to figure out what it was. It smelled meaty, it smelled like... him? Finally, he looked at his hand, and saw it was smoking, mainly from the fire he was holding.... he probably should have realized that. "OW OW OW OW!" He shouted as he dropped the fire ball, catching a small portion of the field on fire as the blue flames spread, even as he shook his hand, smoke coming from it. "Hot hot hot..." He whined, as he blew gently on it. Once he noticed the other fire, his eyes widened in surprise, "Oh crap! Kaede's gonna get mad at me again!" He shouted as he moved over to stamp it out. Kaede got mad when he accidentally set fire to her favorite tree, and tended to get annoyed when he set the forest on fire. It's not his fault Kitsune's natural affinity was for fire!

Panting after he finally got the fire extinguished, his ears perked up as he heard a far off boom in the distance, turning to see some giant, dark story clouds a ways off. He hadn't seen some like those in a long time. They almost reminded him of the lightning demons that killed his father... eyes drooping down at the thought, he picked himself back up. No need to let old ghosts bother him... Plus, he better get back to Kaede, no need to make her worry!

====Kaede's Hut====

Kaede was busy sweeping the front of her hut, not really because it was dirty, but mainly because she was waiting for Shippo. Perhaps she thought it would keep it clean if she swept hard enough before the storm, but really, she was just hoping the boy would make it home soon. She strained her old eye trying to see if she could see home, silently cursing Naraku for taking her other one. Honestly, she was having a hard time seeing as is! Maybe she could persuade Kagome to get her a pair of those things, what were they called, glasses?

"Kaede!!" She turned to see Shippo running over, his appearance slightly dirty, and... was that soot? Agh, the boy was working on fire again. Hopefully he didn't set anything on fire again. Running over, one of his feet got caught on the other, and he tripped face-planting on the ground, making Kaede smile. Oh, to be young again haha. "Ow..." Shippo muttered as he pulled himself up, brushing a bit of dust off, before his smile came back. "Kaede! Look! I did it!" He yelled as he formed a ball of fire in his hands, Kaede looking on impressed at it, before he drew his arm back, making her blanche. Surely he wasn't thinking of! *WHOOSH* And he threw the orb a ways off, both of them watching as it exploded in a burst of fire, leaving a decent sized crater nearby. "Uhhh.... oops?" Shippo said, sweat dropping as Kaede's eye twitched. That's right, to be young again for certain...

"We'll fix it in the morning. Come now, it's gonna be stormy soon." She said, keeping her eye on the approaching clouds. It's been a long time since they'd seen anything like this, she thought as she ushered him inside. That night, was one of the roughest storms she'd seen in all her years. She hoped it wasn't any kind of omen.

====The next day====

Shippo stirred as he heard the sounds of Kaede grunting nearby. "Agh, why do tree branches have to be so heavy!" Waking, and wiping the sleep from his eyes, he walked out, seeing Kaede trying to get a decent sized tree branch from the middle of the road where it had snapped off a nearby tree. Had she been 20 years younger, she might have been able to move it, but now...

Her thoughts were interrupted as she felt an extra push, smiling as she saw Shippo trying to give her hand. Of course, "So heavy..." He muttered, trying to push against it with his whole body.

"Ha, use your whole body, push with your legs!" She encouraged, as he followed her instructions, "On the count of three, we'll push at the same time. One... two... three!" She shouted, as they moved the tree out of the way.

"Aw... my shirt!" She heard him whine as she looked down, seeing a stray branch had caught and ripped his shirt up. She suppose she should probably mend that again, but her eye caught something else, mainly that his clothes perhaps needed a little bit more than mending. They actually seemed a bit smaller than him! She could see his furry ankles where they stuck out, normally when they were covered. Heck, she realized he'd actually gotten a lot bigger. He normally came to her shin, but now, he was almost reaching her knee!

She smiled as she saw his pouting, his face seeming just a barest hint of a bit more mature. "Haha, I'd say I'd mend it, but I'm gonna need a bit more fabric!" Confused, Shippo looked at what she meant, before his eyes lit up.

"I'm bigger! You were right Kaede! It was a growth spurt!" He smiled.

"Haha, I'll get your clothes fixed and adjusted, but I'll need to borrow them to find the right fabric, but that means you'll have to stay inside until I get back, as I don't have anything in your size." Kaede explained, somewhat unprepared for his unexpected growth spurt, but she could manage.

"Okay... fine..." Shippo muttered, somewhat disappointed, he did want to go train more. Walking inside, he stripped down, handing his torn clothes to Kaeda. She had to admit, his body seemed a lot more mature, the barest hints of muscle showing, and although he seemed a bit clueless about it, he had the beginnings of something that could make any man or woman lust, if how tight his undergarment was.

'Oh if only I was a young girl!' Inner Kaede shouted, leaving Kaede blinking if whether or not she was going insane. "I'll be back as soon as I can, until then, find a way to entertain yourself!" Kaede said, as she took his clothes and walked off.

"Okay..." Shippo said as he watched her walk off, adjust the underwear Kagome had given him from the future, although they felt tight. What could a guy do to keep him occupied for a day...?
