11522211.content:
It was a cloudy day in Amestris as Edward Elric and his younger brother Alphonse made their way to East City HQ in response to a summons issued by their superior officer, Col. Mustang. Edward, as was to be expected, was rather despondent having to see the Colonel again, especially after his last assignment had been such a disaster. Everything had been going fine, he had finished his assignment with no problems whatsoever in fact. Then someone had made the mistake of mentioning how miraculous it was such a small boy could be so good at alchemy. Well, needless to say, the result of that comment wasn’t pretty and the town he had been in had suffered massive collateral damage, several injuries, and Ed’s own automail arm getting broken. He had been resting in Resembool while Winry fixed it when the summons had arrived. He had apologized to Winry and had left, making sure to stand in front of Al so that any flying wrenches struck his metal brother rather his own head, and taken the next train to East City. He was there the next day and now stood in front of Roy’s desk, a frown on his face. Al was standing outside Roy’s office, trying to listen in, ready to charge in should his brother try and start anything. The other soldiers in the immediate area had looked up when Ed and Al arrived, then had promptly went back to work, waiting for the bombshell that was sure to come. Roy just stared at Ed for a few minutes, his hands folded in front of him, while Ed stared right back, waiting for the admonitions and the mockery to start. Roy reached over and grabbed a paper, looking it over, letting Ed stew awhile longer. After setting the paper aside, he continued to stare at Ed. Finally Ed lost his temper and shouted, “What do you want?”
Roy, who had been stacking papers inside one of his desk drawers looked at Ed in surprise and said, “Patience Fullmetal.”
Ed just sighed in annoyance and tried to fold his arms, forgetting that he had left his automail one at Winry’s to get fixed. This seemed to annoy him even more, forcing a smile on Roy’s face. He seemed to think he had tortured the blond alchemist enough for now, because he took out a different sheet of paper and said, “This is the report for your next assignment. Read it over.”
Ed grabbed the paper and scanned over it. It was a pretty simplistic report. Apparently a strange substance had been found in the wreckage of Lab 5. Even now, secrets from that place were still appearing. Hidden bunkers, skeletons of failed experiments, dangerous substances, and all manner of unpleasant things had been unearthed. Ed hadn’t been forced to deal with anything from Lab 5 since his own experiences there and he had been hoping to never have anything to do with it again. The report was extremely vague. No one knew what the substance was, what experiments had been performed on it, or what use it might have. Ed looked up from the report and said, “So what do you want me to do?”
Roy grabbed the report back and said, “The substance the report was talking about was found in liquid form in a bottle. This bottle had the appearance of an experiment, since it was found attached to electrodes, the wires severed. When the bottle was brought up from the underground room it had been in, it crystallized instantly into a stone. Whatever the stuff is, it had undergone similar experiments as the red water. This,” he reached into another drawer and pulled out a small bottle with a purple stone in it. “is the substance.”
He handed the bottle over to Ed who held it up close to his eyes. It looked similar to a Philosopher’s Stone, but purple in color. He opened the bottle and held it out to Roy. Roy cocked an eyebrow at him but took the bottle back. Ed held his palm out to Roy who understood and knocked the stone out onto his palm. Ed held it up to his eyes and looked it over again. There didn’t seem to be anything unusual about it at first glance, but some experimenting and research would no doubt yield results on whatever this stuff was. He dropped it back into the bottle and put the bottle in an inside pocket of his coat. He turned to leave, not quite believing his luck. The Colonel hadn’t even mentioned his previous assignment. Just as he reached the door, his hand closing around the doorknob, Roy’s voice called out, “Oh and one more thing Fullmetal.”
Ed groaned in frustration and turned back to the Colonel. He raised a finger and motioned Ed back to his desk. Once Ed reached it Roy said, “About your last assignment.” He pulled out a lengthy report and said, “It appears that after you delivered the research to South City I had commissioned you to deliver, you went on a rampage, causing massive collateral damage, several injuries, and emotional trauma. What exactly happened?”
Ed tried to explain, but knew it was doing no good. Roy did not look happy. When he finished his explanation, Roy stood up and turned to the window. “And so another mishap thanks to the pipsqueak who can’t control his temper.”
Ed growled in anger and leaped onto Roy’s desk, grabbing at his collar, yelling, “Who are you calling so sm—“
Before he could finish, Roy pushed him off the desk. Ed lost his balance and fell backward, landing hard, the wind knocked out of him. Roy walked over to his sprawled form and said, “This can’t keep happening Edward. I’ve had too many complaints about you that have been ignored by the higher ups due to your skill as a State Alchemist. But they won’t turn a blind eye forever.”
“Like I care!” Ed managed to gasp out in defiance.
“Whether you care or not doesn’t matter.” Roy said coldly. “Just keep yourself under control or I’m going to have to take drastic actions against you and that’s not something I want to do.”
“Yeah right.” Ed thought, but didn’t say anything. He merely stood, saluted the Colonel coldly and left.
Al had heard the shouting, but hadn’t done anything. He didn’t want to burst in on Ed and the Colonel unless it was really necessary and nothing too awful seemed to have happened. Ed looked like he was in a foul mood, but he was always like that after seeing the Colonel so that didn’t worry Al much.
11522211.title: The Lesson: Don't Call Him Short

choices: Ed pays the Colonel a visit...
115222111.content:
However, Al did start to worry when his brother’s bad mood persisted on the train back to Resembool. The Colonel must’ve said something that had really made him angry. Halfway back to Resembool, Al finally said, “What’s wrong big brother?”
Ed, who had been staring moodily out the window, turned to Al and said, “Nothing.”
Al sighed and said, “But brother you’ve sulking since we got back from seeing the Colonel. What did he say?”
“Just drop it Al. I don’t want to talk about it.” Ed said, anger creeping into his voice.
But Al persisted, “Come on brother, you can talk to me! Whatever it is, I’m sure—“
Ed finally lost his temper and shouted, “I said I don’t want to talk about it!”
Al looked taken aback but stopped talking. Seeing his brother clam up like that, Ed started feeling bad and rubbed his head, a sharp pain accruing there. Going to see the Colonel always gave him a headache. In a much softer voice he said, “I’m just getting tired of him Al. Every time we see each other he’s always so smug and cocky. He’s always putting me down while I go out and make him look good.”
Al suddenly thought of something and said, “Does this have anything to do with your height?”
Ed’s eye twitched as he said in a dangerous voice, “What’s wrong with my height?”
Al gasped, held up his hands, and waved them around, saying, “Nothing! Nothing at all!”
Thinking fast, he changed the subject. “So what did he want?”
Ed pulled out the bottle and said, “This was found in the wreckage of Lab 5. No information was found about it, and no one knows what kind of experiments was run on it. So they left it up to me to figure it out.”
Al grabbed the bottle and looked it over. He handed it back and said, “I’ve never seen or heard anything similar to this except for the Philosopher’s Stone. Do you think they’re connected?”
Ed shrugged and said, “Maybe. It would explain why the Colonel is just handing it off to me instead of over to a different Lab.”
Ed and Al spent the rest of the trip talking about what the stone might be, what Lab 5 was doing with it, and what they were expected to do with it. As they stepped out onto the platform, Ed said, “Now that I think about it, if this thing came from Lab 5 do we really want to have anything to do with it?”
“Maybe…do you think this was made by sacrificing humans like the Philosopher’s Stone?” Al asked nervously.
Ed pulled out the stone and looked at it. He tucked it away again and said, “Call it intuition Al, but I don’t think we have to worry about that. Just looking at this stone…I don’t know, it just feels safe to me.”
Al looked quizzically at Ed. “Wow brother, you never judge things on just feelings. You usually need research and science to prove something.”
Ed looked a little crestfallen and said, “You make me sound like an emotionless monster.”
Al giggled at that and said, “Well you do attack innocent bystanders for calling you sho-“
“DON’T SAY IT!!!” Ed yelled lifting his suitcase up, ready to bean Al on the head if he dared utter that terrible word.
Al just laughed again and the two brothers headed down the road to Resembool.
It was early the next morning by the time they made it to Winry and Pinako’s house and the two brothers were happy to see a friendly house. Of course, with Winry in a bad mood over the littlest things, the house never started out friendly. As soon as Ed was in range of the upstairs window, Winry appeared, running onto the balcony with a wrench cocked back in her hand. With a shout of, “Hey Ed!” she hurled the wrench directly at the little alchemist’s head. Ed looked up at her voice just in time to get hit directly between the eyes. He fell backwards and was caught by Al who was prepared for just such an occurrence. Ed instantly leapt up, a trickle of blood running down his face from his new abrasion, and shouted, “What did you do that for?”
Winry gripped the wooden rail of the balcony and shouted back, “That was for running out on me you jerk! I wasn’t even halfway done with your arm! What if you needed it before I finished? You could’ve been killed!”
Ed groaned in frustration again, rubbing the blood from his face. This wasn’t helping his headache which had persisted since his meeting with Roy. When he looked back up at the balcony he saw that Winry had disappeared back into the house. Ed felt a little wary. She might’ve gone back inside to come down and greet them…or she may have gone back in to get something else to throw. Regardless, Ed decided it would be best to head inside. Once the two brothers were inside, Winry appeared again with a large bundle in her arms. Ed flinched as he saw her but she gave him a withering look and said, “Don’t worry. This is just your arm. I’m almost finished with it.”
Ed looked at the huge bundle she was carrying and said, “Why is it so big?”
Winry rolled her eyes and said, “This is your arm plus a bunch of other metal and tools. I’m moving it all from my workbench upstairs to the one in the living room.”
Ed sighed as Winry seemed to be over her bad mood. That was another strange thing about Winry. She got angry easily, but she never stayed angry for very long. Ed smiled at Al and said, “Might as well get comfortable. We’re going to be here for awhile.”
Al nodded and they both headed upstairs. Most of the rooms in Winry’s and Pinako’s house were devoted to storage for various automail related projects, tools, materials, and records of their various patients. However, there was one room that they kept clear for recovering patients and this is where Ed and Al normally stayed. Ed took off his coat and kicked off his shoes before walking over to Al and opening up his chest plate. Instantly, several books and papers came cascading out into Ed’s waiting arms. Before leaving for Resembool, Ed had grabbed some reference books and previous research data revolving around Lab 5, hoping to find some kind of lead as to what this strange stone might be. Just as he and Al sat down, however, Winry rushed in and walked up to Ed. Before he could say anything, Winry said, “Take off your pants!”
Ed, wondering just what the heck was going on, said, “Why?”
Winry looked impatient as she said, “Just do it!”
Ed stood up and did as she asked. As soon as his pants were down, she pushed him back into the chair and grabbed his automail leg, pulling it painfully from its socket. Ed yelled out in pain and said, “What the hell was that for?”
Winry looked at him scornfully and said, “Don’t be such a baby Ed! I’m making some extra modifications to your arm and I need your leg so it can get the same treatment. It should only take a few extra hours. I should be completely done by tomorrow since I don’t have to reconstruct them by scratch.”
Winry actually looked a good deal cheerier as she left with Ed’s leg. Al looked at Ed whose face had a slight shine to it from the sudden painful exertion and said, “I think that was revenge for running out on her.”
“Yeah, no kidding!” Ed said, annoyance clear in his voice. “She didn’t even give me a spare or anything!”
As though those words summoned her, Winry appeared and tossed a spare arm and leg to Ed. “Sorry I almost forgot about those!”
Ed inserted his arm and then his leg and stood up and stretched them out a little to make sure they were in properly. Once he was sure they were, he pulled his pants back on and sat at the table with Al. “Alright, let’s start experimenting!”
For hours and hours the two alchemists worked never stopping. When lunch came Pinako left something for Ed to eat and drink and Ed took the tray back down with the dirty dishes before heading to use the bathroom. Night was falling by the time Ed and Al threw down their pencils. Ed looked at the stone in disgust and said, “Nothing. No records, none of our experiments are yielding any results, and I can’t even begin to figure out with this stuff is made of! It’s almost like it came from a different world!”
Al started stacking the loose papers and said, “I wish we could’ve seen what it looked like before it was crystallized or before the scientists at Lab 5 started experimenting. That might’ve helped.”
“Yeah, but there’s no point in wishing about something impossible.” Ed had a sour look on his face as he said this and Al thought Ed must’ve spent a few nights wishing things were different.
Winry came at that moment into the room, breaking through the atmosphere of gloom that had settled in with each of the two brother’s failures in identifying the substance and its purpose. She was dressed in her overalls which were spattered with oil and her hair was starting to fall out of her bandana in sweaty strands. A wrench was in her hand and Ed eyed it warily since Winry looked a little annoyed. She said, “It’s taking a little bit longer than I thought to fix your arm and leg, so I’m going to be pulling an all nighter. If you need anything, I’ll be in the living room.”
Ed watched her leave, knowing she must’ve come in here for company. It must get lonely standing all day by yourself in front of a tool bench. He grabbed the stone and said, “I’m going to go down and keep Winry company alright?”
Al looked surprised but nodded and said, “Alright. I’ll just go through the research again to see if I can find anything we may have missed.”
Al watched as his brother nodded and headed downstairs. Al knew what his brother was up to and didn’t want to interrupt. He just hoped his brother would be able to keep his patience with Winry. Ed made his way to where Winry was and saw her hard at work at her bench, his arm and leg open, wires spilling out of them. Ed walked up to her and looked over her shoulder. “How’s it going?”
Winry turned to face Ed with a smile on her face and said, “Worried about me Ed? I can take care of myself you know. You don’t have to always worry about me.”
Ed blushed and said, “Worry about you? Whose worried? I was seeing what was taking so long!”
Winry frowned and said, “Well excuse me Mr. Hotshot Alchemist! I’m sorry if I’m taking time out of your busy schedule!”
Ed huffed and threw himself onto the couch, looking away from Winry. Winry in turn turned back to her bench and continued working. After a few minutes of silence Winry said softly, “So how’s work going on that stone thing?”
Ed sighed and said, “Not so good. No matter what me and Al do, nothing seems to work.”
Winry sat down next to him and said, “Here let me see it. You’re looking at it through the perspective of a scientist. Maybe if you think about it through the perspective of a mechanic, you’ll think of something new.”
Ed didn’t look to enthusiastic about this idea, but handed the stone to Winry. She grabbed it and said, “Wow, it’s so soft. I thought it would be hard like a rock.”
Ed was surprised to hear this. He’d never touched it barehanded before, since he hadn’t taken off his gloves since he got the stone. He pulled it off now and felt the stone, surprised to find it had an almost gummy quality. Pressing his finger into it clearly left a print, like silly putty. Winry pulled it and prodded it, trying to split it open, but it always stayed in a gooey strand. No matter what she did, the thing wouldn’t be split apart. Winry brought the stone to her nose and smelled it. “Hey it doesn’t smell half bad.”
Before Ed could stop her she licked a tiny spot on the stone. Ed grabbed the stone back and said, “What are you doing Winry?!? You don’t know where that’s been!”
Winry seemed fine however. In fact, she seemed better than fine. She jumped up and said, “Suddenly I feel like I’m full of energy! Wow, I think I’ll have your arm and leg done before morning Ed!”
Ed watched as Winry darted back to her bench and started frantically working again. It was strange. Winry had seemed so fatigued a minute ago, disappointed that she was going to have to work all night to finish repairs. But now she was moving like it was her first major job. Not only that, but her precision was also greatly increased. No matter how small the screw she would instantly find the proper screwdriver and have it screwed in as though her arm was an electric drill. Ed looked at the stone and wondered. Had the scientists in Lab 5 simply created a kind of energy booster? There was no doubt that it would greatly help the military if all the soldiers who were broken with fatigue could suddenly get all their energy back and more. Now that he thought about it, he was feeling pretty wiped out himself…
Ed started up the stairs back to the room he and Al were currently in, and bit the stone neatly in half. He wasn’t worried about the effects the stone might have. After all, they hadn’t hurt Winry. As he chewed he reasoned that Winry might also have taken in so small an amount that any strange effects if might have had wouldn’t show. The stone tasted wonderful. Ed had never eaten anything that tasted quite like it, and he quickly swallowed it and ate the other half without thinking. Roy would probably be angry if he knew that Ed hadn’t kept a small sample for later use or study, but Ed didn’t care. As soon as he swallowed it, he was back in the room and Al was running towards him with a paper in hand.
“Brother, look!” Al held out the paper and said, “I found something out about the stone! During one of the experiments in Lab 5 something came through the Gate after a failed attempt at human transmutation. The scientists disappeared and in their place was a bottle filled with purple liquid. Apparently it was called Giga Booster and was a kind of energy supplement. There was supposed to be strange side effects for anyone if they ate or drank the whole thing though.”
Ed felt a sudden fear enter his body. Strange side effects? He shakily sat down and said, “What kind of side effects?”
“Well, it doesn’t really say. The bottle carried a warning, but it was ripped off when it came through the Gate.”
Ed looked at himself and wondered what was going to happen. Al noticed his brother was looking worried and said, “What’s wrong?”
Ed swallowed and said, “I ate the stone.”
Al looked shocked as he said, “Brother how could you! What if it’s poisonous?”
“Well Winry licked it and it gave her a huge boost of energy and it tasted really good and I didn’t think it would be that big of a deal!” Ed yelled, his voice rising in panic.
Before Al could say anything Ed felt a strange sensation course through his body. He felt flushed as he said, “I think something’s happening.”
Al started to say something, but stopped as he saw his big brother appeared to be growing. Ed looked at himself in shock as his body started to expand, his back moving against the chair he was sitting on. Ed stuck out his legs as he saw his flesh and blood leg start growing longer, and thicker, while his spare leg stayed the same small size. The same thing was happening to his arm. A loud ripping noise was suddenly heard as Ed’s leg became too big for his tight pants. Ed looked down at it and was shocked to see it wasn’t just getting longer, but more muscular as well. Ed had always been pretty well muscled for his age, but the definition in his leg was much greater than anything he’d had before. Ed flexed his arm and saw a bicep rise up much higher than normal, veins clearly snaking down the muscle, feeding it with blood and swelling it higher and higher. Ed’s attention was drawn to his extremely tight shirt as it slowly ripped down from his collar revealing his expanding chest which felt much heavier, drawing down on Ed’s torso until his back caught up, flaring behind him, broadening his shoulders and tearing his shirt apart, the cloth fluttering down around his abs, still clinging as he continued to expand. Ed pulled off the last remaining cloth revealing his abs as they deepened from six pack to an eight pack, cutting deep into his torso, each layer completely visible. Turning his leg around Ed admired his calf which had bulged up as much as his other muscles, giving it the appearance of a thick trunk of muscle. A loud groaning filled the air and the chair Ed was sitting on collapsed under his sudden extreme increase in weight. Winry, who was still operating under an extreme energy boost, didn’t notice, nor did Pinako who was in the deep sleep of the elderly. Using the wall, Ed managed to stand on his one strong leg, the spare one dangling. Ed hadn’t noticed it before, but the metal bases on the ends of his right arm and left leg hadn’t grown with him and were cutting painfully into his flesh. He gritted his teeth and said, “Go get Winry, quick!”
Al looked up (yes, for once, up) at his brother and said, “Are you sure Ed? This might be kind of a shock for her.”
Ed grabbed at his leg and said, “She’ll deal with it. Hurry!”
Ed’s voice had a deeper tone to it and made Al jump at the authority it afforded. He ran downstairs to find Winry working like a maniac on arms and legs that would now surely be far too small for Ed. She turned as she heard him coming and said, “Hey Al! What’s up! Need something?!”
Al sweatdropped at Winry and said, “Actually, Ed needs your help. He’s…well, you’d better just come and see.”
Worry suddenly clouded Winry’s face as she followed Al back up to the room. Her worry was replaced by shock as she saw Ed, monstrously huge, sweat covering his face, grabbing at the metal that was clamping down on his stumps. Winry nearly fainted but Ed yelled out, “Don’t faint Winry! I really need you to remove these bases!”
Winry got hold of herself and said, “Okay, but it won’t be easy. Those bases are attached to your nerves, which apparently are now a lot bigger thanks to whatever happened to you and that’s why you’re in so much pain.”
Ed nodded quickly and said, “Sure, whatever just get them off!”
Winry pulled out a screwdriver and said, “Alright, but it’s going to hurt.”
Ed lost his patience and shouted, “It can’t hurt more than it already does!”
Winry wasn’t listening. She quickly unscrewed the base around Ed’s leg and pulled it out, disengaging the mechanism that connected it to his nerves. A sharp pain broke through the haze of constant pain already plaguing Ed, followed by immediate relief in his leg. Ed pushed his arm towards Winry who quickly unscrewed the base on it as well. Relief washed over Ed as he felt the pain replace itself with a much more bearable ache. He fell onto his back, causing a tremor to shake the room and knock a few books off the table. Winry just watched as Ed breathed heavily, his huge chest rising and falling. Before she knew it she was reaching out to touch him, but quickly pulled her hand back, picking up the bases. She saw that Al had seen her reaching and red flooded her face. She quickly said, “I’m going to make some new bases. I’m going to have to start from scratch again. Looks like it’s going to be another three days before I’m done.”
Ed quickly sat up and said, “Don’t worry about it Winry. Just finish making my arm and leg like you were going to and gather up a bunch of scrap metal. I’ll transmute them to a bigger size.”
“Uh brother? You can’t transmute without your arm.” Al pointed out.
Ed thought about it and said, “Dammit, you’re right. Well, I’ll just draw up a transmutation circle to alter them the way I want and that’ll have to work.”
Winry felt relieved as she heard this. Still feeling the effects of the boost, she ran back downstairs and continued working. Ed, feeling better, stood up shakily to his full height. He was surprised to feel his head pressed up against the ceiling. He looked down at Al and smiled, realizing what all this meant. He was tall! No, he was beyond tall. He was taller than anyone he’d ever run into, including Armstrong! He looked his muscled body over and realized he was far more built than Armstrong. He laughed as he thought about that. Then his thoughts trailed to the Colonel and his grin turned a little evil. Never again would the Colonel call him short, a shrimp, a pipsqueak. Never again would he look down on Ed with his smug smile and his demeaning attitude. Al must’ve noticed his now giant brother’s grin, because he said, “Brother, I hope you’re not thinking of doing something bad.”
Ed looked down at Al and said, “No, of course not!”
Before Al could say anything else, Ed started hopping towards the door. Unfortunately, he had to stop as the floor started to creak alarmingly and the table had fallen over. Instead, he jumped onto the bed, which promptly broke down under his new greater weight. He rubbed the back of his head and said, “This is going to take some getting used to.”
The night drifted by uneventfully with Al worrying about what had happened to his brother, Winry working like a maniac, and Ed fantasizing about what he was going to do with his new size. Every once in awhile he’d flex a different muscle on his body, loving the way it bulged and filled with size and definition. Finally, as the sun was rising, Winry walked up the stairs trying not to focus on Ed’s straining boxers and said, “I finished them, did you make the transmutation circle?”
Ed suddenly realized he hadn’t. He had been too busy fantasizing. Al dropped a design in Ed’s lap and said, “Don’t worry. I did it for you brother.”
Ed looked it over and saw that Al had made it so it would be exactly the same as his old automail arm except larger. He looked at his bicep and his defined arm overall. He didn’t want to lose that, so he made a few adjustments to the circle. When he was ready, he used Al as support and managed to make his way down to the living room. It was an arduous trip due to both his and Al’s huge sizes. They got stuck in the doorway, halfway down the stairwell, and in the doorframe to the living room. In each of these spots they both made enough noise to wake the dead, but Pinako still wasn’t waking up. But that was for the best, since Ed’s condition would be difficult to explain. Ed placed the circle on the ground and Winry dropped the arm, leg, and spare metal onto it. Ed touched the edge of the circle with his large hands and, with a flash of light, the arm and leg bulked up in size and muscle so that they matched their flesh and blood counterparts. Winry then placed the new bases against his arm stump and leg stump and reattached the nerves which was a great deal easier thanks to Ed’s previous operations. Sweat had once again beaded on Ed’s forehead but he grabbed the arm and shoved it into place followed quickly by the leg. The pain was intense and Ed felt numb with it. Within the last few hours he had undergone quite a bit of pain, but since it was a result of his body growing so drastically, he really didn’t care. He stood to his full height again and stretched out his limbs making Winry stare, naughty thoughts running through her head. When Ed turned to go looking for something, she found Al staring at her again, which made her embarrassed all over again. Ed had left in search of spare fabric so that he could fix his clothes and get a fitting outfit. He managed to gather enough black and red fabric together as well as bits of metal to make buttons, zippers, and pocket clasps. Once it was all gathered along with the shreds of his other outfit, he clapped his hands and transmuted a much bigger outfit. He pulled it on as Winry came into the upstairs room with a small screwdriver, a small can of oil, and a rolled up kit of other tools. She said, “I tried a new design with your arm and leg this time, so I want you to check how it’s working every night and tell me about it so I can improve the design.”
“Sure thing Winry.” Ed said, smiling down at her. He was in a much better mood than he normally was thanks to the night’s events.
“Also,” Winry said with a gleam in her eyes. “I’m going to have to charge you extra this time!”
Ed looked a little nervous since he hadn’t brought much money with him on the trip. He said, “Sure…I’ll pay you next time I come.”
With that, he turned to grab his suitcase, yelling, “Al! We’re leaving!”
“Hey!” Winry shouted, chasing after Ed as he ran down the stairs. “Do you know how much steel I had to use to make those? Hey!”
Ed and Al waved good-bye to Winry, apologizing that they had to leave so fast. Winry crossed her arms and shouted, “Don’t stay away so long next time!”
As she watched them running into the distance, she realized she never found out what caused Ed’s sudden growth. She sighed and decided she’d call him about it later.
Meanwhile, Ed was basking in all the attention he was getting from the people of Resembool. All of them were shocked about his sudden change from pipsqueak to muscle giant. The people at the station were in the same awe. Many admiring comments came Ed’s way, lifting Ed’s spirits to the point that he was looking forward to seeing everyone back in East City. Ed and Al had a train car to themselves, since not many people from Resembool were heading to East City. They would probably pick up more passengers on the trip as they stopped at the different stations. Ed had an entire seat to himself, his legs crowding in on Al.
And so the trip passed by, worried thoughts plaguing Al’s mind at the trouble Ed was going to get into, while Ed’s head was filled with thought’s of all the fun he was going to have.
115222111.title: Changes...,Many, Many Changes

1152221111.content:
Edward decided to pay the Colonel a little visit. The problem was he couldn't fit into the hallway of HQ! So he decided to just call the Colonel outside. "HEY!! MUSTANG!!" The giant Ed thundered. Inside the Colonel was dozing over his enormous amount of paperwork when a voice called out his name, the deepest voice he'd ever heard. He peeked out the window, expecting to see Armstrong. Imagine his surprise when he saw none other than "ED!!?" He shrieked when he saw the former pipsqueak flexing his gigantic muscles outside his window. "NOW I know why Armstrong likes to do this so much! Heh heh heh, this is fun!" Ed thought as he continue to show off his bare chest and arm muscles.

"Ed what do you think you're doing? Put your shirt back on!" Al yelled blushing as he saw how many people were watching. "No way Al!" said the giant who was having way too much fun.

The colonel then came out and was now able to fully appreciate how much the Giant Ed had changed. Ed was always pretty well built, but this was ridiculous! "Ah and here you are!" Ed said approaching the colonel who did not even flinch and focused his steely gaze on him. Ed loomed over the colonel, and felt as if he was ten feet tall (when in fact he was much bigger than that)
1152221111.title: Ed pays the Colonel a visit...

choices: Ed orders Roy to start rubbing his feet
Ed orders Roy to do something else (something worse?)
11522211111.content:

"Now inhale and hold your breath." The doctor ordered. Kotetsu obeyed, taking in a deep breath as the doctor pressed the stethoscope against his chest. The middle aged man shivered a bit as the cold metal touched his skin, but he stayed strong. He was a hero after all! Well, at least he was a hero. Kotetsu was the famous Next TV hero Wild Tiger who once saved the city from destruction and crime. With his Hundred Power, he was capable of doing feats of strength, run faster than cars...for a duration of five minutes that is. However, as it turned out he was one of the rare Next born with a condition where his powers grew weaker and shorter. Now after so much use, he only had a few short seconds left of his power.

"Alright, you can exhale now." The doctor said as he removed his stethoscope.

Kotetsu let out the breath he was holding in. "So doc, whats the news."

The doctor scribbled in his file. "Health wise you are perfectly fine." He said. "A lot of men your age aren't even half as fit as you are, so you should be proud of that."

"Well, being a hero tends to mean I get a constant workout." Kotetsu grinned as he flexed an arm.

"And hopefully, we can help you continue that career." The doctor smiled. "The Hero Association has informed me that your powers have all but vanished, but hopefully with our new drug we can give you back the powers you have lost."

"That's what I'm here for." Kotetsu said. "My daughter loves seeing me on TV, and I would hate to end up with no job when I completely lose my powers."

The doctor reached into a cabinet and took out a syringe and vial. "Well with this you won't have to worry about either of those for a long, long time." He said as he filled the syringe. "Now then, are you ready?"

"Lay it on me doc!" Kotetsu held out his arm, and the doctor injected the drug into it.

"You should try using your powers after an hour to see if there is any difference." The doctor said as he swabbed the injection site with alcohol.

"Will do doc!" Kotetsu said.

His rival Bakugou Katsuki, who used an exploding Quirk made from his nitroglycerin sweat had bested him in their last fight, and Deku vowed he he'd catch up and beat him, to Bakugou's annoyance.

Getting a bag to carry it in Deku left UA High and headed to buy from Chikara Mugen. As he was leaving Iida had called out to him. "Deku! Remember to get back before nighttime!" Iida had called out, doing a weird, robotic gesture with left hand going up and down.

"I will!" Deku waved back as he left, getting on a bus to find the shop.

During the hour and a half trip Deku went over what he could possibly do with greater control of OfA, maybe even using a Full Cowl that isn't so limited or taxing, to increasing the limit of power he gets. His mind swirled with possible ideas as the bus arrived. Deku exited, walking towards the small store he knew was his target, cramped between two larger businesses. The place wasn't as well kept as the pictures online suggested, but he didn't let that bother him.

When Deku entered he saw all manner of weightlifting tools, amulets, ancient looking artifacts, and more stuff to the brim around the store. "A bunch of interesting looking things" he thought aloud as he reached out to touch a statue of a wolf nearb, only to jerk his hand back when the statues head moved up to bite with sharp teeth made of precious gems.

Deciding not to get hurt by accident Deku began looking around for the drinks stored within. He saw them nestled together under a larger shelf filled with Astral themed artefacts. "There it is!" He grabbed a pack of gold elixir sealed in crystal bottles called "Quirk Control Lacertus Gigas". He was unsure what the last part of the name meant, but he assumed it was related to its function.

Deku went up to the regist, only now noticing the lack of a clerk. The sign on the register only says "Leave money and name of product". Deku was unsure of why they'd not properly attend the shop considering the quirks that can easily steal from them, but he needed to get back before it gets dark and the teachers punish him. "Sorry" he apologized while leaving some money next to the register, placing the elixir in the bag before leaving.

He hurried to the bus and left for school. He thankfully arrived just in time, but Eraserhead was waiting at the gate. "Next time don't get back when curfew is about to start. Makes more work for us." Eraerhead grumbled before heading inside. Deku gave a bow before heading for the dorms and heading straight for his room.

The sun began to set as Bakugou hanging out at the dorms with his friends Kirishima, Kaminari, Sero, and Tokoyami in the common room. Kaminari charged Sero and Kirishima's phone while they watched TV, Tokoyami muttering phrases about darkness for a reaction while they ignored it. There was nothing really on it he was interested in watching, leading Bakugou to get bored and seek some sweet zzz's in his room. Before he could vocalize his boredom, thd spiky haired Kirishima spoke up.

"Hey Bakugou want to come with me tomorrow? I saw some pretty cool stuff in an ad a few hours ago." Kirishima cheerfully thought back to checking out some manly things he wanted for his room.

115222222222122.content:
Kirishima, Kaminari, and Bakugou were in U.A.'s Quirk training facility. Several hours of personal training to enhance their quirks. Sweat currently beading down Bakugou and Kirishimas faces as they faced off against each other. Kaminari nearby with a look of stupidity plastered across with his thumbs up, spouting "Wheyyyyy....." as he moved his arms back and forth in his current state brought about in his laast skirmish with Kirishima to penetrate his skin. Kirishima's body, however, had hardened to his strongest point as Red Riot Unbreakable. Every bit of his skin, teeth, hair, even eyes, sharpened into a living blade with protrusions that seeve as sword and shield. Now protecting him in conflict with his best friend.

Bakugou showed off his teeth in a cocky smile as he casually stretched his arm during their training. "I hope you aren't finished yet. I haven't even started ." Moving into a aggressivd position as tiny eruptions popped up across his palms.

"Hah....Not yet..hah....I hVen't shown you a fraction....hah...of my strength Bakugou..." Kirishima lied as exhaustion was wearing away his hardest state. Thirty Minutes of battle that devolved into a test of endurance that was in Bakugous favor over whose quirk would give out first. He raised his sharp arms, the tips of his fingers joints slowly losing their sharpened edge.

Bakugou smiled proudly at Kirishimas resolve "That's what I expect! Now DIE!" Bakuogu charge forth as he set off two massive blasts to fly straight toward Kirishima! Kirishima closed his fists to ready a punch when-

"It's Past your curfew! Go to the dorms!" Yelled the dark haired Aizawa with his eyes wide and hair flying up. Bakugou landed flat on his face with a anticlimatic splat! Kirishima sighing with relief as Kaminari continued to "Wheyyyy.....".

Bakugou raised his face from the floor "Dammit! Aizawa sensei let me kill Kirishima first!"
"No. You three got personal time to train. Take any longer and Class will file me complaints of favoritism." The dreary and near exhausted man sighed as he as he quietly left the building. Bakugou gritted his teeth in frustration that a good fight was ended so abruptly.

With his quirk turned off Kirishimas hardened form return to soft and smooth, the fit hero in training looking down to notice his shirt had been tore and little remained to cover her abs. He sighed with relief as the battle ended the way it did. "Should have worn my hero costume." He walked over to Bakugou and held out his hand. "Nice fight man."

Bakugou grabbed the hand with his strong grip. "Too bad we got blueballed. I was totally ready to kill you." Bakugou frowned as he stood up with Kirishimas aid.

"Sure. Thanks for training with me. You and Kaminaris aid Im sure helped me so Im positive I can transform longer." Kirishima had a toothy grin as he headed over to grab Kaminari's arm, still going "Wheyyyyy....." as they head for the exit.

"You gotta train your body if you want to train your quirk." Bakugou. Walked beside the spiky red head as the three exited the training facility. "I know something that might help you train easier Kirishima."
"Like what?"
"There's some methods I saw online to help toughen quirk users that armor their bodies. I'll take you tomorrow." Bakugou sagged as hs walked with hands in his pants, careful to keep the money he had on him stashed away. He knew how much it ate Kirishima on the inside to feel weak or boring. Though he'd never say it upfront.v
"Thanks man." Kirishima gave a toothy grin that showed off his shark teeth.

Neither would expect exactly the effects Bakugous plan had in mind.

11522222222212311.content:
Todoroki Shoto was walking out of psychiatric ward doors, the half-red half-white haired teen had visited his mother. The kind, white haired Rei Todoroki was happy for his latest visit, the two passing time talking and watching movies. Alas, all things must end, especially for a boy who needs to return to his dorms or be punished. The sky crimson as the star descends on the horizon, curfew starting soon,

"Hey! Shoto!" A white haired, stocky college student called out, smiling as he headed to the wards emtrance. "So you came to see mom today too. Lucky!"

"Natsu. Yeah I spent the day with her." Todoroki replied, the side of his lips tipping up as he saw his older brother, Natsuo Todoroki, whom he has rarely interacted with in the past due to their father.

"Man the three of us could have hanged out! Though I got super busy with schoolwork and had to wait till now." Natsuo grimaced as he remembered rows of papers he had to finish for classes. "Let me know next time you come see mom. I'll come too if I can!" Natsuo slid an arm around Todoroki as he smiled, Todorokis lips creeping up into more of a smile.

Then Natsuo's eyes went wide as he..."OH! That's right! I got something to give ya Shoto!" Natsuo called as he moved to a bag on his side, opening it to take something out. The content removed was a.... Weird object. It resembled a gun. But the tip looked like it was made to prick skin than shoot.

"What's that?"
"This is an invention my friend made. He makes all kinds of crazy stuff in his spare time. He wanted me to test it, but I think a huge college student would be pretty easy to notice." He flexed his arms beneath his jacket, showing off to his more slender younger bro.
"So it works like an augmentation quirk?"
"Yeah. This converts element based quirks into power for the body. Enhances everything when you do it. Watch this" He pointed the tip at himself, pressing the button as he let loose a bit of ice, much smaller and weaker than his younger bro, to a *ZING*. Whirring hum came forth as an unseen beam made contact with his body.

Natsuo's already firm body thickened as flesh flushed red despite the ice hes producing. "Yeah...this feels so good." Jeans tightened as the hem moved up to expose thicker calves. Chest pushing out against shirt and jacket, exposong more of his pecs at the top. Neck throbbing as it bulged bigger, shoulders pushing wider, abs carving into place as the shirt rose up to give a peak at the bottom. The cuffs of his jacket exposing wrists throbbing with mass!

Todoroki took in the sight as he saw his brothers body inch higher. One...two...three... He wanted to see how big his brother could get. Sadly, Natsu started shaking his head, fingers pressing button on the device as a *DING* stopped. The hum slowly died as his skin returned to normal.

"Hah.....so great." Natsu instinctively flexed a bicep, feeling his jacket stretch *GROAN*, cloth struggling against mass. Easily having grown six inches thanks to the virus.

"Wow" Was all Shoto could proclaim.

"I know right!? I was in awe myself when I saw it first in action on a guy with a mud quirk." He stopped showing off as he moved his hand with the tool to Todoroki. "Now its yours!"

"Are you sure?" Todoroki hand shook for a second, but his stoic appearance hid his excitement.

"Yeah! When I think of you out there fighting villains, why wouldn't I want you to be able to protect yourself if you need to in a pinch?" Natsuo smiled at his yonger brother, patting him on the head with bigger hands than he had before the growth.

"Thanks Natsu."
"No problem! Though don't let dad learn about it. The world doesn't need him to be as big as his ego."
"I won't even let Fuyumi know." Todoroki smiled, amused at the idea of making their father a toy in his hands.

"I made sure to not inform her myself. She'll definitely tell him ." Natsuo shared the sentiment. Seeing the sky turning dark, Natsuo decided it was time. "Well I gotta go for now. I want to see mom before they close off visiting hours."

"Mom will be happy to see you." Smiling, the two waved as Natsuo entered the Ward, Todoroki heading to the trains to head back to his residence at the UA Dorms.

The device held tightly as crowds gathered around him, fillling every space of the coach, awaiting the moment he reached U.A.....

11522222222212312.content:
Three figures were together in the principals office of U.A. The three discussing matters concerning the fate of one student.

"I do not agree with this decision." The first figure spoke: an unkempt man dressed in black with long dark hair in the bright lit room. He stood in front of the principals desk, where a scarred faced mouse dressed in a fine suit sat in the chair, moving his paw to grab a cup of coffee to take a sip.

"Yes I've heard your concerns before Aizawa. I will not change my mind on this!" the mouse in the fine suit put the cup down. He moved to go through a file of papers as they conversed "We need extra security to keep the students safe."

"I still disagree. Especially with the student you've chosen." Tired eyes shooting darts into Nezu as he gazed at him.

"Have no fear Aizawa. Iida Tenya will be perfect for this job." A blonde man, skeletal in appearance despite his healthy skin with a pointed chin and jaw, spoke up from his seat next to Aizawa.

"He is not prepared to handle such responsibility. Iida not only tried to get revenge, but chose to help Midoriya save Bakugou instead of stopping him. Yet you want him to become extra muscle to keep students safe?" Aizawa shook his head. Feeling his words will fall on deaf ears.

"Indeed. He has made such mistakes in the past, but its clear from his hard work for Class 1-A as President, and his concern for his fellow classmates, that he will do whatever it takes to keep his fellow students safe. Once he undergoes the process even keeping Izuku Midoriya out of trouble will be possible. " Nezu confidantly proclaimed as he put the file up with others on his desk, moving to pull out a bluish liquid. "All Mights already shown to favor him a lot as is, so we need someone who won't enable his worse traits!"

*SHIVER* The skeletal All Might, Toshinori Yagi, had hoped no one had caught on to that who wasn't in the know of their secret. "I'm not sure keeping him out of trouble will work considering Midoriya has inherited my quirk." But those thoughts were only for himself. "Yes. Iida will certainly keep Midoriya pacified if he takes it."

"We've already had his parents do an evaluation on him to see if he's stable and his parents have already given their permission. All we need is his personal consent to ingest this special liquid." He moved the vial between his paws as he talked. "Getting the Scandinavian Growth Hero, Big Feeder, to produce special growth hormones for people isn't easy or cheap. He spends a good deal of time having to ingest the DNA of what he'll use to make said hormone. Lucky for us there was a stash of Iida's DNA given up by his parents for this.

Aizawa let out a *Huff* as he accepted they weren't going to agree with him. "Very well." Toshinori moved to pat Eraserhead on the shoulder as he gave a smile, the disheveled man turning the other way.

"Now that that's settled-" Nezu jumped onto his desk with a *THUMP*, his coffee still safely sitting there. "You can come in Mister Iida!"

The doors burst open! In came a blue haired, broad shouldered teen . Blue-Eyes hidden behind rimmed glasses. He proudly beamed as he stood proud, one arm on his sidevas the other saluted "I'M PROUD TO BE ACCEPTED FOR THIS POSITION!"

Aizawa closed his eyes, acceptance washing over "You already informed him before this didn't you?"

"I'm afraid not. It was Midnight who was, gushing out loud, about having a giant male student in need of releasing urges." Toshinori expressed with a tinge of reluctance over Midnights....hobbies.

"Of course she did." He placed a hand on his head, one eye squinting as he thought about her, gritting teeth before returning to his normal position. "So he consented to all this along with his parents already"

Before they could answer Iida stepped forth, arms shifting as he walked in a robotic fashion, moving left arm back as right went forth, the space between him and his teachers disappeared. "I'm proud to be accepted for this role Aizawa-sensei! Keeping my friends out of trouble so they can achieve their dreams gives me great pride!"

"You understand once you take this you won't be normal anymore?"

He changed movements, pushing his glasses up as he he placed a fist to his side. "Of course sensei. I've seen pictures of the animals fed this drug by my father. Giant goats, colossal chickens, fields of massive grains and sugar beets. I was even informed he gives small doses to other Scandinavia Heroes and it doesn't limit their quirks. Ill take just what I need to keep the others safe!" There were other important factors like the hormone makes defying the square cube law easy, the increased musculature, etc. but he figured his teacher knew those facts.

"Well then! Satisfied Aizawa?" The mouse happily beamed his way as the three looked made contact with his, their eyes bright and shimmering. Well glowing pupils in All Mights case. Confidant this wouldn't go bad.

"Very well. But know this Iida, you mess this up and Ill have you kicked out. Got it?"
"Yes Sir!" Iida saluted.
"Now take this and ise it wisely". Nezu held the vial in his paw, Iida bowing before gripping it firmly in his grasp.
"How much should I take?"
"About one drop a day. Take too much and you're growth will be erratic." All Might patted him on the back.
"You're new room after you've reached half of your estimated size will be a special roo. set away from the rest of the Dorms. We had them set up a hallway to connect it to the others and to the main building, right where you can see students sneaking off. Its the closest to class so you better not be late. Clothes and other materials have already been made to make it an exact copy of yoour dorm room. Including your....shelves of glasses."
"Yes Aizawa-sensei!"

Iida bowed again before heading to leave "Thank you for trusting. Me! I won't let you down!" The boy quickly disappearing into the hallway as he went to his dorm, eyeing the liquid in the vial. Ill keep you out of trouble Midoriya. No matter what it takes." He arrived in his neat and orderly room, moving to his blue blanketed bed as he sat down, preparing for a sip.

*POP* the lid came off as he brought it to his lips for the first small taste....

choices: Mirio ain't done growing yet! He takes Tamaki and Deku out for food!
Mirio tries to pass it back to Izuku, making Izuku hulk out!
115222222222123212.content:
Izuku "Deku" Midoriya had been feeling divided from seeing the passing of Sir Nighteye, former sidekick of All Might "Toshinori Yagi". The two and Nighteyes desired champion to replace All Might as the successor of One For All, Mirio "Lemillion" Togata had seen him leave this world, cheering up his protege Mirio with his last moments.

Only a bit later here Deku stood befofe the cowlick blonde with blue oval eyes, offering him his quirk.

"No thanks."

The words escaped Mirio's lips as he sat cross legged on his hosptial bed.

It was clear as his lips were parting that the blonde had more to say with his big wide smile, but Deku, dejected and filled with self-doubt and pity, moved before Mirio could finish. Gripping his senpais hospital gown, the greenette moved forth and pressed his lips onto Mirio's own, eyes closing before contact was made.

Mirio's oval eyes lengthened as Deku's tongue entered his mouth, saliva being shared. Stunned by Deku's response to his words, unkowingly having something passed on via the DNA within his saliva, and not immediately reacting to stop it as he held his hands in the air.

All Might, just outside the room and listening in, stood in silence waiting for Deku to speak to the boy even he saw as a good candidate if circumstances had been a tad different. "Finish Midoriya. I want to hear your answer."

Deku continued to kiss his senpai, who remained surprised, but decided to wait for Deku to realize what he's done. After a minute had passed, Deku slowly opened his eyes, looking straight at Mirio as green eyes instantly widened.

Deku let go as he immediately jumped away in shock at what he done. Rapidly bowing multiple times as he began panicking.

"I-I'm sorry M-Mirio-senpai! I wasn't thinking!" The green boy's face turned beight red as sweat began to leak down like a waterfall on his head.

With his kohai having stopped, Mirio simply sat with lips open awaiting to say something. The lips rose upwards as he began laughing.

"Hahaha! What was that about!? You gotta go on a date first before doing stuff like that Izuku!" He swatted a hand down just as Deku was initiating his 23rd bow to give the greenette a pat on the back.

"I was passing my quirk on to you!"

Hearing those words, Mirio lips opened. He was going to mention declining before the kiss, even if passing on quirks was possible, and cheer Izuku up so his kohai can regain faith in himself. Instead the younger tren gave up his career for his sake.

"Deku you should k-"
*SLAM*
"MIDORIYA MY BOY!"

Deku stopped bowing in his tracks, his face becoming a torrent of sweat as a waterfall descened from his forehead. For in came the buff form of All Might himself, his mouth twisted down as he bared his teeth.

"All Might!"
"All Might!?"

*PUFF* Instantly his frame deflated back into his normal skeletal like state. His sharp triangular chin on display.

*COUGH* Blood now dripped from his mouth as he wiped it off, eyes piercing into the back of Deku's head. Sensing the tension before All Might even continued, Mirio erupted.

"Wow it's like seeing parade balloons lose all air instantly by popping!"

Nothing.

"Thanks for trying to ease this situation. Midoriya, however, must take responsibility for his actions."

Deku rose up, the green boys face filled with shame as tears stsrted to drip.

"Before that I have to inform you of what Deku just did to you and the nature of OUR quirk."

"''Our''? So that means...."

"Indeed. The quirk I passed on to Midoriya, who has now passed it on to you? One For All...."

The deadly thin blonde began to exposit everything. Deku, who let his tears dry stood with sorrow while Mirio listened, learning what Sir Nighteye wanted for him, Nighteyes antagonism towards Deku, and the burden. Once All Might finished:

"So is there anything you would like to know?"

"Yeah! Can't I just pass it back to Midoriya with a kiss? No harm and I'll help keep the secret! Well unless I blurt it in front of Tamaki, or Nejire, or the principal...."

He was still trying to lighten the mood, but All Might had none of it as he shook his head. He had his left reach for Deku, not to lash out, but to ruffle the messy green on top.

"Unfortunately your body must ingest it over the course of a few hours. Once the power becomes a part of you then you must adapt to it. After say about 5% then you could return it to Midoriya......Maybe."

"I take it it's never been done before?" Mirio assumed passing it to a past holder.

"Correct Mirio my boy. If you're willing to try I will help you. Now I'll go make sure no one else is peeping in so this incident doesn't get worse."

Releasing Deku's hair, All Might pgave a big *SIGH* as he exited. Leaving the two boys alone. Deku brought his hands to his face for a *SLAP* followed by shaking his head before peering at the older teen.

"I'm sorry for acting rashly senpai. I should have let you finish"

"It's fine! I must admit I just assumed you were going for a roundabout confession than actually passinga quirk on. i just....wish Sir Nighteye had confided in me about whether I would want such a thing in the first place."

Mirio looked at his bandaged arms, thinking to his mentors last moments. His lips bent down for only a second as he began to think he let all this happen so he could-

Mirio immediately pushed it out of his mind as he smiled. He would never do that. He knows how much he meant to me.

"Senpai?" Deku waited till his senpai was smiling, a gesture he put on to not let the negative weigh him down. "This is likely just my fault. He didn't believe he could change fate until it was too late."

Nodding in agreement, Mirio asked "So when do I know when the power is within me?"

"You clench your butt and scream SMASH in the bottom of your heart!"

"Super simple! Man imagine if that's all it took for Permeation!"

"Y-yes! Except....for all the times I struggled."

"No way! You just needed to smild and be proud when you began. Here since it hasn't started for me yet here goes!"


Squeezing tightly with a loy of cheer, a loud *BOOM* and *RIIIIIIPPPPP* erupted as Mirio's body expanded instantly! The 181 cm (5'11") body exploded in mass as he reached 230 cm (7'6") in a moment. Surpassing All Mights hero form in every way.

The cowlick blondes hosptial gown stretched over bulging, mountainous curves carved from granite, pushed to their absolute limits. The lightest of flexes could rip the shirt and pants in twain. Lemillion's arms, bulging and rippling with muscle that made All Mights arms look downright small! Tattered bandages fell to the ground as a loud *GRROOOAAANNN* of the hospital bed told how it was struggling to stay up.

"......"
"......"

Both stayed stunned by the resulting transformation. What took Izuku a good hour to do with disastrous damage to his arms Mirio had done in under ten minutes with no ill effects.

"Whoops! I was just trying to flex my arm!"

"This was flexing!?"

The green boy almost fainted as All Might returned.

"What the Hell!?" Blood erupted forth from his mouth as the blue in the pitch black schlera swirled around in shock.

=====Unknown Surprise=====
Despite what Izuku, his doctor, and mothsr believed he had indeed been born with a quirk:

Replicate - A quirk that replicates any quirk within the user, allowing it to copy itself in the user should they pass it on to another. Useless by itself and eaving one effectively quirkless.

Until the day Deku became All Might's successor.

Now with it inherited into OFA, both Lemillion and Deku could endlessly replicate the quirk of OFA as they pass it to the other. Amplifying its effects to endless heights...

115222222222211.content:
It had been three days since the crew of the Astra had followed the path laid towards the next habitable planet following their trip to planet Arispade. Their last trip ending horribly following the remaining habitable landmass was swallowed by the catastrophic tsunami's that regularly plague the mostly aquatic planet.

"7...8...9...10!" Kanata huffed as he finished his last set of pull-ups and finished his weight training for the day. "Man I'm beat! I should take a shower!" Kanata took off the red, white, and blue suit he normally wears and heads for the bathing area on the ship to take a quick shower, the girls already asleep for the night. His muscular and fit body from years of weight training and track showing off as he entered. He made it quick and fast, cleaning his body quickly to use as little as water possible to keep them from running out before they arrive at the next planet. The captain of the Astra put on his suit once more for the night, knowing he needed to make sure everything is going well with Zack before going to bed.

He entered the bridge, where Zack Walker was finishing up checking the ships controls. The white haired, bespectacled genius was in his own turquiose and dark blue suit. He was checking to be sure the autopilot was functioning properly before going to bed himself.

"Everything working properly?" Kanata asked as he looked over Zack, seeing him check the system in case of damage or malfunction.

"Yes. Just being safe. Never know when we might get trapped in the middle of nowhere due to something malfunctioning." Zack replied as he finished up, getting out of the pilot seat.

"At least we wouldn't have to worry about more of those spheres showing up." Kanata chuckled as he thought back to how this all started. A sphere dragging them off into space lightyears away from their homeworld or Planet Camp. Now they were using Astra to make the trip back to their home. The Sphere making another appearance on a previous planet, but thankfully none of them were dragged off like last time.

"I wouldn't be so sure of that. That Sphere could appear at any ti-!" Zack went wide eyed as he saw it. Hey Soma, found this interesting drink given to me during a travel through India called the Drink of the Gods. Figured you might want to try. Had a sip myself, but that's a secret for another day. It had been a month since Yuri came in second at the Grand Prix Finals. Though he had intended to prepare with Viktor for next year, having his coach also be one of his rivals, he had returned home to Yu-topia. Viktor had to leave a week ago, leaving Yuri to himself. ''I really shouldn't be doing this, but Viktor left and my mom made me that huge feast'' He begrudingly thought as he directed his misery towards himself. ''I should have gone with him, cause then I wouldn't have given into temptation.'' he brought his hand down to his stomach, Yuri's shirt riding up his belly from the gut he had gained from indulging himself the past week. His mom bringing him more pork cutlet bowls each time he convinced himself this time would be the last.

"Viktor. If only you were here!" Yuri thought aloud as he finished his sixth Pork cutlet bowl, expecting his mom to bring him another one any second.

"Well it's a good thing I did arrive my little piggy!" A voiced called out as the door opened, Viktor nearly naked and holding two bowls in his hand.

"Viktor!?" Yuri called out in surprise "What are you doing here!? DIdn't Yuuri ask for your help for two weeks?"

"He did, but then your mother called me and said she had let herself feed you nonstop pork cutlets." He said as he walked over, putting the bowls down with their contents sealed beneath some wrapping. He got on his knees and started playfully slapping Yuri's belly. "Your mom told me you looked ready to ruin yourself more and knew I could get you out of this."

"And what about Yuuri?" Yuri asked.

"Oh he wants to kill you and was cursing every second as I left. Said he was saving it for when he sees you personally. But never mind that". Grabbing one of the sealed bowls, he slowly peeled open the top as he continued speak "It just so happen a fan sent me something that could help you catch up, cause you are gong to spend the next week working three times as hard to catch up." VIktor flashed a sinister smile, letting Yuri know he was furious with him. Yuri gulped in tense worry. "But for now you are going to eat this product a fan sent me to help me keep going. 115222222222222112.content:
"Pain killers?" Yuri said as he read the text on the box. "I don't understand... Why would I need to take this for a skating training?"

"That's because the training is going to be a little different for our usual skating workout... in my way to Yu-topia, I stopped to visit a curious dojo called Ryōzanpaku. The masters of that dojo were a little... extravagant, but also very strong and fit. I told them about your weight problems and they recommended a really intense workout to lose your extra kilos really fast... they even lent me the required tools to perform it. But they also warned me it could be a little... intense."

Yuri had a bad feeling about all that.

"Why is so important to burn my fat so fast?"

"There's another tournament in 4 weeks, and I had signed you up for it."

"WHAT? Why didn't you ask me first?"

"Well, as your coach I though you would benefit from that experience... and..." Viktor started to twiddle his fingers shyly, "...I signed myself too. I was thrilled with the idea of competing against you..."

"Viktor..."

Yuri couldn't get mad at his coach when he gets so adorable...

"By the way, the press knows you're going to go, and everyone is going to pay attention to all your moves and failures... specially after you kissed me in front of the cameras during the Grand Prix..."

" *GULP* O-ok, I guess I have to get in shape again..."

"Great! Take one pill while I get all the equipment so we cam start."

The Japanese skater didn't feel as confident as his coach, but he couldn't let him down. The boy started to read the information pamphlet of the painkiller and once the Russian man got back asked him another question.

"Viktor... this medicine isn't normal..."

"Why?"

He started to read the warning text: "It might cause progressive muscular hypertrophy and the reopening of the growth plates."

"That's probably just one of those 'one in a million' cases"

Yuuri kept reading: "It may increase the libido and genitalia in men with genetic predisposition to it."

"That doesn't sound so terribl... I mean, I'm sure you don't have any 'genetic predisposition', whatever that means."

"Exhausting physical efforts during the treatment isn't recommended so it could worsen the described side-effects." He read with a specially high voice tone.

"We've already concluded you won't suffer those side-effect, so it won't worsen something didn't happen."

Viktor's reasoning was so absurd Yuri couldn't refute it. He eventually gave up and agreed to take the suspicious medicine...

"Now let's begin the training! We're going to start easy: I want you to do your usual steps workout..."

"That's a piece of cak..."

"...while you wear THESE..." He said as he showed him two pairs of wrist and ankle weights, each one weighing 5 kilograms (11lb)

"Ok... they're a little too heavy to start with, but I can..."

"...and THIS..." His coach interrupted him again with another workout tool, some kind of jacket with springs which constricted the body and hindered every movement...

"Don't you think that's a little too...?"

"...and THIS!"

"Enough already!"

It was the most intense training Yuri had ever had. 2 hours of basic skating exercises, carrying more than 20 Kg (44lb) in weights.

He ended up extremely tired, but surprisingly he didn't feel any stiffness.

"I guess... the painkillers... work..." He thought seconds before falling asleep in his bed.

The next morning Yuri woke with aches all over his body. The painkiller had lost its effect sometime during the night. He took another dose and rested for a few more minutes until the pain disappeared.

'I hope Viktor knows what he's doing...' he thought, fearing what kind of horrific training he had planned for today.

Of course he didn't. He could be a superstar of figure skating, but he had been a coach for less than a year. He was always very demanding regarding his own training and he had assumed the same would work with his kissable pupil. And the closing deadline wwould be making him be even harsher.

During that day and the next one, Yuri had to endure even more intense sessions with heavier weights. But, in the morning of the third day, he went to see Viktor with a big smile in his face.

"Look." He said as he lift his t-shirt, exhibiting his reborn abs. His gut was gone.

"All your hard work worth it... I'm so proud of you." Viktor told Yuri as he hugged him tenderly. "I don't want to be the strict, bad coach anymore."

"Yeah, I prefer you as the funny coach..."

"Maybe we could do something... relaxing... for once..." He said with his sexy voice. moments before kissing him.

When the kiss concluded and Victor and Yuri separated slowly from one another, the former stayed still and silent. He had noticed something strange. There wasn't anything wrong with the kiss, it was great, like the previous ones... but in the previous kisses he had had to stand on tiptoes to reach his lips, whereas this time he hadn't.

Those minor concerns disappeared as soon as Viktor revealed his plan... a private bath together in the hot springs. While they were taking the bath, Yuri, who had enjoyed the first kiss, went for the second.

"Whoa. It's weird to see you took the initiative..." The silver-haired man admitted after his lover let him breathe "...but I like it."

The kissing continued. And the erotic caressing. And eventually, their cocks received the attention they were asking for.

Viktor had been blessed with one vigorous, powerful dick, standing at 17.5cm (7"). Yuri loved that cock almost as much as his owner.

He played with it with his tongue until it was wet enough to go inside his ass. When his coach was about to put it inside, he stopped to admire the toned back of the pupil, how his shoulders seemed broader than usual and his ass felt more muscular too. His whole body felt fit and hard, like a Greek statue.

"I'm a great coach" He told himself, proud of the results of his 3 days training, and then he penetrated Yuri. The younger skater enjoyed it. It didn't hurt at all, maybe due to the final effects of the painkiller, or maybe the painful training had somehow hardened his inside. Pale, warming hands stimulated his cock with energy. After a quarter of hour of pleasure they reached climax.

After cleaning themselves, Viktor went outside to walk the dog. Yuri, still a little tired of all the training and sex, decided to stay at home.

While he was waiting for his return, he heard his mother complaining in the kitchen.

"Dear... I've made too many pork cutlet bowls. It's so sad to waste food..."

Some time after, Viktor came back and saw his pupil surrounded by lots of empty bowls. His gut was back.

11522222222222211211.content:
"Shit."

The next day they started his training again, and the rookie coach watched slightly worried how easily Yuri could do an hour of workout without a drop of sweat, even after increasing the weight of his weights. Surprisingly, he had gained a considerable amount of muscle mass in only 4 days of exercise. Everyone could notice it even with the extra layer of fat he had also gained the day before.

His pecs, biceps and thighs were considerably thicker now, tightened under his t-shirt, but his new gut was even more noticeable, a hill of meat which shook constantly during his workout. And that was the only concern of Viktor.

The rookie coach had some wrong ideas about exercise, like "if you don't get tired or sweated it isn't working". He was afraid the current workout plan was too easy for him and it wouldn't burn the 10 pork bowls he had eaten. He left his lover to exercise his muscle alone while he phoned his friends from the Ryōzanpaku dojo. He returned a few minutes later with a new idea.

"Yuri, stop. I think the basic 'go up and down steps' exercise won't be useful for you anymore."
"Are you calling THIS a basic exercise?" He exclaimed annoyed "Viktor, I'm doing it while I carry almost 30Kg (66Lb) in weights"
"Yes, but I think you have already got used to it. 2 hours and you're not even tired..."
"Actually, I'm a little tired..."
"...it's time to do something more... challenging." Viktor kept talking, ignoring him "Different. Stimulating."
"Uh-oh" Yuri was wondering what new torture his coach had prepared for him.
"Let's do a little jogging for the town."
"That's... actually nice, Viktor. I don't think the excessive workout is good for me, and I don't think I really need something SO extreme to slim down. A more long-term, softer workout plan with jogging and similar things could make me loose the extra kilos (pounds) in the remaining weeks..."
"Oh, Yuri, you misunderstood me. I don't plan to go easy on you... and the more intense the workout is, the better."

Of course Viktor didn't have a change of heart all of a suddenly. His false kind smile was a signal for something terrible coming...

"I want you to jog carrying all your weights AND an extra 80Kg (176Lb) weight."
"What!? That's too much! Also, I thought you didn't have heavier weights..."
"Yes, but my friends of the dojo suggested that I could use another thing as a weight... MYSELF!"
"Oh, gosh..." Yuri couldn't believe what he had been hearing "Are you really going to make me carry with you while I run? How??"
"The masters of the dojo..."
'I'm tired of hearing about that damn dojo.' Yuri thought.
"...told me to get a truck wheel, tie it to your waist with a rope and sit myself on the wheel while you run."

Yuri was fed up to the back teeth of Viktor's evil-coach mode, but he ended up complying with his orders. He couldn't say no to him. Maybe it was because of he always admired him as a skater... or how much he loved that man... or how handsome and hot he was.

Secretly, he always thought he didn't deserve someone as charming, intelligent and hot as him. Even less then after getting so fat...

So the training started, and it was as humiliating as Yuri expected. Every citizen was staring at them.

"Yuri, you're slowing down." His coach warned him.
"I'm tired, Viktor. We're being doing this a whole hour!"
"I know, but it's necessary... I'm your coach, I know better. Now speed up!"

Yuri didn't answered, nor accelerated. His coach had to take a hard line...

"Yuri, if you don't go faster, I'll send photos of your last year dance-off to your mom..."
"What?? You don't dare!"

*Ping!*

"I've already sent the first one in which you started wearing your tie over your forehead. And I'm sure you hadn't forgotten what you were doing in the next one..."

Yuri didn't know where he found strength to keep running so fast for another hour... but when he finished, his coach congratulated him for his efforts.

"Not bad for your first day, but I'm sure you'll do it even better tomorrow..."

And that dreadful training carried on for four days... in the 5th one, Viktor measured his waist and gladly announced he was again in good shape. Although the diameter of his waistline was still quite bigger than usual, his now prominent 6-pack clearly indicated he didn't have a gram of fat in his hips.

"You had worked so hard I think you deserve a reward... What would you want to do?"

Yuri remained silent. He couldn't be happier for his achievements, but he decided to keep it for himself. He was still mad at Viktor for his incredibly hard workout plan and didn't want to recognize its efficacy nor thank his coach for it.

Viktor perceived his resentment, but didn't say anything more. Both men stay one in front of the another for a few uncomfortable seconds.

The silence was broken by Yuri, who noticed something that made him forget about his grudge.

"Viktor... Are you... smaller?"

The Russian was always half a head taller than the Japanese boy, but during the last days Yuri failed to notice the difference was slowly reducing until, until that moment: standing in front of Viktor, the top of his silver head was under his nose. That would make him 10cm (4") shorter...

"...or could it be you're taller?" Viktor replied, a little dazed for the question.

His body had been changing since he started the training. His lean physique had become something like a beefy gymnastic... becoming so brawny in only a week is weird, but becoming taller? Something really strange was going on...

"You're 180cm (6'), right? So I must be a little over 190cm (6'4") tall..."
"Heh. I like your new height. It makes you look much more imposing... and handsome."

Yuri blushed a little. He wasn't used to be called 'handsome', specially from a beautiful skating star like him (actually he never had a high self-esteem). Although tt was true his physique had changed a lot lately, his slim built had been transformed into the build of a beefy gymnast.

"Don't you think this is a little weird, Viktor?"
"Nah, it's just a growth spurt."
"I'm 24 years old." Yuri answered him back.
"A LATE growth spurt then."
"I grew 20cm (8") in a week!"
"So it's a FAST, LATE growth spurt."
"Uggg..." He signed, tired of Vic's obliviousness. "It think it's time to stop taking those pills. It's not like I would need them anymore..."

The student avoided his coach for most of the day.

It was a cool, misty morning in Sendai. The sun starting to appear on the horizon, lightly shining up the sky. As it did an orange-haired, short, and energetic fellow rode his bike through the mountain as part of his daily training. Shoyo Hinata was riding his way on the road through the mountain, moving from the road to the trails that lay between the trees. "I can't wait for today!" The team was having another practice math with their rivals Nekoma, the Crows and Cats facing off once again.

He continued to travel between the mountain on the path to Karasuno, only to slow down as he saw a mysterious pillar like object block the path. "What's that!?" he called out as he stopped several feet away. "Wasn't here yesterday." Hinata got off his bike as he went over to check the pillar. "I've got to move this or I'll have to backtrack and be late for school!" Hinata placed his hands onto the pillar in order to move only for a voice to call out from the trees.

"Please stop human!" The voice called, its tone both gentle and deep. To Hinata it sounded like a male, so he assumes as such. "That artifact must stay as is for four days and nights!"

Hinata moved his hands off the pillar. "But if I don't move it I'll be late!" calling back to the voice. Not being the brightest bulb, he never questions why the voice calls him human. Kageyama and Tsukishima will also start off making fun of me too!

"I understand, but in exchange for going back the other way I will grant a wish of yours." The voice called back. "What is your wish that I, Daidarabotchi, can grant human?"

"Really!? Well then sure." Hinata, really wanting a wish granted and not questioning the reasoning, began to thinand move back over to his back, getting ready to leave. "I wish..."
