"Do you want to have biggest fame and skill, or the ones with biggest dimensions?" He simplified his words so that poor student would understand him

"Why don't both?" Hinata replied immediately, without thinking about the repercussions of his answer. He always wanted to be a respected and skilled volleyball player despite of his small height, like his idol "The small giant". But in his sport an insufficient height is an important handicap, and if there is a chance to increase his height to match (or surpass) the other players he would take it without the slightest doubt. Also, he was tired of being the subject of jokes...
"That counts like two wishes, young human. I only agreed to fulfill one..."

Hinata grabbed the pillar and started to shake it.

"STOP! All right, I will grant this desire... But I need more details, like how much you want to change, if the other humans must perceive your changes or not, if your past should readjust to..."
"Crap! I'm late!" Hinata got on the bicycle and moved away from that place "Don't forget my wish, Monolith-san!" He shouted as he disappeared between the trees

"I'm not the... Well, I have to honor my word..."

Hinata was pedaling as fast as he could, constantly dodging trees and walkers in an effort to get to school on time. Unfortunately for him, this other path was much longer than the first one and he had wasted too much time talking with the invisible "Monolith". He had less than 5 minutes to cycle 6km (3.7 Miles).

Unless some kind of miracle happened, he would surely arrive late, then the match would have already started by then, and he wouldn't be able to take part in it and he'd be lectured and mocked by everyone.

But miracles never happen... unless you conclude a deal with invisible entities...

"The greatest players need strength..." The voice considered before casting a spell.

All of a sudden, the exhausted boy felt a surge of energy going through his body. His bike, which was starting to slowdown, sped up dramatically.

But after that initial power rush, he started to decelerate again... his previously agile legs felt weird... numb... for a few seconds he almost couldn't move them... but then they began to beat like they were a heart, blowing up their muscles with each beat. After a few spasms, they had almost doubled their original girth, with incredibly toned quadriceps and calves... His new, herculean legs propelled his bicycle faster than any pro cyclist.

Then the spell focused in his upper body... The stiffness came back, but this time affected his arms, shoulders, chest... His arms were completely rigid, frozen in a long spasm, and that's a problem when you're going incredible fast on the middle of a mountain...

There was a big tree in front of him, he was going to collide in seconds unless he recovered his mobility. The orange haired boy clenched his teeth, trying to change the direction, but there was no use, they refused to obey him.

Then the voice added, "They need strength, as much as possible, and also quick reflexes to use it properly."

Like his legs, his arms and torso gained pounds of muscle in seconds, the sport shirt he brought almost to the ripping point from the rising pecs, delts and abs...

The boy didn't regain control over his arms until he was about to crash in less than a second... and with incredible reflexes, he was able to change the course and avoid the tree.

Even after the life endangering experience, he didn't slow down... instead, he went faster. Maybe he wasn't aware of his new strength... in the last minute, he had packed a lot of muscle, the same as a professional gymnast, which looked weird on his short 164cm (5'5") frame. But that was the next thing to change...

He was about to leave the mountain, and he could see the school from faraway. He had less than 2 minutes to reach it. He kept pedaling as he went downhill, and as he descended, Daidarabotchi’s voice echoed in the forest behind…

“But strength and speed isn’t everything… A great player has to have a great range… reach… so be his body as big as it must be to achieve it...”

Hinata frowned as he felt pain in every bone in his body… growing pains, as his extremities and torso started to lengthen. The border of his shirt rose, showing the last row of abdominals, then his navel and finally his whole 6-pack.
And his feet grew at a steady pace, from his size 6 (36.5EU) to a humongous size 16 (46.5EU), obviously bursting the shoes during the process.

His longer legs had to bend a lot to pedal, making it harder and uncomfortable, but that didn’t stop him, neither the fact he looked ridiculous on a bike so small, wearing clothes equally short...

There was no time to worry about those things: He only had one minute to reach the school. He had arrived at the suburbs in record time thanks to his new powerful body, but there still were a dozen of blocks between him and the finish line.

“I’m not sure what the more great sportsmen have...” The spirit admitted hesitantly, “I confess I know no thing about that sport called Volleyball… but I know another thing which the great men are known for… a thing which will end our deal.”

Hidden in the cloth, a small soft extremity of no more than 7cm (2.75”) became numb…

*ping*

That hidden, pink piece of meat shook, gaining two extra centimeters (0.8”) and a little girth and sending an intense signal of pleasure that surprised his owner, who decreased the pace for the first time.

*piiing*

The meat rode twitched again in a longer spasm which added 3cm more (1.2”) and a sensible increase in thickness. The 12cm (4.7”) manhood, still in his soft state, had almost matched his old hard-on, and it started to feel a little constricted there.

Hinata couldn’t help but moan a little when it happened. Distracted by the intermittent pleasure, he stopped pedaling, coasting slowly through the street... until he experimented a big one.

* PiiiIIIInPiIIng PING*

His dick expanded 6cm (2.3”) further, in waves of growth and pleasure that almost threw him to the ground.

“That’s enough. The wish is fulfilled, so my duty.” Said the voice before disappearing.

The boy got up slowly, unable to process what had happened to him. He was meters away from the school entrance. He went in, and saw a few cute schoolgirls looking at him curiously.

He wasn’t used to that kind of attention, but he liked it, and his new dimensions (he was almost 2 heads taller than them) gave him confidence to answer waveringly, maybe with a little too much enthusiasm. The girl responded giggling. After a few seconds, the boy realized the reason of their laugh.

His oversized cock was poking over the trouser leg of his sport shorts (which, by the way, were now a few sizes too small, like all his clothing). As red as a tomato, he ran to a corner to adjust his junk, but it took a few tries. It was so long that it always ended up falling again through the trouser leg before he entered into the gymnasium.

He met his friends there, and there weren’t especially happy…

“You’re late, Shrimp.”

A booming voice shook the former midget. It was Kei Tsukishima. Or a giant version of the blonde blocker. He had undergone the same transformation as Hinata, and he was huge… nearly three heads taller and muscular, with an ego even bigger than before. Tobio Kageyama wasn’t far, and he was one and a half heads taller than the orange haired boy. The other teammates were taller than him too, between Kageyama’s height and his. The only one who didn’t tower over him was Nishinoya, half a head shorter than him. Everyone was wearing clothes that were multiple sizes too small (except Nishinoya, who had stolen Tobio’s spare uniform from his locker)

The wish had worked. Together, they were the tallest volleyball team (in Japan? The world?), but the growth spell had respected the height differences between teammates (worse: it had increased them) and Hinata still was the shorty of the team.

(although maybe that could change…)

While Hinata was dealing with his pissed-off friends, Nekoma entered the room.

During the cold night within the city of Fuyuki, where the legendary Holy Grail War takes place and where the Fifth Holy Grail War had begun, the local high school of Homurahara Academy was the target of an unknown supernatural phenomenon. The student council room shined as the sparkling light of Rayshifting transported a mysterious mechanical object from an alternate timeline branch, one which was likely culled in the Quantum Time Locks. It was palm size, with its numerous parts sprawled about and resembling something that a human would make. It had a smooth and angelic aesthetic to its design.

The true purpose of this device lost through the numerous rayshifts it has gone through from the original reality it emerged in. A weapon made by the Gods during the Age of Gods to combat the Giant of Light who arrived from space to eliminate all life 12,000 years ago, only for its world to fall to the Giant before the wielder of the Holy Sword could defeat her. A weapon to make a human into a Divine Spirit capable of standing against even the mightiest of threats that target Gaia and their Golden Age. A weapon that allows them to defy even the law of physics that the Gods themselves could not fully defy such as the square cube law.

It would come to serve its purpose in an unconventional manner once brought before a human boy who can wield Projection to Trace it, a process usually not possible by human hands on objects of Divine Origin. It would finally serve the purpose it was made for.

===The next day===

"So what was this odd thing you wanted me to check out?" The red haired Shirou asked his friend Issei Ryudou as he brought him to the Student Council Room. Issei had stopped by earlier to ask him to meet him in the Council Room, Rin nearly entering the classroom caused Shirou to move Issei out of the room through the second door, barely avoiding Issei and Rin having their typical feuding.

"Yeah. We came in this morning and saw a weird object in there. We assume the principal left it there for us to deal with, so I was hoping you'd fix it for us." The blue haired Council President opened the door, showing hims the object on the table.

Shirou walked over, examining the object and touch it and the smaller parts with his hand, slowly gliding his fingers over its smooth surface. "Looks like it won't take long. So leave it to me like you usually do."

"Thanks Shirou. I've got to get going. The school's been having a problem with kids being exhausted and the Coaches want me to find out what's wrong." With that Issei left the room, letting Shirou work alone like he always does at Shirou's request.

All right. Let's find out what's wrong. "Trace on!" As Shirou said those words, blue light emerged as lines began to spread across the main object and one of its smaller parts that he was touching. It was different from most objects he messed with, yet still simple enough to figure out with a decent understanding of technology. He used Trace On to fix some flaws with the inside of the device placing the first part into its right side once he finished. It took him a few minutes to figure out what exactly to fix, but once he did the parts fit into the object like they were intended to. Soon there was none left but the object itself, which he noticed had an angelic aesthetic to with two of the parts he attached resembling wings and a built in halo. Weird. Well at least it's- His thoughts stopped as he saw that different red and black lines trailed over the device, turning on and activating to "bless" the one who had finally allowed it to serve its purpose: to weaponize humans and ensure the continuation of the Age of Gods no matter what.

With that, it let out a flash of light mixing red and black with its gold and silver....

11522222222222222222221.title: Ken Kaneki

115222222222222222222211.content:

Is it the Kaneki from the later half of Re, where he becomes the One-Eyed King after ending his role as his split personality Haise Sasaki?
115222222222222222222211.title: Original or Re

choices: Eat the Quinque and take the handles to Anteiku Grow a foot in height and mass.
Take them to Hide and ask him to keep them safe for now.
1152222222222222222222111.content:
It was the middle of the afternoon, the CCG were transporting a new series of Quinque that were rumored to turned the tide against the Ghouls in Tokyo. The rumored Quinques were said to have strong regenerative properties while having the ability to strengthen themselves upon absorbing a Ghouls RC Cells after hitting the target. It was unknown how the info was released, yet the CCG had yet to learn said fact.

Despite this, they had kept the transport and its goods a secret amongst the low ranked doves. As the Special, Associate, and First class were attempting to deal with an incident involving the ghoul group Aogiri Tree, they assumed the less risk they brought to its existence the better. The transport truck had been kept as inconspicuous as possible to keep it hidden as it drove through the city of Tokyo.

The low ranked doves dressed in civilian attire as they tried as hard as possible to keep themselves from being noticed. Their mission going smoothly while smoke from a major fight between CCG and Aogiri happens in the 18th Ward could be seen in their part of the city. The truck traveling safely in the 20th Ward where Anteiku resides.

"Thank god we didn't get dragged into that mess" The first investigator said as he drove the truck.

"Yeah. Just think if we ran into one of those monsters". The second grunt shivered along with the first at the thought of facing the One-Eyed Owl, the Chinese fire wielding Tatara, and the creepy yet silent Noro.

"Thank goodness we're safe away from the-" CRASH! The transport truck fell over as a powerful impact rammed into it. The two investigators were knocked out by the crash as they hit their heads, glass shattered around them but relatively safe. A black and red Rinkaku kagune opened the passengers door, its centipede like appearance checking their pulse to make sure they're safe.

Good. They're safe. The attacker sighed in relief at seeing them unharmed. His white hair contrasting his black mask that hides his face. Ken Kaneki, the One-eyed Ghoul, had overheard Aogiri talking of unique quinque with strength boosting properties. Wanting to have the power to never see himself or the people in front of him suffer again, Kaneki saw a perfect opportunity to get said power. He rammed his Rinkaku into the back of the truck, ripping the doors open with his multiple tentacles. Examining the Quinque stored on each side, eight in all, Kaneki wondered what to do.

I could eat the kagune originated parts and take them home that way so its easier, or I can carry them as is to Anteiku Kaneki pondered as investigators no doubt head for the crashed truck.
1152222222222222222222111.title: Quinque Nutrition.

11522222222222222222222.content: The series following the Hunters Gon, Killua, Kurapika, and Leorio in their wide and ruthless world?
11522222222222222222222.title: Hunter x Hunter

115222222222222222222221.title: Gon Freecss

choices: The two months fly by and Gon gains innches over several days.
He finishes with inhuman speed and leaves for Yorknew, much bigger than before.
1152222222222222222222211.content:
It has been several months since Gon returned home to his grandma and Mito, the now Nenless boy sitting in his room at a desk. Completed papers strewn across the floor and bed, his arms crossed his arms as smoke spews forth from his ears. The papers before him on the desk barely scribbled on. "I can't handle math. I wish Mito wasn't making me do this." frustration in his speech as he thinks back to how Mito told him to catch up to the years of schoolwork he left behind while he lived as a Hunter and searched for his dad.

Gon tried to force himself to solve the math problems as quick and accurate as possible to end the nightmare before him. If I don't finish soon I'll eventually have another year of homework to do. Gon shivered in horror at the thought. I wish something will save me from this horrible nightmare.

On cue, a knock on his door had come to answer his prayers. "Gon. It's your friend Killua. He's on the phone."

Getting up with joy at a chance for relief he walked over to the door and answered "Thanks Mito!" as fast as possible as he headed downstairs to the phone. Mito stood there unsurprised that he sought a chance to get away from his schoolwork. Looking at the mess she sighed. "At least he's doing it properly."

Downstairs Gon quickly arrived at the phone to talk to Killua Zoldyk. "Hi Killua! What's going on with you and Alluka?"

"Nothing much." Killua replied with some joy at talking to Gon "We just got to Yorknew city. We're planning where to go right now. Palm and the others told me they called and that Mito's been making you do lots of schoolwork."

"Yeah and I'm bored out of mind."

"Well good news! Nanika says she wants to help you. She knows how boring being locked away can be" Gon wasn't sure what Killua was talking about, but he knows that there were "complicated issues" concerning their family situation and that Kil wouldn't explain more. "So we're going make things easier for you "

"Nanika enhance Gon please" Killuas words were heard by Gon as well as Nanikas "Aye" over the phone.

Instantly a glow of nen overwhelmed his body. A feeling of warmth filling his being as he felt his mind relax and exhaustion from thinking was gone. The feeling, still feeling him with a warm pleasure, talks on the phone. "I feel great! More than capable of handling math now. Thank you Killua, Alluka, and Nanika!" he siaid over the phone.

"You're welcome Gon. Alluka and Nanika are happy it seems to have helped." Killua replied as he thought what to say next. "A month from now Alluka wants you to come here. She wants us to hang out for awhile."

The feeling still persisting across his body, Gon replied "I'll make sure to finish by then and have Mito let me go. Bye Killua!"

"Bye Gon!" Killua finished as he hung up on the other side, hanging up the phone, Gon went up the stairs to begin doing his schoolwork again as the warmth still spread. "I'll get this done in no time!" Unbeknownst to Gon, his arms that loss their muscle tone from being healed were slowly gaining an inch of definition.
1152222222222222222222211.title: Wish Granted

choices: He's bigger too (as big as Gon? bigger?)
He's normal size and he's surprised by his growth
11522222222222222222222111.content:
During the following days, a transformation took place, both physical and mental.

Every passing day studying became easier, his mind could memorize more information in less time and he could concentrate more easily in his tasks. His aunt couldn't be more pleased, although she didn't know the real, unnatural cause of all this... neither was Gon, who was still an absent-minded boy and had already forgotten Alluka's little help.

The other aspect of the transformation affected subtly his body. Each day he grow almost nothing, like a centimeter. An amount small enough to go unnoticed from one day to another. But after the first week, his shirt and trousers didn't fit him well, exposing his ankles and a band of his plain tummy. He was as tall as his guardian now.

"I think you're hitting puberty." Mito said smiling as she gave him new clothes. He looked at the pile of finished homework he had on his desk and smiled again "You're also much more mature and responsible..." her face changed "...so unlike Gin" She thought next
--
The next week his studying performance had improved so much he could finish 5 hours of homework in just one. He used the rest of the time to train his atrophied body and his muscles responded well.

After other 7 days, 7cm of height and a few extra pounds of muscle, Gon needed to renew his wardrobe again.

"Surely, today's children do grow up fast"
--
At that point, he was already taller than his aunty. He kept training. His musculature already matched Killua's, and it was improving every day.

At the end of the week, he looked older than he really was. His face remained unchanged, but the increased height, wider shoulders and strong build made him look like a young adult.

"Did his father grew so fast at his age...?" Aunty Mito wondered worried after giving him new green clothes.
--
That week Gon decided to train his nen too. His Nen skills had been damaged and blocked after his battle against Neferpitou, and no one believed restoring them was possible... but lately he felt he could archive anything.

First day, first Nen exercise: he accidentally released an incredible amount of nen.

"Wow"

He didn't forget his physical training, and so, two days later, he noticed he almost had outgrown his brand new t-shirt. It wasn’t caused by a new growth spurt, it was too soon, it was because of his muscles developing faster than ever. His pecs had increased their thickness and now were pressing against the fabric, making their shape visible to everyone. His abs became much more prominent, like six hard rocks. His bermuda shorts stretched as his thigh got thicker, and those weren’t the only growing things stretching his pants…

He didn’t want to bother his aunt and forcing her to go shopping again (he had to take a boat to get to a clothing shop), so he kept wearing it.
But after a day, his tshirt were so skintight the shape of his nipples was perfectly visible through the cloth. The sleeves hugged tightly his swollen biceps. His t-shirt started to feel to short, more due to the growing girth of his torso than the few centimeters he grew in half a week.

Another day passed, and his t-shit got even tighter. He hardly could move with it, so he spent a good part of the day shirtless, only putting it on before meeting her auty. Unfortunately, his plan backfired the next day at lunch. When Gon tried to reach the salt, the tensed t-shirt burst, revelating his well defined chest to her.

“Sorry, I’ll fix it...” he answered hastily and embarrassed.

He put his hand on the rip and instinctively tried to close it by graving the cloth.
That tensed again the clothing to the point of creating another burst in the opposite side, over his perfectly V-shaped back.

“Crap. I better go to...”

He tried to get up from his chair. Then his shorts teared up a little too.

“AHHH!” He ran to his room ashamed of himself.

The day after Mito measured him and shortly afterward she went shopping again for her 6 feet tall nephew.

“This is the biggest size they had.”

The clothing fit well for a day. During his training he sensed how it was constricting him again. He lost his cool and teared the front of the shirt up to regain mobility.

It ended up being a good idea. That way no matter how much his pecs grew or his shoulder stretched, his “open shirt” would adapt to the new girth by opening itself more. And during his last days with his aunt he grew plenty more.

It had been a month since Killua’s call and it was time to pay him a visit.

He saw his aunty off, and hugged her affectionately. The height difference was funny.
At that time he was 185cm tall (like 6’2) and a head taller than her. Also his wide, muscular build made her look smaller. When he arrived her home a month ago, she was the one almost a head taller. The time (and magic wishes) changes everything.

Then he head for Yorknew city. Even with his enhanced speed, the journey took him a few days during he kept growing a little more.

Once he arrived the City, he met Killua.
11522222222222222222222111.title: A month flies by and Gon gains inches here & there

choices: Kil accidentaly wishes to be as big as Gon and Nanika hears him
115222222222222222222221112.content:
Killua freaked out when he was his friend towering over him.

“Gon??”
“Hi, Killua!” He greeted innocently.
“What happened yo you…? You’re huge!”
“I guess I grew I little since the last time we met.”

“A little??” A month ago, Killua was slightly taller than him, and now Gon was almost 2 heads taller and as muscular as Leorio, if not more.

“Have… have you done another Nen Contract?? Like when you battled Neferpitou?? How could you..:!?”

Killua hadn’t forgotten how Gon grew magically to his adult form during that battle to kill that monster, and that dangerous transformation almost killed him afterwards.

“No, no, it’s just a natural growth spurt. It’s nice, eh? I look just like my dad, but shaved”

“Natural? You had grown like 35cm in less of a month! That’s the opposite of ‘natural’!!” He though about it hysterically. “How it could happened…? Is it a secondary effect of his broken contract or… maybe it was the wish? Nanika misunderstood me when I asked her to ‘enhance’ Gon!”


“Hey, Kil. Shall we run a race round the city?”
“Eh?”
“I lost a lot of stamina after my illness, but this month I’ve been training a lot and I think I’m in shape again. I want to test myself.”
“Ok, but don’t overdo it. You’re still convalesce--”

Kil blinked, and when he opened his eyes Gon was gone and a gust of wind blew. The race had begun, and Gon’s new speed had caught Kil by surprise. During those seconds of advantage he had got away so much the white haired boy almost couldn’t sight him.

Theran in a straight line as fast as he could. His speciality was the speed, but he couldn’t match Gon’s by normal ways. He had to resort to his Godspeed skill to caught him up when he was within a few meters of the goal. Killua made an extra effort, surpassed him and won by mere inches.

The the killer boy fell to the ground, exhausted.

“Boy, that was fun!” Gon exclaimed very excited “I want the rematch!”

Kil looked at him. “He isn’t even sweating. Such a monster...”
115222222222222222222221112.title: He's normal size and he's surprised by ...

choices: The three kids stay together in the city for weeks. Things happens.
They meet Kurapika and Leorio. They spend weeks together, witnessing the changes
1152222222222222222222211121.content:
Kil had spent all his electricity in the first race and he knew he didn’t have a chance without it, so he suggested him to go for a drinks instead.

They bough a pair and drank it as they rested underneath a big tree in YorkNew’s famous park, ParkCentral.

While Gon was drinking his cola, Killua peeked at him several times, observing the features of his new body, like how thick the bicep of his right arm flexed as it was holding the cola can, or his oversized tshirt straining by his monumental pecs, deltoid and his shoulders.

They only tested his speed that time, but he was wondering how strong he was. He was an enhancer, so he guessed he was way stronger than him now. He was starting to feel envy… and sad. He felt he was leaving him behind...

“Gon” He said “how do you feel?”
“I’ve never been better!” He answered enthusiastically.
“That’s cool” Killua looked down. “That growth spurt really improved your skills as hunter”
“Do you think it’s due to that? I think it was the result of my training”

Gon had always been so naive... but Killua loved that aspect of him.

“If that’s the cause, I wish it would keep going. I want to really strong, the best hunter ever, so my father will start looking up to me”

“Aye”

They didn’t know someone was watching them behind some bushes, spying them with two eyes as dark as her smiling mouth and listening any single word they said.

Killua wanted to be strong too, but for different reasons. He wanted to be free, strong enough to stop his family from controlling him, hurting him…

“That’s nice. I wish the same too.” He muttered sadly “I wish I could be as big and strong as you, no matter how much you grow..."

“Aye” Nanika agreed between giggles.
1152222222222222222222211121.title: Kil accidentaly wishes to be as big as Gon and ...

choices: Time passes, they keep growing more and more
11522222222222222222222111212.content:
Eventually, they received a message from his old friends Kurapika and Leorio announcing they'll come to see them in a few days.

Of course, when the meeting date finally arrived, they didn’t expect Gon could have changed so much.

“G-g-g-gon??” Exclaimed Leorio in front of a boy as tall as him, even buffer and with a ripped shirt which exposed part of his impressive pecs and abs.
“Leorio! Long time no see!”
“You’re... tall?”
“Yeah. Cool, right?” Gon was proud of his height.
“Cool?? That’s not normal! It could be caused by an illness! You have to go to a hospital!”
“Some people are naturally huge.” Killua tried to calm him “You’re as tall as him, my father is a little taller, and that giant from Phantom trouple...”
“Still, I want to do him some tests to be sure he’s fine”

No doubt about Leorio being a killjoy. Kurapika didn’t say anything, but his eyes had gotten red. He could feel Gon’s power, it was incredible and it was growing… With that kind of power, he could easily destroy the Phantom Trouple. He was going to investigate Gon’s transformation, but it would do it discreetly, on his own.

As they were talking, Killua felt a little disconfort in his bones. It ended quick and he forgot it immediately. He was 7cm (3’) taller now, but it went unnoticed next to Gon’s gains. His baggy clothes still fit him well.

The following day Leorio did some basic examinations on the giant boy, but he couldn’t find anything wrong with him. He started to record his height, which was now slightly bigger than his at 195cm tall. He lend him some of his clothes which fit him better than the rags he had been wearing.

Killua was training alone when he experimented another growth spurt, this time he rose over 10cm.
His body was trying to catch up Gon, but with big spurts instead of Gon’s slow, constant growth.

First he didn’t notice nothing because he was exercising shirtless, but when he finished and tried to put his tshirt he found out it didn’t covered his navel. His abs looked even more defined than before.

“Weird” He thought before he went back to the hotel they were staying. Kurapika was there, waiting for the return of Gon and Leo. He noticed the white haired boy was now taller than him, likely 175cm tall, but he didn’t say anything.

Another day passed. This time Leorio wanted to get a magnetic resonance imaging of Gon, but in the hospital they find out Gon’s shoulders were so wide he didn’t fit inside of the scan. Other tests only showed how healthy he was.

Leorio observed the boy while he was putting on his lent black shirt. His naked torso looked even more impressive than yesterday, to the point he hardly could button up the buttons over his chest are.

“Unlike Kil, he hasn’t been training lately, but he is packing muscle fast.” He confirmed “Is that another symptom of a hypothetical illness?”

They came back to their hotel. They wanted to dinner in a restaurant, but Killua refused to leave his room.

“What happens?” His friends asked him at the other side of his door.
“Nothing. I don’t feel very well. I’m going to rest a little, and...”
“YOU DON’T FEEL WELL??”

Leorio went full on “Paramedic mode” and broke down the door to “safe” him. Killua was there, but he wasn’t ill, he was almost completely naked.

His t-shirt was ragged, busted by another explosion of height and muscles. His thigh were so thick that his trouser legs were half ripped, and they looked like they would tear completely if Killua took a single step. His old shoes were in front of his long feet and looked like little kids’ shoes compared to them.

His whole body looked more like his muscular father (although he wasn’t as tall as him...yet) than his old self. He was without a doubt bigger than any of his older brothers… and almost as tall as his friend Leorio. He had nothing to wear, and he couldn't go shopping this way.

“No, you too...”
“Get out!” He pushed them to the corridor, but that movement ended up bursting his shorts, which fell to the ground, displaying his huge private parts to his pals.

They became speechless. Killua closed the door as fast as he could, more red than a tomato.

“He must suffering the same syndrome as Gon” Deducted Leorio before noting down ‘Genital hypertropy’ as a new symptom of it.
11522222222222222222222111212.title: They meet Kurapika and Leorio. They spend weeks...

choices: Their growth remains stable.They start planning an alternative fix.Family issues
115222222222222222222221112121.content:
Once everyone chilled out (well, actually Leorio was the only one who needed to calm down), they lend Killua some of Leorio's clothes and took him out to dinner.

In the restaurant, Leorio and Kurapika watched silently how the two teens devoured plate after plate, and didn't stop until they finished their 5th one.

"I know growing boys usually have great appetites, but I didn't expect something like this..." The chain hunter said to Leorio, who still looked troubled.

The next day Leorio made additional physical checks on both boys. It was obvious for him the kids where taller than him (his eye level was now on their nose), but he needed exact data.

Killua went first. He undressed and got on a scale which also had a height rod wearing nothing except his underwear (also lent by Leorio, but it was starting to look too tight for him).

The rod confirmed he was 198cm (6'6"), 5cm (2") taller than Leorio, and he weighed 95Kg (210Lbs), outweighing him with 10 extra kilos of muscle well distributed on his thick legs, arms and torso.

"That makes you like 2cm taller than Gon..." Leorio commented after looking over the data of Gon he took two days ago "A small different, like you had before this 'growth spurt' started."
"Are you sure? He seems as tall as me..."

He wasn't going to repeat the same test on him, but after Kil's commentary he measured him too, and got surprised how he had grown a little during those two days, matching up Killua's height and body mass.

"Gon is growing at a stable pace, more or like a centimeter (0.4") per day and he told me it began a month ago" He informed Kurapika hours later, worried about their results "Killua added a foot and a half in about two days and when he caught him up his growth slowed. All data suggest he's going to grow a cm/day too. It's so illogical... What kind of disease could cause two different boys to grow synchronized?"

"..." The androgynous hunter nodded.

"Aside their heights, they look healthy and in top form. There was no signs of health problems, but no one knows what could happen if they keep growing like this. An extra centimeter doesn't look much from one day to another. But if this kept going on it would make a whole foot in a month. 12 feet in a year. The increasing effort of his bigger bodies may damage their hearts, bones and organs..."

Kurapika was interested in their transformation, but he didn't share Leorio's concerns. After observing how much stronger and faster they had become, he desired the same thing for him. Even if that growth shortens his life, he was willing to pay that price to kill the trouple. And his young friends were the key for it...

While they were talking, Kill and his sister were in another room. He was about to ask her something...

"Nanika, I think we have grown enough. Please, stop our growths."
"Nay" She sentenced and immediately continued playing with her toys.

It was the first time she rejected a wish from his brother.

"But... Why not?"
" 'cause that would contradict the other wish. I couldn't do it until it's done."

That was a rule Killua wasn't aware of. Not even Kil could make her undo an underway wish.

"When... when is my enhancing wish going to finish?"
"You asked to be as big as Gon, brother... so when he stops growing, you will stop too."
"When is he going to stop?"
"Don't know."
"How could you not knowing? You're the one who granted!"
"You asked me to enhance him, but you didn't tell me how much. And after that he desired to keep growing, but he didn't say for so long. I can grant any request, but if you don't specify details, my power takes will fill the holes for its own. Like what I have to 'enhance' or what does 'looking up' actually means. "
"Then he... WE... could grow forever?" Kil was getting more and more uneasy.
"Nay. He didn't wished for eternal grow. I think it will stop after a while."
"And how long is 'a while' ?"
"Don't know. A week?" His big brother gave a sigh of relief after hearing that. "Or maybe 10 years?" That relief disappeared quickly.

Nanika noticed fast he wasn't happy about her doing.

"B-b-but brother, I thought you wanted to be really powerful! I granted your wish in secret because I wanted to make you happy. Did I mess... everything?"

She was about to start crying, but then his brother hugged her and comfort her.

"No, Nanika, you did it right. With this new strength I can protect us from our family and all the bad guys in the world. But I'm a little worried to become too big to fit in a house."
"Don't worry, brother! As soon as the first wish ends, you could wish to become small again!"

Although he might have to wait years for that.
115222222222222222222221112121.title: Time passes, they keep growing more and more

choices: The three have fun with Killua and Gon's new sizes as they play around the city.
Illumi sees what has happened to Killua and begins scheming for both his sibling
1152222222222222222222211121212.content:
"To make sure no one else grows like us can you promise to not grant any wishes involving growing unless I say so?" Killua asked.

"Aye" Nanika replied. Her massive silver haired brother moving to ruffle her hair, earning a smile.

"Thanks Nanika. I'll get you both ice cream as a reward kay?" He told them both as Nanika switched over to Alluka.

"Can I ride on your shoulders big brother? You're so big" Alluka happily asked, wanting to enjoy having a big Killua to play with.

"Sure. Gotta watch out for the doors though." Picking Alluka up, He placed her on his shoulders. Alluka's Shrine Maiden clothes obscuring his thicker neck as she held on to his head.

Unfortunately for the two siblings, Gon's desires were far greater than either could expect as Killua felt a chill across his body. "Brr! Alluka are you cold?"

Alluka tilted her head as she looked down at him. "Nope. Are you okay Big brother?"

"It feels like there's a chill coming over me" Killua said as his body slowly started to inch higher. Choosing to ignore it, the two began leaving the room as Killua bent down at the doorway, allowing Alluka to open the door and he bends just enough to let Allukas head theough the door. The two leaving to go get ice cream. Killua not realizing the chill was his body inchinding higher as he grew to 6'9 (205 cm) in the past couple of minutes.

"Let's get Gon and have him join us!" Alluka said as they were walking near the room Gon was at.

"Yeah. I want to know just how much Gon wants to keep growing" The two soon arrived at Gon's room. Alluka knocked on the door.

"Coming!" Gon's called out as he headed for his door. As he opened it Killua was shocked.

"You're huge Gon!" Killua called out as Gon's head was higher than the seven foot door. Even Killua was small enough to go through doorways and didn't pay attention to the size. Gon bent down to exit it, and Killua almost felt like he saw him grow an inch(2.54 cm) in that time.

Gon's big brown eyes beamed down at Killua as he stood up to his new height of 7'4 (223 cm). His muscles having grown even more in clothes too small and tight for someone his size. Gon had a look of joy "Just been training! It's had some great results! So Kil you wanna go get some clothes and food? Im starving after training so long" He stretched an arm that nearly reached the ceiling.

"Sure, but what do we tell Leorio and Kurapika? You know he'll wanna test us to see if we're alright after you've grown that big." Killua replied, having let himself oogle Gon's sweaty beefy form for only a second.

"It's boring being stuck here all day. Let's go have fun the four of us. Ain't that right Alluka?" Gon went to high five Alluka who happily high fived him.

Against his better judgement seeing the two most important people in his life happy lead Killua to give in. "All right. We'll let them know later." He was worried about just how big they both will get, yet the fact he'll be he only person to rival Gon in size made the silver haired Zoldyck happy. The two walked together with Gon taking the front due to how wide both were, Alluka happily looking forward as she sat on Killua's shoulders.

When we get big enough Im going to have to make a ton of requests to Nanika so we don't hurt people we care about Killua thought as they walked, the three soon exiting the building as Gon and Killua rose higher and higher, Killua now matching Gon's towering height before the next inevitable burst brought forth by desire.
1152222222222222222222211121212.title: Gon's Dreams and The Wishes of Killua

choices: Killua confesses his feelings [No growth for now]
Killua starts getting nervous and another growth spurt hits them
11522222222222222222222111212121.content:
The walk was less quiet than they would like.

Their incredible heights caught the eyes of the pedestrians, who pointed to them, made comments and even took them photos more often than it is polite. But that didn't stop their plan: The scatterbrain Gon didn’t realized all that attention whereas Killua did but couldn't care less.

Their first stop was a clothing shop. It wasn't a really fun place to go, but they wanted to find more fitting clothes ASAP. The ones they were currently wearing were owned by Leorio, and although he was a very tall and buff at 6’4 (194cm) they had manage to outgrew them by a foot in height and several pounds in muscle... Unfortunately, in the Hunters World the people as tall as Leorio are a minority and the shop didn’t have clothes as big as their current ones, much less any bigger.

After that they went to a theme park. They tried a lot of games and eventually went to the roller-coaster. Killua stayed outside, keeping an eye on his sister while she was having fun in the ride, looking for any sign of danger, as the overprotective brother he was…

...but he also has to watch over his friend, who was sitting beside him, almost sobbing.

“Why do the roller-coasters have to have a MAXIMUM height too?? The last time was too short, now I’m too tall… I’ll never know how cool it is… *snif*”

Killua comforted him tapping his back. It was weird for the people in the park to see such a huge man crying on the floor, but Kil knew Gon well, and knew it doesn’t matter how big he had become, he was still a sweet innocent boy inside.

“What if we go for some milkshakes once my sister had returned? Would that make you feel better?”
“*sob* Maybe...”

“Killua!!” His sister shouted when she finally came back. “It was the funnest, coolest thing I have done, or will ever do! It’s the best roller-coaster in the world!”

After hearing his words, Gon started to cry again, kept doing it until he emptied three milkshakes cups. His white-haired friend was still with his first orange juice, and her sister was playing with her ball nearby after finishing hers.

“Another one, please.” Gon asked to the waiter with a smile in his face dirty with cocoa, a funny look.

“Tell me, Gon… Did I ruin everything with my wish? You would have ridden the roller if I hadn’t made Nanika expand you.”
“Oh… right.” He had already forgotten the role of his sister on his body changes. “That felt bad, but I’m not angry at you or her… it’s just a fairground ride.”
“But it’s not only that… buying clothes is going to be harder… travel by car, bus or plane too… you have already hit your head against doorframes three times today… we can’t stand up straight in some low room… look, we can’t fit our legs under this table.”
“Those are… a lot of things, but they’re just small inconveniences...”
“As we grow up, there will be more and bigger issues. Sooner or later we’ll be too big for everything.”

Gon became speechless.

“I thought we would have lots of time to fix this, growing a centimeter per day, but this morning we had a 25cm (10”) growth spurt. If it happens more times we’ll become freaks in no time, and it will be my fault.” His face saddened more as he talked.

“Don’t feel guilty for this. Maybe the growth will complicate our lives, but I don’t think it’s a bad thing. It restored my hunter skills and made me so powerful that I’m excited with the idea of becoming even stronger.”

“Even if you won’t be able to fit inside a house anymore?”

“Well, that would sucks, but I think I could bear it for a while… we would only have to wait for the growth to stop, and then ask Nanika to shrink us to a more comfortable height.”

“You make it look so easy… we don’t know when it would end...”

“A month, several years, I think it won’t matter much to me, if you stay with me in this.”

Killua couldn’t help blushing a little…

“With you, a growing curse would become a big, funny adventure!”

Killua stopped. He could feel his face burning.

Another pause. Kil didn’t know how to express his inner conflict.

“When you were in coma… I got devastated. Like I couldn’t conceive to keep living without you. Is this what it’s what I’m suppose to feel for a best friend?”

“In your place I would feel the same” Gon added with a smile. He didn’t want Killua to recall so terrible memories.

“Yeah, but because I’m your friend… but I think you’re more for me than that.”

“Your milkshake, sir” The waitress brought him his order, and after thanking her he started to slurp it with a straw. It was something rude to do that in the middle of a conversation, but Gon didn’t know nor worry much about conventionalisms.

“I like you.” He finally said, and Gon stopped drinking. “...if you don’t feel the same… sorry...”

...

His huge hand touched Killua, making his infinitely happy.

The two young hunters turned around. Kil’s fat brother was sitting at another table, eating a steak. So near for so long, but neither of them could detect the presence of the experimented killer.

“Milluki!! What are you doing here??” Killua yelled, jumping from his chair.
“What do you think? Having lunch. I hate working on an empty stomach.”

Killua reacted much faster than Gon, propeling his body towards his little sister, who was still playing carelessly.

“Illumi!!!”

His other brother stopped hiding and showed himself.

“You two came for Nanika!!”
“Our original mission was impeding anyone to abuse Nanika’s powers. We arrived too late for that.”

Kil frowned, it was impossible to deny he had made some wishes after growing two heads taller than his old brother…

“You gave many speeches about loving and protecting that thing, but at the end you exploited her dangerous powers for your own profit.”

“I didn’t exploit her! Yes, I may did a small wish, but I didn’t expect it would end like this!”

“Even if that excuse is true, it also proves my point: You can’t control her power, she must be locked up... or destroyed.”

Illumi tried to kill her again, but the giant boy, carrying his sister in his arms, could dodge him (a feat impossible for him before his growth spurt). But even with his improved speed, he barely could keep dodging his attacks, and with his arms full, he couldn’t attack freely either. And his bleeding leg was slowing him down more and more...

“Killua!” Gon was running towards him to help him, but then the fat killer, who had just finished his meal, threw a fork and a knife to his back.

“Gon!!” The other boy screamed as he saw his friend wobbling.

“After what we heard, we couldn’t let such a bad influence affect your mind.” Illumi kept talking while he tried to stab her sister. “And make you question our family’s values.”

“I poisoned the cutlery before throwing it, with enough poison to kill a whale.” Milluki’s turn to mock “You’re going to die in 3… 2… 1…”

Gon didn’t wait for him to stop talking and punched his round face with all his strength, making his heavy body to fly.

“Ugggg… Killua...” He could feel the poison in his body, but he could endure it for a while. “Get her out of here...”

It broke his heart to leave his friend behind, but the pale boy agreed he first had to keep her safe.

11522222222222222222222111212121113.content:
Killua ran as fast as a lighting, reaching their flat in no time. Kuropika and Leo were there.

“Protect her!!” No time for explanations. He looked back, expecting to see one of his brothers after them, but no one was there.

“No… They stayed with Gon...”

Killua raced to the park as fast as he could, but his hurt leg didn’t respond well and ended up falling to the ground, wasting valuable seconds.

Meanwhile, Gon thanked Nanika for the wish. His new powerful body was the only reason he could put a fight against two killers of the Zoldyck clan. Without his last growth spurt he would probably be already dead.

Like he was now, he could block most of their attacks thanks to his steel-hard skin and his nen aura, but even so, some of the attack manage to hit him, and as the fight progressed he started to accumulate damage. In this state, his best attack, Rock, wasn’t fast enough to reach them (although he could surprise them with scissor once, hurting them)

“Gon!”

Killua’s voice made him look back. His friend was finally back. His eyes looked at him, filled with hope…

...and then became empty when Illumi’s arm pierced his back, heart and chest.

“NOOO!!”

Killua lost his mind and jumped over them with bloodlust and thunder. Maybe he could have been successful where Gon failed… he was in better shape and had more training… but before he could do anything, his father appeared.

Everything went black.

He waked up chained in a dark, cold dungeon. His family was there, lecturing him about family loyalty and rules… he didn’t listen, he kept yelling and screaming full of rage while trying to break free from those chains, but although they rustled they didn’t broke.

“You can’t break them. No one can. You’ll only be freed once you learnt to behave.”
“YOU KILLED HIM!!” His words included all his family, but his eyes were fixed on his father.
“Your unhealthy growth was synchronized with his.” He replied “It might have killed you in the long term… but if he’s dead, he won’t grow anymore, so as you.”

Killua lost his mind again and went berserk again, but his chains endured.

“It’s obvious you need some time to clear your thoughts…” They said before closing the door, leaving him in pitch darkness.

What none of the Zoldyck knew was that Gon had actually survived. Kurapika and Leorio found him in the park and brought him to a hospital where Leorio and some medics tried to save his life.

5 hours of surgery later, Leorio left the operating room.

“How is he…?” Kurapika was concerned.
“He’s… he should be dead. His heart was practically ripped up… but we saw it beating and slowly healing somehow... We sutured it, stopping the bleed, but the damage is so great a normal person, not even a hunter, wouldn’t survive.”
“But she’s not a normal person anymore.”

Leorio was visibly shaken. He lit a cigarette before continuing.

“He also have a lot of poison in his blood, one so lethal when a medic made contact with a drop of his blood he died instantaneously. We had to wear isolating suits during the operation. We injected some broad-spectrum antidotes, but I don’t know if he’ll survive.”

Gon was resting at intensive care unit. It was the biggest bed in the hospital, but it barely could bear his weight and his feet were almost in the border…

Gon frowned in dreams, and his body expanded slowly, centimeter by centimeter, until his feet stuck out of the bed. His vitals became stronger after that.

Far away from there, under Zoldyck’s mansion, Killua was still trying to get rid of his shackles when he experimented the same 13cm (5”) growth spurt. The shackles rustled under his bigger strength, but he still couldn’t break them.

The twelve foot behemoths body bulging with muscle and mass, his form resembling a normal man save for the massive Blender he has for a head and his genitalia replaced with a power cord attaching the two. "Foolish heroes! I'm the unstoppable Protein Blenderer! All shall be blended into protein to fuel my growth!" the cocky Mysterious Being spoke. "This body was forged from a mere human to a god by consuming too many protein shakes! Now anything I blend becomes protein that makes me grow! Only a S-Class has a chance to stand against me!" he cockily flexed his biceps.

1152222222222222222222222111.content:
It had been a few weeks since King Rod Reiss reign, Titan form, and the invading Titan Shifters from beyond Paradise had been defeated. The Military that had taken over the kingdom had begun to go through the serums and other leftover artifacts stored away for safekeeping by Reiss and his men. The Military Brigade, in hopes of finding a means to weaponize the Titans that threaten them outside, in the walls, and the greater threat that known as Marley which seeks to take over the island and purge them.

To this end they had left Hang in charge of overseeing any items relating to Titan-shifting and their capabilities, which she had engrossed herself in for the following three weeks. She had even come across remnants of info revealing how the Ackermans were humans designed with the capabilities of Titans. This info, combined with the serums she had and a few leftover items from Reiss reign had given her the inspiration to create more humans with Titan based capabilities. Thus she had come to Eren, asking for samples of his DNA to help.

"I'd so appreciate it if I could only use your blood, saliva, spinal fluid, and *ahem* a certain other fluid in my research." Hange had asked Eren the first few days after the research. Her face flushed in clear excitement. Eren looked nonpulsed as he gave a reply.

"Sure. Just make sure I'm sedated because I'm not sure how I'd react to you, uh, collecting certain samples."

"I will!" Hange replied enthusiastically, only stopping to say something she'd forgotten "Oh and don't tell Mikasa anything. She'd probably kill me!" then return to running off to inform the Military . Though she had kept it a secret from Levi due to knowing he might be frustrated she'd try something like this without informing him first. So the next few days Eren had been strapped down and sedated as Hange had her men collect as many samples as she could over the next few days, having told Armin to keep Mikasa as busy as possible as they did so. Drugged still but just cognitive enough to know what was going on in his surroundings, Eren noticed that he had been return to his room with a basket next to him filled with food.

A note on it that read:

Thanks for all the research material Eren! I'll make sure not a drop of it was in vain! Here's your reward to have yourself or share with the others. Toodles!


Hange then spent the next few days now focused solely on completing her Human-Titan weapon.

The new few weeks she had kept to herself in her lab, with the Military haven been requested by her to keep Levi out so he wouldn't interfere with her research project. With enough time she eventually combine several of the serums with a mixture of fluids from Eren. Though in case of Marley or unwanted enemies trying to steal the research she had made sure to keep all knowledge of fluids and their usage as hidden as possible, not even trusting the new Military controlled government with the secret just in case.

By the fifteenth day she had finally completed her research.A small vial containing a pale red liquid. "At last, the tool we had been waiting to even the playing field with the enemy!" Enthused with herself, she had been thinking of who to best test it on. "Ah Eren of course! He is the one who helped make this possible afterall." With that she headed to leave, only to encounter...

11522222222222222222222221111.content:
"Oh, speak of the devil..." The scientist thought when she saw Eren, Connie, Armin on her doorstep. "What is the reason for your visit?"
"Hange, we've come for answers. I've been asking some questions, and nobody seems to know nothing about your experiments with Eren. Not even Levi."

Those words erased Hange's smile from his face.

"Oh, shit... so he knows I'm doing experiments behind his back..."
"When we went to see him we already knew you were up to something, so we were discreet." Armin clarified. "We only asked him if you were working on a project, and he said you weren't. We tell him nothing about your taking samples of Eren because we know how we would react."
"Look, Hange, you're a good guy and I know whatever you're doing is to help us and our nation... but I deserve to know what are you going to do with my fluids."

Hange took a deep breath, calmer. The last thing he wanted was confronting the strict captain Levi and fortunately she had dodged that bullet (for now). He looked at the intimidated Connie, who hadn't yet said anything and seemed a little lost in that conversation."

"And why did you come here?"
"My squad sent me for the flu shots we asked you for last week... but if you're busy, I could come later..."

She looked at the short soldier with suspicion. They didn't know each other much, bet she knew Connie was a gossip guy and he would tell his teammates all that conversation. Unless...

"Come in, I'll tell you everything. All you three."

...if she made Connie part of her clandestine experiment, he would keep his mouth shut to avoid be punished like her.

The four soldiers walked into the rustic lab. The scientist soldier leaded to a room with a big written blackboard and several notes and graphics holding on the walls.

"The goal of my current is simple: To fix the titans."

Eren's eyes got wide open.

"What do you mean with FIX? To make them human again?" He never dreamed the thousands of titans outside the walls could become human
"Not exactly... Although it could be used as one!" The androgynous woman said with a smile "It's not a cure, but an improvement of the titan formula!"

Hange pointed to her illegible notes on the blackboard.

"Why does the pure titans lose their minds after transforming and the special titans can retain their ones for a time?" Silence, but it's not like Hange expected an answer from them "It's a gene! "Yeah I need to test it first, which is why I need you to watch over me when I perform the spell later Alibaba. When we're done we'll go to the edge of the Great Rift to perform it without anyone interfering." Aladdin replied back as he finished his food.

"Alright. So you want me to stop it if something goes wrong?" Taking another bite after talking to finish half his shawarma.

"Yup!" With a nod from Alibaba, the two finished eating and ordered several drinks before preparing to leave.

It took several hours to reach the entrance to the vast and expansive Great Rift. The two quickly got to work preparing for the spell Aladdin sought to perform as Aladdin held his staff with both hands, concentrating on controlling the magoi produced by the rukh. Light began to surround him as the rukh across the area flew towards him to give him the extra power needed. "You ready Alibaba?" Aladdin asked as the glow strengthen as he readied to perform it.

"I'm ready!" Activating his Djinn equip, Alibaba was engulfed in flames as his appearance change. His clothes remade to show off his lean physique as his dagger takes its proper black sword form. The fire halo burning behind him as he stood ready to knock Aladdin out.

"All right! Said-Said Rajiballah!" Aladdin called out, the land around him suddenly engulfed in rukh as it proceeding to rush towards him like a flood, endless birdlike shapes of white rukh swirling around him in a radiant tornado of light. The sky darkening as clouds began to set it and surround above, thunder deafening the land. The earth itself beginning to tremble beneath their feet, pebbles shaking about.

"Whoa! I did not expect all this to happen." Alibaba said in surprise as he tried to stay steady on the rumbling earth, the small rocks and pebbles slowly levitating off the ground. Alibaba looking a bit surprised. He wanted me to stop this? A nervous look cross his face as more rukh just continue to rush forward towards Aladdins body, and with them and the evergrowing Rukh tornado the wind became strong enough that even his magoi controlled flames were starting to be blown out. Even my halo is on the verge of going out! I don't think I can stop this. Desperate not to fly off as well, he grabbed hold of sturdy tree nearby and held on, stabbing the ground his sword to also stay in place.

Aladdin was in a bliss like state as it all happened, his body filled with a joyous warmth and pleasure as the rukh seemed to dance within him. Yet they kept his body still and in place. His arms, his chest, his eyes, his mind, all filling with the rukh and overwhelmed by their warmth. Yet he was unable to voice any of it. It's strange. This isn't like any spell I've ever perform before, mmm, and yet I don't want it to stop. The light giving Aladdins body pleasure and filling every cell with an intoxicating feeling, leaving him ignorant of the world around him. Not noticing Alibaba as he used his fire magic to send him to a tree farther away as the one he held on to was being engulfed by the rukh tornado, stabbing the one he reached with a burst of fire magic using his sword in order to not let go. Soon a 15 meter tornado swirled around Aladdins body.

With no clear signs the tornado suddenly stopped, all of the Rukh frozen in place. The strong winds halting and the levitating rocks falling down to the earth. Is it over? Alibaba thought as they quickly rushed into Aladdins body. The massive space they had swallowed all the way to the clouds above quickly shrinking as they entered Aladdins body. The dark clouds soon gone as the sky turned clear.

Alibaba pulled his sword out as he saw it had finished, walking over to where Aladdins body stood. As he started getting near him he noticed...

11522222222222222222222222222111.content:
Kirito let loose his shadowy insect-like wings, his Spriggan Avatar taking flight into the sky of Alfheim Online(ALO). The recently integrated New Aincraid floating in the sky, the equally massive World Tree branching into the sky. "Time to go see Klein in Gadan". He headed for the Salamanders territory that Klein was part of, the wind blowing his soft hair back as Yui held on tightly to the dark strands. As he traversed the skies his skin began to feel flushed, his body feeling like a gentle massage was caressing every part of his body. Every part of his avatar felt sensitive to the strange touch as beneath his black clothes blue veins turned black, feeding his body the stat boost. Triceps, lats, hamstrings, deltoids, etc. grew a little bigger as he gained an inch in height.

This feels so nice. Kirito closed his eyes as he flew, embracing the pleasant feeling even as other fairies flew by. Soon it began to ebb away, black tainted veins turning blue as it stopped for but a moment. A good 2 inches added to his height as he grew to 5'8, his clothes a little tighter but still loose as a little more muscle grew beneath. "Yui are there any noticeable changes to my body after drinking the stat boost?"

"Let me check daddy." She began to analyze his body, noticing the beginning of muscle emerging from Kiritos Avatar body and a improvement to stature. As she went in depth to analyze the program her eyes turned from black to blank white, an assortment of "%#:%%=3222×÷%%4;#=%=÷÷##==" flooded the AI's mind, the black ooze that dwelled within the Avatars code was less like a program and more similar to a virus. One advance enough to tamper with Yuis own programming.

Eye color returned as her memories and scanning ability were now rewritten, seeing his new appearance as 'normal'. "Nothing's wrong Daddy! Just a boost to your stats by 1%!" Which wasn't entirely a lie, his stats received an okay boost, but it'd be correct to say he received one closer to 4% than 1.

"Good. We're almost to Gadan. So let's go down and tell him how the new raid boss in Spriggan territory works!" Kirito began to lower his altitude as they entered the desert territory ruled by the Salamander race.

===During the battle===
Kirito swung both blades with all his might as he clashed with the mighty new raid boss added to Alfheim. Svartálfar, Forgotten God King of the Dark Elves. A giant cloaked figure with scaled hands and a face obscured save for its eyes that consumed the light around it like a black hole. Three Mystical Spears that he tossed at the melee swordsman who swiftly dodged, black leathery wings of of the boss appearing from his cloak as he took flight, summoning threw more spears that all moved at his will like peojectiles.

Kirito decided to take on this new raid boss solo in the recently opened it dungeon Shadow Alfheim. It's difficulty surprising him as it allowed even solo players to take it on. Nevertheless he prevailed, realizing he always changes between flight and land with his attacks, striking in half Svartálfar as he deopped the stat booster. A stat booster meant to improve only one stat by a mere .25%, but due to an unforseen error the dark attuned Spriggans gained a permanent status buff enhancing, stats receiving boostsby large amounts beyond the intended use. The forgotten Dark Fae was to be a grinding boss to make way for a new set of bosses based around each race.

Seems they should have experimented more with the beta testers!

In the depths of the pyramid shaped mega float, Ocean Turtle, A woman and young lady stood next to a dyed blond man in the dark-lit control room, sitting comfortably as he stared at them with his hands nestled around a black and red button. "I'm telling you I can't do that. I can lose my job, even worse if the damage is too severe when Rath finds out."

"Please Mr. Higa! We think this can help restore Kiritos memories." The young, light brown haired maiden with hazel eyes bowed before him.

"Higa. This-" The black haired woman held up a green and black Flash Drive "Contains a program by Kayaba I perfected. It expands the capacity and capabilities of a persons Fluctlight when in FullDive. This can help fix Kazuto mind even faster in Underworld and the Soul Translator."

"Rinko and Ms. Asuna, I can't do what you are requesting! Rath and I want to produce true AI via the Fluctlights. Even with your validation about its purpose if I do that all three of us will be expunged from Ocean Turtle, and even worse if Rath gets angry enough. Don't worry his brain will heal with time." He moved his hand from the button to return overseeing the digital realm of Underworld.

Asuna turned her hazel eyes to Rinko, who "*SIGH*" as she realized she would need to play a card to gain aid from her former classmate. The dark haired woman moved over to his chair, bending slightly to whisper into his ear.

Higa's eyes widened as he flushed red. "You wouldn't." He turned his head, staring point blank into eyes steeled in resolve.

"I would if it helps Asuna and Kazuto." Higa swallowed as Koujiro Rinko looked him straight in the eyes, unflinching.

"All right fine!" Both smiled triumphantly towards each other as Higa caved. "Ah I hope Rath doesn't get me sent to jail for this."

"Thanks Higa." Asuna smiled in joy.

"Don't thank me yet. I need to let down the protection so it can go through. This can easily backfire if the program doesn't work as mentioned." He turned around and moved the mouse to open and deactivate the firewalls and Antivrus protection. As the programs shut off and he received a warning about no protection, he opened a small hatch beneath the controls to reveal the USB port. Holding his hand up for the USB Flash Drive, Rinko handed him the object to plug int. "Now to save the file and activate it".

He sww the file "GRWEXPV8.exe". He smirked at it being her 8th Version. "Could have done it by version-OW" His smartass comment getting a slap in the head. "Sorry!" Returning to save the file into the processes outside the Admins reach, going through the search for his Fluctlight in Central Cathedral. As he found the two intruder Fluctlights in the heart of the Axiom Church, he set it activate on Fluctlight Unit ID NND7-6-*CLICK*-361.

The ID of Fluctlight Eugeo.


Shit.

====UNDERWORLD -CENTRAL CATHEDRAL-====
Two boys step by step head higher into the great Tower where the tyranical Administrator, Pontifex Quintella, rested at the top. One blonde green eyed clad in blue, the other black hair and eyes clad in the same color. The two boys carried blades the same color.

"Which Integrity Knight do you think we'll face next Kirito?" The blonde boy, Eugeo, asked his friend in black as they continued walking up the towers steps,

"Considering we beat the red knight, hopefully some higher numbered ones." Kirito assuming the number of each Synthesis relating to their power, rather than the time they were converted by Quintella via the Symthesis Ritual. Unbeknownst to him that the second in command and her four subordinates waited for them. "No matter who we face we'll beat them and save Alice."

"Yeah!" Eugeo smiled as the continued upwards, his foot raising to the next step to as he-*FREEZE*.

Green eyes began shifting rapidly in his sockets, zigzagging in every direction as lips dripped red from teeth piercing lips. The blonde boys body shivered as he remained frozen in place. All thoughts by the boy silenced. Emotions nulled as the program became a virus, altering that which it was not meant to infect.

Kirito moved a few steps upwards, only to look back when his friend did not stsnd side by side "Eugeo? Eugeo!" He quickly moved to him as he grabbed stiffened arms, kept in place like they were forged from granite despite Kiritos best efforts.

FLUCTLIGHT PARAMETER CAPACITY: EXPANDING....
FLUCTLIGHT SACRED ART CAPABILITIES: EXPANDING...
FLUCTLIGHT GROWTH PARAMETERS: EXPANDING...
TABOO BREAKING INDEX PARAMETER: DELETED....

Eugeos arms started to thicken beneath Kiritos grip, hands covering less and less as biceps stsrted to appear with a vein to nourish it. Kirito stood a step higher, letting go the arns as he watched his friends head soon rise, eyes meeting his own as they sporadically moved about only to rise higher as Kirito glimpsed upwards.

"Eugeo?!" Kirito wasn't sure what to do as he witnessed this transformation......


In the chambers of Quintella, the power mad ruler of the light half of Underworld, she slept peacefully, unaware her rule will soon end.

While Cardinal, sitting in a chair hidden in her secret library only she has access too, twitched as she felt the changes to Underworld. "It seems the gods have finally done something. I doubt it was to stop their twisted experiments with us or Quintella. *SIGH*" She manifested a cup of tea to sip before resuming "I hope Kirito and Eugeo still fare well on the quest to dethrone her. My messengers should inform me soon...."

115222222222222222222222222222111.content:
The twins didn't like much extenuating physical efforts, so they looked for an alternative on internet. Eventually they found a suspicious website which advertised some kind of "magic pills" to improve strength and handsomeness of the male body.

They ordered them without thinking, and the day after they received a big box with dozens of bottles of pills.

"I didn't expect they would send so many for only 5$."

They went to the club room where all the other members were (except Haruhi, who was doing something elsewhere). Some of them had already started training: Mori was lifting weights shirtless with special enthusiasm. Honey wanted to follow his cousin's example, but he couldn't lift the lightest of the weights. Ootori was already bored and tired of running on the treadmill and had stopped to play with his phone.

"Kaoru, Hikaru, good timing... I have got an idea to make the exercise more fun." The president explained his plan: A competition between the members to see who can get bigger in one month and the winner would receive a really special prize (he didn't specify).

"There is a bodybuilding contest in a month. We could all participate in it, and we could use the judges' points to decide who win our personal competition."

Not everyone liked Tamaki's idea, but they ended up signing up. Then the twins talked about the pills they had bought and offered them some bottles.

"Is this... some kind of steroid?" Tamaki wondered suspiciously "Is it safe?"
"Of course!" One twin said.
"They aren't steroids, they're... supplements!" The other continued, although they didn't actually know what they are.
"It helps to build muscle and gives energy to do more even exercise."
"Well, if that's true... I'm so tired after 10 minutes of treadmill I could make use of one energetic supplement..." Ootori said as he took one.
"Packing muscle isn't easy for tall people like me." Mori continued. "If they could help me..."

Honey got another bottle and swallow a pair of them without caring about what was the recommendable dose.

At the end everyone had his own bottle of pills. There were still plenty in the box.
The label of the bottle didn't say much about the drug and their effects except it helped to become stronger... However, there was an information pamphlet on the bottom of the box, hided by the remaining bottles... that unseen document warned about the danger of consuming more than a pill per month and it wasn't recommended for people younger than 21. Unfortunately, no one noticed that piece of paper...
