Each boy had gone to a different exercise machines and equipment bought for the club. Numerous tools for weightlifting neatly gathered together as their own private gym. The truth of this situation is that Kyoya had noticed they were being a bit too gluttonous and he had manipulated Tamaki's ego to get this all set up. As the Shadow King should to keep the club running smoothly. "Was surprised by Hikaru and Kaoru getting these to help. It shouldn't do much harm if we only use them to get into shape." Kyoya mused as he held a bottle in his hand, opening it to take his his own. "I made sure to prepare before I did this. I have no intention of improper training".

"All right! Let us train ourselves and become dazzling heavenly bodies for all women to adore!" Tamaki gallantly sparkled as he talked to the rest, taking out his first pill and ingesting.

"Will do!" Honey chirped from Mori's shoulder, sitting there happily as Mori stood there in silence.

The twins were not so satisfied with the idea of working hard, even with the pills "At least we can win an award if we do well".

Kyoya just smirked as everything was coming together as he schemed.

As they all took a pill they went to their individual equipment, some of which had been changed on a whim. Kyoya was doing chin ups, Honey was using an 35 lbs (16 kg) kettleball, Hikaru and Kaoru were both using 15 lbs (6 kg) dumbbells, Mori was near Honey doing bench press with 45 lbs (20 kg) barbells, and Tamaki was completetly reckless doing a Lat pulldown with 150 lbs (60 kg).

Hikaru and Kaoru quickly got into theirs doing bicep curls. "Easier than we thought!" Both said as each rep seemed easier with each new one. Veins elegantly emerging across their biceps as they slowly got bigger.
Honey was treating his kettleball more as a toy as he lifts it before putting it down. "This is heavy!" Never taking into consideration his shorter height and weight wasn't ready for it. Yet after lifting it for a second and third time felt a tad easier and he could hold it just a little longer. His slender arms looking like something was thickening beneath it.
Mori and Kyoya had yet to start, as they were doing dynamic stretches to prepare their bodies for the coming training. Mori's eyes on Honey.

Tamaki on the other hand had been an idiot. Never learning how to properly do lat pullldowns, nor having weights set to a limit he could handle, meant his face was blistering red as he tried to pull down the bar, his bad grip not even budging the weight as. It sat there as an unmovable object. "C-c'mon I can do this!" The blonde whined In frustration as it refused to budge.

"I told him not to rush and look up everything about it." Kyoya mused as he finished his stetches with Mori and the two headed for their planned workouts. Hikaru and Kaoru were doing reps with reckless abandon, each flex making their biceps bulge slightly more beneath their uniform, and bizzarely the rest of their body slowly grew starting from the muscles they were working. Though not as big as their new biceps and growing arms got the most change. It was feeding them with a buzz of energy to keep going.

Honey shorter frame was definitely bigger as his wider shoulders on his short frame left his uniform tight. He had just been playing with the kettleball, even doing some actual exercises by chance, as his smaller body welcomed the pressure of the heavy object. "I should get a bigger one to play with!"

Tamaki meanwhile had let out a triumphant sigh of relief "Aha! I knew things would go my way!" Instead of receiving an injury from his reckless posture and new tire effort to pull down the bar, he had finally seen the weights rise ever slow slowly. It was clear that his biceps and deltoids were growing stronger, his shoulder muscles bulging as light veins snaked below his clothes. His lats were growing stronger in the back, which began to influence the other muscles in the back as the pill altered the rest of the body to make them as strong as the ones being worked.

Soon he had finally pulled the bar down to to the top of his chest chest...and then pulled ut down further. The bad posturing only made his body work harder to compensate, growing to feed him mass and power to ease the workload. "Yes I did it!" Tamaki triumphantly thought aloud as he just kept the bar in place with his stronger grip. "I knew I could do it! Now let's do another one." With his second the strain became easier, his shirt began to stretch in the front as his pecs started to grow from contact with his thickening muscles.

"Another! and Another!" Each rep became easier as his body grew from each one. Bursting in power as the 100 lbs became nothing by his 8th rep! The King of the Host Club felt discomfort as his body needed to be repositioned to pull the weight, the leader getting easily 5 inches (12 cm) in height. The lower set of cobblestone abs peeking at the bottom. "Since this is getting easier I better put on more weight!" Tamaki triumphantly mused at how natural this came to him? Not realizing that pills wonderful effects are why he's not in a hospital.

The others were still doing their own exercises but the lack of strain with the now pitiful weight of their dumbbels and kettleball made it hard for Hikaru, Kaoru, and Honey to notice. Mori was taking his time doing small number of reps sith each set, keeping his body from being damaged in his mind but halting his progress. Kyoya's own body was getting nicely toned as he did his set of reps with each chin up. The boys had all gotten 1-1.5 inches (2- 3 cm) in height.

He put the weight up to 300 bs (136 kg) before sitting down. "Now let's see me get used to this even easier than the first time!" As he piled on the weight. Repeating the process of frustration, ease, cocky arrogance as he bulged, stretched, pumped, hickened with inhuman power. The leader of the Host Club adding easily 8 inches (20 cm) in height to rise to 7'1 (215 cm) by his 20th rep. His main workout muscles grew the most and the rest of his body grew to keep up. "I am truly made to be the Host Clubs King!" Tamaki Suoh cockily released the bar with carelessness as the buzz of energy left him on a power high and he decided to really flex his arms. With that motion a *RRRRIIIIPPPP* sound echoed across the room as his biceps tore through the restrictive clothes, more tears releasing their desperate pleas to end the expanding form of the growing prettyboy behemoth. The weights fell with a thud as 300 lbs came down hard with the bars release.

With it all eyes turned to Tamaki as he stood tall and proud and looked at the others. "I need to get bigger!" The other members stared dumbfounded.

"Tamaki!?"

After their initial surprise, the club reacted with quite enthusiasm to Tamaki's growth spurt.

"So this is what we can get by exercising... so cool!" The twins said, amazed by his muscles, as they were going in circles around Tamaki, observing his muscular body from all the angles.

Honey was playing with the strong president, hanging from his arm as he kept it flexed. The little guy laughed as Tamaki started to spin, transforming himself into a living carousel.

When he stopped spinning, he stayed still face to face with Mori... although this time the "former tallest club member" was way below his eye level, roughly a head shorter. He was staring at the president with a serious face, Tamaki suspected he didn't like to be outgrew, or maybe he dislikes how much attention his cousin paid to him...

He rubbed his shorter fellow's hair with a little too strength, to annoy him a bit. He really enjoyed his new height, a suitable size for a "prince"... or a king.

But he wasn't as greedy to let his friends fall behind... He encouraged them to keep training.

"You have been doing it well, but you neglected the intensity of the exercise. Exercising with an 2KG weight will take you two the double of time than a 4KG weight... the same with one of 8, 16 and 32KG! If you try as hard you think you're going to die, but keep going, you'll eventually get a body as strong as mine!"

The others members, encouraged with his words, decided to give their best so they could get a body as impressive as the president. The most fired-up was Mori, his face remained serious and emotionless, but his eyes were filled with fire and determination. He added weights to his own until it matched the 300 Lb (136 kg) Tamaki did lift just before stopping. The headmaster's son had some difficulties with it, so Mori thought if he could lifted it, he would match him.

His stoicism disappeared when he started to use that weight... he used all his strength, but he only could lift it a few centimeters before dropping it.

Swearing and panting, the tall dark haired boy realized he wouldn't achieve it without an extra help, so he grabbed his bottle of pills and took another two.
Taking more "supplements" could be considered as a cheat in that competition between club members... But he didn't feel guilty. Minutes before he had seen the twins sneakily taking a new dose. And they had begun to benefit of that: They had grown inches in height and width, their t-shirts were straining with their thickening pectorals and couldn't cover their longer torsos, exposing their first row of abs. They were lifting lighter weights than his, but maybe because of that they could finish multiple reps, and the correctly executed exercise benefit their growth rates (Remember: Mori was still on his first rep because it was too heavy for him)

Mori could have reduced the weight, but he was too pig-headed, he wanted to surpass Tamaki as fast as he could... so he keep trying with the 300Lbs weights, suffering a lot so tbey would rise just 5cm (2 inches)... while he was holding it all his muscles, which were completely and painfully flexed, thickened 2.5 centimeter (1").

Worn out, he dropped the weights noisily. He didn't notice his improvements and frustrated, he swallowed another pill.

But he didn't gave up and tried it again, and during the tremendous effort his pectorals and biceps expanded another inch... This time he noticed something, that he could lift it an little higher for one second more than before. He smiled and repeated the exercise.

A new rep, the weights went noticeable higher, not only his muscles grew, his whole body stretched taller (not much, roughtly 5cm or 2").
Another rep, the weights didn't feel so impossibly heavy anymore. His shoulders grew broader, and with them his deltoids and pecs.
The third rep caused a little growth spurt in height and muscle mass. Mori wasn't comfortable in the seat, he readjusted his posture to adapt his larger frame. Also...
The fourth one. And his shoes were killing him. They were becoming more and more tight as he kept exercising... but he was too into it to stop and take his trainers off.
The fifth one. It was becoming too easy too him, the main difficulty was his clothes... he was doing it shirtless, but his shoes and his pants couldn't adapt to his growing form. The trouser legs receded as his legs grew even longer, got tighter as they gained width... and his crotch grew fuller due to the hormonal chaos caused by the overdose of pills.
Six. His feet burst his trainers. Mori didn't care much (actually, he felt alleviated) and kept going.
Seven. His head rose a few more centimeters. His super wide-shoulders, in contrast with his still pretty narrow waist, gave him an extreme v-shape back.

"Too easy" He thought and added more weight

Eight. Mori moaned a little, but not because of the weight. His cock was growing... or trying to, but his tight trousers didn't let him. The struggle was as uncomfortable as pleasant... He couldn't help getting a hardon...

Nine. An erection (expanding with each rep) can tear trousers.

Ten. The rest of his trousers (which ended just above his knees) started to rip due to his growing thighs.

Eleven.
Twelve
...
Twenty

The now-considerably big twins stopped chitchatting and stared silently at the colossal teen. They could see the growth happening in front of their eyes.

The innocent Honey was cheering him as he was taking more and more pills. The little blond didn't trained much in comparison with his friends, but he ate much more pills. They were incredible sweet, and the boy started to think about them like candy. Although he hadn't grown much (a few inches and pounds), the excessive dose would have consequences later.

Fourty.

The phone rang in Kagamis apartment while he finished his bath, water dripping off his toned body as he went to answer the phone. "Hello?"

"Kagami-kun" Kurokos soft voice called over the phone. Kuroko had three massive vanilla shakes before him and a blender that had been in use. Creamy vanilla oozing down the inside. "I will bring it over soon then. Also, I invited Aomine to your place. Bye" And with that Kuroko hung up.

Kuroko meanwhile was finishing his shake. Its sweet vanilla filling him with joy. Not noticeable at first, but Kuroko looked a few inches taller and his arms more toned. The first time the door bell rang, Kagami thought Kuroko had finally arrived, but unfortunately for him it was just Aomine.
The tanned players felt disappointed too when he discovered his former teammate wasn't there.

The next hour the situation was a little uncomfortable for both teens.

Although Kagami and Aomine shared a lots of traits (like their love for the basketball) and both enjoyed playing basketball together, they weren't friends (neither enemies), they never developed a relationship beyond their healthy rivalry, so outside the basketball court didn't have many topics to talk about, so most of the time they just exchanged short phrases or watched the TV.

*Ding Dong*

Both boys stood up at the same time to welcome Kuroko. They hoped their mutual friend would save them from the boredom, and he actually did... but in a way they never expected.

"Kuroko??" Kagami exclaimed when he saw his shadow friend was now slightly taller than him. Aomine remained speechless, but his wide open eyes showed he had been surprised too.

Kuroko had to bow a little his blue head to pass through the doorframe (now dangerously near his head). His clothes couldn't cover all his new self, part of his toned stomach were exposed. "I thought you had already made them... THAT DOESN'T MATTER, WHY ARE YOU SO BIG?"
"Am I...?"

He looked at his redhead friend directly to his eyes. Then Aomine.

"Oh, I am. Cool"

Kuroko hadn't noticed that little change until now.

"I saw you two days ago and you weren't like this!"

Kuroko took a moment to answer back. He didn't understand why he was so tense. He didn't associate that unexpected growth spurt with all the suspicious milk he consumed before...

"A growth spurt?"
"People don't grow a foot (30cm) in two days!!"
"I did."
"He. Ok, it's weird, but I think it's a good thing." Daiki joined in the conversation to try to cool Kagami down. "It may have boosted your resistance and performance."
"Maybe we should test it later."

Aomine put his arm over Kuroko's shoulder and walked together to the living room, leaving the still worried Kagami behind.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222221.content:
It was a dark, foggy night in the dense forest. The leaves were gone from the trees, the heavy mist was in its place. The dark-haired Guts wandered in the forest for severa cold day and nights. By his side glowed the tiny elf Puck with his blue hair likewise shining in the thick mist. The two had entered the forest two days ago, but no exit has been found. Guts hunted what few animals he could find, yet they only appeared conveniently when he needed to sate his hunger. "We're lost aren't we Guts?" The fluttering Elf stated.

"Seems so" the large man said solemnly as he stopped walking foward. In the two days they have been here in the misty forest and it had not let up. Oddly no malevolent spirits reacted to the Brand of Sacrifice upon his neck since arriving. Something he only saw was the cave near Godo's home. What a weird woods. Perhaps elven influence is strong here? It mattered little to him as long as he could have a good rest, something he has rarely experienced at night for a long time. The cool mist was starting to feel pleasant to Guts as he thought of what to do. It has been a few days yet I shouldn't let my guard down.

"We will stay here for the night." He told his tiny compatriot as he moved to the closest tree, puling his sword from behind him as he started pressing his armored back against the trees side. His tattered cape resting its ends upon the roots beneath Guts. The bark and roots was not as pleasant as a bed, but were oddly more comfortable than when he's slept ike this before.

"Alright Guts! I'll stay up to keep watch for a little." his transluscent wings flapped as he laned on Guts head, nestling himself ito the white stripe of hair amidst the black. Guts massive Dragonslayer held close as he prepared to sleep. His sole opened eye beginning to close as sleep came to him. His guard never down despite the trainquil environment that surrounds them.

The two did not realize they had slipped into a hidden realm of the Astral world. A solemn and gentle land that seeks to ease and bring pleasure to those who enter. It had been thousands of human years since the last visitors, and so the shrouded realm seeks to bless its guests. The mist peered into Guts subconscious, seeing the battles and struggles of the warrior. Of his failure to protect Casca and the desth of his comrades, and the isolation of fighting demonic spirits and/or Apostles every night. Only recently getting a time of peace with his encounters with Schierke and the others. If only I was stronger.

That was all it needed to sense to grant Guts wish, and seeing Puck as part of him, it began to work its influence.

"Just another ordinary day in Hellsalems Lot" Leonardo Watch cheerfully narrates to himself while thinking of his sister Michella. He drives through the streets of Hellsalems Lot as a giant monster rampages in the background of the city eating cars and building debris. Demonic gangsters having a car chase shooting at each other just behind him. All of it white noise to the man as he turns, the gangsters crashing into a centipede monster that emerged from a portal to Alterworld and crimson fire and smog erupts from the giant monster speeding through that street. The monster in the distance picking a fight with his coworkers in Libra. Ordinary people and Beyondians living their everyday lives ignored the typical mayhem save for the brief glance.

"The best thing about the Eyes of the Gods is that I dont have to open them to see. Unless the situation requires greater sight from them." Leonardo narrates again, though to whom remains a mystery. He was off from his job and Libra today, hoping to get some more money for his next X-Station Triple-X. Only to receive a text from Zapp that a legendary burger joint from the deepest depths of the Netherworld had opened a shop in the city. The chance of trying one of a kind burgers was a very powerful temptation just to see if it could rival mankinds Jack & Rockets. While there was definitely good non-human restaurants in Hellsalems Lot, the number of weird and dangerous ones were far greater in number. He almost didn't go for the burger till Klaus mentioned he regretted not getting one in a past mission in the Alterworld. That was all the incentive Leonardo needed to go chasing after and try one. The polite and gentle red headed man was not the type to play along with Zapp. Though no one at Libra does.

"If it turns out to be a bust I'll take some of the allowance I give Michella to buy it. Ill pay her more from next time. Because I really want X! X! Triple-X!" The narrating messy haired young man let his love of games overcome his reasoning for a second. It toom about a couple hours but he soon arrived at the shop of this fabled burger joint: The Titans Grip.

The restuarant sign was stitched together into the flesh of a giant wyrm like creature. It rested its long figure from the hole where it resides. The serpentine beast with its grotesque forehead and twelve eyes had a mouth and teeth that opened and acted in ways biologically possible for earth animals. Its teethserved as counters as employees took orders from countless folk standing in lines, with certain parts of its mouth opening as doors to let the employees enter and leave. "Looks better than Zapp at least." He got off his bike and examined each counter and line, the customers nearly all Beyondian. They were all lines for a singular brand of burger made by Titans Grip, with signs that said what line was for which one.

"Let's see..." He examined the signs to get a clue on whicb burger to buy. "1.The Dragons War: comes with The Souls of humans as condiments? Pass. 3.Masochists Paradise: taste countless flavors through the skin as the burger brutally beats you up? My luck sucks as is. 7. The Seven Days of Paradise: brings you to heavenly bliss for seven days before a dead girl emerges from nearby TVs to drag you go hell...sheesh they really are masochists in Alterworld."

He went through them one by one, declining each one he saw for having some bad side effect Leonardo didn't wish to deal with. That is until no. 28. "The Ultimate Burger [Incomprehensible] Lets you experience a subconscious desire be made reality for 24 Hours before returning to normal. Sounds good." He looked and saw it had one of the shortest lines. "Looks like I can get through this line real quick. Wonder why so few people want one?" Leonardo contemplated as he got into line 28, thirty minutes passing by as the line dwindled and he finally arrived at the counter.

A three eyed figure with no mouth and five hands spoke to him. "Price is 10.00 per burger. How many do you want?"

"Is what the sign said true? It grants any desire for 24 Hours?"

"That is right."

Bringing out all the cash on him, betting on this to get all his wishes granted simultaneously. "I'LL TAKE THIRTY!" he yelled at the top of his lungs. The ccreature grabbed the three hundred and thirty dollar tax, heading inside the innards of the great beast before returning with two bags of the Ultimate Burger.

"Have a nice day." it said as it bowed, Leonardo leaving happily with the bags as the next customer ordered some. Getting to his bike, Leonardo happily opened up one burger to take a bite. Its contents looked disgusting and an eye appeared to look at him from within, but the young man ignored it to take a bite.

The taste was...okay at best. Not the best he's had and not as terrible as some Beyondian attsmpts at making burgers. " Swallowing, he let out a sigh. "Expected better to be honest." As he prepared fo take his next bite...

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The fabled Third Child was in a cold, sterile changing room in the pyramid like Nerv HQ on Sunday. The brown haired youth undressing to put on the plugsuits Evangelion pilots wear. "So I'm to try this latest Plugsuit?" the demure boy asked to an empty room. White shirt and pants neatly folded as he had already put on the bulky looking plugsuit before being told too, his lower half already in as he put his arms into the suit. Once he had it fully on he pressed the decompression button to shrink it to the plugsuits usual skintight appearance when worn. It resembled his old one save for thinli esthat trace across the blue and onto the white chest component.

"Yes Shinji Ikari. We need to test this suit out before we can start making more of them. I assumed Misato told you this before you arrived." the cold, detached voice of Ritsuko Akagi answered over the speaker, the dyed blonde scientist checking his vitals on the machine before her. Four slots with names above each. "And before you ask no there is no cameras in the changing room so you don't have to be embarrassed."

"O-oh I wasn't thinking of that at the moment!" He had not worried as Misato was there due to her own actions, so the perverted older woman was unable to make snide remarks at his expense even if she hadn't been forced to do paperwork she had failed to do the other day and tried to pawn off to Ritsuko. "All Misato told me was that this was important and test plugsuits were involved."

"That Misato" Ritsuko sighed as she thought of the troubles her friend pushes on to her. "Due to an unforseen accident the test plugs suffered some damage from the last angel attack. As such we will need to test the suit out next week as well when the repairs are finished."

"Okay, so why am I wearing this if we can't test it Miss Ritsuko?"

"We'll be having you wear this 24/7 every day for the next week." Ritsuko bluntly declared.

"What!? But what about need to ccean myself or use the bathroom? I can't do that in this!" Shinji was panicking as there were, ahem, other reasons a youth going through puberty wouldn't want to wear it.

"Do not worry. These plugsuits are state of the art and have been designed to turn said waste into energy. I could go into detail, but you wouldn't like the specifics." "Though I am not allowed to mention the properties of these new plugsuits in the first place." She kept said thought to herself. Though she believed she knew a way to calm him down. "I can tell you that Touji Suzuhara, Kensuke Aida, and Kaworu Nagisa have likewise agreed to these experiments."

Hearing that, Shinji had mostly calmed down "They did? I mean I'm not surprised Kensuke did but Kaworu and Touji as well?"

"Yes. It's our hope to prepare potential and current pilots by testing them with these new plugsuits beforehand."

"All right. So what should be done about school? Won't I get in trouble for not being able to wear the uniform?" Shinji asked as he grabbed his clothes to prepare himself to leave.

"Fear not. Tokyo-3 First Municipal has been told the four of you are excused and will be residing in GeoFront for the next week in a vacant area so we can study you all via the suits. Misato wiil take you there and will retireve items you request."

"All right. Have a good day Ms. Ritsuko." Shinji bowed before leaving the room, heading for where he had left Misato at earlier?

"..." She didn't reply back, not being used to dealing with Gendo's son. She looked down at the device, wondering exactly what Gendo is planning.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Shinji was brought to another chamber. It was really spacious, like three rooms brought together.

The third children would have expected a big room beneath the Nerv headquarters would be filled with mechanical pieces, boxes or any other boring stuff… but much to his surprise there were a big TV connected to a video system and a console, a sofa, several chairs surrounding a table, bookcases, a few plants here and there, a hi-fi system in a corner and an improvised kitchen in the opposite side of the room. From time to time a few employees entered to put new furniture or some electrical appliances.

Shinji located his 3 friends in the roomy sofa, wearing the experimental plugsuit like his but in different colors. Misato was in front of them in casual clothes, talking about the facilities which would be their new home for a week.

He went to them. He was greeted energetically by Touji and Kensuke whereas Kaworu didn’t say anything, he just smiled at him.

“Besides the living room, you have a private bedroom” She explained as he opened one of the adjacent doors. The inside looked much like Kaworu’s room. “There are a few more room, like a shared bathroom you won’t need, another room with gym equipment and some unused rooms destined for storage… if you need anything else, buzz us on this entryphone and we’ll bring it.”

“Will you let us take off the suits, although it would be only for a while?” Shinji asked shyly.
“I don’t know, the point of the experiment is to analyze how the plugsuit performs after a long period of time… but I’ll talk to Misato, maybe she will let you take a rest for a few minutes so you can ‘relax’.” She winked at him, and that wink wasn’t subtle at all.

When she left, the boys started to talk.

“A week without school, housework or parents! Summer holidays have come early this year” Toji exclaimed as he grabbed the TV remote.

“I wish this suits were less… exposing...” Kensuke admited, feeling awkward about how this skintight uniform hinted the details of the most private parts of his body.

“You shouldn’t be ashamed of your body, we’re all men here.” He cocky Toji replied “Also, I’m pretty proud of mine.” He flexed his arm, showing a quite defined biceps.

That wasn’t a good moment for Shinji to tell them about that strange night when he and Kaworu took a bath and slept together… That night was weird and confusing for Shinji, although it also felt… affable. He would have liked to talk about it with anyone, but his friends were a little too immature, he were still annoyed with Misato after the last Nerv crisis, Asuka was too homofobic, Rei too emotionless…

A week locked on a room with Kaworu could be a disaster… or something wonderful…


Meanwhile, Commander Gendo Ikari, Fuyutsuki and Ritsuko was watching them with cameras hidden all over the place. 20 screens alternated live broadcast of them with biometric data taken from the sensors of their suits.

“All the subjects are wearing the modified plugsuits… all the suits had the bio-altering modules you requested...” The Dr. Ritsuko informed. “...although I’m not sure why did we install them”

“For our old dismantled project, Project Ascension”

Ritsuko’s eyes opened wide. She didn’t expected Ikari was going to reopen that dangerous project.

“That’s crazy, Gendo” Fuyutsuki objected “That initiative was a complete failure, it killed every single subject who volunteer for that experiment”
“The new data suggests it could work in younger males.” He explained as he passed the above mentioned report to Ritsuko “That’s why I took them for it.”

The blond woman read fast the key parts of the report before admitting he was right.

“You can’t be sure about that. Those kids could die. Your own son, Gendo!”
“He won’t die. He’ll become the ultimate weapon against angels… and Seele.”

Shinji had a rough night. He wasn’t comfortable with the suit. It felt more tight than usual… also, every few minutes he could swear it felt a discharge or a jab on his skin, although it was too small he couldn’t be sure it really happened.

In spite of that, he eventually fell asleep.

“Good. I want you to double the dose… I want the others to receive the same amount plus Shinji's last night’s dose. I don’t want them to be left behind.”

“No. We have to complete Ascension Project as soon as possible. Seele is preparing to end us. We can’t build or repair EVAs without their resources… but we could build an army of other things as powerful as EVAs...”

Of course his powers were limited for now, but the more souls that his figure consumed... he took a moment to look through his vessel's memories, Soul, that's an apt name... the more souls Soul consumed, the more growth Azazel could bestow, able to become the perfect Great One.

He slowly got to work with what he had, just adding just a bit of muscle now. He could only get so much for now, even if he was a Death Scythe. It wasn't a lot, but it was enough to add the barest hints of definition. Soul wobbled slightly even as this was going on, unaware of what was happening. While Azazel tried to do what he could, other smaller changes happened as well, his pupils becoming just slightly more ovaliod, and his ears just slightly more pointed. Both exhausted, Soul collapsed, while Azazel himself chose to sleep, eager for what other changes he could do.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Soul snored as the sun slowly rose in the window, light beaming down upon Soul's bedroom. The white haired death scythe ignored the heat that soon warmed his skin as he tried to sleep even through fhe daylight. His body adjusting to the unique soul inside him as it tried to absorb the being inside, yet Azazel Samaels willpower protected him from his host.

Soul drooled as his dreams of souls continued. A flash stormed into the room, seeming to disappear as Soul snoozed on. It didn't last long as a certain ninja was growing bored of watching him sleep, jumping down on Souls bed and causing him to bounce. "Ugh!"

"Hyahaha! I caught you by surprise!" Black Star happily gloated as his friend was completely taken by surprise. Azazel Samael still slumbered despite the noise, pleasantly thinking of a mighty dragon form to reign over all as a Great One.

"Damn Black Star *yawn* why'd you go and wake me from a perfectly good dream?" Soul put a hand in his shirt as he scratched his scar.

You won't believe this! Lord Death is having shipped to the school: a massive amount of souls from dangerous killers!" Black Star beamed as he pointed at DWMA out the window.

Hearing the world souls and shipped was enough to awaken the red creature from its slumber, he listened with intent as Soul talked to the mysterious blue haired kid he assumed was a loud brat just from sight. "Lord Death typically has us hunt for souls to get stronger. Wonder why he's having them shipped in?"

Azazel was having the same thought before attempting an evil grin on his near featureless soul. He cared not for the reason. "Best use this to my advantage heh heh heh." He began to pump an intense craving for souls into Soul's body' slowly reverberating with intensity following every heartbeat.

"He wants to make it easier for future students to get strong I heard." Black Star mentioned to his white haired frienc. "Right now they should be stationed over at a storage facility before being shipped directly to DWMA tomorrow."

Feeling hunger, especially one for some sweet souls overtake him, Soul smiled as he touched his left pointed ear. "Sounds like a light snack to satisfy my breakfast." He quickly changed out of his clothes as he continued talking with Black Star. The blue haired boy now standing on his dressure. "I bet you want to see me eat all those delicious souls." A toothy sharps grin crossed his face before continuing "No eonder Tsubaki isn't here."

"I was going to bring ber along. But she said i needed to let her do her important business instead. No idea what she meant by that though" The blue haired ninja shrugged, not worried since he wants to watch Soul stuff himself with murderous souls.

Finally dressed Soul smiled "Well then let's get going. I'm starving for a decent snack" He patted his stomach as the two walked to the storage area. No guards were on standby when they arrived.

"Even if no ones here best not to go through the front entrance. Looks like its up to you." Soul unashamedly jumps into Black Stars arms bridal style, held by the ninjas nicely toned muscles.

"Right away. Yahoo!" Black Star cried as he jumped over the gate and ran towards the vehicle storing all those tasty souls. Souls that the evil little dragon soul and his host would enjoy.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It’s been pretty slow in Ikebukoro lately. Even on the online chats. This was beginning to annoy Izaya, so he went to visit Shinra, who was more than happy to see him since Celty went out.
“Aww, what’s the matter? You don’t seem like yourself.” Shinra taunted.
“It’s just been slow, slower than I like.” Shinra could tell he was upset. Before the recent calm came, Shizuo had beat him up, but was able to escape yet again. The hole ordeal left a bad taste in Izaya’s mouth. More so than usual. He’d usually mess with his beloved humans to make himself feel better, but there have no opportunities since the meeting of the Dollers.
“Want to help me with my project?” Izaya looked unamused. “It’s supposed to increase one’s strength.” This, caught his attention.
“What for?”
“Well, Shizuo has super strength and his bones can’t brake. I figured he’d be able to go all out if someone else had the same abilities.”

Touya decides to leave with Yukito. The Grow makes them its next targets.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sakura had been walking home with Li and Tomoyo after school. The three happily talking as they walked under the Sakura blossoms.

"I made a new outfit for Sakura to wear when she's capturing Clear Cards!" Tomoyo cheerfully told Li as she showed him a picture of it on her phone. A beautiful pink dressed with sakura petal patterns across it.

"It's very pretty! I think Sakura would look good in it." Li said as he saw the dress, Sakura was blushing in embarrassmentas she overheard them talking about another one of the many outfits Tomoyo loves to make her.

Wanting to stop the two who were fanrasizing her in that dress, Sakura quickly thought of a good idea to distract them. "Oh look over there! I think I see a Clear Card causing trouble!" With that she was off and disappeared faster than they could keep track.

"Wait Sakura!" Both cried out for her as she disappeared. The two unsure if they could follow since Sakura sometimes faced them in a space isolated on her lonesome.

Unfortunately for Sakura's little attempt to get away from her gushing crush and best friend, a new, never before seen Clear Card was nearby. A green robe hooded figure covered in flowers and vegetation, a single arm hidden beneath its robes. The Grows hooded head was just high enough over the fence to watch Li and Tomoyo. The vegetation near it growing in size. Seeds growing into full size plants while grass grew in all form from tiny specks fo tall, healthy vegetation others would want to mow.

It moved across the air as it trailed both within its sights. The Grows hood completely focused on Li. A small bird flew by as it continued its stalking, growing nearly half its own size in size and healthy muscular mass before it exited its range and kept flying onwards. The Grow had some objective that oddly did not involve Sakura as a vine extended feom its sole arm. Moonflowers cover its vine like limb, radiating moon magix.

Li paused for a sexond to turn and look in The Grow's direction. "What's wrong Li?" Tomoyo asked.

The Grow had been wise enough to hide behind the wal, unveilings it moon magic brought attention due to the boys affinity with said magic. Luckily Li saw nothing.

"I thought I sensed something. Must be my mistake." Li shrugged it off as him and Tomoyo continued walking. He dropped his guard even as he sensed that magic nearby.

Rising up and seeing its chance, The Grow swung its vine at Li. The vine nearly touched him as if it had failed. The white morning glories however tore off the vine to collide with the back of Li's shirt. They turned into a white glow that softly melded with the boy as the vine was pulled back to The Grow, who quickly began to flee the area and leaving a nice trail of flowers blooming as it moved across as batch of seeds.

"Hmmm?" Li wondered what this nice feeling was as the moon magic vanished. He shrugged it off in a second to continue talking with Tomoyo as they head for Sakura's.

When they arrived Sakura was at the door. Having beat them both she wanted to wait. Seeing the two she began.

"Did you catch the Clear Card Sakura?" Tomoyo asked.

Sakura froze up and looked away, guilt clearly getting her. "N-no." She stuttered, not wanting them to figure out the lie. Tomoyo's smile on the other hand made it clear she already knew.

"What kind of card was it?" Li innocently asked, not realizing the truth.

"It was doing weird things with metal and making metal birds that flew away. Yeah that's it!" Sakura bluffed, digging herself deeper due to the embarrassment if Li learned the truth at this point.

The three continued talking as they entered the Kinomoto household. A trail of grass and weeds began to grow upwards as The Grow looked on from afar, just far enough that Sakura would not sense it. Perhaps it wanted to see the changes to Li?
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Grow

He starts getting too big for his living room Now superpuberty is a rare symptom
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Saiki Kusuo was alone in the Saiki household, a nice relaxing day without a single friend causing trouble for him. "Good grief is this going to be in the third person? Normally I just narrate what's going on instead. In my head." The pink haired, psi-limiter wearing boy asked as he realized what kind of story he was in. "Well this will be nothing but trouble for me. But as usual I can't escape these kinds of situations. I'll ready myself for playing your game for now writer.."

Resigned to his fate as soon as it began, but no less annoyed by it, Saiki turned on the tv to watch something to help soothe his heart before the coming madness. Unfortunately, the writer made sure he caught sight of people he knows in every showed he past and try to ignore with the changing of each Channel. What annoyed him was his parents appearing on a show about about vacation spots in other countries, showing them both enjoying a nice vacation in Hawaii. His father making a fool of himself as usual with his tongue out and being stung by numerous bugs while his mother smiled happily.

"Awfully convenient for you isn't it, writer?" Saiki sacastically commented, realizing exactly how his parents won that free trip to Hawaii for an entire week. He'd assume it was his annoying masochist of an older brother in an attempt to compete with his psychic younger brother. Trying to best Saiki only to lose and be a little too happy losing against him.

That's when a convenient knock at the door started. "Better check to make sure it's no one I know." Using telepathy he began to observe the mind outside. Thankfully it was just a delivery man, who tired of waiting for him to answer the door as five minutes passed, just brought over the multiple boxes unknown items before getting back into his vehicle and leaving. Sighing in relief it isn't any of them to make the soon to be disaster worse, Saiki activated his X-Ray vision to see what's inside.

"That's-!" Saikis green tinted glasses started to feel the heat of his vision as Saiki lost control of himself for just a second. In each of those boxes was nothing but coffee jello. The package had his name on it meaning they were all his. His favorite snack for him to indulge.

In a flash he had teleported all the boxes in front of him, another teleport taking a coffee jello out of the boxwithout opening it. Peeling back thd top as hd telekinetically brought a spoon over from the kitchen, Saiki smiled.

"Good grief. You may be a pervert but I thank you for this delicious treat!" Saiki happily thought as he started indulging. A loving smile crossing his face as he enjoyed the sweet taste of the first bite.

"This is definitely a trap you set up for me. Coffee Jello is just too good to pass up however. I wouldn't do this for any normal sweet." He took another bite as a a different but still happily smile crossed it. "Okay that's not true. I was a glutton at Saiko Mitori's house when he bought tons of sweets I could eat for free. I have to give people the idea I have standards though."

However that was all part of the writers plan as Saiki unknowingly consumed a special superpower formula his brother Saiki Kusuke had tried to make, but finding being all powerful no fun against his brother, threw it all away a day later. Now his younger brother indulged himself in a confectionary filled with said substance that will make his world ending power greater.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Coffee Jello my greatest weakness.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Issei Ryoudou was carrying a box engraved with bizarre symbols out of the Occult Research Club. The toned, brown haired young man having been asked by Azazel to remove it properly. Though once he learned what perverted stuff the box could do was enough to get him to take it home instead.

====An hour hour====
"You want to dispose of this?" Rias had asked the fallen angel. The clubs demon president was perplexed by it. "Isn't this a legendary power capable of granting any desire?"

"Indeed it is. Even the most perverse and lewd of wishes can be made reality." The advisor mentioned to the young devil. Unaware Issei was listening in on the other side of the door.

"All right. I'll make my harem kickstart as soon as possible!" Issei mused, going through such trouble when he ends up married to at least twenty women and a child with each in the future. Running off to prepare to take it home.

So naturally he didn't hear the next part. "The being on the other side of this thing is an Issei level pervert and has some...interesting tastes. So I immediately stopped his wish granting after the first one."

====Present====
Issei was already out of the school, carrying the box with him as he headed home. "Can't wait to use you!"

It doesn't take long for him to get home, where he decides to enter from the back so Rias, the other girls, and his parents won't figure out he's home just yet. Making sure to be as quiet as possible as he headed upstairs to his room. Having stealthily arrived in his beedroom without anyone noticing, Issei happily laughed as he put it down on his bed. "All right! Let's see what this can do!"

He remembered seeing the instructions next to it, but in his haste hadn't thought about reading or grabning them. So began a long process of hitting it with blunt objects, messing with the symbols carved into it, and Issei yelling at it to make his dreams of a harem true.

As an hour passed Issei had finally become fed up "Fine! My dream of a boob and harem paradise may not happen but I can still dispose of you!" He yelled with frustrated tears as he held it above his head, his hands pressing two carved symbols with no meaning in his world at the same.

A whirring began to hum through it as the carvings glowed, instantly bringing to life the box as it began shaking. "Best put this down." Issei beamed with joy as he put it on the floor, rubbing his hands together in anticipation.

Soon the top open forth as a mesh of tendrils began to emerge forth and place themselves across the floor, a trail of unknown goop that glowed red left behind as they slithered about. "That's nasty." Soon the tendrils began going for his bed "Ah no not there!" He quickly tossed them away, which spurred the being beyond to speak forth.

"__________" it's voice incomprehensible and even seemd to cause objects around the room to vibrate from it. Seeking to comprehend where it was at, it tapped into Issei's head from the realm beyond. It received the info it sought from Issei's head, remembering which world it's portal was in. Soon the tendrils retreated back to the box

"________" Soon gave way to a telepathically sent its thoughts directly to Issei's head. "Being of the DxD universe, what is your wish?"

"All right!" Issei cheered. "My wish is to make it easier for me to get my harem! No brainwashing though. I want it to be consensual! And make it so my furture self has more time for all the girls and my kids!" The greedy hybrid asked for more on top of it.

Processing his wish, a puddle of red ooze erupted from the box and landed on the flood. "'That's...incredibly boring." The being beyond sounded irritated.

"There's nothing wrong with a guy wanting a harem! Ain't that right Ddraig?" He talked to his sacred gear, Boosted Gear, which the legendary red dragon of Britain was a part of.

"Oh now you remember me! I figured something like this would happen the moment you got that scheme in your head." The green orb on the gear glowing with each word Ddraig spoke.

"C'mon man you gotta agree with me in these situations!" Issei talked back, but the being beyond did not care for their squabble.

"I care not what you desire. I am an Outer God, a being that abandoned my world. _______, He of World Ending Desire. I will make a wish this day, but it will be one that satisfies me! So prepare yourself as the center of my desire devil" Scanning his body, he was apparently a human shaped dragon rather than a mere human after Great Red reforged his flesh in the dimensional gap "dragon man thing! Hehehe" The box instantly closed and with a puff vanished.

"I don't like this at all." Issei grumbled as he rubbed his head. "My floor is even covered in weird red stuff now."

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The battlefield shook as shockwave sfter shockwave sent the cloudy landscape backk, two figures clashing fist against fist beneath the starry. Gold Lion armor vs Red Dragon armor as they punched and smashed into each other. "BOOST! BOOST! BOOST!" The voice emitted from the green orb of the Red Dragon as he pummeled into the stomach of the Lion, cracking the armor as a smirk emerged on the man clad in golds face as blood trickled down his lip. The defeated red haired maiden of the pervert clad in red watching from afar.

The kids in the stadium cheering as they saw him move "Oppai Dragon! Oppai Dragon!" Oblivious to the conversation.

"Yeah. Full power my ass. He's holding back a different trump card than the Nemean Lion." The form of Sairaorg drew ever closer to his collapsed opponent.
"Issei" Concern was apparent on Rias face as she saw him on the ground, soon struggling to get back up on his feet as Sairaorg was within range of a quick hit if needed.
"Are you still ready to battle Issei?" One fist up as Sairaorg Bael prepared to move in.
"Yeah, but first you need to get serious and show the other power you have kept hidden!" Anger visible as he sprinted right into range to hit Sairaorg in his unprotected chin.

"Gah!" Sairaog replied as he quickly responded by smashing both arms into each side of Isseis armored ribs, causing an "Argh!" to erupt from his perverted opponent as the two continued their brawl.

"I see! You sensed that ability of all things!" Sairaorg grunted as he kicked Issei into thd ground, only for a charged "BOOST FANG CANNON!" cbeam to send him skyward. Isseis wings emerging to reach his foe in the sky.

"Of course we sensed it. That power you kept hidden is obvious even with you wearing Regulus!" Issei rellied back as they began to descend into a bralw of nonstop punching in the celestial heaven above. Sairoargs left arm comlletely unprotected as the gold armor covering it was destroyed by the beam.

"Sorry sorry! But that power is...well it's not something I can use in ordinary situations." Sairaorg grabbed Isseis arm and tossed him down into the ground again, second crater overlapping the first one as he descended down to attack, Issei quickly flying back up as the two punched the other in the face.

"That shouldn't matter in a match like this! What kind of men would I be if I don't play with Presidents breasts for powerups!?" Issei spat through a fist covered by fist.

The Nemean Lion Regulus spoke as a glowing light on the helm of Sairaorgs forehead. "But if you want to see the power my master awakened through training his body to the limit don't you dare regret this decision!" The two rivals distanced themselves as they landed upon solid ground once again.

In the stadium the crowd whispered to themselves what sort of power could it be? "A technique beyond even his trump the Nemean Lion!? What could the Lion King display for us in this match!" The anmouncer yelled with glee to the audience.

Back to Sairaorg he looked up to where the Lions consciousness resides "You sure Regulus? You and the rest of the team know about it but its a technique Id rather keep secret till my grave. I mean what if my mom wakes up and sees?" Sairaorg rubbed his head as he thought of his mother still in her coma.

"I do master.p! It's time you showed Issei Hyoudou your full power!" The Nemean Lion spoke as he began to glow, separating himself from Sairaorg into his mighty lion form.

"Aren't even waiting to give me a choice eh?" The lion nodded to Sairaorgs comment. "Heh. I guess I'll be known as a pervert in my own right for this." He smash his fist into his hand before closing his eyes. His body calmly overflowing with energy as he focused.

Issei stood there dumbfounded. "What gives!? Why are you removing Regulus?"

The gold lion was the one to reply back. "Unfortunately the power you so crave to be unleashed can't be contained within me. We tried once in the past to no avail. Now excuse me but I'm getting miss Gremory as far away from here as possible." The glowing Golden Lion didn't even give Issei time to reply back as he zipped past him to grab Rias via his teeth, digging into her shirt as he tossed her on his back and ran off.

"What!? Issei!" Rias was confused as the two fled as far as they could.

"Haaaaaaaahhhhhh....." Sairaorg spoke in silence as the aura erupted in a massive aura of power! Shickwaves pushing everything away around him as it started to make Issei lose his footing.

"BOOST! BOOST!" Two mechanical wing like portrusions with sharp ends erupted from his back to stab the ground. Isseis eyes blocked off by the force of wind from seeing the sight before him.

As the Boobir Dragon Emperor struggled to keep his place, the Stadiums screens began to suffer static as each screen slowly disappeared. Leaving the audience in the dark.
"Uh...for the first time in Ratings Games history we seem to be suffering technical difficulties." Naud Gamigin said in surprise "Hopefully its fixed soon so we can see the climax!"
"Boo! Fix the magic!" Cries called out of Devils watching. Wanting the technology and magic used to fix it to be repaired as the battle continued fo escalate.
"Is Oppai Dragon going to lose!? No way! Oppai Dragon never loses!" The children cried as their hero was left struggling.
"Issei..." Kiba, Gasper, and the girls spoke as they saw him left trying to hold on.....

In the battle itself the shockwaves soon calmed down, Ddraig auickly retracting the protrusions as Issei dug his hand out of the earth, looking up as his eyes ooened to see what happened to his opponent.

Sairoarg Baels aura calmed down as he was left in an extremely tight but growing shirt with no other clothes as he...

Shinichi Kuro was an inteligent teenager who wanted to become a detective. He helped to solve multiple cases... until he met two mysterious criminals from a secret organization. Those men forced him to drink an experimental poison and left, but the poison didn't kill him... instead, it transformed him into a child! Now he keeps helping the police while he pretends to be a kid named Conan Edogawa, and keeps looking for hints to uncover the evil secret organization and arrest all its members.

*****************************

In this story, Ai Aibara (the creator of the poison and another victim of it) finally creates an antidote to the poison and "Conan" was so eager to get back his old life that drinks the untested serum without a second thought.

The antidote (apparently) works out and he becomes a 17yo teenager again... but as he will eventually find out, the antidote is too strong and will make him growth further than his original size...

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The detective genius Shinichi Kudo, in his de-aged alias Conan Edogawa, opening Professor Agasa's home. The blue eyed, dark-brown haired boy entered the home of his neighbor and ally. His backpack holding clothes for a teenager. The glasses wearing boy headed for the room where Haibara was waiting by herself. "She texted me about a new potential antidote to APXT 4869, hopefully this one can work beyond 24 hours." His dream of fixing his current state trapped as a yong boy and return to his normal life as a genius high school detective. Even attracting the attention of Gin andvVodka who poisoned him in the first place.

Entering the room where Haibara usually tests her antidotes, a chill shivered through his spine as his body made contact with the very low temperature in the room. Easily in the low thirties. Haibara was waiting in a heavy winter coat. A white pill safely kept next to her gloved hands. "Thank you for coming Shinichi. I have prepared my latest antidote test trial for Apotoxin 4869." Haibara spoke with her typical stoic tone.

"Does it require cold temperatures to work?" Conan asked as he felt the chill worsen as even his school uniform cold. He unzipped the backpack to pull out his high school uniform, ready to change.

"Indeed. I apologize in advance for making you take it during these conditions." Haibara handed over the pill, Shinichi gratefully took in his hand with hope. "It surpasses the other experimental antidotes and should give you a 168 hour time limit. My tests suggest it works the best in cold temperatures."

"Well then I better try it now before I catch a cold." Conan headed for the bathroom with clothes and pill in hand, changing out of his current outfit as he happily brought the pill to his waiting maw. "Here goes." Conan consumed the pill, the extermely bitter taste pressed against his tomgue as he quickly swallowed. "Tastes pretty bad compared to the normal ones." instantly cerulean eyes widened as his body numbed to the antidote going into effect.

And yet this antidote had plans of its own......

1. Conan remains a boy, but his kid clothes are now extremely tight as he's added inches and muscle to his body.

2. He returns to his proper age as Shinichi Kudo permanently, but his body now grows a foot in size every time he solves a case no matter how small.

3. Just like his fever induced hallucination in "The Stranger From Ten Years Ago" Shinichi is sent forward ten years later living life as Conan. This new reality is far more bizarre as he's now ten feet tall and can rival a bodybuilder in muscle. Just what is going on?
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The miracle antidote to Apotoxin 4869

Shinichi had been on a case with Heiji for a week. Tracking down a criminal after a bank robbery who mysteriously disappeared. They had finally caught him in a hotel. Heiji patted Shinichi‘s back for apprehending the criminal before he explained to the police the criminal’s master plan.

Heiji was waiting in the lobby for Shinichi to finish.
“I have to admit, that case was a bit difficult this time.” Shinichi Said as he saw his friend.
“Yeah. There were a few times I thought he was going to get away again. You want to...” The two made eye contact for the first time in the conversation. The two than had panicked looks on their faces. Shinichi was supposed to be slightly shorter than Heiji as he was 174cm with Heiji at 177cm. Shinichi Must have grow a foot (205cm) as Shinichi was nearly a head taller than Heiji.

“Shinichi!” The two turned towards the front door to see Ran. “There you are. Did you two forget we were going to get dinner together tonight?” Despite looking further up to make eye contact with Shinichi at 160cm, she didn’t notice his change in height.
“We forgot. We just apprehended a criminal..” Heiji was cau off.
“I know. I saw it on the news. How do you think I knew where to find you two? I’m going on ahead. You two are going to pay if you bail.” She said as she left. Shinichi bend down to Heiji. “She didn’t notice Shinichi.” Heiji Whispered. Both realizing that no one else aside from Heiji seemed to notice either.
“Perhaps only those who know about the antidote can notice.”
“We need to figure this out. Let’s do it after dinner so Ran’s off are backs.”

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Three children were huddled together in the Third Grace Field plantation. The younger kids were happily playing outside as an orange haired girl, a white haired boy, and a dark haired boy oversaw an odd mix of chemicals. The three of them were mixing dangerous formulas and overseeing the chemical reactions as mama and sister Krone oversaw the rowdy kids outside, Don and Gilda watching for any suspicious moves from the two for Emma.

"So you are sure this will work right?" Emma asked Norman as she poured a vial of red chemicals into the yellow one. Soon it bubbled and turned a sickly glowing green. Ray soon did the same with a red and blue to make a dark magenta.

"Yes. Going through the morse code left behind in the books from William Minerva I found a second set. One that contains a secret how to create a growth formula able to let us get strong enough to save all the kids and fight back against the demons." The white haired Norman was a genius even compared next to the other two. Mixing his to create a dull orange from red and yellow.

"I never saw it myself despite spending years to plan this." Ray chuckled, having known Isbaella was his mother from the moment he heard her sing.

"Good thing we're together to save everyone then! You'd have no chance without us!" Emma beamed.

"Watch it Emma or I might blurt some secrets of yours I've remembered." Ray chuckled to himself, piquing Norman's interest while Emma wondered what secrets he knew. And its thanks to him Isabella even got them the required substances, much less the demons believing it all to be harmless.

Soon the three vials they had mixed had finished. "Nevermind that for the moment. This is almost done." They then took turna pouring them together into a singular bottle, the glowing green, dull orange, and dark magenta slowly becoming a dark black sludge.

"It's done but ugh! That smell is rancid." Emma said in embarassment as even having to smell of that goo made her want to barf.

"Let us pour it in the individual cups then." Norman smiled as Ray brought out cups. Ray began pouring an equal amount that filled to the top of each cup as it slowly oozed out. He had a look that could kill to inform the other two he thought it was disgusting too. The contents filled each cup to the brim, with there still being half left over. "Looks like there's more to drink if we need it."

The three kids each grabbed a cup, plugging their nose with their free hands as they began chugging down the slow moving black gunk. Thankfully the taste was bland rather than tasting as bad as it smelled. Once the last of the had gone down their throats Emma sighed in relief "This growth formula tastes better than it looks and smells!"

"Thankfully" Norman smiled as he saw Emma's bright face. That's when they felt a pleasant warmth beneath their plain white shirts and pants and Emma for her part would soon experience the joy of being a boy.
