1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Nagisa

choices: The growth is extremely slow. The day after he's only a little taller.
He starts to grows slowly during the next class
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Today we're going to study the biological cycle of the plants AND the fundaments of horticulture."

Koro-sensei and his classroom were outside the building, in an improvised vegetable garden. He had brought more fertilizer, seeds and tools than they could ever use in an one hour science class.

The yellow octopus started talking about the seeds, how they contained a baby plant, an embryo, and nutrients in an area called endosperm. He also mentioned the types of seeds, how are they formed from the flower, how the grow into a plant... too much information for middle school students, but Koro always managed to make his lessons interesting and light for his pupils.

Eventually he explained some basics about farming, how they had to be planted and cared to get a healthy vegetable... and gave a demonstration: He carefully planted a few of the thousands of seeds he had bought earlier a watered a little.

Then the class and he stayed silently, staring to the plowed soil.

"Well... we'll have to wait for a few weeks before the seeds become grown-up plants..."

A few seconds more of silence...

"Are we going to stay looking at them during the rest of the hour??" Terasaka complained, growing bored.
"I don't think they're going to be able to grow... it's almost winter." Karma observed.

And his teacher, getting more and more nervous, made up a shortcut.

"Well, maybe I could give them a special help to make them grow faster and so, continue the lesson..."

He shook one of his tentacles, which changed its color to green, and then twisted it in an spiral until it released a few droplets of a strange liquid. They fell into the watering can and misted with its content.

Koro-sensei watered again the sowed soil with the mysterious mixture and in a matter of seconds some tiny plants began to rise from the ground.

"Ohhhhh" The kids were amazed by it.

The yellow teacher tried to continue the class, but he was interrupted by Nagisa's arrival.

The small boy's clothes were dirty and a little damaged, he had some bruises all over his body and seemed to have lost his books. He didn't want to admit it, but it was clearly for everyone he had been in the receiving end of a fight.

The aggressors weren't unknown either... all Class D was angry by Class E high scores in the last semester exam, much higher than theirs. That had hurt their pride and some of them got revenge by bulling the smallest, Nagisa.

He wasn't defenseless after all those hours training to be a killer, and at first he could avoid, escape or defend himself from his bullies, but days later class D reacted by gathering half of the class to attack him. 13 against 1, he couldn't do anything...

Koro-sensei frowned, dying to do something to stop the bulling, but he wasn't sure what (he couldn't kill the bullies, that was against the rules of the school).

The plants kept growing behind him, they were now bigger that the average... that gave Karma an dangerous idea to help his friend...

He took the watering can without being noticed, filled a glass with its mixture and offered it to his sore classmate.

"Thanks." He said with a smile before drinking it all.

A minute later, the plants had become so incredible big they were menacing to crush the class with their weight. Koro sensei had to use his superpowers to prune them continuously until their growth stopped.

"I hope that doesn't happen to Nagisa." Karma thought a little nervous.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The sprouting seed only needs water

choices: He lets the growth go on. Nagisa keeps growing very slowly.
He gaves him a second dose. The growth becomes a little faster.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Nagisa didn't show any changed during the next classes, remaining at 159cm tall. Karma started to think maybe the mixture had no effect on humans... but the following day, as Nagisa went int with Yūma Isogai, the redhead did notice Nagisa's head wasn't as low as before.

He had gained a few centimeters, maybe 5-7cm / 2"-3". He was still pretty short, but started to look more like an average male student than a girl.

Karma felt a little relieved, he was a little worried about dangerous side effects or the possibility of becoming a giant monster... but he also felt a little disappointed. He expected a greater growth spurt.

"Hey, you look different." Isogai commented looking at Nagisa. "Are you taller?"
"I think so. My clothes felt a little tighter than before." He extended his arm to him so he could see how the sleeves were an inch too short now. "I guess I finally hit my growth spurt."
"I heard the growth spurts that come during the puberty are usually the final ones." His classmate commented without malice, but those words concerned Nagisa a little. He didn't want to get stuck at his current 165+cm ish height and completely lack of muscle mass...

"Don't worry." Karma comforted him, with secret intents "I'm pretty sure this is just the first of many growth spurts..."

Karma still had a bottle filled with the mixture from the water can hidden in a cupboard of the class E building.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The growth is extremely slow. The day after he&...

choices: He had a decwnt boost. More than 15cm and slight muscle definition
Looks the same size, but his body starts to grow a lot before he sees Karma
Nothing.at all. Looks like Karma's gonna shove it all down his throat.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"It'll take too long for him to panic at this rate. Better give Nagisa another dose." "I have to get something. Be back in a sec." Karma devilish purple horns and tail appearing as the crimson red teen moved left the room while the others looked nervous.

"He's up to something isn't he?" Sugino spoke to no one in particular.

"Definitely." Nagisa nervously smiled at what Karma had schemed.

The red head genius had gone to the room where the mixture was hidden, quickly grabbing it out of the cupboard and leaving the room. Though not without closing the cupboard. He doesn't want anyone to figure out his hiding spot. He didn't want an idiot like Tersaka to get a hold of the mixture. Then they'd have a crazy huge idiot with an ego to match.

Karma headed back to the classroom, where his classmates were too busy conversing to notice. It wouldn't take much to offer him a sip, but that's when he remembered. "Showed off my devil side. No way he'll fall for that." That's when he saw Nagisa's half filled cup with his drink for lunch sitting on the blue haired boys desk. Working fast he snatched it up before he was seen and left.

In the hallway he worked fast, pouring out Nagisa's drink on the floor. A nice mess for others to step in later. Then poured the mixture until in it was full. "Can't wait till he drinks more~" He swiftly returned the remaining mixture it back to the cupboard.

The redhead then cheerfully returned to the classroom "I got what I wanted." Wrapping his arm around Nagisa as he blocked view of the boys desk, placing Nagisas drink back in place.

"What was it Karma?"

"That's a secret~" He moved away "But you'll find out soon enough."

Nagisa didn't pay no heed, as it likely wouldn't affect him. He hoped anyways as he grabbed his drink to take a sip. The same taste of the drink he had the other day went down his throat. "Karma you changed my drink didn't you?"

"Me? Your mind must be playing tricks on you." Karma remained stone faced, making sure he couldn't see the scheming smile hidden away now that he's gotten a second dose.

"Well it tastes good regardless." Nagisa smiled as he drank every last drop. Unaware of even more growth mixture in his blood as Koro-sensei entered the classroom, disheveled from having to cut up even more of those overgrown plants from the day before that were on the verge of crushing class E building with their rate of growth.

====Following morning====
Nagisa's blue eyes slowly opened as the boy yawned. Stretching his arms as he let out a soft "Aaaaah...", feeling a strange tightness with his pajamas. "Hmmm? My clothes feel a little tight" Rubbing his eyes, Nagisa opened them to see...
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Second dosage

choices: Time passes. Nagisa beats Karma in several areas. Karma grows envious...
Nagisa has another growth spurt in the middle of the class
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
...to see his pajamas were stretched by his thicker torso. The buttons of the pijama shirt were still holding up, but it was clear it didn't fit anymore: Actually, the two sides of the shirt couldn't remain in contact except by the buttons, exposing ovals of his torso between each pair of buttons.

Breathing was hard with those clothes, so the blue boy proceeded to undo it, uncovering a pair of pecs and abs which weren't there the day before.

Amazed by the discovery, Nagisa examined his new muscles in front of the mirror.

"I look as muscular as Terasaka... maybe even bigger..." He noticed as he palpated his rock-hard pecs.

Time skip. Everyone in Class E were chitchatting, until a badly dressed figure went into the classroom.

Everyone fell silent for a moment.

"Nagisa??" After they recovered from the shock, the class shouted his name in a chorus.

The blue haired boy waved his head shyly, clearly uncomfortable. He had no choice but putting his uniform (it was mandatory), but those clothes were designed for his old ‎159cm self (5'2.5"). After growing over the 6 feet mark(180+cm) and packing some muscle, they seemed uncomfortably tight and ridiculous.

Nagisa couldn't bottom up his jacket and shirt, so he had to walk to the school exhibing his pecs and abs. Also they weren't long enough to reach his pants, so there was a band of toned torse exposed.
And similarly, his trouser legs couldn't cover his ankles, so anyone could see a few centimeters of his socks.

"Terasaka, did you bring the spare uniform I asked for in my sms?"
"Y-yes..." The former delinquent were still a little shocked, still not used to having Nagisa at eye level.
"Thanks, you're a life saver. I'll pay for it later."

The boy left the classroom to get changed. Karma's devilish smile disappeared, replaced with dull and disappointment.

"Oh, I hoped he wouldn't find fitting clothes so soon"

That size was what he was looking for when the redhead gave Nagisa the first dose, but he would like the humiliation of wearing ridiculously small clothes would last a little more.

But that wasn't the real reason of giving him mysterious hormones, just a plus for the naughty genius.
The real motive was to help him to fight the bullies of Class B, and he couldn't wait to see their faces when they find his usual victim...

His wicked smile reappeared, and his friend did the same, now wearing Tersaka's uniform, much more well-fitting.

The class and him had some lively conversation about his miraculously growth spurt. The boy couldn't stop smiling, happy for not being a runt anymore.

Karma felt happy for him, but also felt a little uncomfortable near him and realizing he was towering him a little (5cm+ or 2 inches). He found out he didn't like Nagisa being taller than him.

Korosensei entered in the classroom carrying giant tomatoes as big as truck tyres from his mutant garden, but he dropped them when he saw at his previously short pupil.

The teacher was surprised by his change, but he didn't connected to the water can he used two days before. With a smile, he encouraged him to go all out in the scheduled assassination attempt after class.

"We'll see if this little growth spurt has slowed you down or sped you up..."
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A decent boost

choices: He decides to take a big dose to catch him up
He tries something to stop/reverse his growth (doesn't work, it makes it worse)
He accepts Nagisa's growth / FREE OPTION
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Nagisa's growth spurt made him a celebrity between his classmates.
Tomohito Sugino tried tirelessly to convince him to join to his improvised baseball team.
Similarly, Ryōma Terasaka defied him to arm wrestling, specially irritated after hearing some girls speculating if Nagisa was now the strongest in class E.

Girls who never paid much attention to him started to look at the boy with special interest.

But all that interest couldn't stop the beginning of the lesson, so everyone sat down and stayed quiet as Kuro-sensei explained new and harder concepts.

It was during the math subject when the first annoying thing for Karma happened... His monstrous teacher had wrote a really complicated math problem in the blackboard. "One of the kind only I can solve..." The red head thought as he did the maths

But before he could finish it Nagisa stood up and said the result. Kurosensei confirmed it was the right answer and congratulated the student. This scene repeated a few times more, quite frustrating for Karma...

"His calculus and memorization skills seem to have grown somehow... did the drink made his brain grow like his body?"

They had PE next. His teacher Tadaomi Karasuma prepared a battery of athletic tests. Again, Nagisa performed really well, ending up in the first positions whereas Karma fell a position in the class ranking.

"It's just a bad hair day." He downplayed it, as he observed Nagisa. His sweat had impregnated his tracksuit, and the shape of his pecs became a little more noticeable under the wet cloth. "And he's having the best one of his life..."

PE ended, and class 3E had some time to rest before the assassination attempt. When the blue haired boy was leaving, Karma had an evilish idea...

"Nagisa, wait... I lost my wallet. Could you help me searching? Maybe it fell in the school gates..."

He accepted, although a little of anxiety could be seen in his face. And the anxiety only grew when Karma brought him to the area where the worst of class D were playing truant. He counted 11 of them.

"I don't think your wallet is nearby... please let's come back." Nagisa begged, they hadn't been spotted yet.
"Those are the ones who were bulling you?"
"Yes... but I managed to avoid them lately..." Nagisa noticed a sadistic smile in his friend's face. "You never lose your wallet, right?"
"Those bullies won't stop looking for you every morning to beat you up." He continued his speech "They won't stop until..." The boy got out of the shadows and waved his hand to them "...you ask them POLITELY."

Of course, the bullies bit the bait.

"Look, aren't those losers from the Class-E...?" Said one of them, with a sadistic look on his eyes.
"Mm? You looks familiar..." The leader of the delinquents recalled the short blue hair boy they beat up two days ago "Are you the big brother of that smurf?"
"No, he's the blue dwarf!" Karma confessed "He has hit a growth spurt"

Nagisa wished Karma would shut it down. He didn't want more conflicts but those idiots.
Fortunately, they weren't as inclined to hit him as before. They still wanted to look menacing and intimidating, but they were more eaguer to face a weak 159cm kid than two stronger 175cm and 180cm guys.

Noticing it, Nagisa signed alleviated. "We won't have to fight."

"Correct me if I'm wrong, but you're the retarded ones who have been hitting my pal, right?"
"!!"

Nagisa's hopes vanished as his red friend kept talking and the bullies' rage grew.

"Be careful with what you said, E-weirdo."
"Eleven against one, that was so brave... Are you valiant enough to try again against two, or that's too much for you?"

Aaaand the fight started. The insulted leader and two of his henchmen jumped over Karma. The red boy had confidence he would win thanks to their killer training, although the exhaustion from the PE class slowed him down enough so it wouldn't be fast or easy. He could knock out their boss with a pair of punches, but the other two weren't so easy (when he tried to focus on one, the other attacked him from behind). It took him 15 seconds to make the second idiot fall, and when he was going for the third a flying bully landed over his next victim.

He was be thrown by our tall Nagisa. There were no more villains, the blue boy had already defeated the other 7. Karma couldn't believe he had done it in the same amount of time the devil boy needed to finish two.

Scratched and hurt, the bullies decided to escape pitifully... before leaving one threatened to get revenge, but Karma didn't take it seriously.

Both teens returned to the class building, Nagisa didn't talk to him, angry due to the fight he put him in, but he also felt relief: he wouldn't have to face those guys (or that was what he believed)

Karma's plan was a complete success:

-He had taught a lesson to those jerks about messing with his friend [CHECK] (only Karma could mess with him)
-He had pranked Nagisa, forcing him to come school with ridiculously small clothes [CHECK, although it ended too fast for his taste]
-He solved Nagisa's height complex [CHECK?] (Actually Karma didn't care much about that, he only wanted action and fun)

...despite all that, he was uneasy. If a point of the mischief was pranking Nagisa, at the end Karma was the one who had lost to him in several areas, and that felt humiliating.

"What if the growth continues the next days?" Karma hadn't actually think about that possibility before, but after seeing the giant garden again and how some plants kept growing at irregular paces, that fear grew. "The difference between us would become massive..."

Deep down, Karma knew what he had to do.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: From zero to hero

choices: The bottle is almost empty! The boys from class-E drank it thinking it was water
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Karma left his enlarged friend and sneaked in the class-E building.

Karma almost fainted when he saw the bottle had disappeared.

He started to search for it everywhere, desperate, until he found it in the next room the class used it like a looker room. It was laying almost empty on a table as the other boys were changing his sweated clothes.

"Who... who did...?" He asked with a thin voice.

"Oh, it was yours? Sorry, Karma, but we were so thirsty after PE that when we found the water we drink it without a second thought." Yūma Isogai, the handsome but poor class representative, apologized "I'll bought you another later!"

Karma didn't answer, just gave him a killing glare

"It was hidden in a locked cupboard... this wasn't an easy accident, someone took it on purpose... but does that person know what the mixture does?"

Karma looked down to the bottle and made some quick calculous: Assuming his classmates had drunk the same amount, they would have received roughly half dose of the hormones. The remaining amount was a dose a half, maybe a little more, but less than the liquid Nagisa drank the previous days. It should be enough to avoid the others to surpass him, but he wasn't so sure about defeating Nagisa, that would depend of his luck and genetics.

"Anyway, I only has to trick Korosensei to give me more mixture." He planned as he drank the mixture, without wasting a single drop.

After that he decided to change his clothes too (sweated and dirty by the exercise and fight). While he was removing his shirt he noticed Nagisa was nearby. He was half naked, examining his pecs and biceps with a worried look.

"Hey, Karma... do I look different?" He asked as he approached "Like... a little bigger?"

Karma knew what he was talking about. He had watched his body carefully that morning when he arrived, admiring his prank (maybe that hormonal teen had other interests besides that), and although he was pretty muscular then he seemed to have gained a few pounds of muscle during the last hours.

His pecs, biceps, thighs were thicker, his shoulders were a little broader, and Karma noticed his head was 5cm higher... That confirmed his worries about the growth continuing time after the last dose...

But still, it wasn't a difference so considerable to be noticed by anyone but the owner of the body and the prank maker.

"I guess so. It has been a hell of a growth spurt" Nagisa continued undressing, removing his pants, exposing a pair of muscular legs. His undies, still on, were constricted by a distractingly huge bulge.

A big flaccid cock, easily 14cm long (5.5"), wriggled in the air. Long, but a little thin, which made him look even longer.

Wondering about how big would be hard, Karma felt strange, intense sensations when he saw it, but he wasn't sure if they were positive or negative ones. He never expected his considerably big 11cm (4.3") long soft cock (19cm / 7.5" hard) could be defeated by anyone outside porn movies.

He concluded what he was feeling was envy.

"Maybe tomorrow it will be my turn." He said with a false nice smile. Inside his soul, he was smiling too, but that smile was dark and evil, at the idea of towering over him and making him feel the same uneasy feeling the blue boy had been making him feel. "Or everyone's turn." He thought, as he remembered everyone had taken a little of the unstable substance.

Next day...

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"OW!" Sugimoto grumbled as thick bandages were being wrapped around his left bicep. Medicinal substances placed upon three scars penetrating into his flesh as a short teenage girl wrapped the injuries in bandages, small cups with the medicine nestled next to her and the fire in their tent. His right arm and left leg having similar bandages already tightly wrapped around.

"You were very lucky that time Sugimoto. To take on three wen kamuy at once and survive is a miracle." Asirpa still chastising him as she pulled the bandages as tightly as possible earning another "Ouch!"

"Sorry Asirpa-san, but -OUCH- if I didn't act those bears would have eaten the skins." He recalled to them finding three bears at the tent, all of them had partaken in killing and eating human flesh, even killing nearby bears that hadn't, earning their name as evil gods (wen kamuy). They had left the skins leading to the Ainu treasure temporarily in the tent while they hunt for food. Their companions Tanigaki, Ogata and Shiraishi having headed out in the other direction for a distraction when several 7th Division flunkies nearly stumbled upon them. Ogata aiming to kill the soldiers.

That left them with a nice stack of deer meat and fish now cooking around the heat of the fire as Asirpa finished patching him up. "You still nearly got killed. Why if the third one hadn't missed your head you'd be dead right now!" The biggest and angriest of the three had tried to bite his head, getting her fangs into his right arm instead.

"I mean I did turn it around and stabbed her in the head repeatedly a second later so it all worked out Asirpa-san!" Sugimoto reminisced as he shot the first, used the first bears claws on the second as he stabbed it, and repeatedly stabbed the third.

"But if you died...." Asirpa lowered her head, eyes obscured from view.

"Asirpa-san...." The messy haired mans face brightened.

Only for her face to rise up with eyes sparkling as drool dribbled "Where would I get more osoma?"

Immediately a frown crossed Sugimotos face as color left it. "You were worried about not being able to eat miso soup?" Ever since he introduced it to her Asirpa still could not wrap her head around the fact Miso is not osoma (Poop) despite loving the taste.

Then a deep *GRRROOOOWWWLLLL* emanated through the tent as their stomachs finished the conversation.

"If the deer meat doesn't fill us up lets eat the bear meat outside!" Sugimoto chuckled as Asirpa looked famished at the thought of enjoying more delicious food. Finishing and putting up their medical supplies, the two happily worked to cook the food while waiting for the other three to return.

I wonder if I should tell Asirpa about the voices I heard as well Sugimoto thought to himself as he cut up the deer meat, Asirpa humming Hinna Hinna to herself as she grilled the fish. Nah Ill tell her another time. The scarred, fit man continued chopping as the worked together and daydreamed of delicious food.

=====An hour earlier====
"Don't worry Sugimoto! I'll get you inside!" The small girl declared as she dragged his body across the snow, mutilated corpses of two bears nearby and the third mostly intact and father away from their campsite.

Sugimoto was in a delirious state, half lost to unconsciousness as he bleed out, turning the snow beneath red. "A...sir...pa..."

"Excuse me! Can a mister 'Sugimoto Saichi' receive this message?" A mysterious voice from nowhere filled Sugimotos head, keeping him from knocking out.

Yes? Sugimoto had no idea who this was, but he needed something to keep him struggling with his numerous injuries.

"Ah good. You need not know who I am, but you are accompanying an Ainu seeking to retrieve the gold, yes?" Sugimoto was about to respond only for the voice to continue. "Normally I would not interfere in the realm of man, but the other Kamuy want me to do something for once for fear of the gold becoming cursed. Not sure why, so what if humans turn into a dragon from cursed gold due to human greed? *Sigh* So I shall bestow upon you a blessing to ensure the young Asirpas success." A wisp of pale white descended from the sky, unseen by Asirpa as she nearly reached the tent with his body, the small orb quietly flew into the semi-conscious Sugimotos ear. Unseen and almost forgotten.

====Present Time=====
The two were happily eating, delicious cooked deer, grilled fish, some small bits of bear, and some osoma miso. "Nah there's no way that was real." Sugimoto smentioned aloud between bites with Asirpa ignorant as she flushed red from fulfillment at the miso soup. The two happily ate while they awaited their companions return.

After all, who'd believe a Kamuy blessed him to help Asirpa?

Get over here dammit and kick this demons ass Saki. - Kokoro

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Somebody, help! Akira and Yarai had collapsed!"

Rion, Akira's best friend and his potential romantic interest, went across the corridors of the strange laboratory they were exploring, looking for the other students. It didn't take long before finding Mariya, the genius of their group.

"It's the plague it had been infecting the others!" He exclaimed after examining the unconscious boys "The myxomycete!"

When they had entered that abandoned building, they hoped to find some useful information about where they were, why there were dinosaurs and human ruins but no people, and they pretty much succeeded in that regard...

But, unfortunately, they also came upon the same plague which killed all the humans who lived there, a fungus which could grew on the skin of who touched it, causing fever, weakness and pain as it was extending until it killed its victims.

Those teenagers had found a treatment to cure it by rubbing salt against the affected skin until the myxomycete was wiped.
Mariya undressed the pair to repeat the treatment, but then he realized it wouldn't be so easy...

The affected skin, which could be tell apart from the healthy one due to his strange color, was bruised.

"It can't be... Had the pathogen invaded their insides??"

If the myxomycete was starting spreading by the blood stream, the salt treatment wouldn't be enough.
Both teens searched that room and the adjacent ones, looking for something they could use to destroy the myxomycete.
Eventually they went inside a room that looked like a laboratory.

"I found several antibiotics!" Rion announced filled with hope.
"They won't work! The myxomycete is a fungus, so they need antifungal drugs!"

But there weren't any. Rion was about to cry.

"Damn! Where could I find something that kills antifungal...? Think, Mariya, think!"

Then the short nerd laid his eyes on certain shelf loaded with little bottles. He moved closer it and read their label.

"Rion! Help me to take all these bottles to their room!!" He shouted as he grabbed as many as he could.
"What are they?? Antifungals??" He asked as they left the lab.
"They're ADN samples from the dinosaurs they were cloning. They're suspended in a solution to preserve them... a mixture of antibiotics and antifungal." He explained with a smile in his face.

Then they proceeded to inject them a dose of every bottle. When they finished, they stared at the immobile and pale bodies of Akira and Yarai.

"Will... will it work?" The girl felt even more anxious now they couldn't do anything but wait.
"I don't know... but it's the only shot we have."
"Could it hurt them?"
"It shouldn't. I read the ingredients of the bottles, the samples are inactive nucleotides, harmless, and the preservative solution are made of drugs that could be used in hospitals... but if the dose is excessive..."

The minutes passes, and became hours and to their great relief they started to get better. Akira was the first one to wake up and thanked them for saving their lives.

While they were chatting, Mariya's hand bumped with something. It was a pair of empty bottles a little different of the other ones.
The two students were so in a hurry they hadn't noticed they had a different tag...
Mariya's face grew palee when he finally read it.

"Is something wrong, Mariya?" Akira asked, noticing the change.
"N-no. Don't worry, just rest."

The 2 bottles had gene editing therapy, something called BG-13. The kid searched between the lab documentation until he found what that meant.
It seemed one of those scientists had discovered a shared gene between different large dinosaurs which was responsible of their great sizes.
That unknown geneticist had been experimenting with that gene, injecting it to livestocks to increase their mass. The results of the experiments were extremely positive, registering and increase of skeleton and muscle mass. A few of the cows subjects grew to the size of a diplodocus...

His experiment could have ended the world hunger, but the myxomycete outbreak ended his experiments (and his life) before it could be concluded.

The BG-13 didn't seem dangerous (some results indicated it improved the health and livespan of the subjects), but that didn't calm Mariya down much...
A drug could have good effects on certain animals and be mortal for others.

When he returned to the room where his friends were, he hadn't decided if he should tell them (admitting his terrible mistake) or not.
The only thing he was clear about is that he had to watch them carefully.

Mariya spent the night watching the two with intensity with Rion nearby. The rest of their group either sleeping or standing guard against any predatory prehistoric animals that may come outside. The intensity the nerd staring at their resting patients who slumbered peacefully was unnerving Rion.

"Is everything all right?" She asked as she looked at the short teen.
"Yes." He lied as he pushed his glasses up and brought out his laptop. "Just making sure the ADN are still effective against the myxomycete in case we need to scavenge for more to fight it." Which wasn't completely a lie. Though he'd prefer not using more of the gene altering pills on them.
"Hopefully they'll be back to normal soon." Rion smiled.
"You best go rest. I'll report any changes. It'd be bad if Sengoku got sick worrying about you immediately after waking up". He needed a good reason to get her to leave
"I guess, but it feels like you want me away for some reason Mariya." Rion obliged his reasoning, but she could tell he was disturbed about something. She waved before leaving the makeshift house of sticks, leaves, and vines the two lay under.

With her gone, Mariya closed his laptop and turned his eyes full force to them as he theorized. "The prehistoric animals they cloned were always non-saurian in nature. They did clone reptiles and the dinosaurs avian descendants, yet not them when their species dominated. Even animals that lived before the dinosaurs had been cloned. Could they have been using the other experiments to test it out before fully cloning the dinosaurs? If this gene altering was part of their end goal, then were they trying to fully harness their DNA for it? If so could that could be to help people..." Mariya came up with more and more theories based on his personal thoughts for their reasoning, attention disconnected from the two before him despite eye contact.

A meek blue haired boy entered the card shop Card Capital. "Hi everyone!" The boy said in his innocent voice as he saw Misaki and her uncle/boss Shin behind the counter. The two conversing with a mysterious masked figure as Assisticat snuggles comfortably into his small bed on the counter.

"Hey Aichi!" The green haired manager of Card Capital waved to Aichi as the ex-Vanguard player noticed the meek boy.

"Are you sure the one who can feel the Wind is not here?" The masked figure was in an otherwise normal black suit, the mask pitch black with white markings around the eye holes.
"Like I said I don't know who that could be!" The lilac haired tomboy got aggressive with the figure, who had been driving her up a wall as his refusal to take no and repeated his question repeatedly. Misaki and the Masked Figure still ignorant of Aichis presence.

"What's going on manager?" Aichi asked as he overheard their ongoing conversation.
"I think that man is looking for you."
"Me?" Aichi looked over as he slight tilted his head.. Taking a moment to remember The Wind being a phrase to refer to PSYqualia by some. He turned his gaze back to him "Do you think I should greet him?"
"Mmm...." He crossed his arms as he thought for a moment, only for "What did you say!?" from Misaki to determine the answer. "Yes. At this rate Misaki might send him to the hospital."

Aichi gulped at the thought as he nervously skirted over to speak. "I-i m-might be the one you're looking for!"

"If you don't leave this shop I will-Aichi!" Misaki blurted out his name as she turned towards him mid-threat. The masked man likewise turning to gaze upon the boy. He peered into the boys eyes from beneath the mask. Not a word emerged as he caught sight for a second of a galaxy emanating into the windows of Aichis soul.

"Yes you are indeed the one I was looking for!" He bowed to Aichi taking the bow by surprise.

"I'm s-sorry but please don't bow!" surprised by the figures respect.

"Forgive my rudeness to the shop owners. I am Stigma and I-" He bent up slightly as pulled from his suits pocket a booster pack of cards "-Have come bearing a gift for the enemy of the Void" Grabbing one of Aichis hands, he placed it gently into the boys palm. It had no brand or any form of series on it. Only silver wrapping holding cards within.

"The cards within can be kept to yourself or shared with others. Now my role is now over. Farewell." Faster than Aichi could reply two fingers moved to the sound of a *SNAP* as the figure disappeared before his eyes.

"Excuse me-huh?" Aichi was confused as all traces of the figure vanished from memory. Looking at the pack of cards and turning to Misaki "Was someone just here?"

"Nope. You are the first to arrive Aichi." Misaki voiced with a glint of fury within her eyes, like she recalled speaking to someone who annoyed her greatly. "Do you want to play a match while you wait for Kai and Miwa to arrive?"

"No. I got a new I want to open first." He beamed as the pack was held tightly in his hands, moving to settle at a table. Getting comfortable he tore open the pack to reveal the cards beneath. "Huh?" His eyes widened as he saw each card was blank. The clan, artwork, grade, effects, Power, Critical, etc. did not exist. Save for a space at the bottom where the Design and Illustrator would be. In its place was two words:

"Your Desire".

"I...uh...better ask Kai if I was tricked into buying fake cards". His face luffed red as he tried to hide it, not yet knowing what powers the card has. Especially as it acted on his desire to be stronger to impress Kain a way Aichi would not expect. His clothes filling just slightly as the first card in his grasp, its background, started to shift.

Tenjin gave him a list with all the fertility gods he knew and the address of their shrines and the god of war raced to the nearest one. He prayed in front of the altar, trying to communicate with the owner of the temple, but he was completely ignored.

He went to next one from the list, a goddess who didn’t care about Yato and didn’t answered his prayers. The same with the next gods, and the following ones…

“Not me.” She said, trying to cheer him up, but her words didn’t have much effect over Yato.

Yato, confused by the suddenly teletransport, looked around. He was in a medieval temple, but all the furniture and doors were extremely big, like they were designed for giants. He felt like a little child in that room.

"So, you're looking for my blessing, Yaboku?"

When he heard his old name, the purple-haired god turned around and saw a huge figure behind him. Over two times taller than him, and many more times broader and thicker. Obviously this imposing man was the master of the temple.

"Yes, but it seems you have already consumed all the blessings, Tajikarao."

The strong god had always being one of the biggest, but he never was so humongous. The last time they met, he was roughly 2m tall (6'8), today he duplicated that. He didn't wear nothing but a toga around his waist, bigger than a Grand king bed sheet but barely enough to go around his waist. It could hide his fat flacid penis, although his huge package and fat cock pressed against the cloth to the point everyone could distinguish their shape.

"I'm pleased you recognized me after so many years." The giant walked menacingly towards the little god. The floor seemed to shake under his heavy steps. "Most of my improvements are due to centuries of hard work, since our battle."

The battle in which a God of Calamity defeated the God of Strength. He hadn never got over that humiliation.

"Since then, I grew stronger and you seemed to have become a poor excuse of god." He mocked as he flexed his biceps, several times bigger than Yato's head. "There's no doubts who will win the rematch."

The muscular god summoned a vessel and got ready to fight.

"I didn't came for that."
"I gladly bestow you my blessings once I have painted my floor with your blood..."

Yato almost was hit by the first thrust. He was very fast despite his size.

"If you insist on attacking me I'll leave and you'll never get your desired victory over me!"
"If you flee, that would probe you're a coward and I'll win by default! My honor will be restored!"
"What honor is there in attacking someone unarmed and unprepared?"

Tajikarao stopped. He couldn't refute Yato's point. That frustrated him terribly.

"But if you agree to grant your blessing, you'll have your fight."

Tajikarao's expression changed abruptly and now shone with sadist excitation. Yato was beginning to regret this...

"Who must receive my blessing? Yourself?"
"No, my vessel Yukine."
"So you're looking for strengthen your weapon..."
"Not exactly." Yato didn't fancy explaning Yukine's complex.

He gave him a photo so he could identify his target.

"He's just a brat. A wimp."
"He's stronger than he looks." True. "We make a fantastic team" Not exactly... "He's always looking up to me and admires my power..." Lies.
"I have enough to prepare my blessing. I only need some time... but I hope, for your own good, you'll keep your side of the bargain."
"The next full moon we'll have our duel."

Yato left and the other god started to prepare his blessing. While he was sending blessing power to Yukine's photo, an evilish idea crossed his mind.

"So your Shinki servant looks up to your power, eh? But I bet if he grew much stronger than you, your servant wouldn't respect you so much..."

He added a little more divine energy than it was necessary. And then he imagined Yukine growing so big that when it was time for the duel Yato would try to hold his improved sword-vessel, now longer than his own body, and failing.

He laughed and proceeded to inject even more energy into the photo.

In the Earth, the blond kid, sleeping in his bed, started to shake and moan pleasantly while his body began to grow slowly, becoming more and more constricted by his clothes. Who knows what he was dreaming.

"What do you want, Yato... it's too early..." The boy rose slowly from his bed, still half asleep. He took 10 seconds to notice something doesn't fit...

"Yato, are you kneeling or something...?" He instinctively said pointing at his face, a little below his shoulders.

He shook his head with an amused smile. That was a silly question, Yukine only had to look down to see he was standing up.

"Did an enemy shrink you?"

Yato shook again and put his hand on the regalia's broad and tall shoulder.

"Your pleas had been heard and granted by the greatest of the gods!"

He looked around, looking for the great god Yato was talking about.

"I'm talking about ME, airhead! I granted your wish! You're tall now!"
"Ehhhh??"

That revelation cleared his head up at last.

Yukine, this time, finally noticed how all the room seemed smaller and how small and ripped his clothes were.

He ran to the bathroom, but the top of his forehead hit the doorframe of its door... but after the hit he didn't complained, his face showed even more excitation instead.

Once inside he shut the door behind and proceeded to examinate his new body in front of the mirror. At his new height, his head was cut off by the mirror. He took a good look of the reflexion of his long, broad, muscular upperbody.

The short boy didn't even dream he could get so big when he was alive. He didn't know man as big as himself existed.

He flexed his body, admiring how big his flexed arms got, his V-shaped back and front, caressed his abs (it was tickly) and when he looked below stopped.

There was a huge bulge inside his deteriorated underpants.

Thrilled (and a little scared by so many changes), he slowly took down his shorts...

"OH MY GOD!"

"Did you call me, my faithful Regalia?" His meddling master bursted into the bath only to found the teenager with a huge flaccid cock hanging from his crotch.

Embarrassed to the point of blushing, Yato went backwards a few steps and left him alone again.

"Maybe I went too far with his wish..."

The blond regalia went out seconds later with what remained of his clothes, clearly too ashamed to do anything more lewd with his new body. Together they pretended clumsily nothing had happened.

"Yato..."
"Yukine... sorry, I think the wish didn't work as..."
"...THANK YOU!"

The kid hugged the fortune god so tightly he almost couldn't breath. Yato's feet shook in the air, unable to touch the floor as the tall regalia lifted his body.

"As your lead shinki, I'll swear I'll use my new strengh to protect you, and I'll work to get even stronger...!"

But he had already broken his oath, as his master was suffocating under his arms.

Trapped in his grasp, with his head pressing his muscular shoulder, he couldn't do anything but feel his warm touch... the soft skin of his hard muscles... and his strangely sweet aroma...

For some reason, he was starting to get hard, so he demanded loudly to be set free.
The jubilant Yukine, unaware of Yato's reaction, obeyed him immediately.

"Thanks."
"Sorry, I got swept up. This is amazing! I'm not just big, also I've never feel so strong! How could you do this?"
"Professional secret!" Yato answered cryptically as he didn't wanted to let his down by confessing it was another god's doing.
"This is great, but... I think I need bigger clothes... I don't want Hiyori and other regalias to see me this way" He say pointing at his damaged pijama pants which were about to rip in any moment.
"I have the solution to that problem too!"

Yato's solution to every problem: mooching another guy.

The pair ran down the streets (the god got surprised when noticed how fast Yukine had become, he hardly could keep his pace) until they reached their destination...

Yato rang the doorbell of the house and waited until the large figure of Daikoku went out the door.

"What do you want, Ya...? ...!!"

Kofuku's regalia muted when he saw the equally huge body of Yukine.

"The kid had a growth spurt, and I'm afraid no one sells clothes this big... so I was wondering if you could lend him some."

"Yato, what will you do to him?? Don't tell bullshit, regalias don't age!!"
"Me? Nothing..." He said holding his smile.

Once he calmed down, he agreed reluctantly to give him one of his shirts and pants.

"I can't give you more, custom made aren't cheap and my goddess can't spare much money."
"Oh, regarding Kofuku, where is she?"
"No idea. She said something about having to do a favor to a friend and left."
"Surely she's trying to seduce a future homeless."
"Hey, don't mock my goddess!!"

As they argued, Yukine finished buttoning Daikoku's shirt. It fit great. The blond regalia always envied the scary-looking man a little, for being so big and strong... but now he could look into his eyes directly, he didn't look so intimidatingly strong...

"I wonder what I can do with my body" He said as he closed his punch.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Yukine adjusted to his current body with Yato, Kofuku was happily heading off to thr near Inari Shrine that worshipped the black sclera'd androgynous fox god Uka-no-Mitama/Inari-Okamj/Oinari. She happily hummed as she walked down the street, wallet in one hand and food in the other as she headed to make an offering. Copied photos of Yukine in her purse ehile her bento box had the most expensive meats and veggies she could find for it as she headed to make the request to Japans second most popular deity. Bested only by Tenjin in popularity.

The pink haired goddess soon arrived at the local shrine, two Kitsune statues standing prodly in front of the rows of Torii leading deeper inside. She skipped happily through the vermillion gates to pass two more Inari statues at the end. A large crowd of humans gathered around the saisen to offer money and pray. A plain looking, fox-eared, one-tailed man dressed in shrine priest robes sitting next to a group of Shinki wearing fox masks and dressed in shrine uniforms. Thankfully the Gods of the Far Shore are not noticeable unless seeking attention from the crowds, allowing them to reside in peace.

Kofuku headed up to the lesser god watching over this Inari shrine. "Hello Mr. fox! I'd like to make a request to Oi-kun!" She asked cheerfully, holding up thr fresh bento box made with expensive meat before him as part of the request.

"Sure thing miss" He eyed her up to uncover her identity, eyebrow raised as he realized what God it was "Mrs. Binbougami. I'll contact them."

"Kofuku Ebisu please!" She corrected him as she offered the box, the lesser deity bowing before taking. With knowledge of which Binbougami stood before him. He closed his eyes as the bento disappeared, teleported to Inari's residence. His eyes closed for several minutes before opening.

"Lord Inari has approved of listening to your request. For such a fine meal something will be granted even if the full wish cannot be made reality."

"Thanks! Tell Inny I want my Yatty's Shinki to grow bigger!"
He figured out she meant the disaster god. " Does he plan to benefit from this?" He questioned if she, or Yato, knew such blessings ending up affecting the God as well. Though not to the same extent.
"Nope! His Shinki Yukky wants to bigger since he won't grow older. Yatty wanted to grant his wish. Don't see how he'd benefit from it since it only works on Shinki." She tilted her head for a sec. As she thought to be sure she was certain.
Relieved, he responded "Very well. I shall inform my lord." He closed his eyes as he spoke to the great Uka-no-Mitama telepathically. A moment passed before he spoke "Your wish for Yato's Shinki shall be granted."
"Thanks so much!" Kofuku was about to run off but stopped. "Oh right. Need a photo right?" She brought out a photo Yato gave her of Yukine, handing it over. She then waved before cheerfully ran off to ask the next god Benzaiten, hoping to really make Yukines wish a huge surprise. After all a few blessings shouldn't have a big impact right?

"Lord Inari has enough servants to locate him, but this will speed it up." He anused as he sent it to him as she left through the vermillion torii, the honcho of the small shrine returned to relaxing before the crowd.

----
Uka-no-Mitama meanwhile was scarfing down the bento with joy, almost all of the Bento Box nearly gone. Fox.ears twitched as they finished, putting the chopsticks down on a table before them. Quiet and mysterious, the fox deity grasped the photo as it materialized in its hands. With a snap of its free hands fingers, its blessing now rained down upon Yukine to help him grow more.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
“What’s the surprise?” Yukine asked as he came out of the covers.
“I asked a god to make you taller!” Yato stood still after saying that as Yukine had stood up. Yato was looking up at him. Yukine must had been around the same height as Daikoku. “I didn’t think it would make him taller than me” he thought. Examining him further, Yukine also had gained some muscle. Skinner than Daikoku though.
“What are you talking about?” Yukine asked, still groggy while getting dressed.
“What do you mean? You used to be shorter than me yesterday!”
“Get a shrine and your perspective of your surroundings changes, huh? I was shorter than Hiyori when I became your regalia, but I’ve grown since then.” He said as he finished getting dressed. Yato noticed that his clothes fit him perfectly. As if they had grown as well.
“Yukine, I’ve got breakfast.” Hiyori Walked in.
“Hiyori.” Yato whispered. “Wasn’t Yukine shorter than you yesterday?”
“Don’t you remember?”
“Your wish?”
“Not that! You told me Yukine wasn’t well when you found him. And when he was better, his physical appearance changed from before. At least that’s what you told me. I’ve never seen his normal appearance.” Yato couldn’t believe it. Was he really letting the shrine get to his head to the point he would forget something so obvious? “Oh yeah, speaking of my wish, did you find something that..” Yato had left.

Yato had gone ahead to see Kofuku.
“Hey Yatty! Where’s Yukine and Hiyori?”
“They’ll be here in a bit. Is Daikoku here?”
“Why do you need him?”
“No. I just need to ask you a question.”
“He’s cooking breakfast. He won’t hear if we whisper. What is it?”
“How tall is Yukine?”
“That’s your question? I don’t see what the problem is?”
“Just answer the question.” Yato got slightly annoyed.
“Shorter than me. Although I don’t know by how much. Why?” Yato got closer to her ear.
“Remember our conversation yesterday, about Yukine?” Kofuku nodded. “Well, I was able to get a god to grant the wish.”
“That’s great!” Yato covered her mouth as he didn’t want Daikoku to hear her raise her voice in excitement.
“Apparently he made it so only we can notice. Did you do anything?” She thought for a sec after Yato released his hand.
“I did tell one god that you were looking for a favor.” Yato sighed.
“That must had been it. Now I need to figure out to reverse it.”
“Why? Isn’t that what you wanted?”
“I would have been fine if he was taller than me. But it doesn’t mean anything if he doesn’t realize the change!” Kofuku understood.
“Hey guys!” Hiyori had arrived. Kofuku was surprised when she saw Yukine come in.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"AAAAAAAAAAAA!" A heavy broadsword was swung onehanded as the screaming Magic Knight slashed through a rock, cracks forming where the rock was sliced as the top slid to the left, making a *CRASH* as it landed partially on its lower half and the cracked chunks were tossed about as they skipped around. Other such largr, shattered and sliced rocks all around as the short, green eyed boy causually swung the blade in his hand in rapid succession. Torso bare displaying considerable musculature for his stature. Veins snaking across to feed his working biceps. Only his captain surpassed him in beef.

"YEAH! Swinging these swords gets easier by the day!" Wiping sweat from his forehead as he finished the last bit of his trainig of the day. "Got an entire day to train and none of the other Black Bulls surprised me."
Thoughts spoken aloud as he turned his head around.

Ignorant some fifty feet away Noelle hihhden in the bushes watching him. Repeating "Bakasta" as her face glowed crimson.

"Wait. But I haven't learned a new spell for a sword!" He yelled to the air, forgetting why he tried to ignore everyone today.

=====Yesterday=====
Asta was running blindly through the capital of the Clover Kingdom, trying to complete a minor mission the Wizard King tasked him with. Townsfolk seeing ash blonde hair zip by to the sound of yelling as he tried to find a feline enchanted by a camouflage spell.

"Not here either!" He yelled as he scanned the markeplace, not noticing the spot between apples moving about as he ran off south, the cat jumping to leave for east. The day soon turned to twilight as the suns light began to vanish over the horizon. Invisible cat not found.

"Argh! I should have asked for Vanessas help. Maybe her string cat could find it!?" He was stumped but still running about until.....

*THUD* Astas face bumped headfirst into the thick thigh held secure in its cloth prison beneath. Falling backwards he he stopped his head from heading the ground by sturdying himself. A smiled crossed the figure he crashed into.

"Need some help Asta?" A deepvoice said, but oddly familiar as Asta looked up, and up to see....Yuno!?

Asta shook his as he looked up. His foster brother, rival, and friend stood before him but something was different. Not that Asta was sure as he assumed he was still 177 cm(5'7 ft). Yetvthe person before him was easily 213 cm(7 ft). Not that said part was noticed as the amber eyed titan positioned one arm like something was resting on it, stroking the air around it with his free arm. To the 155 cm( 5'1 ft) Asta what was immediately noticeable was those muscles.

His clothes, somehow still fitting Yunos body just fine, clung tightly to his impressive musculature. His thicker thighs wrapped tight in brown pants, black shirt rising slightly to see the outline of a lower six pack. Above them was forming a shelf of pecs nestled beneath the Golden Dawn robe he wore. Visibly higher up so the lower half of his black-clothed pecs visible. His arms were visibly thicker, easily a 45 cm (18 in) in proportion with his body, at least if he was his original height. The bicep was much bigger now due to the additonal growth. Even the dark haired boys neck was thicker.

"YOU'VE GOT MUSCLES!" Astas pupils filled with stars. as shock nearly had his mind break. The gears of his mind nearly grinding to a halt from this revelation.

"Yeah. It's a long story." Yuno bent down as his left hand continued scratching the above his right, until the visible coloration of a creatures eyes was visible to Asta. "I heard you were looking for this fellow."

It took a moment to process that in his hands was the feline!"Y-yeah!" Asta pulled out his grimoore, reaching into it to grasp the Demon-slayer sword. With a tap of the heavy broadsword, the cats fur transitioned into orange and stripes.

Returning his sword back to it, Asta welcomed the kitty into his arms. A smile crossing his face as he looked up, the tension of this odd...situation finally laxed for him. "Thanks Yuno. Im gonna get another star for doing this for the Wizard King. But how did you get so...."
"Big?"
"Yeah!" The cat, though clearly not happy to leave Yunos arms, accepted it even as it gave a deathglare to Asta.
"Well we were dealing with an acient mystical weapon the other day when Sylph showed me a new spell in my grimoire. ''Blessing of Raging Wind Incarmate:Become the Storm.'' It did..this" He flexed his right arm, bicep rising with the flex past Astas head. He let out a *Sigh* "Good thing my clothes grew too or Id be in trouble."
"So what happend to the weapon?"
"I punched it, which made a tornado send it flying off into the distance."
"I can't believe something so cool happend in the five days I hadm't seem you!"
"Yeah well the Wizard King was particularly impressive. He wants me to show off the last day of the weekend."
At those words Astas star filled pupils widen more. "I want to watch you show off too!"
"Don't worry. That's why I came looking for you and learned about your mission from the king." Yunos words made Asta tilt his head in confusion.
"Me?"
"Yeah. I told the king only if my rival got to come, cause my rival would never find a way to get big either and I can show off how much bigger I am than you."
"OH YEAH!" Asta gritted his teeth as he prepared to engage in competition with Yuno. "I'll totally find a sword that will let me get huge and make the Wizard King praise me for getting so much bigger! Just you wait! I'll see you there " Asta immediately ran off the sound of *HISSING* and *RIP* as he clearly forgot about the cat he was carrying to the Kings castle where his majesty amd the Wizard Emperor were at.

Yuno stood there watchimg with a blank look. Devoid of even stoicness before a warm smile crossed his face. "Can't wait to see how you'll do it."

=======Back to the Present=======
"ARGH! I can't let Yuno show me up before the Wizard King! I've gotta show everyone what I can do and beat Yunos butt!" He rolled across the ground before he let out *OUCHOUCHOUCH* as he rolled over pieces of the shattered rocks before stopping next to his grimoire. The black five leaf clover emblem upon the cover.

"Only one day left. There's totally a way to do it! I know there is!" Asta stood up as he made hia delcaration to the empty surroundings. The demon resodomg in his sword amused by the situation.

If you want to show off so badly I know just the sword in this grimoire. The black shadows wild hair flew about as he grinned. Astas Grimoire begam to leave his clothes, gllwing as it opened its pages as they began fying wildly to Astas attention.

"What the? Has my prayers been answered!?" Soon it shifted till it landed upon a page near the end. Ink appearing amd flowing forth across the page as words and images appear to the glow of the demons call. Soon a massive, sleek looking sword easily three times the size of the demon-slaying sword emerged! The grimoire had a hard time trying to spit the behemoth out, easily chucking like it was trying to throw it up due to its sheer size before it landed with a heavy *THUD* on the ground.

It was Black with the appearance of two mighty bull horns engraved upon its hilt. The swords edge emblazoned with silver symbols undecipherable on the pitch black blade. Asta moved forth to touch the blades hilt, which due to its girth would need him to lift with both hands.

He just didn't expect the sword to be so light!

"Weird. Its so big but its the lightest sword I've ever grasped. But it must do what Im seeking. So c'mon sword make me big. Even if its just my muscles make me huge enough to show Yuno up!" As Asta called to the blade hoping for an answer he got it.

And he still didn't notice Noelle in the bushes!

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
he story of a young female mage named Louise Françoise de la Baume le Blanc de la Vallière, the main protagonist. Louise is the third daughter of a aristocrat family (La Vallière) and attends to the magics school of her kingdom, Tristain. As the first exam of her second year of her magics studying, she is supposed to summon a familiar, a creature that will be loyal to her and accompany her for the rest of her life, protecting and guarding her, but Louise is not very bright when it comes to magic casting, from where she gets her nick name: Zero Louise, as in zero accuracy Louise. A series of events unfold as she casts her familiar being, Hiraga Saito, a human that came from the "real world", Japan. Other students summon creatures like: a dragon, a firespitting salamander, a beholder, etc., aggravating poor Louise's situation and popularity in school.

The society in Tristain and the neighboring kingdoms is organized in a simple way: whoever comes from a rich family and is able to cast magic is called an "Aristocrat", the rest are called plebeians, after the ancient/medieval times society in Europe.

Doesn't take long for Louise to realise that Saito, her plebeian familiar, is special in many ways for her as he starts becoming popular in school and learn to master his newly acquired abilities, which will be very valuable for the upcoming dangers and war plots that they will face.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Zero no Tsukaima, The Familiar of Zero

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Adopted into the Itsuka’s family household at a very young age, Shido has been living a fairly average normal life until recently. At the start of the series and his new high school year as a 2nd-year student, he accidentally stumbles into a new world unknown to him or to the public for that matter of fact.

Discovering the real reason behind the spacequakes and the fight between the AST and the Spirits; forcefully or voluntarily, Shido was brought into the secret organization known as Ratatoskr that his little sister commands, which was also a surprise to him. With the only explanation from her being that only he can save the Spirits, Shido reluctantly joins due to his nature to help and save people in need.

Going about with his normal life and rescuing Spirits is one thing, but with each new encounter and new Spirits to save, there is always some type of new hardship on Shido's mental health, since he has to deal with the opposite gender, with which he does not have much experience dealing.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
A classic yaoi where the protagonists are Marararui/Zoomans, humans that descended from other animals like Jaguars o Crocodiles, instead of apes. They looks like normal humans, but they have animal senses and instincts that sometimes overwhelms them. They live between humans in secret, they also have their own society. They are less fertile than humans (monkeys), so their numbers are pretty low.

They're classified by different levels, the stronger and bigger are called "heavy seeds", taller than doorframes and wide, muscular bodies. There are also weaker medium and light seeds, retrogrades (a Marararui with human parents but a Marararui ancestor. They're really fertile), and more.

Did I mention the male Marararuis can get pregnant after putting a special parasite in their ass?

----------

Protagonist pairings:

-Norio: Cat. Retrograde. Really short. 1st year highschooler.
-Madarame Kunimasa: Jaguar. Heavy seed. 205cm+ tall, dark haired man. 3rd year.

-Madarame Yonekuni: Crocodile. Heavy seed. 205cm+ tall, blond man. Hates cold. 3rd year.
-Fujiwara Shiro: Divine wolf. Heavy seed. 193cm tall, dark haired man. 3rd year.

-Joshua McBear: Bear. Really Heavy seed. 215+cm tall, red-haired man. 1st year. Wants a son from...
-Teruhiko Kumakashi: Bear. Medium seed. 180cm+ tall. 3rd year. Originally liked Norio, but after being forced by his family to have sex with Joshua to have heavy seed descendant, he fell in love with him.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Love Pistols?

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Junjou romantica is a manganime about three gay pairings:

-Misaki: 1st year college student. Short. He has problems to accept his feelings for Akihiko and usually tries to avoid having sex with...
-Akihiko: Famous writer and stereotypical seme. He was in love with Misaki's older brother, but after living with Misaki (to tutor him) for some time he starts liking him.

-Hiroki: College teacher. Grumpy, selfcentered uke. Formely he loved Akihiko, a one-sided love, until he met...
-Nowaki: 24 yo novice pediatrician. Gentle seme and he's quite tall (186cm) which pisses off Hiroki

-You Miyagi: College teacher and Hiroki's co-worker. Divorced. Serious. The seme of his unexpected relationship with...
-Shinobu: 3rd year highschooler. Kinda childish and unreasonable sometimes, but deeply loves You Miyagi.

Suggested plot: Some of these characters catch a benign growth-inducing illness known by causing height and muscular growth for a limited time (a year?). There's no cure, so they have to endure it as they become bigger and stronger day after day, adapting their lives to their new sizes.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Another yaoi: Junjou romantica

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:

Alas, his fate will be changed today.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ushio Hinomaru

choices: Horns grow, his skin reddens, as Hinomaru slowly grows
Hinomaru arrives and easily eats more food than anyone!
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The short, stout Hinomaru was getting his clothes on in Odachi Highs Dojo. The black and crimson red haired teens scarred tanned body was on display as he was taking of off his mawashi belt to be folded and placed in his bag, pulling out his school his form to wear and cover his stocky frame. Next to him was a set of dumbells, likely used by him only a few moments ago. "Goerta meet with cpatain and Kirihito. Don't want to miss out on the buffet!" He patted his stomach as crimson eyes gleamed with joy. The rest of the team had left for the newest buffet to stuff themselves on the all-you-can-eat challenges and menus.

"We keep getting banned for some reason." Oblivious that it was his, Gojou's, and Yuuma's attitude in front of the owners antagonizing them and leading to bans of all sumo students. Getting his things together, he left the empty dojo and headed for the schools entrance. "Hmm?" He was puzzled as he saw other students still there, leaving one at a time as a man in a suit was standing with bodyguards, asking questions from the looks of things. Thr guards letting them leave after presumably answering the question.

As three students left Hinomaru had reached the entrance, moving close by so his ears pick up the conversation with two other students.

"So you've heard nothing about a candidate to be one of the National Treasures(Tenka-Goken)?" The man in the suit was surpsinlgy tall. Yet his frame was rail thin and could probably collapse from a strong breeze. Eyes hidden by glasses

"Sorry man we don't even know what those are." The lead of the two male students replied before heading to leave. The man grimacing as his search continued

"National Treasures?" Hinomaru pondered "Wonder what he needs to know about them." The short red head moved towards the the tall man. "Excuse me sir! What do you know about the National Treasures?"

Noticing the unkempt hair and scar on his cheek, the man in the suit spoke. "I'm looking for one of the High School candidates sought after to be a Yokozona and bear the title of a Treasure. One Hinomaru Ushio." His voice softer than Hinomaru expected.

"You're looking for me?" Hearing thst from Hinomaru took the man aback, he was informed Hinomaru had a fierce look, but his ststure....

"*AHEM*" He coughed to get himself back on track. "Everyone else may leave. We found the person we sought." The other students were let free of school grounds as the man returned his attention to Hinomaru while the clattering of footsteps across the background "Indeed mister Ushio. I have with me-" The man made a gesture to one of his men, causing a guard to bring out
a long, thin ornamental case "A treasure from none other than thr Imperial Household Agency." He opened it to unveil a tachi. The sword instantly recognizable to the studious Hinomaru and history buff.

"Whoa! It's the legendary Onimaru Kunitsuna! The sword said to get its name from slaying an Oni!" He was blushing from joy at seeing something like it in person. "Wait but why am I allowed to glimpse it?"

"Pardon me. The Grand Chamberlain and the Emperor had requested the current candidate for the future Yokozuna be allowed to touch the blade they will be named for. The reasons I know not, but thry pulled a number of strings to see it made for reality, including the ones not in our possession." He pulled the tachi from its sheathe and showed the blades visage before Hinomarus eyes.

Sweat beaded down his brow as he gulped "I can really touch it?" The man nodded in response. The teens hand reached out to touch the sharp side of the blade. In that moment, the flame of passion that burned in Hinomarus eyes for sumo consumed all in the windows to his soul to become temporary kindling, with the visage of a Oni being beheaded in the reflection of the blade. The Last Oni, who haunted the dreams of the man who forged the Blade, which said sword would protect and strikd down to be named after Onikind. The Onis blood and the blade long dormant until now: the promised time. They desired only one thing, the birth of a new Oni who would beget a new generation of Oni across the world.

The flames in his eyes quickly died down as Hinomarus crimson red eyes glowed, removing his fingers from the blade, his middle trickling blood due to its sharpness. None of the men could see the supernatural influence, or bizarrely the blood from Hinomarus finger upon the blade.

Hinomaru himself just felt a powerful and warm presence in his body, his time to fully be born as the King of Oni was not yet here. He smiled as he bowed "Thank you for the chance to touch a National Treasure!"

The man and his bodyguards smiled "No need Mr. Ushio. We were only doing our jobs. Thank the Emperor and his aide for giving the opportunity." he quickly shesthed the blade and placed it back in its case, returned to the guard who kept it. "Now that our job here is done, we have festivities to prepare all across Japan. Have a good day Mr. Ushio". The man and his guards soon left, leaving Hinomaru alone at the gate.

Then. Hinomarus phone rang as he received a text from Kirihito about the Buffet "Oh crap!" He gasped as he quickly charged off while reading it.

The group has already started eating despite me urging Kunisaki to wait. Hurry before Kunisaki says something he shouldn't and we get kicked out - Kirihito.

He ran as fast as possible to reach the new buffet, and his legs carried him with greater speed thsn usual.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Return of the Oni.

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content: The main protagonist himself. Leader of a street gang unsure of whether he deserves a life beyond fighting and killing, and not sure if he wants to embrace a peaceful life with Eiji Okumura.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Ash Lynx

choices: Ash demands food for starters. Then hell call Sing
Ash wish to know what Yellow Leviathan is.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The bight light of the sun shone across New York, descending into a large public library. Few resided at the long tables, save for a blonde haired teen. The beauty of his angelic face as his head rested peacefully on the table, letter opened up beneath his fair golden hair where specks of blood tinted white paper a dull red.

A library staff member walked near him to awaken Ash, but smiled as she saw how happy he looked before walking away, a different patron asking for aid, ignorant the fair youth she assumed slumbered was dying from a stab wound gotten not too long ago. The youth, Ash Lynx, choosing not to receive medical treatment even after reading Eijis heartfelt words. Letting death take him instead as the light of the sun shined doen upon him. The sweet embrace of death soon to take.....

Destiny decided to rear itself, a different Library patron walked by in front of Ash resting head, catching sight of the dull red blood on the letter beneath his head. Clad in plain black clothes, Thick rimmed glasses hiding eyes, hair obscured by a thick black cap, face mask . The man held several books he placed them on the table as he quickly moved to the other side. "Ere ith mthing ung ith em." Words muffled by the mask as he moved his fingers under the jacket and black sweater to feel the pulse on angelic skin.

Feeling a heartbeat far too low for his age, the man pulled his mask down. "He won't last long enough to reach the hospital, the fact he shows no signs of struggling tells me he plans to die like this. Sorry but" moving a hand to a zipped pocket, unzipping as he pulled out a bottle "Im not kind enough to grant ones death wish". Popping off the lid, he quickly lifted the unconscious blondes up, using himself as a cushion as he took out a yellow like pill he put in his mouth. Closing his mouth shut as the pill quickly started to dissolve from the touch of liquid and travelled down his throat. He knew the experimental drug wouldn't be enough, reaching for another one to repeat the process. Opening mouth, closing, dissolving, rinse and repeat. The eyes of fellow patrons walking back gazing at the situation with misplaced thoughts on what was going down.

"Ive gone through thirteen of these. I don't know much these body enhancers will help this death seeking fool."

The staff member from before soon came up, drawn by patrons who informed her what was going down. "Sir please leave that poor fellow alone."

"I can't miss. See he's-" opening the jacket he showed the blood on Ashs sweater "on the verge of death."

"Oh my god! I-I thought he was sleeping!" She quickly rushed to their side. "Can I provide any aid?"

"Yes call my hospitals ambulance with this number and tell them Dr. Atlas gave it to you. I'm-" He dropped another pill down Ash throat, quickly moving to pull a cell phone out of his pocket to give her, quickly typing the number in the emergency call. "-trying to keep him alive." Returning to give him the medicine.

"Y-yes! She nodded as she took it in hand to answer.

As the two did their best, the experimental drug the doctor had been using began to affect Ash failing body. Though the process was slow as the loss of blood increased, the chemical compound began to affect the cells it came into contact with: gums, throat, stomach, intestines, bloodstream, etc. The process altering and mutate every fiber of his body as it moved about. If he had only taken one, this would not save the gang leader, but the doctor knew this as he gave him nearly the entire bottle. Soon his heartbeat began to slowly speed up to normal, new cells forming at a rapid pace to take the position of former cells where the injury was inflicted, the injury from the blade soon began to heal over as cognitive function returned.

Blue eyes dimly unveiled from the darkness as his ability to remain conscious returned. "Ei...ji..." was all he could muster before returning to his slumber. The doctor sighed in relief as his bottle had finished. Not a single one remained.

"What should I do next?" The librarian asked as she finished her task and retutned the phone.

"Get him some water to drink. He'll need fluids if he wakes before they arrive." With that she was off.

"Damn. I tested the Yellow Leviathan on an unwilling test subject. Ill get in trouble for this." He positioned Ash to rest his head on the table again. Returning to his books as the librarian brought the water and checked out his books in exchane.

======Three Hours Later======
*Lub Dub* *Lub Dub* *Lub Dub* *Lub Dub* rhythmically filled the silence of the room. Small lights of machines showing heartbeat as a Drip was put into the vein of one Ash Lynx. The blonde resting as his body lay in a hospital room. Clad in a long hospital gown beneath a blanket.

*Lub Dub* *Lub Dub* *BABUMP* *BABUMP* *BABUMP* The machine reading the rapid change in heartbeat "Eiji!" Ash nearly jumped out of the bed as he shot up, eyes wide as his longing crept into his dreamless slumber. He paused for a few seconds as he took in his surroundings as he realized whats going on. "I'm alive?"

it is a Hospital again. I know the process. Probably some creepy bastard plans on using me for science or assaulting me. Tsk. Fate won't let me rest in peace even when Dino and all the creepy fucks are finally arrested. The realization his attempt to accept death had been foiled, he pulled the blanket off as he recklessly tugged the Drips from his veins. Paying little attention as his body prevented vein collapse with rapid healig, or ignorant his noticeably thicker arms wrapped in his angel smooth skin. The new mounds of muscle easily softball size with a flex. Getting up with a surprisingly heavy *THUD* Ash looked around the room for his things.

"There it is!" He saw a table hidden behind the machines where his possessions and non blood-stained clothes lay. He moved over to grab his phone, shifting through contacts. Who to call? Sing? Nah I push enough on him for aid as is. Best call Blanca and Alex to get the gang to free me! As he pressed to message both, the sound of *SQUEAK* SQUEAK* *SQUEAK* drew his attention to those walking this way.

Damn. I don't have anything to defend myself with. He quickly moved to the bed to appear harmless, stabbing the drips poorly into his veins, yet suffered no repercussions from mishandling it. Next tossing the blanket over himself to wait for his chance, the blanket messily covering him.

Dr. Atlas entered the room to the sound of *CREAK* as the wooden door moved forward,noise filling the sterile environment. He wore a surgical cap over his hair as well as the mask, his black spectacles still on.

"Ah you're awake!" Smiling as he moved to Ash, he held out his hand. "Hello Mister-"

"Ash Lynx'" Ash replied. No hand meeting Atlas.

"-Ash Lynx" he moved his hand back as he brought over a hospital sheelchair to sit in. "I'm sure you have questions and Ill be happy to inform you of anything you might knkw after I found you in the local Library-".

"What do you want?" Ash wasted no time.
"Ah I wish to apologized to you. To save your life, I did an illegal act and used a drug to repair your body after you obtained that stab wound."
Thought so. "Do you plan on keeping me here as a guinea pig? I will make your life a living hell if you try to."
"Goodness no Mr. Lynx. You are free to go, but due to my actions we at Zhenren Hospital will do what we can to pay you back so long as this doesn't get taken to court."
A smile crossed Ash face at those words, especially relief at not being part of a mad science experiment. "Pay me back for keeping quiet? Well then I want you...."
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Life saving medicine
