1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Killer T Csll [Squad Leader]

choices: A sudden virus attack! Killer T grows with every kill!
Killer T clothes get tight as he picks a fight with White Blood Cell!
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
A world where light shined down from above, a vast roof with buildings, tunnels, and streets. Black haired men dressed in plain white shirts with the words "Cell" written on them standing around buildings. Men and women dressed in red uniforms carried boxes and crates filled with food through the streets and tunnels, moving to drop off some to each plain shirt male before continuinig on the path.

Nearby a base with an open area for training, men clad in black uniforms wearing caps that say "KILL" running laps as a glasses-wearing man drank tea given by his assistant. The two watched from indoors behind a nice desk and nearby bookshelves. He took a sip as she moved to her own desk. In the field though....

"All right you T-Cell maggots! What do we do!?" A blonde man lead the field of men clad in black, all of them smaller and of similar build save for one larger than all of them and his sleeves ripped off.
"Kill Cells and Viruses!" They yelled in unison, sweat beading down their heads as they continued running laps.
"That's right! We guard the pharynx! We are T-Cells! What are we!?"
"We are T-Cells! We guard the pharynx!"
"Damn right! Be ready after the next lap men! We'll be getting ready for any viral threats!"
"Yes sir!"

"They should have been done an hour again. That idiot needs to kee track of time" The glasses wearing man, Helper T Cell, and commander of the T Cell Division in thd Lymph node, sipped tea.

"I could say the same of someone behind his desk all day." His assistant, Regulatory T Cell, huffed under her breath as she filed through papers. She noticed a package in pure white wrapping paper and a letter. Taking it she read the signature "This is...."

Five minutes later they group had fonished the lap, standing in line to wait their Squad Leaders command. The largest member was oddly missing, having disappeared at the gesture pf Regulatory T Cell to emeet her. At least until....

"Sir! You got a present!" The massive Effector T Cell had in his hands the white gift.

All sense of professionalism disappeared instantly. "A-a-a present for m-me?" Lips quivering, body shivering, eyes wide as Killer T Cell was handed the box. Big wide smile and blushing red as he held it with shaking hands. His men amused him showing his softer side again after the last present incident shdn a virus performed a prank on him. He pulled open the paper attach to see the signature:

Sorry about joining rhinovirus in pranking you. Hope this makes up for it just a little.
Signed, Regular Cell.

"Heh. To think a mere Cell would be apologizing to me." He barely straightened up to regain composure, an occassional twitch before rapidly tearing open the wrapping, ripping apart tape to get to thr contents he crsved. There in the box was free nutients: meats, veggies, fruits. But the color was odd. Purple tinted like veins spread across them like a snake.

"Looks delicious!" Killer T Cell took some of the meat out "Thanks for the food~" teeth bared as he digged into the red meat, juicy purple fluid oozed down his lips as he chewed aggressively, his men looking on both happy for their Squad Leader, bored, and annoyed at how he won't share any with them. Watching as he sat on the ground to devour it all.

Shame Killer T Cell had no idea what was in the foods he was scarfing down greedily.

======Abovd the T Cell base======
Watching from the balcony of a normal cell apartment was the dark haired Regular Cell, looking down at the T-Cell dots that he views as always arrogant towards the normal cells. The fun they once had after Rhinovirus had stopped, his copy had left his home, and Lactic Acid Bacteria was too big to take care of anymore and had gone to live with the rest of his gigantic cuddly kind to help the body.

His hand pressed into his chin, a *SIGH* escaped his lips as he looked down on the type of White Blood Cell base. Next to him was a box with the same odd purple veined nutrients. "I hope giving him a treat will get them to have fun with me again. I won't get to make another copy for months."

He pulled out a small piece of a purple veined broccoli, contemplating eating it. "I wonder where the Red Blood Cell got these from?" He thought to the his delivery girl with thr sole bright red hair and the ahoge. "Oh well." He happily took a bite of his nutrients for the day. A few bites as drool began to flood, eyes widening as hr chewed and swallowed. A small lick of the lips. "Pretty good!"
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Nutient Gifts for Killer T Cell

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Suggested story nº1, at High School: Thien's surgery to stop his growth doesn't work and keeps getting bigger and bigger, filling him with dismay, although his relationship with Den helps him to endure it. At the same time, Den notices he has grown a few centimeters and has the opposite reaction. Although none of them suspects anything yet, both events are related.

Suggested story nº2, as independent adults: After doubting for weeks, Dau Den decides to sign up for a new experimental drug trial that could make him grow up to a normal size despite being in his twenties... but this drug is more powerful and unstable than the doctors realize, and due to an oversight Den receives 10 times more pills that he was supposed to. Ah! And on top of that, Thien accidentally consumes a few ones, with impressive results.
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The tall Nhat Thien and the short Dau Den

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Thien's awakening was slow and peaceful, quite different to how to fall asleep, hiding his anxiety in the operating room, waiting for the anesthesia to kick in.

His parent and sisters were around him, smiling, an improvement compared to being surrounded by strangers, the surgeons. The bed was barely longer than the sketcher, though, as his feet were hanging at the end of it.

But he was already used to, since he hit the 2 meters tall mark a year ago, and it was not like he was expecting to shrink due to the operation, only to stop growing.

The following days he only received good news from his doctor: The possible tumor they had found in his pituitary gland was smaller than they estimated, so the extraction wouldn't cause any side effect... it wasn't malign... it was all adipose tissue, harmless...

But all those good news had a darker side: If the tumor was so small and harmless, was it really the reason of his 208.5cm height?

The doctors wanted to remain positive and assume it was, although he wanted to make checks on Thien from time to time, just in case.

The boy was released days later. The first thing he did back home was calling Dau Den to meet. When he saw him, his tiny (boy)friend jumped to his arms and fused in a hug. "Welcome home!"
1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.title: A sucessful surgery... an unsucessful treatment?

1152222222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Red haired Sakuragi Hanamichi was having a thrilling day. He got to practice more than usually with the gorilla-er captain Takenori Akagi letting him play against Rukawa more the past few days, even playing a prank on a sleeping Rukawa after school by drawing a stache and all sorts of crude drawings before leaving school for the day.

"Destroying both Kingdoms would be easy if I only had my dragonstone. That accursed object I discarded in the astral plane after it failed to curb my madness. Only that fragment remains in that songstress grasp. No matter. My revenge will come. Then the paradise I desire shall be reality." He had waited for an age, a little longer would not change much.

What Anankos was not keen to was that his alternate counterparts had all discarded their stones the same way. Millions, nay, billions of dragonstones floating aimlessly in the astral realm. Eventually a plentiful amount of the now ownlerless rocks would collide, the impact of these same stones would merge them. The power of the stone amplified twofold with each new contact, and with it a new greater stone would be born.

One such dragonstone, easily the size of Garon's Blight Dragon form, floated aimlessly in the deeprealms. It had wandered for a time until it reached just the right spot, gravity taking hold as it fell down into the territory known as My Castle, where it fell with a heavy *CRASH!* as it tore through Corrin's private quarters like it was paper. The young lord awoke from his bed chambers with a startled "We're under attack!" as he swiftly grabbed the nearby Yato to see what inader had attacked so quickly.

Instead before his sight lay a massive stone that filled most of the room, narrowly avoiding his bed. The table, chairs, chandliers all smashed beneath its bulk. Pieces that were less fortunate sent with enough force to pierce the wall or crack it.

"What in the Gods name is this?" As he left the bed, the sleek ebon and ivory armor with black tights that naturally tight clinged to his skin. The nimble and lithe lord moved out of his bed, grabbing his cape with his free hand. Elegantly putting the sapphire cape on with a swift movement.

He gently caressed the godly stone with his right hand, expecting it to be inert like his stone save for when activating it.

Instead a rush of power flowed out of it as it seized his palm. Petrifying the arm in place as power coursed out and into the half-dragon. "A-ah!" The yell he released was feeble and sounded oddly...aroused. Intense heat filled his body as a tent start to form in his tights. The power of the Silent Dragonstone began to react to his will, slowly shrinking the arm as all of Corrins skin bubbled beneath the armor. The armor slowly spread out as his body started to hulk out. "C'mon! Bend to my will!" Corrin gritted his teeth as his neck bulges with strong muscle, his antlers appeared on his head as he grew in height. Soon his arm started to become 'normal' relative to Corrins new size as he bent down, his right now equal in size, only gaining a bit of mass before shrinking as the stone continued to feed him.

Now seven and a half feet tall and easily the size of an amateur bodybuilder, and a throbbing cock that was obscene in its size tucked away. Corrin growled "Let. Me Go." At its new master request the stone calmed down as it shut its tap, letting free the arm as a burst of water flowed out of the hole it made and into the sky. With a burst it gushed forth and flooded My Castle for only an instant before the wispy water and bubbles evaporated.

"Hah....Hah...hah..." It had taken everything from Corrin to end it there. Like an intense workout that had gone overboard. Corrin's eyes began to glow crimson red with a deep entrancing intensity. "That was weird." That's when he realized something odd was going on. "Wait...Jakob and Felicia should have already burst in here freaking out, not to mention my personal assistant. Why has no one questioned this?"

He tried to stand up properly, but his legs were numb. Their new thickness as the thighs press together. "Can anyone help me!?" Corrin called out. Strangely someone did enter the room, and the voice left him perplexed. "Papa! What happened here?" the voice had to belong to his child Kana. But she sounded different.

"Papa was just practicing with his dragonstone and tired himself out. It's nothing to worry about. Come help Papa get up". He held up his massive right hand, the black tight covered hands hiding azure markings that were emerging upon the hidden skin and accentuating the veins beneath the engorged armor.

"Sure papa!" Kana ran up to stand before Corrin, and he knew in an instant this wasn't his daughter. Spiky hair and boyish face compared to his girls sweet features and bun styled hair.

"Who are you?"

"What are you talking about Papa? It's me Kana!"

The power that he had unleashed had rewrote My Castle as he knew. Rather, it had placed the young warrior in a new reality. One different from his own in slight and noticeable ways.



Like the fact his kid was now male. And maybe much larger in size than he's supposed to be. Bizzare dragon magic and genetics will do that!

12533121.title: The first of many: Ryuji Sakamoto

choices: With a Grail in hand, Ren wishes for Ryujis leg healed (Slow Growth)
Ren wishes Ryuji to be bigger than life Better wish for a new Metaverse to hide
125331211.content:
It was night at Tokyo's Juvenile Hall, the leader of the Phantom Thieves of Heart, Joker aka Ren Amamiya, was resting in his cell. Not much for him to do except wait for his release and Shido being convicted since the former Prime Minister and the God of Control Yaldabaoth behind him were both defeated. He had little contact with his friends on the outside, and the Trickster wanted something to make the days go easier since he was visited two days ago by Igor and Lavenza as they finish their contract with him.

I wonder how Ryuji is doing. His first thought that night was to his cheerful blonde friend. The first to join him in the Metaverse as they challenged Kamoshida in his Palace of Lust, and together with Ann and the incarnation of hope Morgana faced off against. He'd worried about all his friends and Confidants, but tonight he decided to focus on his kind but not the brightest, friend. He worried about Morgana just as much, if only because the shapeshifting feline disappeared with the Metaverse.

Wonder if he's still mentioning he's a Phantom Thief of Heart. The thought amused him as light shined through his small window, as Ryuji always loved being boiterous and speaking before thinking. But that's just one of his charms.

"I see. A desire to see your blonde companion." As an ominous voice rang out Ren instantly got up and prepared for a fight.

"Relax kid. Just happened to stumble upon you and heard your thoughts." The voice, which sounded both similar to his own, yet also sounded like Shido's, filled the room.

>* Who are you?
* What's going on?

"Relax kid. No reason to have a heart attack over meeting a God." The room filled with an eerie green light as a lanky figure whose frame reached the ceiling of his cell appeared before him. Armor with a wood like appearance, a cape split in two, gold, a fake red beard around the helmet, with the intense green eyes of the skeleton that wore it all.

"Name's Dagda. Father of the Tuatha De Danaan and son of Danu, mother of the Tuatha de. I stumbled across this universe after leaving my own for a bit" The skeleton now known as Dagda stated as he mystically spawned a massive floating bowl next to him.

>*Not interested
*I don't like where this heading
*He sounds so edgy

"Heh. Not even interested before I can give you a chance to make things easier on you. I like that from a human, especially one who has become a Godslayer. Though you're mutually cooperation is not needed for what I want" The skeletal Celtic God informed the mortal before him. "I was seeking to dispose of this Dundry of mine after asking my daughter Brighid for it. A place where my accursed mother will never find it. Lucky for me this universe is hidden from her wretched sight."

>*Still don't want involved
*Sounds like you have mommy issues.
*Don't pawn off your junk on me.

"Oh you will. Now that the original Grail the people wished for is gone, the masses indolent desires will seek to make a new one that will serve the same purpose, even if the number of folks who wish for it are small. Do you get my meaning?" Dagdas words put Ren on alert as he became wary of this info. A reborn Yaldabaoth is possible. "Now you're getting it kid. However, my Dundry can perform the same miracles as the Holy Grail. Angels have desired it for their accursed God for that reason. But if a singular human claims ownership before the masses do well...." He let the implications of avoiding Yaldys return come to Ren himself.

*I don't trust you.
>*I'll take your word on this. How do I stop it?
*No thanks.

"Glad you asked kid. Use my Dundry to grant a wish. It can be small, it can be huge, it can be so inconsequential it changes nothing. Once you do the Dundry will obey you as I've long given up ownership of it. It cannot grant my wish. A wish unimportant to you or your world." He warned softly as he put to sleep the guard starting to walk by before continuing "Now best be wary. Once one is brought into the supernatural it becomes a permanent part of your life. My appearance here is just a sign of your future. Heh. Good luck boy." With a chuckle the bony deity vanished in a flash of green light.

With the Dundry before him Ren knew better than to wish for his release. He'd get out on his own time. So the leader of the Phantom Thieves made a wish to see Ryuji. In a flash an "Oof!" Came out of the blonde blur that fell onto the bed.

Looking up Ryuji to see a small rooms door he wondered what was going on. "Where the eff am i?" Looking around only to see his friend. "Dude! It's good to see ya!"

*Likewise Ryuji
*Nice of you to drop in
>*Sorry about that Ryuji

"About what?" Ryuji asked as his leader informed him of what happened. "So some shady skeleton gave you this to avoid that asshole Yaldabaoth resurrectin'? Sounds too good to be true. But uh if it can will ya have it get us outta here? Don't wanna be stuck in this cell when the fuards come."

Nodding, Ren wished for them both to be in the Cafe Leblanc. Making a secondary wish as soon as they were in his apartment for a dummy that is mistaken by all guards in Juvenile Hall for himself. At least for now while the two catch up.
125331211.title: Wary wishes of a new Holy Grail.

125332.content: The series about Pit the Angel fighting the forces of evil in service of the Goddess Palutena.
125332.title: Kid Icarus

1253321.content: The hero himself, the flightless Angel whose ability of flight is temporarily blessed by lady Palutena.
1253321.title: Pit the Angel

choices: Pit decides to not head for land, letting hot springwater grows him huge
Pit arrives on land and only slight growth.
12533211.content:
The Galactic Sea shine brilliantly amongst the stars. The blue, turquiose, purple shimmering below as a lone Angel flew above. The brown haired, toga wearing angels wings glimmered with light from the power of flight blessed upon him. He flew threw a bizarre set of stone rings held together by gold energy, which glowed for but a sec to send the angel to another part of the great sea that connects the galaxy. "Okay Lady Palutena that was the fifth ring on the map. What's next?"

"Let me see..." The voice of the green haired goddess was looking at a mystical hologram map before her, trying to figure out where to go next. Most of it was simple to understand, a line trailing through a 3D view of the Galactic Sea and the five teleporting rings. Each part of it only appearing after one set was complet, yet now it spread out in all directions with no clear destination. "I told you Pit. You should have thought about learning more about this legendary Hot Spring and how the map worked before you sprinted off to look for it. This map has now decided to screw with us at this point "

"But Lady Palutena it was legendary Hot Springs said to grant any wish! There was no way I could pass this up after the humans gave me the map as thanks when I slew those monsters during an attack on their village". He flew around observing his celestial surroundings for clues, with no mass of land to rest should his time expire in sight. He still had four minutes and a half left of flight time, so he was not panicking just yet. Plus Palutenas teleportation magic would get him in time.

"Right. It's not because it was a hot spring they mentiined. Nope. Definily not that at all." Palutena reluctantly sighed as she tried to mess with the holographic projections, only for it to remain the same, not wishing to leave him stranded. As soon as her power had been charged to give him flight again Pit had jumped off Angel Land without thinking. The green haired Goddess of Light had to give him flight to save him, which Pit then used an opportunity to go fly off to space to find the treasure he craved. Suddenly a tiny Centurion flew in, bringing news tochis goddess from the humans below. "Wait seriously? No wonder it wasn't working. Either the map wasn't replicated properly or they destroyed the planet it was located on."

"What's wrong Lady Palutena?!" Hearing what sounded like bad news, the angel began to worry as two minutes remained.

"The Centurion I sent to investigate informed me the villagers found the map in the wreckage of a ruined Aurum vessel that crashed when we fought them off." Pit did not like the sound of that.

"So...I screwed myself over didn't I?" One minute thirty seconds remained.

"Don't worry I'll rescue you from there with my Power of Teleportation." 45 seconds passed before she spoke again. "And my powers aren't teleporting you out of there. Nor are any of my others powers. Just the ones that were active when you arrived there, and it seems it won't let me reinforce your flight. So make peace with me and I'll see you in your next life". Palutena began preparing his funeral rites as 15 seconds remained.

"Aren't you giving up on me a little fast?!" The power of flight began to fade as he started losing flight. "Nooooo! Me and Pittoo are too young to die!" The power faded as he started tumbling out of the sky and down into the starry sea below to his doom.


Is what fate would normally have happen.

Instead the heroic champion of Palutena fell through a hidden, mystical portal that opened up, dropping him with a heavy splash into a large hot sping big enough to serve as a big lake. Golden waters shimmering brightly as Pit struggled for air by the surprise and swam desperately upwards to the surface. Upon breaking the surface, water dripping down his face as he took a fresh breath of joy. "I'm alive! I'm alive!" He opened his eyes in joy as he yelled out in excitement, seeing the large lake of steamy, golden water that lay before him.

"And I found the Legendary Hot Springs too! Did you hear that Lady Palutena!?" No response. "Lady Palutena? Oh no I can't quip with myself! I learned that the last time I tried it." Swimming slowly, he saw some land a good couple hundred feet away, which seemed to have silvery leafy flora growing.

Pit began to swim to nearby land. "This place must be why her powers weren't working. I'll have to find a way to communicate with her when I get to land." Though he about it for a second. He could enjoy these springs before reporting to her, it wouldn't take long to enjoy them.

"Nah once I enjoy these springs for a bit I'll find a means to contact her. Not everyday one gets to enjoy legendary Hot Springs!"

The Aurum, who had poorly replicated the map, had failed to obtain and thus not replicate the special guidelines that warned of what to do and not to do in this hidden realm of blessed Springs. Namely that males were not allowed for the...interesting side effects it had on them and weird power bestowing. Of which Pit would soon feel.

Though at least his toga will grow with him!
12533211.title: The Ultimate Hotaprings

choices: Pit goes to put his sandals on, but they're... tighter?
125332112.content:
"Pit? Pit! PIT!" Palutena yelled as loud as she could through her telepathic connection with Pit. Although if it's telepathy, can she yell? 'Hm, I wonder if that works. PIT! PIT! Wait, focus Palutena. We need to reestablish contact with Pit. I knew I should have actually gotten the laser eye surgery for my All-Seeing Eye of Palutena..'

She pinched her brow in annoyance. Pit and his hotsprings, if it weren't for the fact he was so passionate about this stuff, she'd be mad, but he was just too adorable about it. She laughed as she walked away from her magic pool. She wasn't going to mention that Pit was missing to Pittoo. The less he knew, the better. "Now, how am I going to find Pit... One of these days I'll have to promote him; keep him busier that way." She muttered.

====With Pit====

Pit meanwhile was having the time of his life, gently backstroking through the Ultimate Hotsprings, enjoying the feeling of soaking in the hot water, feeling it surround him, enjoying it loosening his tense muscles. "Ah, gotta love soaking the sacred buns~" He cheerfully admitted.

But as much as he wanted to enjoy, he needed to contact Lady Palutena first. He quickly swam towards the shore, still unaware of any effects of the springs. It would still be a bit before that kicked in. "Aw, but it's such a good spring, but Lady Palutena... but Hot Spring! But Lady Palutena..." He kept carrying this internal debate on, idly swimming towards the shore all the while. "Hot Sprints... Lady Palutena..."

*BONK!*

"Ow!" He rubbed his head, realizing he had bonked his head on the shoreline in his absentmindedness. "Lady Palutena." He said, as if it were some sage wisdom, and not the end result of 3 minutes of his life he'd wasted on a pointless debate. Shaking himself almost like a dog, he flicked his wings off, trying to get the wetness out of them. "All this water better not make me shed any more feathers..." He muttered as he walked onto the shore.

Turning around, he looked at the vast expanse of hot spring behind him. "HOT SPRING!" He shouted, eyes shining with stars, before an imaginary caricature of Palutena whacked him on his head. "Lady Palutena... right." He looked around, trying to get his bearings. Near the shore were some very unique looking plants, glowing silver in the golden light of the hot springs, there seemed to be some kind of fruit growing on them as well. At least he wouldn't go hungry!

"Lady Palutena! Hello! Can you hear me!!" He shouted mentally, trying to see if he could reach her. He tapped his laurel, "Is this thing working! Hello!" After a few minutes of trying, he sighed in frustration. "Agh! Come on... what am I supposed to do..." He crossed in arms in deep thought, before he looked over at the hot spring.

"Well, it's not like she'll know." He said slyly. He was supposed to follow the Angel Code, but he shouldn't let all his clothes get wet. Plus it's not like she'd see it. Grabbing his belt, he undid it and his clasp, letting his toga and scarf loose, which he carefully hung to dry, leaving him only in his navy blue tights. Stripping off his gold rings, gauntlets, and sandals off, the last thing to go was his laurels, before...

"WOOHOO!" He shouted, diving into the hot spring, clad only in his tights. No shame there. He savored that hot spring, enjoying the heat, the feeling, the swishy-swoshy of water. Hey, it's not like he was a poet or something. He can't even read! Although Palutena was working on that at least.

He moaned at the sensations. "This hot spring is amazing!" He yelled, feeling such a unique feeling as though his very muscles were saturated by it. In truth, they were. One legend had it that Heracles, who Palutena told many stories about, found his strength from a hot spring just like this one. Although no one knew they were one and the same. In truth, it was just beginning.

Getting out, he stretched, letting his limber limbs relax, and one could see the changes start. His tights were not a lot tighter on him. If one didn't know Pit, they might think he was just starting professional swimming, his arms and legs lithe with slowly developing muscle, just slowly becoming apparent and his pecs and abs developed enough to show just a faint outline.

Even his own face looked just slightly more mature, not by too much, but a closer look would show things were off. Other things were more mature as well if his front was any indication. He stretched back, showing how much tighter his sacred buns clenched as well. Nobody could resist not grabbing a piece of them, even as more pale skin showed on his thighs, the former tan line no longer able to be covered by his tights.

His toga might still fit, but everything else is gonna need to be resized for sure!
125332112.title: Perhaps He Does Deserve a Promotion

choices: Pit notices the changes after his last fruit and loves it! Eat more!
As Pit grows Pittoo starts experiencing the same growth before leaving
1253321123.content:
*GROWL* A primal noise emitted from Pit's stomach as he happily swam through the hot Springs. "Stupid hunger. Ruining hot spring time." Pit grumbled in annoyance as he turned aeound and began to swim towards the shore where his clothes lay. It took him a few minutes to return, his body enhanced slightly more as his angelic buns were shown off to the endless springs as he stood up and walked over.

"Ill leave my clothes there for now. No point in putting them back on when i'm just having a snack." Pit thought aloud as he wasn't entirely able to get over his love of talking.

Loooking over to a short silver leafed tree, drool seeped from his mouth in anticipation as he saw a group pf silver looking apples dangle before him practically begging to ne eaten. "These look delicious" Pit happily ran over, plucking the silver fruits one by one until he had made a mid sized pile of them to eat.

Holding the last one in his hands, Pit smiled "The Gods have those golden apples they adore sp much, so silver apple's must be just as good!" and with that he took a might bite of the fruit. The taste was fantastic! Sweetened to the right amount of perfection. Juice seeped from the bitten apple down his cheek, dripping onto the sand. Every bite made him crave more! Soon nothing remained of the first fruit save for its steme and core.

"Ah! That helped a little" Pit happily patted his toned tummy, looking over at the pile he made. "I still have a lot more to eat until I'm satisfied. When I get back I might even share some with Pittoo!" And with thwt he began to munch into his next fruit.

All the while he failed to noticed how his tights were getting tighter, covering less pf his growing body as visible bicep even Pit would notice started to develop. The fruits had the same effect as the hot springs only even stronger. And if a number are eaten simultaneously perhaps even their affects would be magnified!

Though even Pit noticed some changes as he paused eating his fifth fruit "My tights are weirdly tight around the front of my thighs...oh well I'll worry about that after finishing these lovely treats!"

====Meanwhile in Angel Land====
"Still nothing..." Palutena was wearing an odd set of antenna and standing on the roof of her home temple, trying to get some kind of signal. "Well this isn't working." Tossing the antenna away and landing with a *CRUNCH* as they collided with the ground, Palutena thought of her next move.

"Guess I better contact Pittoo and see if he can help. He'd also help me know Pit truly is okay."

She sent out her telepathy while moaning like a ghost "Pittoo... Pittoo... Pittoo~..."

"Stop with the moaning and tell me what you want." The serious black feathered angel replied in annoyance.

"Ah good! Pits still alive then." She sighed with relief.

Hearing that was enough to get Pittoo on alert "What trouble did you get him into now?"

"Not me. He found a map to Legendary Hot Springs and you know Pit when it comes to those." She chimed.

"Typical." The black haired angel sighed that his other half got himself into trouble over Hot Springs. "You want me to go find him don't you?"

"Bingo. Ill use my power to give you flight. Will it be alright with Viridi if you help me?"

"Who cares what that brat thinks. I need to go anyways, as she won't be happy when she learns what I did to her forces over her last penny reason for trying to exterminate Humanity." Pittoo sou ded coxky over whatever he did.

"Well since I haven't heard anything about this I will assume you nipped it in the bud before it became a problem. So lets get you pver here and ready to help!" Palutena activated her teleporting magic and sent him over to Angel Lamd, where the dark angel will be lesd to the same lamd as his other half.
1253321123.title: Fruit of the Gigantomarchy.

choices: Dark Pit is on his way! But Palutena is getting full view of his... issues...
Pit's continuing his meal, but does he want to explore more, or keep eating?
The fruits are cursed, and slowly Pit is growing more and more corrupted...
12533211231.content:
While Pittoo (DARK PIT!!) was being debriefed on the situation in Angel Land by Palutena, currently dressed in a labcoat with crazy glasses on as she pointed at a blackboard with a map that made no sense, Pit was busy finishing gobbling down his last little apple, licking every last bit of his fingers off. "Mmm, that hit the spot!!" He said, licking his lips now, before yawning somewhat.

"Eating always makes me tired..." He yawned out, giving a bit of a stretch as well, his spandex stretching out a bit more, eyes shut as they teared up. His growth was still fairly slow, despite his swim and the apples, but it was slowly growing more and more apparent. His height had gained several inches as well, his spandex now only covering to mid-thigh now, the paler flesh easily apparent, although it seemed to be gaining a nice tan together with the rest of him.

His wings gave a light flap as he finished his stretch, bending down, the spandex stretching tight around his butt, his sacred buns slowly growing firmer and rounder. He finally opened his eyes and looked down, wiggling his toes. He did think something was off though. 'Were they always that big?' He thought, as his eyes ran up his legs too, a minor twitch making his calf flex. 'When did that happen I wonder...' Pit thought, as he enjoyed maneuvering his legs to watch his muscles flexing.

His looks gradually moved up to his upper body, his blue eyes sparkling with amazement. "Whoa, this is awesome!" He said in joy, running a slightly larger hand over his arm and forearm, slowly feeling as he placed his hand on his bicep, lifting his arm up as he flexed, feeling as the muscle underneath grew larger and firmer, not anything overly impressive, but to someone who's spent most of his immortal life a thinly built angel, it was everything.

Pit looked around nervously, knowing he was breaking quite a few Angel Laws, but it's not like anyone was going to catch him, right? "I wonder... It wouldn't hurt to take a peak..." He muttered, grabbing one strap of his spandex as he pulled it down, gently pulling his wing out as well, before following the process with the other side.

He didn't pull it all the way down, stopping at his waist, at least trying to keep his modesty, as Pit looked down, and he was speechless. "Sweet Lady Palutena... I have abs... and pecs!" He gawked, as he ran his hand over his chest. He looked like he'd been doing sit-ups for a few months instead of just shoving whatever food Palutena left for him for healing down his throat, a very faint trace of a 6-pack present, able to feel the light bumps of it.

It was a little bit harder to observe them though, as he had to bend down a bit further than usual because of his pecs. Again, nothing too impressive, really only sticking out an inch or two. "I always wondered what these felt like..." He muttered, testing their firmness. Considered he'd always been flatter than Viridi in that regard...

He'd marveled at that for a while before feeling like he was going to get caught, although he didn't want to, wanting to continue looking at himself, but he had just knew he'd get caught. That is, he'd feel like that if this was some cheesily written story, "But that's just ridiculous!" He laughed as he put his spandex back on, giving his wings another flap, a few wings fluttering down, as he wondered if they looked bigger, but he had other things to worry about.

"I wonder what's causing this..." He wondered, getting in his usual thinking pose. He definitely wasn't this buff before he tried searching for the Legendary Hot Springs... "What would Lady Palutena do..." He thought. Last time he asked her something about something similar, she'd started talking about the Monoeyes and the Miks, something he really didn't want to get into again. Mainly because he couldn't read it, and the pictures were weird.

He ran through the check list of everything that could have been going on, and he really couldn't work anything out. "Hmmm, wait a minute," Pit muttered, an idea coming to him. "Lady Palutena said I'd only grow iff I ate healthy..." He looked at the apples, "If these are hot spring apples, nothing could be healthier than that!" He shouted, "I better eat more!" He yipped as he got to apple-picking, running around with more energy then before, somewhat ignoring some other needs he didn't quite notice yet, his spandex pulled quite tight around his front on the lower end, and like the rest of his body, still growing!

====Up above as well====

"Damn it you crazy goddess, where the heck did you learn to drive!" Dark Pit yelled, avoiding yet another floating rock as he tried to avoid dying yet again.

"Uh, I never actually got my license. The Divine Motor Department was always too slow. That's what we get for manning it with sloths!" Palutena said, currently dressed like a WWII-era fighter pilot as she steered Dark Pit on his way.

"WHAT?!" Pittoo yelled. "You better know the way at least! You flew Pit-stain this way! And I told you, it's DARK PIT!"

"..." Palutena didn't respond.

"You don't remember the way, do you..."

"..."

"This is why I'm a solo angel..." Pitto-Dark Pit muttered, face-palming and wondering why every deity had to be so insane.
12533211231.title: The Little Angel's Growing Up~

choices: Dark Pit arrives and Palutena loses sight of him. But he's far away from Pit!
Pit returns to swimming as Dark Pit falls into the water nearby.
He gorges on another kind of fruit.
125332112311.content:
Goddess Palutena had discarded her pilot uniform, having finally remembered what she did with the map. Two Centurions had taken it away to be locked up, but without Pit to be their brains they forgot where that was and had been circling her temple for hours mindlessly. "Note to self. Find a a way to marginally increase their intelligence." With map in hand she unraveled the parchment, it's holographic projection of the Galactic Sea laid before her. The path Pit had rushed through flooding back.

"Good news for you Pittoo! I found the map." Palutena sounded proud of herself despite making such a huge oversight.

"Finally. We wasted some time wandering this starry blue eyesore cause of you." Dark Pit grumbled, worried about Pit as they they had wasted more than half the time limit on nonsense.

Palutena waved her finger in the air as she heard those words. "Tsk tsk! Pittoo you need my power to fly after all."

"You're the one who asked me for help. Also it's Dark Pit!" He grumbled knowing the battle of names is eternal with this teasing Goddess.

"Now go through these rings and it will lead you to his location" Palutena intentionally ignored his rebuttal as the black feathered angel flew across the sea that connects the galaxy.

"Dang Gods ignoring an angel when it's convenient" Grumbled Pitt-er Dark Pit as he flew amongst the heavens, passing through the first ring and heading for the next. Palutena was increasing his speed as much as possible as she eyed something...odd. There was something off about Dark Pits body. His body was more curved?

"No that wasn't the right word." She thought as that'd describe herself far better. She could definitely see more skin exposed than normal peeking out from his tights. His rings and sandals were abnormally tight, pushing into...visible muscle Palutena definitely knew neither he nor Pit had. "Those toes stretching past the sandal are cute too." She mused to herself as she them wiggle a little. Now moving to check those nice lean thighs that were starting to be exposed.

As he passed the second ring Dark Pit had enough of the silent goddess. Her thoughts as clear as day. "Stop perving on me or I'll have the Goddess of Vengeance deliver retribution"

"Wow! Pit would never have noticed!" She had been taken offguard by his keen insight.
"Cause he is an idiot." Dark Pit grumbled.
"So do you know why I was observing you?"
"My clothes right? Yeah I noticed the changes already. It's annoying and most likely related to whatever that idiot's up to." He touched his chest, feeling his chest push out a little more. He smirked at the thought of flaunting a bigger physique a beefy chest in front of that brat of a goddess. "Maybe they'll even get big enough to make Palutena jealous..." He smirked as he passed the third ring.

"I heard that~" Palutena cooed to him. Amused by the absurd idea of Pittoo or Pit ever being that big.

"Don't care if you did. Now lets find that fool and give him a talking too." He flapped his wings harder as he headed for the fourth and final rings.

=====Legendary Hot Springs====
"Ahhh!" Pit had finished his second pile of apples, having plucked and snacked down on as many as possible. He was really excited by this land that offered him everything he desired "No matter how many I eat I still want more. A paradise of food and hot springs I'll never tire of~" He tossed his finished apple into the pile with the rest. The brown haired angel adjusted his tightening tights a little.

"Though maybe I should stop and relax for now. If I keep eating I might bust out of this" He felt his belly push out a little, the nice definition of his first abs coming in as he gave it a pat. The food he ate also expanded his belly a little. Yet it was not even close to as big as it should be from more than three dozen apples plucked from two silver leafed trees.

"Then again I'm sure there's more fruits for me partake in." He saw in the distance pineapples growing to his right, while the left grew bannanas.

"What to choose..."

125332221112.content:
Sora was in Yen Sids Mysterious Tower with Riku, having not set off on his journey just yet since he failed to become a Keyblade Master master in the Mastery Exams. The old wizard had left with his apprentic Mickey for the moment to find mystical tools for the battle against the Xehanorts.

Both teens were relaxing as they waited, Riku reading a book made by Yen Sid for tools that could turn things around. "Hey Riku?"

"Yeah?" The silver haired boy asked as he moved his eyes up to look at the relaxing Sora, who was tossing a small ball in the air to keep himself entertained.

"Do you really think we'll find anything that can make a difference?"

"Sure if someone actually helped me look." Riku knew Sora had gone through a couple books, but Sora isn't the brightest tool in the shed and likely missed something.

"It'd be easier if Donald and Goofy were here." Sora pouted as he still tosed the ball. "Okay maybe if Donald was." Goofy was pretty insightful, but he wasn't a mage for a reason. The brown haired boy accidentally tossed the small ball higher than normal as it ended up hitting the roof. "Dang it! The ball!" it began bouncing away and into a shelf, hitting a small vase next to a set of books and knocking them over.

A thunk resounded through the room as the books fell on the floor. The vase was thankfully safe as it slowly roll down upon the floor in a position that prevented it from shattering. "Whoops!" Swiftly Sora ushered forth to clean up the mess, picking up the vase and books, save for one that fell down as he picked them up and started to organize them back. The fallen book opened wide. Falling upon just the right page.

Riku who heard the commotion just smirked as he closed the book that had nothing of import. Standing up and going to pick the last book as Sora put away the rest, Riku began reading the open page. Blue eyes trailing across the page as he drank in the knowledge written down. "Hmm...seems you found something for us to use afterall."

"Really?" Sora had no idea what Riku meant till he turned around and saw Riku standing behind him. He moved next to Riku as his blue eyes shined as he started looking at what Riku was reading. Riku saw locations inscribed and long details Sora wouldn't be interested in. So best to keep it as simple as possible.

"The first is a Keyblade in Olympus Coliseum said to channel the power of the Olympians themselves." Riku mentioned the first, noticing a part of the page was missing.

"It'd be pretty cool to be as strong as Hercules! Maybe even stronger!" Sora was enthused with that choice. He tried to imagine flexing a muscle as big as Hercules on his skinny arm.

"The next is a legendary trident in the depths of Atlantica said to make a merman who can travel the very stars themselves like he's in the depths of the sea." This one showed a Trident very different from King Tritons weapon.

"Like Monstro?" Sora was amused by his merman form being as massive as Monstro.

Riku flipped the page to continue reading "The last is...a Paopu Fruit grown in the Realm of Darkness, able to bless resistance of the dark to its chosen."

"I do need to become reslient to the dark like you. So I won't fall under Xehanorts sway again." Sora admitted as he remembered their scheme to make him the 13th Vessel.

Heading over to Yen Sids desk, the silver haired blue eyed keyblade wielder grabbed a bookmark to mark the page, closing the book. "The exact locations are inscribed in as well. So what one do you prefer Sora?"

"Hmmm...." And Sora began to think.
125332221112.title: Three paths to Power

choices: Sora feels his inner light shining bright, as the fruit starts to strengthen him
Immunity from darkness... by becoming one with it... (Dark or demon)
Before he does, Sora wants to share with Riku
1253322211123.content:
"Hmmmm..."

Sora thought for quite a while, while Riku tapped his feet impatiently, waiting for Sora to say something, anything, but he just sat there thinking. "Sora, are you just going thinking all day?"

"I know, I know, I'm thinking!" Sora muttered. He and Riku had just finished trying to save Kingdom Hearts, but what put Sora at risk the most, especially with Xehanort, was his weakness to the darkness. Riku was immune because of his familiarity with darkness. But the Paopu was also the most dangerous to get, since it was in the Realm of Darkness itself. That's a lot of darkness... "I think we should go after the Paopu..."

Riku nodded. That was Sora's greatest weakness, so becoming immune to darkness' influence would be their greatest aid, and derail Xehanort's plan. "That's probably the best choice... but the most dangerous. We need to be ready." Riku said, as he started walking off.

"Hey, where are you going?" Sora said, as Riku threw a familiar black coat in his face.

"Meet me in just a bit outside, make sure to wear that." Riku said, carrying his own as well. "I'm going to gather some supplies. Try to gather some of your own." And with that, he walked out.

"Gather your own... blah." Sora mocked, as he headed off as well.

====x====

Some time later, Sora, wearing the Black Coat, was waiting outside Yen Sid's house, as Riku finally showed up. Sora huffing. "Took you long enough. Did you get lost, why do I need to wear this anyway?" He didn't like being dressed in it. Too much like Organization XIII for his tastes, looking at Riku dressed in his own.

"The Realm of Darkness takes a while to get to, unless we use this." Riku said, holding his hand out, and before Sora's eyes, a Portal of Darkness opened up. "These make for fast travel, but you need to wear these, otherwise you might be effected by the darkness." He explained.

"Oh." Sora muttered sheepishly. He had forgotten about that.

"Now," Riku continued, his keyblade appearing in his hand. "Let's go." Sora nodding, the Kingdom Key in his own hand as they both walked through, Sora shivering as they did. He hated the feeling of the darkness. Once they got through, the sickly purple swirls of the Realm in full view, Riku looked at the page he'd ripped out of the book, and pointed on one path, brimming with Heartless and the occasional Nobody. "There we go."

"Right." Sora said, as he gripped the Keyblade tighter, and with that, he and Riku went charging, taking down countless enemies as they carried on their hazardous search.

A horde of heartless, and a few scratches, healing spells or potions, and close calls later, they'd finally arrived at a beach, Sora recognizing it as the one they'd left not too long ago. "Can't believe we were that close to it..." Sora muttered, looking around for it. "Where is it..."

Riku looked as well, seeing a lone palm tree in the distance, like what he and Sora were used to on the Destiny Islands. "Over there!" He pointed, Sora smiling at that as they both ran over to it, running as fast as they could before anything could happen.

"That... was almost anticlimactic..." Sora muttered. "Normally we'd get at least some kind of boss before we finished." He noted before Riku punched him.

"Don't jynx it..." Riku chided, as he looked around, worried that something massive would come out. Once he was convinced it was safe, he looked up and saw a familiar shaped star-fruit, which he quickly climbed up and got, "Sora! Catch!" He called from up above, Sora looking up as he saw the fruit coming down.

"Whoa!" Sora muttered, struggling to catch it, the fruit bouncing around in his hands before he managed to get it, looking at the fruit, which was a much fainter color than the ones he was used to.

"Ooff!" Riku grunted as he plopped to the bottom, panting slightly. "What are you waiting for?" He said, as he looked at Sora who was looking at it, who looked at Riku, then back to the fruit, before leaning in to take a bite.
1253322211123.title: Into the Darkness We Descend

choices: The same way way the tree grew, Sora grows slowly in the bed (as tall as Riku)
No, his growth is more like a giant sequoia's
12533222111231.content:
"Are you sure you don't want part of it? I know you're resistant to darkness, but a little extra protection could be useful for you" Sora asked, undecided. He couldn't forget how easily his friend opened a Corridor of Darkness minutes ago... there was still darkness inside his heart, just a little and under control, but Sora felt it was unfair to be the only one to gain full immunity against darkness, leaving Riku to fight his own demons alone...

"I already told you I don't need it, and if I eat it, maybe I'll stop being able to open portals and we'll end up stuck here. Plus, I'm not the one who you should share a paoru fruit, my name isn't Kairi..."
"..."

His little joke didn't cheer Sora, who still didn't feel convinced... but he gave up and took the first bite of the citric star.

"How is it? Does it taste good?" Riku inquired him a little worried, but the other keyblade user was too busy chewing it to answer.

"MMMMMMM!!!" He had almost finished when he screamed alarmed with fully open eyes, like something had scared him. Sparks of colorful light appeared around the boy as his whole body became light as a feather and rose slowly from the ground.

"Are you flying? How can you do it outside Neverland??"

Another flash of light almost blinded Riku, making it clear what was happening was completely different to a mere reactivation of an old power...

Sora, now feet above the ground, shined like the sun. His friend grew worried.

"Sora! Talk to me!!"

The spiky haired boy couldn't reply... his mind was miles away, in the far past... Somehow, he was witnessing the memories of the paoru tree.

///Once upon a time , a lone seed fell to the realm of darkness, a land of nothingness where nothing can born or grow///

///The seed didn't give up, and sprouted in the sterile soil despite the lack of water and sun. It grew, resisting the toxic energy of the darkness. The heartless stepped on the tiny plant, but it managed to heal and came up again... and eventually grow into a beautiful tree by his tremendous will to live.///

///But nothing is eternal, and over the years the tree began to whitter.///

///He lived alone his whole life, so his final wish was to meet someone... someone as noble, brave and stubborn as him. He wanted a friend.///

///He spent his remained nutrients to grow a fruit, a gift for that longed friend, filled with immense light, his own lifeforce and whatever magic make him grow in that hell...///

///Because after growing in the world of the heartless he understood how important it was to forge a hero strong enough to stop them.////

The lights faded. The kid slowly descend to the ground near Riku. The trance broke and his eyes opened. The first thing he did when he waked up was running to the hill Riku got the star fruit, but the only thing he found was a whithered trunk surrounded by twigs.

Sora could not help but cry.

"She's dead... *sob*"
"It's just a plant, Sora."

It was, but still it took him minutes to stop crying.

"How do you feel?"
"I feel... stronger! Like I was supercharged or something." He made a few superjumps and noticed he got much higher than before. "I didn't expect an anti-darkness magic would make me physically stronger."
"I'm glad it worked."
"Thank you, Ms. Paopu Tree!" He bowed in front of the dead plant. Riku smiled at his overreaction.

All that jubilous vanished quickly when the ground started to shake and heavy steps and roars were heard nearby.

"Let's go!" Riku casted a portal to the realm of light. Sora jumped to it without the slightest doubt. His taller friend looked back one last time to the rest of the tree and said softly

"Thanks."

Then he crossed the corridor of Darkness and returned to Destiny Island before the heartless could catch them.

"Whoa, that was an adventure. I'm beat." Sora had been waiting for him lying on the sand.
"But you were so energetic just two minutes ago!"
"Yeah, I don't know why I'm so sleepy... *yawn* now..."

Riku took him to his home. Once in his room alone Sora took a look to his pocket. He still had a small piece of the Paopu, the transformation had hit him before he could finish it. He put it away in a drawer, just in case Riku changed his mind and wanted some protection.

Then he went to the bed, laid down and fell asleep almost instantly.

Sora slept sound asleep that night. His body slowly grew in mass while in slumber. He didn’t notice anything when he woke up and got dressed. He felt great! Sora then met Riku at the tree as usual.
“Hey Sora. Get enough sleep?” Riku asked while Sora was bent over to catch his breath.
“Yep!” As he stood up with confidence.
“Woah!”
“What is it?!”

Although their skills were roughly unchanged from before, Sora’s was noticeably better than the last time. Still lost though. Riku was still a little consern about the growth spurt. But maybe that just what it was, a growth spurt. Sora remembered the rest of the special Paopu fruit he saved.

1253322211123111.content:
The thought of the Paopu vanished when Riku suggested him a race to the cliff in the hidden side of the island.

They had never run a route that long, but they hadn't competed since Sora got his keyblade. They had grown a lot since then, specially stronger, and could take a marathon like it was a sprint.

Again, Riku felt quite impress by Sora performance, who eventually overtook him without showing a minimum exhaustion (even Riku was getting a bit tired after all the sparring and running).

The boy reached the finish line in record time, but his tremendous momentum didn't let him stop before falling by the cliff.

"Sora!!"
"AAAAAAAAAhhm fine!"

Sora had been punched by giant heartless, burned by gods and worse. A little fall of dozens of meters to the sea couldn't hurt him.

"Come! The water is at the ideal temperature!"

Riku jumped to the sea, making a huge splash. They swam and played for half an hour before returning to the land. Soaked, their wet clothes felt so heavy they removed most of them on the beach. It was strange to see the start of a 6-pack in the previously skinny body of Sora. It wasn't the only change: His noodle arms were getting as thick as Riku and his flat chest had gained volume.

Nothing extraordinary, but Riku found strange he hadn't notice these long-run changes until now "...and he can't have grown this much in just a day... can he?"
He had to stop looking at Sora's body after his friend noticed his inquisitive looks. "I don't want this situation to get weird."

Sora kept oblivious to his body changes, but not to his lowing body temperature after their plunge. "Brrr! I need a towel and dry clothes."

They hadn't any, as they hadn't planned the swimming training. They went to their homes, but since Sora had lost his home keys when he dived into the ocean, they both went to Riku's house. The parents of neither of them were in town, so the spiky haired boy was free to spent the night at Riku's.

Riku lent him one of his new pijamas, which on him looked a bit tighter than he expected, and both friends relaxed in front of the TV, sitting on the floor.

Side by side so closely, his friend got distracted again with the other's proportion, this time his feet.
Sora had always stood out due to his big feet, several sizes longer than Riku's (which were quite big even for adults). That was the reason he had to wear those ridiculous yellow clown shoes instead of regular ones... but today the difference between them seemed more exaggerated than ever.

Before, the tips of Riku's toes were aligned with the base of Sora's toes... but now, they barely reached the "ball of his foot".

"Can his usual shoes... or any shoes... capable of fitting those beasts?" RIku thought.

Sora, growing sleepy, stretched his back and limbs. For a moment, his feet moved a bit further than Riku's although Sora's hadn't changed his position.

"I think I'm going to bed. Good night, Riku."
1253322211123111.title: Goofing off without Goofie

choices: They find Yensid in the tower
12533222111231111.content:
In his dreams, Riku relived an old memory.

2 years ago, a bit before KH1, in the Destiny Island, Riku overheard a causal conversation between Selphie and Kairi.

"Haven't Sora's feet turned totally huge in the last years? Despite being pretty short, he wears shoes that dwarfs my father's."
"Maybe his feet grow first and later the rest of his body catch up with it. He could end up taller than Riku."
"Maybe..." A strange smile appeared in the FF8 girl "you know, my big sis said the men with big feet always have a big penis. Have you seen Sora's? By chance?"
"Of course I haven't!" Kairi shouted, embarrassed "He's just my friend!"
"Haha, shame, I would like to know."

Riku moved away from the pair to avoid being detected and forced to answer the Selfie's lewd question. After spending so much time together, swimming, sometimes sleeping in the same room he had the chance to see him nude. And Selfie was right, Sora's was huge down there, almost three times Riku's. His ridiculously baggy knee-long Bell Bottoms helped hiding it.

The dream turned bizarre when Riku met Sora. Riku grabbed an apple and bit it, but when he blinked the apple turned into a bitten Paopu fruit hold by Sora.

"Our destinies are intertwined, Riku." KH1 Sora turned into KH2.
"I'll protect you forever, Sora."

With his eyes closed, Riku moved his lips closer to the shorter teen... but when he opened his eyes saw he had missed and reached his collar bone. Sora had magically become a head taller.

"Can you protect me, Riku?" The spiky haired boy asked with a strangely sad look.
"I can. I'll be on your side."

Reacting to his words, the boy grew taller and thicker, a muscular build way beyond Riku's formed in his body as he broke the 3 meter tall (10') barrier, his abs in front of the other's face.

"But you can't"
"Wait, Sora..." But Sora added over 30cm (1') more in height, now his giant crotch was at Riku's eye level. The ripped clothes releaed the beast, a long, fat, tanned soft cock hanging close to his knee.

The earth trembled as the muscular giant inched upwards. Instintively, as his more-than-a-friend's face got out his reach, Riku hugged the giant penis in front of him to regain stability.

As Sora's legs lengthened a lot suddenly, soon Riku was hanging in the air, meters from the ground, gripping a phallus turning thicker with each second, and harder to kept hold of...

"Sora! Don't let me behind!"

But the 10m (33ft) boy didn't seem to hear his screams. "Mmm..." All he said was a soft moan escaping his lips. Soon Riku found out why. It wasn't the growth, despite gaining more and more meters...

His hugging the giant 's penis was more arousing he estimated and went hard quick. Soon it was pointing upwards, and was so long it touched the lower part of his abs. Very opportune for Riku, who was desperate for reach Sora's face, but the task was bcoming increasingly harder with the now 18m/60ft tall Sora. He tried to climb his hill-like pecs, but they were slippery and almost fell.

"Sora!!"
"This island is too small. Mmmmm..." Sora grew 20ft more, his pecs thickened a lot more, looking bigger than a bodybuilder's, and almost impossible to pass by by Riku.

But he didn't give up.

"Soon, the world will be too..." Another shiver of growth. He was as big as an Olympic titan. His humongous feet ran from end to end of the island.

"Sora, I'm here!" Riku finally reached Sora's collar bone, close enough to his face to be heard.
"You can't protect me from the darkness, Riku."

Everything went dark.

Riku awakened in his bed, with his PJs wet with the sweat from the nightmare, and his undies wet with the results of the erotic aspect of the dream.

"What fucked up dream..."

Riku looked down on the left side of his bed. Sora was still sleeping on a futon next to him.

"How could he grow so big so fast? It's weird..." He thought as he stared as the shape his pecs printed on his tshirt, and at his newfound abs that the PJs wasn't long enough to cover.

And then it was his morning wood, peeking from his pants. It wasn't as long as in his dream, but it was surrealisticly big, which his head resting on the upper row of abs.

"How long is that, a foot? More? Wait a sec..."

It was longer than it looked... because Sora's body was longer too, as his more stretched clothes hinted, with some rips that wasn't there when they went to bed.

"Sora, wake up! Get up now!"

Sleepy, the boy obeyed and stood up slowly... and then they both found out he had grew another foot (30cm) overnight.
Riku's head, 180cm/6', was aligned with the base of his neck.

"Cool."
"Cool?? People don't grow 30cm in one night, and even less after growing 20cm the night before! Sora, this is serious, something is happening to you!"
"Ok, I understand these growth spurts could be problematic it continues." The boy said rubbing his head, that moments ago had softly hit the overhead light.
"Dangerous. It must be the Paopu from the realm of darkness you ate. We must see Master Yensid as soon as possible!"
"Okay... ouch!"

Sora wasn't used to being a 7 footer... His head hit the doorframe as he left.

12533222111233.content:
"Are you sure you don't want part of it? I know you're resistant to darkness, but a little extra protection could be useful for you" Sora asked, undecided. He couldn't forget how easily his friend opened a Corridor of Darkness minutes ago... there was still darkness inside his heart, just a little and under control, but Sora felt it was unfair to be the only one to gain full immunity against darkness, leaving Riku to fight his own demons alone...

"I already told you I don't need it... Plus, I'm not the one who you should share a paopu fruit, my name isn't Kairi..."
"..."

His little joke didn't cheer Sora, who still didn't feel convinced...

"No." He finally made up his mind. "Not without you."
"Sora, the goal of this travel was to prevent Xehanort of using you as a vessel! I don't need it to reject Ansem, I can do it alone since Chain of Memories."

(Note: Barely)

"Yes, but this fruit can help you... make you free from your regrets."

Riku didn't understand the meaning of that.

"In KH1 you made a mistake..."
"I accepted to be Maleficent's apprentice, tried to humiliate you, became Ansem's vessel. I fell into the darkness. That's much more than a mistake."

"See! That's what I wanted to say. You messed it up ONCE, and you're being feeling remorse since. No matter how much you try to make up for it, you're always thinking you're the worst, that you might get corrupt again at any moment!"
"That's not exactly..."
"The hell it isn't! I know you, I know what you feels. You protected me while I was sleeping in KH CoM... in 358/2 you tried to fix me bringing me Roxas, almost giving up to soul to Ansem... during KH2 you kept protecting me from the shadows despite having much bigger concerns keeping Ansem at bay... in KH DDD you saved me so many times...

The kid stopped for a moment. He needed a break after breaking the 4th wall so many times...

"The point is, you can't stop feeling guilty, feeling Ansem might take you the first time you're less than the perfect hero."
"Those principles stopping Xehanort from possessing me."
"But now we have a better alternative. Take part of this, and you'll never worry about Ansem anymore."
"I don't know. If you eat less than the whole thing it will be less effective..."
"Take half of it, or I won't eat any."
"You're so balky... I'll take a fourth."
"No, half of it!"
"...third?"
"Riku..."

After arguing for minutes they came to terms. They divided the paopu and eat it fast.

Seconds went by before it began to affect them.

They felt a warm sensation in their insides as their bodies began to float in the air. Sparks of magic lighted up the surroundings while they floated between them.

There was no pain, just a sensation they couldn't describe.

The fruit filled them up with so much light it leaked by the pores of their skins, giving them a shining aura.

They hugged, as that warm, undefined feeling grew stronger and their eyes wetter for no reason.
For a minute, the Realm of Darkness had a sun.

As it began, it ended. The two heroes tried to recover from the experience...

But they couldn't relax: the ground started to shake and heavy steps and roars were heard nearby.

"Let's go!" Riku said as he prepared to open a portal, but nothing happened. The light had purged that dark power from his body. "Crap"
12533222111233.title: Deja Vu chapter?

choices: The two grow larger with every level up as their level cap disappears!

125332221112332.content:
Hearing his friend sound worried, Sora looked on the bright side "Well no worries! We can just find Door to Darkness and exit that way." Sora didn't let this bother him much.
"Doors closed remember? You and Mickey sealed it shut."
"Well last time we got stuck on the shore a portal opened for us."
"So you want to bet on the chance a portal will open even if we wait decades?"
"I got it! We can contact our Dream Eaters and ask them to tell the others!"

Riku was surprised by that one. "That one's pretty good. Surprised you thought of it."

Putting his arms behind his head, Sora smiled "Thanks. I knew I could come up with an idea with you here to question them."

Smirking, the silver eyed boy wondered what to do about contact with the Spirits. "Well I best stand guard while you dream. That way you are kept safe-" Both boys eyes gained a glint of determination. The warm light that now flowed within sensed danger was coming and rushing fast to their destination. Keyblades flashed in brilliant light into their grips as Sora brought out Kingdom Key and Riku Way to Dawn. Prepped for battle,

"Huh it's my normal keyblade!" Sora said in surprise.
"Mines my usual too."

Perplexed they had no time to wait as easily a hundred pureblood Shadows slide across the ground in their intangible state. Slowly rising up to gain proper form to attack the two keyblade threats overflowing with light.

"It's just shadows." Sora let out a soothing laugh. "They'll be easy to finish. Thundaga!" He swung his keyblade as he chanted the spells name. But righteous lightning did not descend as the Shadows slowly moved closer. "Huh?"

"Having trouble?" Riku was ready to strike, but Sora wanted to show off after eating the fruit.

"Weird." Sora tapped the tip of the keyblade with his free hand a few times. "Well if that doesn't work then Blizzaga!" No chilling ice crystals.
"Firaga!" No burst of flame charged forth.
"Fine. If magic doesn't work then Salvation!" There was no spinning or columns of light to purify the dark.
"Hey Riku...did that Paopu reset all my power?"

"Yup. I didn't expect that either." He sighed, knowing the outcome would be the same if he tried. Looks like this Paopu was more trouble than its worth. Even if I regain my power I don't have any contol of darkness anymore. My Dark Firaga and other skills powered by the dark may either be gone for good or I lost it for now Setting his thoughts aside, Riku knew what he had to do. "If our powers are gone we just have to get them back the old fashioned way."

The two smIrked. "Yeah!" Soras lost his abilities twice before. Getting them back again is simple. "Whoever beats the most has to buy the other ice cream!" Sora rushed off after making that bet, hacking away with ease into the swarm.

Reacting to Sora charging forth bg jumping over and hacking down two of the tiny yellow eye mooks, Riku responded "You're on Sora!"

The two got a rush of adrenaline that seemed to get stronger with each passing second. The new light inside gIving them a rush to blindly fIght as the two dodge and swipe at the horde. Shadows vanishing by the dozen in dark puffs of smoke. But every three striked down by their divinely blessed might was negligible to the the ten that spawned as reinforcements.

125332223.title: Crossover

1253322231.content:
A heartless government plans to create an army of giant supersoldiers, luring teenagers and young adults into their installations disguised under the façade of a prestigious academy focused on sports, and administering growth drugs and experiments secretly without their knowledge nor permission.

Will they discover the truth and escape before becoming mindcontroled giant freaks?

Characters of any manga, comic or tv are allowed, even from unrealistic shows, as long as they were written as well integrated into this crossover universe.
Slow growth is encouraged for this story.
1253322231.title: An evil macro experiment

12533222311.content:
10 years ago, a general who had read too many comic-books had the idea of making their own super-soldiers. His proposal was received with moderate interest from his superiors and the Ministry of Defense.

The next years some experiments were made with volunteer soldiers, with limited success and many failures, most of the time implying death.
But due to the rising international tensions and armed warfare over the world, the potential of the idea, an army of super-strong and bulletproof soldiers, was enough to ensure its funding, which only increased over the years.

5 years ago, with dumber politicians in power, someone decided this inhumane project (which had accumulated a thousand demises, only a dozen of men turned into just a Peak human status, and a hundred of unaffected subjects) could help their Olympic teams to break their bad streak.

For some people, 5 minutes of international fame was more important than human lives. And there was a lot of money in the sports world to be bribed into their pockets… and so, another priority was added to Titanomachy.

3 years ago, the project, under the direction of a new but talented scientist called Richards Fox, made an important breakthrough: He identified several keys for the Titanomachy’s success or lack of it.

-Age: Young subjects in development had bodies more malleable and responded much better to the treatment. Male in their early twenties or late teen were the optimum, and anyone over 30s would get little to none improvements and higher risk of death.

-Genetics: There was several gene linked to a greater or lower response to their experiments.

-Environmental factors: Constant and extreme stress, like most soldiers experimented in war, or a really aggressive personality could be very detrimental for the experiment. A more peaceful environment caused better results, sport level exercise seemed to improve it a little further…


These ruled out almost all the army for one reason or another, and the ones in charge were considering shutting the project down when Dr Richard gave them a perverse alternative:

“We can’t turn soldiers into supersoldiers, but we still can turn civilians into supermen and then into our desired supersoldiers.”


First, they had to gather genetic profiles from all the population and select the most promising candidates (they could be easily thousands, if they cherry-picked the ones with more genetic potential, if not, millions). After than, they would have to invite them to their facilities, a false highschool and college with dormitory, under the promise of paid education and/or top-notch training in whatever sports they were into… keep them there under their surveillance, subjected them to their growth treatments and subtly brainwashing, and one or two years the first battalion of titans would be formed and ready for deploy.

“What if some of them found out the plan… or their own changes… and tries to escape?” A general asked.
“I have several ideas so they would spend months growing without them noticing… but even if that happen, our security would caught them before they escape and put them in our underground lab under the academy. There will be no reason to be subtle there, so we’ll subject our prisoners to our most extreme growth treatments. I trusts I could get the best results that were, albeit with some causalities.”


Everything went in motion: Thanks to their growing funds, the Atlas Academy were completed in just a year and advertising campaigns made a name for itself.

Soon, any youngster into sports and modest students who couldn’t pay their college started to long for getting one of their full-paid scholarships. Even semi-pro sportsmen wouldn’t reject an opportunity of improving their skills there.

As a part of the promotion campaign, the academy performed the first undercover, pilot experiments over a few candidates.

Those guys, who were merely average rookies when they entered, got graduated (released) as superfit 200cm tall (6’7”) athletes that triumph in that year tournaments.

That only increased their considerable fame. The real experiments, with all their experiments, would start the next year, when they received thousands of applications.

They could have just limited to choose those willing candidates, but Richard was overambitious and used the genetic database to find the best possible subjects in the whole country, including those who wasn’t interested in the Atlas Academy or sports, and sent them admission letters to convince them to join.

Then, the real fun would start.

====================

Although Dr. Fox was the leader of the project, once the Academy was build his superiors forced him to share the decision-making power with other two “teachers”, who can make their own experiments under a third of the students, besides the common treatments shared by all.

Richard Fox took that like a defiance, a way to prove he was better than any other by getting the biggest giants. The truth is that he was an arrogant bastard who only cared about recognition, so he tried to make the life impossible to the other “teachers”. The ones who had worked with him agreed he was too obsessed with The Project, to the point his motivations seemed almost… kinky. He got the biggest and tallest candidates.

He decided to name his group of students as “Red giant”, as a dying sun.

The other board member was Dr. Thomas Tame, a silent guy, younger (in his 20s), and smaller and thinner than most (5’6”). He was serious and hard-worker, and that’s how he gained his position.
Most of his students were average size or shorter than average (a fact Fox loved using to mock him) but he didn’t mind as long as they had a considerable genetic potential to grow giant.

He formed a group of students known as “Hidden sword”.

The third member of the board was a goth-looking man named Corvus. Fox and Tame didn’t know who he had ended up there, as he didn’t look like a scientist at all… but the ones in power knew Corvus very well. He was a man capable of getting anything done by the right price, by using mysterious ways. Some people said he was a mage. They weren’t completely wrong.
The Titanomachy Project had caught his interest and asked to lead it. The one who objected disappeared.

His was the “House of darkness”.

The Atlas Academy opened his doors, for real this time… and nothing will be the same.
