125332223321.content:
An ancient experiment of mankind, sealed away in a golden conduit shaped pod, fell from Elysium to the land below as the Conduit ravaged the world and eliminated mankind off the now desolate rock. It had fallen with a massive impact, miraculously survived the fall. It rested in the same spot for over millions of ages before it would be enveloped in the Cloud Sea brought forth by of the Architect. Forgotten, fallen, and lost in the sea. Nestled away for an eternity in the land of Alrest eithout ever changing

After an eternity in silence a hook perced the ground next to it. A Salvager dressed in blue feet landed upon the ground right next to it. Through his helmet the figure observed the item before him. Adding the inglatable device to it, it soon rose off the ground as it floated through thd water like cloud. The Salvager gripped it tight as it floated to the depth probe. Attaching it to the probe, the Salverger moved up to press the button and bring himself and the treasure up to the surface.

Soon the Salvager and his latest treasure breached the surface of clouds, light of the sun basking both as the Titan Azurda stands proud. With the object placed gently on the white and green giants body, he jumped dwon off the probe. Getting upon his gramps, the salvager known as Rex pulled off his helmet. The white giant turned his head to speak "Did you get a good catch Rex?

Rexs golden eyes reflected the suns light as he looked up at Azurda. "I think so! Both the probe and ping worked better than usual. We might be able to make use of them a tad longer." Rex grabbed a tool and worked to forcing open the sealed lid. With a bit of force it soon popped off, falling with a thud as its contents gushed out and over Rex.

"What the-!" The salvager boy was surprised as it engulfed him and knocked him down. The slime like substance was blue and heavier than it appeared as he was sent under it. The boy struggling to get out of the slime due to its weight.

"You all right Rex?" Seeing a hand reach up and swipe away some of the strange slime from his mouth to make an "Mf pfay" as he ingests some of it by mistake. Seeing him struggle with something that look relatively harmless "That took me by surprise."

Rex began to stand up as the slime stuff lay across the ground. A look of annoyance as his body and clothes were drenched in it. "I can't sell this stuff to Argentum! I don't even know what it is. Much less getting it out of me and my clothes" The brown haired boy was frustrated by this failure.

Azurda sought to cheer Rex up" The container looks in decent shape. You could scrap it for a few bucks in its place." Rex was trying to rub the stuff out of his skin, but it was now refusing to move.

"Yeah but what should I do with this stuff now?" He was still rubbing it at his clothes and skin, none still coming off. "Eat it? I mean the little I swallowed actually tasted okay. Kinda bland to be honest."

"I'd advise against that. Eating a little might already have some unknown affects on you. I'd be sad if you couldn't see your dream of visiting Elysium and solving the land problem as we Titans die never got off the ground." Azurda assured the boy he helped raise.

"Well then better clean up whats on the ground since the stuff on me made my skin blue and won't come off." Rex turned to see the slime was gone, and his gramps had been so concerned with him Azurda failed fo notice it. "Well if it's gone it probably it ain't a problem for us. Now I best get this out so we can go to Argentum for a meal." Azurda turned his head forward as he started to move for the Trade Guild.

"Ah! What a wonderful day to explore the ship!" The cheerful blonde knight spoke as he looked out towards the endless sky as the Grandcypher sailed across the Phantagrande skydom. He was waring his normal attire rather than his knight uniform. A plain white shirt that showcased his fit frame. "Man Percy you really do love to complain when people are happy!" The gray eyed knight chirped as he turned to see Rackam was steering the ship.

Vane had gone to the side of the deck where the door to Grans cabin was, happily giving a big knock to the captains cabin door. "Yo captain!" Here for whatever gift you want to give me!" Vane then heard quick movement as the brown haired, brown eyed captain answered.

"Ah good you're here Vane. I've got the perfect thing for you!" Gran had in his hands a necklace with an emblem of a Shield.

Smiling as he took the necklace in his hand, Vane put it on as he spoke "Thanks captain! Not often I get free gifts!"

"That's not all." Gran crossed his arms before Vane could go show it to Perceval. "This has a special power meant to make your Soul Eruption even stronger and let you shield us with Reflect like you used too. At least if the old lady I bought it from is right." He left out he had to hold it on himself for the next three days for it to work, since he let superstition guide his actions. But against powwr Primal Beasts like Ifrit or Colossus and Twin Elements such strength is needed to quell the flames.

"Really!? Man so I can get even better at fighting and beating monsters!" Vane was enthused with that. That meant he could better help train the new recruits like Arthur and Mordrded. He moved over and gave his captain a hug "When we reach the next island lets eat together! My treat!" Vane didn't realize he had essentially asked Gran om a date before leaving.

He really wanted to practice with his skills as he prepared to go to his quarters to grab his spear. The supernatural charm of the necklace would show itself soon enough as it made him into the ultimate defensive warrior, and with it the strongest offensive fighter.

“What’s wrong Nya-te?” Jibanyan asked Nate who was sulking in bed.

“Such as the burden of one who bares a Yokai Watch. They must help settle the problems caused by the Yokai, or be effected by them.” Whisper explained. “The only difference is you’re the only one who’s aware of them since you have the watch.” Nate’s eyes lit up as he jumped out of bed.
“You’re the only one who..?”
“No! Be effected by them! I can call a Yokai to help ease the burden of this physical work!” Whisper dreading the thought tried to persuade Nate not to but he already called one.
“Darumacho!” Nate called out with the watch.
“Darumacho!” Nate remembered when Darumacho showed up, he made all of his male classmates, and teacher, buff and strong.

“Darumacho you ready to train?”
“Actually.. Could you just make me stronger without making me train like last time?”
“But you can’t without..” He was cut off.

“I suppose I can do that.” Nate stared at Darumacho intensity with an unamused face. “Okay, okay. I’ll do it. It won’t happen until you wake up tomorrow though.” Nate jumped with joy. Jibanyan was excited to see what would happen while Whisper unwillingly went along with it.
“At least Nate wouldn’t have to worry about clothes as the Yokai’s power made it so the clothes automatically fit and that everyone will think it’s normal” was the only positive thing Whisper could think of right now.

When Nate woke up in the morning, he noticed that he...

1253322233323112.content:
During the night the Inspirit power of Machismo flowed through Nate. The gold aura lovingly wrapping around him to make him stronger beyond normal. All due to his previous training with Darumacho to get big. His small body began to thicken and pump up with power, his pajama pants filling out as the growing clothes tightened upon growing calves. His body stretched upwards as his shirt pushed out thanks to his growing pecs, abs coming into being on his formerly flat stomach. Biceps and Triceps bulging with each breath he took. Pumping up bigger with each one. His neck thickened as his neck muscles lovingly grew. His feet peeked out from beneath the blamket, Big powerful feet and enlarging toes on display as he moved his legs ever so slightly to miss the sleeping Jibanyan nestled comfortably at the end of his bed even as they pushed onwards and off the bed itself.

While his current clothes were expanding just fine, the Yokai Watch itself on the other hand was not so lucky. The small device was struggling against the thick muscle of the growing boys wrist. The power within Nates arm was threatening to break it with the simplest of movements as he pumped up taller and wider. The brown haired boy having a pleasant dream all the while, showing off herculean feats to his friends as he ripped homes out of the ground with his bare hands. The very ground ruptured as his power tore into the cement and earth.

"Hehehe...I hope you guys like this!" Nate cockily proclaimed as he gripped it with one hand. Flexing a bicep with his free one before tossing the house into the sky, the home disappearing into the horizon. Eddie, Bear, and Katie giving a resounding "Awesome!" as they cheer him on. Dream Nate's ego growing bigger than even his new growing size, while his new size finally tapped out at 6'5 (192 cm). The boy snoring in joy as they began toworship his muscles in his tight clothes.

As dawn approached and the light of dawn shone through the window drapes and the ceiling window. Whisper woke from his slumber. "Ah what a lovely day to be a butler~" The ghost Yokai mused as he stretched his ghostly limbs. He looked at the bed with his eyes closed as he slowly opened them "Rise and shine master Nate-" He stared at the beefy giant still snoring soundly, Jibanyan nestled safely between thighs that were any bigger could crush the cat Yokai like its nothing. "Ah silly me~ I'm clearly still sleeping. There's no way he's become so huge..." As he flew next to Nate's face.

"No matter waking up the dream version of him will be a piece of cake!" He then began to poke Nate's face, Nate's face grimacing in annoyance. "Ah! Good morning Na-" and with that a huge fist collided with him and sent Whisper into wall.
"Let me sleep a few *Aaah!* more minutes" The growing Nate was drained from his bodies transformation.
Whisper, now crushed into the wall barely worded his reply "Clearthly noth sweepin' afer fall" crumpling down on top of Nates pecs.

It would be another hour before Nate or Jibanyan wake up. The feline stretching as Nate slowly sat up, rubbing his eyes. "*Ah* Morning." The sleepy giant spoke as crumpled Whisper fell from his pecs and onto his calf. As his eyes opened Nathan Adams took in the sight of his bod. Followed by Jibanyan's shocked face.

"Im huge!"
"You're huge!"

125332223332333113.content:
It was the first week following Makoto becoming the new Hopes Peak Academies headmaster. Kirigiri had revealed herself to be alive after they had settle in, the new school to bring hope to a world that suffered under the madness of Junko and her Ultimate Despairs. All of whom were now dead, cured of their brainwashing, or launched themselves into space.

Makoto was in his office as night set in, finishing signing files for when the next generation would attend the academy. Kirigiri and Asahina were attending to other Academy matters as he dealt with this particular need. The light that shone from outside dissipating as the sun descended on the horizon, leaving only the light of the office. "I've got quite a bit to still finish. Gotta persevere!" Makoto convinced himself as he moved from his finished stack of papers to the next. A process that would go on for four more hours.

"*Yaaaaawwwnn*" The sound rumbled from Makoto's mouth as he finished his twentieth stack of papers. "Only thirty more to go."

*Ding* The sound of his phone receiving a message helped keep Makoto awake as he looked down on it.
You can rest for now Makoto. I've finished more than half of my work with Asahina's aid. Hopefully we'll see you tomorrow.
Makoto smiled as he entered his password to reply back. Thanks Kirigiri. I'll see you soon.

With her consent Makoto stetched his arms and began to move the current finished stack over so he could snooze at his desk. The peaceful embrace of slumber falling over him. What he as a human was unable to see was a ghostly .woman. She was dressed in an elegant peplos, bearing a Cornucopia overflowing with fruits in one hand, and wore a mask that cover the top half of her face. Her body glowing a pale white as she touched the dreaming Makoto's head. Her fingers slipping into his head, connecting their consciousness together.

"Hmm? Where am I?" The dreaming Ultimate Hope spoke aloud as his initial dream of all his classmates alive and happy vanished for a white void of emptiness.

"My first champion, Makoto Naegi." A soothung female voice reverberated across the white realm.
"Hello?" Makoto called out, unable to see the person calling him.
"I am Elpis. Goddess of Hope. Another ancient empires name for me was Spes. To the tribes who worshipped a single God I was Ramiel the Angel of Hope."
"The Goddess of Hope? There's someone like that?"
"Indeed there is my little mortal. I have been locked away within Pandora's Box since time immemorial, but the actions of Junko and her despair released me from the box, destroying both my prison and the ruins it was stored in during their rampage across the world."
"I-this it's a lot to take in. I must be dreaming something odd."
"This is no dream my champion. You know little of the mythologies of which I belong after all."
"True. But I could be making this up."
"Heh" A gentle giggle emerged from her. "Things don't need to be complicated my mighty champion. I have come to warn you of impending disaster".
"What is supposed to happen? If the Goddess of Hope is truly here then it must be related to despair."

"Indeed it is." With those words a miniature form of the world came into being before Makoto Small enough that he could hold it with both hands and crush it like a ball. "Soon despair will overrun the world. Junko and her despairs were merely the prelude to the real show." Slowly the miniscule earth began to erupt as a massive hole pierced both sides of the world, soon followed by an eruption across the surface of the planet as a white liquid erupted forth until the planet was nothing but dirt, white goo, and magma quickly hardening from the extreme temperatures of space.

Fear came over Makoto's face as he saw this happened. "What must we do to stop this?" Determination began to shine within in his eyes as he readied himself to take whatever danger thqt caused this on. Hope will guide their way!

"Merely accept become a true Avatar of Hope and the power that comes with it." a ghostly hand appeared before the brown haired man's eyes, welcoming one of his own.

"I will!" Makoto held the hand, instantly getting embarrassed as she began to lock fingers with his hands.

"Then become Hope Incarnate and shake the very foundations of the world!" The formerly soft voice gained a sinister tone as power began to erupt forth to fill Makoto's mind.

"Ahhhh!" Makoto yelled as his mind went blank. Intense overwhelming feeling of intoxication enveloped him as boh his mental self and physical body glowed a white blue. Slowly the aura melted away as Elpis finished the transfer. Leaving both his physical and kind in a deep pleasurable sleep that stained the front of his pants.

Her hand left Makoto Naegi's head as a smirk crossed her face. "Heh heh heh. One down. Now to transfer the other half of my power to Hajime Hinata. The world will soon realize why Hope was sealed away in the depths of Pandora's Box." The ghostly masked Elpis walked through the wall to leave, allowing Makoto's body to transform.

Makoto Naegi would undergo the change of his body for the next twelve hours as he became the disaster that would threaten the world.

1321.content:
It was another tequila sunrise day as the Tennyson family was making their way through a tour of a medical facility in California. For Gwen, it had been a fascinating tour and a welcome break from constant alien fighting, for Ben it was one of the most boring things he had ever done. He stared blankly at the tour guide, not taking in a word she was saying about X-rays and surgery. Finally he groaned out loud and said, "Man! When is this thing going to end?"

Gwen stomped on his foot and said, "Shh! Stop acting like a kid!"

Ben grabbed his injured foot, jumping up and down on the spot for awhile before muttering, "But I am just a kid! And so are you!"

Gwen just ignored him, crossing her arms and focusing on the tour. Ben made a face at her back then grudgingly continued following at a slight distance. Just as the tour group was turning a corner, they passed by a window looking into a laboratory. Ben glanced inside and was shocked to see what appeared to be some kind of ray gun. He pressed his hands against the glass, leaning in close. Two scientists were inside walking around the machine, pressing buttons, writing notes on clipboards, and looking like they were preparing it for something. Ben turned to ask the tour guide what was going on in there, but saw the group had already disappeared down another hallway. He was about to run after them when he remembered how unbelievably boring the tour was. At least with this machine there was a chance that something exciting might happen. So Ben stayed put and kept watching. A few minutes later, the scientists both ripped something off of their clipboards and exited to another room. Ben looked around and made sure no one was nearby before swiftly opening the door to the laboratory and slipping inside. He walked up to the ray and looked it over, amazement in his face. What use could this thing possibly have? Was it some kind of alien technology? No...if that were the case, it would look a lot weirder and there would be tighter security. But then what did it do?

"Only one way to find out!" Ben said, walking over to the control panel. Even though the console was covered in buttons, switches, and dials, Ben knew exactly which one to press. He searched out the biggest one and pressed it. Instantly a mechanical hum filled the room. A gauge on the machine showed a bar that was rising from red, to yellow, and finally to green. The machine swiveled around, searching for organic life, and focused on Ben. Ben froze for a second, which proved a second too long, and was zapped by a beam of green energy. Ben didn't feel like he was getting electrocuted or that he was getting hurt in any way. In fact, the feeling was rather pleasant. He felt his muscles stretching and refiguring themselves, his bones stretching, his clothes tightening slightly. When the ray finished firing Ben turned to look at himself in the mirror and was surprised by what he saw. He wasn't freakishly huge, but his muscles were a bit more defined. His biceps pushed against his tight sleeves, his pecs were much more visible, his flat stomach and the faintest hint of a six pack and his legs, though the change was not easily seen through his pants and he wasn't about to take those off, were thicker. Ben wiggled his toes feeling his socks stretched over his larger feet, pressing against the sides of his shoes. He had grown at least half a foot taller as well. Noise from the other room brought Ben back to his senses. Letting his shirt fall back over his bigger body, he ran as fast as he could from the room. Little did he know, the machine was an experimental medical machine that, in theory, was going to be used to increase muscle in those with muscular dystrophy and other such diseases as well as increase bone size and mass for those born with height deficencies. Ben had been blasted by the highest setting on the machine, and with it still being in the testing stages, there was no telling how large he would eventually grow.

13212.content:
As Ben began walking back towards the tour group a strange burning feeling came over him. He closed his eyes as he became ready for any pain about to come his way. None did though and as he opened his eyes he was stunned by what he saw. His biceps were bulging as they filled with power. The growth had not stopped there. Ben's pecs had also continued their transformation toward solid shelves of muscle. His abs had become a well defined six pack as the growth continued. Ben's thighs grew as they changed to powerful thighs that a bodybuilder would be envious of. His calves became pillars of powerful muscle. His pants had become extremely revealing shorts as the material ripped. Last but not least the growth reached his feet. In seconds Ben's sneakers shot from his feet as they (his feet) tripled in size. His socks became shreds of cloth on the ground near by. As the growth ended his shirt shredded from Ben's breaking free now hung loosely along his well muscled shoulders. When the growth ended Ben looked toward the floor beneath him. The floor seemed farther away and that could only mean one thing. Not only had he gotten enormous muscles but he had grown taller as well. Looking around Ben guessed he was probably ten or twelve feet tall.

Ben flexed some of his biceps and as he saw it bulge and then disappear. He continued to admire himself as he looked himself over. Once a lab tech had come down the hall way Ben was in. when he saw Ben he ran away quickly. To him Ben must have looked quite impressive. After that Ben decided he had better go back to the tour group. the hall ways were twenty feet tall so Ben had no trouble walking through them. As Ben walked carefully his giant feet left impressions and cracks in the floor below him. After Ben had made a few wrong turns he finally was close behind the tour group. The tour guide who was looking ahead of her didn't even notice as the enormous Ben came up behind Gwen and Grandpa. "Grandpa... Gwen.." he said trying his very best to whisper; a very difficult task when your voice is loud and deep. Both Gwen and Grandpa turned around and as soon as they saw him their facial expressions looked very alarmed.

Quickly they both pushed him away into an empty room which had nothing but a desk in the far corner that looked to have been out of use for decades. "Ben! What did you do?" Gwen shouted at him; her voice overflowing with anger. She began pacing back and forth as she tried to figure out what to do. Instead of anger Grandpa looked at Ben with concern. Ben still didn't want to tell them what he did. "Come on Ben..." Grandpa asked pleadingly. Ben looked at both of them. He decided it would be better if he just explained what he had done. Then he explained to Gwen and Grandpa exactly what he done. Both Gwen and Grandpa listened intently to every word. After he finished Gwen summoned a magic blast and hit Ben on the head. "Oww..." Ben said as a reflex. Truthfully it didn't hurt him but he didn't want her to hit him with more magic."How could you be so stupid?" she yelled at him as her temperament turned back to anger. Just then....

"Ben, let's go back to that room you were in," Grandpa told his huge grandson. Ben nodded and, as quietly as possible, tip-toed out of the room. Luckily, the group had left the area, but Ben didn't want to alert anyone else who might be around.

When they finally reached the room, Grandpa looked around the machine, trying to see if there was anything he could use to reverse the machine. Ben, meanwhile, was too busy checking out his body. Sure, he didn't want to argue with his grandfather, but he felt he might as well enjoy his bigger body while it lasted.

"Well, Ben, I might be able to fix it and-"

Grandpa was cut off as the ray went off and hit him.

133.content:
The sky was clear and the sun was shinning, birds were flying a singing happily to each other. It was perfect day... if it wasn't for the sounds of explosions and slight tremors coming from the Baxter building.

"Johnny!" yelled Sue, "What did you do?"

"Hey it wasn't me" he said, appearing from the kitchen behind his sister. "Maybe Ben's-"

"Don't finish that sentence matchstick" grumbled Ben, stopping in front of Sue. "What d'ya think Reeds up to Suzy?"

"I don't know, but I'm gonna find out"

With Sue in the lead, they went up into Reed's lab. It was a mess, sparks kept jumping form some of the controls and there were shards of glass all over the floor.

"Reed!" called Sue, panic slipping into her voice. "H.E.R.B.I.E where's Reed"

"He is in the lab Susan" the computer answered calmly. "He told me not to desturb him"

"It's OK Sue" said a voice from above.

Sue looked up to see Reed dropping down from the floor, his body stretching until his feet were on the floor.

"But I need you all to leave quickly"

"What? Why?" cried Sue.

"Because there was an explotion and one of my formulas was splashed over the ceiling. I think I've cleaned it all up, but I could be wrong"

No sooner had the word's left his mouth when a drop fell from the ceiling and landded on...

1331.content:
Something cold dropped onto Johnny’s shoulder, splashing onto his cheek and some of it getting into his mouth.

“GAH!” he screamed, jumping to the side, trying to get the horrid taste from his mouth.

“What’s his problem?” asked Ben.

“Oh no” breathed Reed.

“What?” cried Johnny, “What is it? Oh my God, what’s gonna happen to me?”

“Just stay calm Johnny. It’s going to be alright”

“Reed, I feel…”

Johnny started scratching franticly around his neck where the liquid had hit him.

“… really itchy” he whined.

“Reed what was it?” asked Sue.

“Probably just water” grunted Ben.

“No” said Reed, “it was a… oh my”

Johnny had stopped itching and was now breathing heavily, a look of bliss on his face. Then Sue noticed something. Johnny’s arm seemed to be swelling, mainly around the bicep and forearm. Johnny looked down and his growing arms and smiled. He started to rub them, feeling them get bigger.

“Reed?” asked Sue.

The growth seemed to pass over the rest of his body, his pecs getting bigger and pushing forward against his uniform. His legs were getting bigger as well, his thighs practically bulging with power. And then there was the area between his legs. There was a definite… increase in the bulge. And from the looks of the bulge, Johnny was enjoying himself.

The sounds of creaking bones echoed through the lab as Johnny’s shoulders began to expand, the muscles becoming bigger and more rounded. His neck started thickening as well, straining against his collar. Veins started springing up looking like lightning bolts.

When the growth began to slow, Johnny was as tall as Ben, not quite as wide but not far off. Sue could only stare in shock at the size of her little brother.

“Awesome” said Johnny.

He brought his arms up and flexed them, his biceps bulging and straining against the uniform. He then but them on his sides and flexed his pecs, stretching the four on his chest and distorting it.

“Reed what did you do?” asked Sue.

“Hey Rocky” said Johnny, cutting off Reed. “Wanna arm wrestle?”
1331.title: Johnny

It was an experimental chemical I was working on to help those with muscular and height problems. He's probably gonna keep growing..." Reed explained and as he did their attention turned back to Johnny.

Everyone watched as It started with his Pecs seemed to grow in solid shelves of muscle. His biceps and for arms soon followed suit as they grow to a width that would be any bodybuilder to shame. The growth continued though as his arms,chest and legs expanded and grew even more. His suit was now just a loin cloth over his magnificent muscular figure which was now close to twenty feet tall. Luckily the ceilings of the lab have been built to thirty feet and Johnny's growth seemed to have come to a halt.

Johnny grinned as he flexed his biceps and watched them bulge. "Thanks Reed." he said as he tried taking a few steps forward. The floor creaked under the weight of his enormous body but still held. He flexed his biceps admiringly again before heading towards the door. He tried walking through the door way but it was only ten feet tall and wasn't meant to expand to when some one enormous or a giant had to leave or come in. After turning himself and running into the problem of bumping his pecs he stood up and pushed through the door frame. the metal and bricks could not stand that much force being put on them and they fell through making a giant hole where the door to the lab used to be. "I'm going out." he shouted back to them. his voice was so loud they quickly covered their ears.

"No Wait! Johnny!" Reed shouted after him. Johnny shouldn't be going out in public like that. The general public would go into a frenzy if they saw a twenty foot man walking through the streets. "He's gonna get himself caught and studied in a lab by a bunch of scientists." Reed shouted to Ben and Susan as he grabbed his coat black jacket and put it on. they both looked at Reed as if to say "Like you don't want study him..." before they hurried out behind him.

1341.content:
Summer time.

Jack had worked on so many antighost inventions over the years that they started to pile up and take up too much space on his lab. And one day of summer his tidier wife Maddie finally got fed up and told him to get ride of the unsuccessful ones (like the 90% of them).

But Jack was a hoarder and couldn't throw away his beloved experiments (which he still expected to end up successful one day)...

...so he decided to hide them all around the house: the soul-catcher went to the attic, the ecto-bomb was hidden under her daughter's bed, the fentom visor inside the WC tank... the list was endless.

But only one is important for this story: The Ghost Repelent, a liquid created to weakened or destroy spirits, but like many other of his inventions had the opposite effect, strengthening and sometimes blowing up phantoms.

Danny had to use a bottle once to re-stabilize his female clon, Danielle, who was melting away due to Vlad's poor cloning tech. After that it was forgotten until this day, as Danny's father filled an empty big bottle of Cola with it to hide it inside the fridge. And then it was forgotten again.

Hours later, his son arrived visibly depressed. A few days before his almost-girlfriend Sam confessed she had found a true boyfriend (Justin Viever, a stupid pop start who recently had become an singing emo). Also the summer were almost over, and soon he would have to bear Dash's bulling and boring classes.

He did what any other teenager would do... drown his sorrows in a glass of cola.
He didn't even notice that cola had a suspicious green tone...

"Mmmm... delicious! From now on, I'll only drink this brand.

There was still a lot of cola left...

13511.content:
It was a hot day. Ash was walking around with Pikachu on his shoulder, wondering what he should do. Ash had taken off his jacket and left it, hoping no one would pick it up later. Ash continued walking around, almost fainting from the heat.

"Pikachu, we have to find some shade soon! I don't think I can last much longer in this sun." Ash barely managed to say.

"Pi..ka..." replied the pokemon.

Ash quickly found what he was looking for and collapsed to the ground. He closed his eyes for a few minutes, allowing himself to relax and calm down so he could realize where he was. Ash after relaxing got up, still hot, but cooled enough so that he could get a look around.

There were some buildings that had various things in them, businesses, housing, and the like. However, there was something nearby that looked interesting enough, and no one else seemed to have noticed it. Ash walked up closer to it.

The object was only a pillar, about 3 feet high and had an alcove where a large hook that was attached to who-knows-what sat inside.

"Huh, 'Pull and Buff'?" thought Ash. "I suppose I'll try, and hope it is what I think it is."

Ash gave the hook a good quick jerk, but as soon as he did so, it yanked him forward and he couldn't let go of the hook. Ash suddenly felt bigger, and indeed he was, quite rapidly growing large and muscular. He saw his biceps explode with power as it grew well beyond it's normal size. The muscles fighting for space on the once tiny arm with the biceps unflexed as big as Ash's head. Also, although he hadn't noticed it, his pecs were growing as well making anything in front of him, much harder to see. His torso had morphed into that perfect V-taper as his shirt was stretched at the top, yet relatively normal sized at the bottom.

"I'm getting so....BIG!" yelled Ash to no one in particular.

Once he was finished growing the hook unlatched his hand and the first thing he did was flex his incredible biceps where thick snake veins pumped blood to his super-sized muscle. Ash hadn't even noticed that he wasn't finished growing. Ash only continued to flex his super biceps watching as his growth hit the 2nd stage.
Ash only briefly glanced at his pecs seeing them flood out in front of him under his shirt, which briefly made him wonder how long it might hold out. He was to soon find out. Ash grunted as he felt the power increase once more through his body causing him to start sweating from the intensity, and not the blazing heat. His biceps continued to grow, pulsating with new raw power as the snake veins continued to multiply feeding the monsters that were his arms. His mighty pec shelf greatly expanded, making his poor shirt, very tight, and losing the war that was space. And it did lose, as his shirt began to get too tight and Ash heard the shirt finally give way in several places with a satisfying RRIIIPPPP!

Ash only now took a good long look at his body beneath him, what he could see anyways. He looked at his mighty pecs which blocked most of his view, and felt what he could of his torso, with the abs so deep and cut that they were practically mini-pecs themselves. His favorite was his arms with the biceps so big that were the size of most bodybuilder's legs. Although he couldn't see or feel them, he knew his back and traps made his small waist look even smaller with so much muscle up top.

Now, there was only one thing Ash wanted to do, and that was "Pull and Buff" again!

Ash was traveling in the Kanto region again, wearing an outfit that looked like his original one. He, Brock, and Misty met a scientist who was researching the physical structure of Pokemon. Particularly “Fighting” types. He was trying to figure out why some of them seemed to wear clothing and the benefits of doing so. Misty didn’t really find it all that interesting, unless he was talking about Poliwrath.
“So Ash”
“Yeah... um..”
“Macho. Call me Macho. I have here a Machamp belt. I was able to get it from one before it passed away. I was hoping that you’d be willing to help with my research on it.”
“How?”
“By wearing it of course! It is a belt, and can be worn by humans it seems. I need you to wear it for a while and return to see it’s effects. If any at all.”
“Sure!” Ash took off his current belt and replaced it with the Machamp’s belt. Interestingly, it didn’t look any different from his regular belt aside from the “P” on it.
“It apparently changes shape to fit the wearer. Fascinating..” He said writing notes.
“Bye Mr.Macho!” Ash said as he left with his friends. Ash felt great, like he could do anything! They stopped to have lunch where Ash had eaten almost all of what Brock made.
“Slow down Ash, you’re eating too much.” Misty said with annoyance and concern.
“Sorry Misty. I’m just really hungry!” After they ate, they met up with Ash’s other traveling companions at Saffron City. They were Misty, May, Dawn, Mallow, Lillie, Iris, Lana and Shauna. The guys were Brock, Cilan, Clemont, Kiawe, Gary and Gladion. After conversing for a while they headed to the Pokemon Center for the night. Ash bunked with Brock, Cilan, and Kiawe. Ash went to seep without taking off his clothes as he was too tired. His grogginess making him forget that he had Machamp belt. As Ash woke up, he felt a tightness with his clothes and noticed something different.
135121.title: The source of Machamp’s strength?

1351212.content:
Ash realized the cause of tightness. His muscles had grown to make his clothes stretched across his body. Standing up, he noticed his shirt and pants didn’t cover his abs and ankles. His jacket wrapped around his large back and thick(ish) neck with the sleeves tight around his large broad shoulders. Ash then noticed that his friends, still groggy, had grown as well. Brock’s muscle were more defined, stretching his vest. Cilan’s shirt was skin tight while his vest’s buttons were holding on for dear life. Kiawe was like Brock, but since he was shirtless, his clothes suffered the least.
“Guys, look at yourselves!” Ash proclaimed. The boys look at themselves with shock. Although their muscles masses looked similar, Ash and Cilan seemed to have grown the most due to the tightness of their clothes. They were more or less the same size of Brock and Kiawe, who’s muscles were already noticeable, now they were just more pronounced. “What happened?” Ash asked Brock with a bit of exited curiosity. Brock took a double take. Ash was more or less his height. If the rest grew in height, it was unnoticeable amount.
“I don’t know Ash, but I think we’ll need some new clothes.” Brock replied.
“I’ll ask my mom. She be able to make exact replicas of our clothes in bigger sizes.” The four then went to the Center’s restaurant where the others were. They noticed the change as soon as the Boys entered. Misty Lillie, and Gary examed Ash. May, Clemont and Dawn Looked at Brock. Sophocles and Iris at Cilan, and Mallow and Lana at Kiawe. They explained their predicament over breakfast. Pikachu and the other Pokémon adapted to the change pretty quickly while the others were still curious about the cause but could find no immediate answers. Ash called his mom who could get the clothes ready and have them sent and arrived in the morning. They then decide to...

1) Explore Saffron City.
Gary is jealous of Ash. Chili and Cress arrive to see their brother Cilan. Clemont investigates the cause. Misty is not sure how to fell about Ash. And Iris finds Cilan more annoying somehow.

2) They stay at the Center.
Because of their new weight and can’t be on the top bucks now bunks, Ash and Cilan now bunk with Gary & Clemont while Brock and Kiawe bunk with Sophocles. (Ash, Cilan, Gary, and Clemont grow larger than Brock and Kiawe) Cause is still unknown.

135122.title: Dynamaxing in Alola

choices: The pokemon in the balls are ejected as they catch Ash and Kiawe!
Both boys are fine but have a pink aura around them. Both are famished!
1351221.content:
It was another sunny day on the island of Melemele, our heroes Ash and Kiawe were at Kukui's lab on the shore of Hou'oli Outskirts. The current residence where Ash resided as he lived in Alola to attend Pokemon School.

The Kanto trainer with dark hair sat next to the dark skinned fire trainer with red and black hair. The two enjoying a friendly conversation as the TV shows Detective Laki played, distracting Rotom as he wore the wig of the detective and repeated word for word the dialogue from a rerun. Pikachu was snuggled in a bed next to Lycanroc as the two dreamed happily. Meltan was happily eating some scraps of metal, his eye in the middle of the nut perk up with joy as he consumed it into his steely slime.

"You think the professor called us to let us test anything League related!?" Ash eyes sparkled at the thought, the League currently constructed, underway towards completion.

"I hope so. Whatever trainers we might get to fight would help us get better when we face off!" Kiawe mused, having Ash as a hotblooded competitive trainer like himself pushed the two to greater heights.

Nearby the aquarium containing Luvdisc happily swam about to the door opening. Coming in was Professor Kukui, the man who wore no shirt and allowed his chest to be shown off beneath his jacket. He was carrying some pokeballs and an unknown device in a box.

Immediately Ash jumped up "What's in the box Professor!?" His eyes pierced straight into the crate as he waited an answer. "It is league related!?"

"Kinda. At the moment preparing for the league is our more pressing concern" Putting the box at the table, he plucked out a couple pokeballs as the pokemon continued to mind their own business, tossing one to each boy without a word.

Kiawe caught his instantly, while Ash let out a "Whoa!" As it nearly missed his hand.

"So if it's not related to the League, why are you giving us normal pokeballs?" Kiawe turned the ball around to observe it.

"It's part of an experiment with Professor Magnolia of Galar" He brought out two bracelet like objects, tossing them again to he boys. Ash caught it easily this time and stood triumphantly as Kiawe looked amused by the reaction.

"We want to experiment with a special kind of pokemon battle in that region, so we could one day have them as part of the League, the Trials, and battles with Kahunas." Next to be removed from the box was the device, resembling a shield with a sword embedded in the center.

Ash's eyes beamed with joy as Kiawe asked"What kind of pokemon battles?" The two put on the bracelets during it.

"A unique kind of battle called Dynamax. It's a secret at the moment so don't tell anyone else kay?" Kukui prepped the strange device, putting into it several different Z Crystal, adorning the Sword and Shield in glamor.

"Ah Professor! I want to know what Dynamax battles are!"

"Don't worry Ash, soon you'll see it first hand. Though the three of us will have to exit my lab before I let you try so it" Picking up the object as he flicked up a couple switches, each Z Crystal embedded innthe object were turning a shining pink as energy crackled about.

Intrigued by the secret battles Kukuo unveiled, both boys quickly exited out of the lab faster than Kukui could count to five, the two waiting, eagerness sparkling in their eyes at whatever surprise he had in store. He moved a good several hundred feet away from the lab, both following in anticipation.

The older man plopped the object down, flicking a switch to a light *Whiiiiiirrrrrr....* as he looked to both, adjust his cap on his head.

"So whst's Dynamax!?"
"What is Dynamax professor?"

Placing a hand in his pocket, he smiled as he explained "Galar has special areas that allow Pokemon to grow to giant size. Such battles are found across the region, including wild Dynamax pokemon."

"Giant Pokemon!?" Both yelled simultaneously, even Kiawe the, mostly, calmer one when his blood was burning with passion or anger.

"Yup. It's quite a sight. I've been communicating with Magnolia as part of a side project, to see if we could replicate it in other regions using Z Crystals." He pat the pink Sword&Shield affectionately as it cackled with pink energy " Must say I've spent nearly as much time on it as trying to get the League made into a reality here!"

"Cool so I can have Pikachu fight as a giant! Hey PIKA-" Ash was cut off by Kiawe grasping his arm, shaking his head.

"Nah Ash, if you could do it with pokemon that don't reside in pokeballs I don't think we'd be given these balls" Pointing to the balls in their hand, Ash noticed they had pink lines across them.

"Ah. Is it true professor?"

"Afraid so. These balls are special prototypes we've made to work outside Galar when we attempt to induce Dynamaxing in Alola. Magnolia tested them on her end, now we need to see them work overhere." Despite being dekected, Ash perked up as he realized what they'd be doing"

"So we already have ones that Dynamax!"

"Ah right! Can't wait to see what pokemon is in my ball and beat you in a battle!"

"No way! I'll definitely win Kiawe!" The two were ready to battle before a loud *AHEM* came from the professor.

"Yes having you two battle with those pokemon in the balls is the plan, but you have to let me finish. Dynamax pokemon shrink after awhile, unlike wild Dynamax Pokemon. So when you activate your Dynamax Bands" He pointed to their wrists where they wore them on their wrists "Prepare for when you want them to Dynamax during the perfect opportunity. You both even need to know how to pose to activate it, got it?"

Both nodded.

"Good. It's pretty simple to activate. Return your pokemon to their ball, the energy of the Band will activate, making the ball massive. Then you toss it to bring out the Dyanamax mons."

"Thanks Professor!" Both said simultaneously for the instruction, turning back towards each other.

"Better get ready to lose Ash! I'm not going easy on you!"

"Same to you! I gotta face Hau and Gladio in Dynamax battles after I beat you!"

Both tossed the balls to let out the pokemon, only for the balls to grow huge mid toss, crashing with a heavy *THUD* in the ground as a surge of *CRACKLE* erupted with pink energy treading across the ground before the energy shot forth and went in the direction it was thrown,

"Wha-!?" Neither had time to react as energy zapped both in the chest, with an loud *BOOM* as it sent them flying back wards and into the sand.

The Dynamax inducing device was working as intended, but it seemed the balls were not yet ready for trial with experiments in Alola...

135211.content:
Ben clenched his white teeth as his skinny arms shook, trying to pull down the bar connected to the many weights behind. Ben's efforts only brought sweat to his thin limbs.

Kevin's room was like a private gym, with weights and workout benches, but no treadmill. Kevin craved the feeling of a hard pump in his muscles.

His eyes became even greener than its usual shade as he watched Kevin, with his pecs tightening and contracting repeatedly through his black shirt as he pumped his muscles hard. When Kevin was finally done for the day, and noticed Ben's workout had hardly begun, he laughed.

"Awww, what's the matter, Tennyson?" Asked Kevin in a baby voice aimed to mock Ben. "Can't handle a little weight?"

"I don't see why I have to do this," said Ben, irritated. "I could go fourarms or humungasaur if I gotta do this."

"One of these days that little watch might not work," said Kevin, flexing his muscles casually and effortlessly as he spoke. "You gotta be ready for anything."

Ben's eyes widened, as if Kevin's huge bicep couldn't fit in his sight. But then, he hadn't accounted for Kevin's wide lats or 60 inch chest to join the flexing party. Ben's face turned almost as green as the omnitrix when Kevin showed off his muscular glutes.

"Ugh! Dude, warn a guy!" Ben yelled.

"Sorry dude, these guns fire without warning." Kevin laughed at his own joke while his one-man-audience just scowled.

Ben knew he could beat Kevin, and then he grabbed the bar and pulled it as hard as he could. It went all the way down to Ben's lap, and just when he thought it would pull itself and him back up, Ben's watch started to glow brightly.

"What the..." Ben was caught off guard as the glow brightened, and finally faded. As the light faded to its orginal dull color, Ben felt a relaxing tingle and released the bar with a THUD!!! as his muscles grew to an enormous size.

His watch had many unpredictable abilities, but this one really took the BEEFcake. Ben's chest rivaled Kevin's 60 inch wide chest before growing to 90. Ben smiled as his huge chest housed two perfect pecs, divided perfectly in the middle by deep cleavage. Ben's biceps and forearms expanded as well, along with his tree trunk-like thighs, and his calves which looked like they were carrying soccor balls.

Ben's new size put a cocky grin on his face, until finally, he felt the tingle in his glutes. In the end he was incredibly muscular, and was now looking down on Kevin from his new 20 foot height. Kevin stared up in shock before grew jealous of Ben.

"Aww, what's the matter, Levin?" Ben asked in that same baby tone as Kevin had used before. "I think its time to..."

Ben was in his home, sitting comfortably at the dining room table. The brown haired teenager dressed in green was experimenting with his Omnitrix, an alien screwdiver picking at it with a sharp edge and multiple lasers.

*CRUNCH CRUNCH CRUNCH* The sound permeated the area as Ben tinkered to the laser and mechanical *DING* *BZZZ* *BRRRRR*

*MUNCH MUNCH MUNCH*

"No way Tennyson. Watching you mess with the Omnitrix and seeing it backfire is always a treat." Kev grab a handful of chips from the bag, dropping them into his cavernous maw that rapidly chewed to more obnoxious *CRUNCH MUNCH CRUNCH*

13521222.title: Upgrade-Rex 2.0

choices: Upgrade massages Rexs swollen stomach, every massage growing them
The two are taken to Providence. The nanites spread out to grow them
135212221.content:
*SWING*

A sword had sliced instantly through the leg of a giant demonic entity.The giant blade of a goggles wearing hispanic, clad in dull green and black suit. A massive jetpack erupting from his back.

*ROAR!* The demonic being fell over with a *CRASH* as he collapsed into a building.

Upon the teens chest a green device lay at the center of his suit, the dull bright green glowing. "Rex! I think I figured out how to reclaim the Omega-Nanite"

"What's the plan Ben!?" Rex was as fast as possible, knowing it won't take a moment for the monster, Alpha-Omega, to restore his leg and continue fighting.

"Think about a nanite. Any nanite, and imagine it being able to reabsorb the nanites taken by another person. I'll be able to do the rest." The omnitrix glowed as he spoke each syllable.

"I've never done that before. Making huge machines to fight with is a hell of a lot easier!" Rex turned as he saw two hands emerg from the rubble, Alpha Omega picking himself out of the ruins as sharp pointed legs emerged, his back right leg rebuilding itself as the head wreathed in flame let out another *ROAR!*

"Well think fast!"

Rex set off his jetpack, sending himself flying into the air beyond Alpha-Omega's grasp, his hand quickly reaching forth and narrowly missing the tiny human by a hair.

"All right. Gotta concentrate. Concentrate. Concentrate...."

He focused everything on imagining not one, but two nanites to stop his foe as black and green Upgrade alien remained merged with his skin. A Shield Nanite that keeps them from leaving his body or mechanical creations, and a bottomless pit that absorbs any and every nanite into his body by his will. Two within his chest where the suit contacted his skin began to transform, the normal nanite shapes transfiguring as they became pitch black with the dull green tron lines of the omnitrix. Soon other nanites following the process as over two thirds were transformed into Upgrade-infused Nanites.

"It's done!"

"Then let kick this failures butt!"

Quickly turning himself around, Rex looked down at Alpha Omega as he continued roaring beneath in frustration, ripping apart buildings around him and tossed them, never reaching their height.

Rex began his descent down, the speed of their fall escalating as they readied themselves to crash into Alpha-Omega. The renegade nanite released a crimson red beam to a *VROOOM* as it attempted to disintegrate them.

Rex easily dodged to the side, the massive beam narrowly missing them as they continued to gain speed until they *CRASH*

The two had collided into the red flames of the fiend. Disappearing within. The beasts beam stopped as he moved for his torso and head, feeling for them within.

Nothing.

"Hehehehe! Nothing will stop me from embracing my destiny to destroy everything father!"

He was triumphant far too soon, as the red suddenly began to shift, turning green as a sickly feeling began to overtake the machine.

"Urk! What i-is happening!?" Alpha-Omega willed his arm to restore itself, but nothing happened. He grasped his chest as he felt illness overtake, only his left arm began to contort, hand twisting as it collapsed into itself, shrinking within a few minutes as his arm vanished within his shoulder.

"No! This cannot be!" He grasped for the joint where his arm once connected, only for his right to began twisting itself. Soon falling the same cycle as it disappeared. The green flames growing brighter.

"My destiny!" His front left leg and his back right began to dissolve, nanites dissolving as a whirlpool formed where they resided as they spin into the lower half of his body.

The lack of two of his essential limbs caused the monster to once again collapse, crashing into the ruins he made with another *CRASH*

"No! No! Nonononononononono!" Alpha-Omega yelled out as his body shrank. The gigantic form shrinking as his remaining legs repeated the process of receding into him. Even his flames began to recede as the face that was held within the fire shrank with them. Soon he was just a head surrounded in flames, no bigger than a tank.

"Father help me! Father!"

He called out for Rex's brother, his creator. Cries that fell on deaf ears as even his head vanished within the green flame. The Alpha and Omega Nanites absorbed, the mind of Alpha being deleted by the consciousness of the two within.

"....." His mind finally ended as the flame soon disappeared.

In the place of the fire was Rex clad innthe suit, and he was looking a bit heavy.

His belly anyways.

"Urp! I-I never felt like this before!" Rex rubbed his bloated stomach, the black and green suit rubbing the oversized tummy, far too big for his sleek frame.

"I guess absorbing Alphas brand of nanites must be different."

"Yeah but -*URP* this feels aweful. But at least we kicked his ass."

"Must say I wish he could hear us smack talk him in the fire. Making a heat resistant suit was a good idea once we got in there!"

"Yeah-but *URP* I want you to get out me this second Ben. This feels the worse!"

Ben was amused as he began separating from Rex.

.....


Except he didn't. The suit still clung. Ben yried to moved his head, the singular eye shifting about as aRex heard grunts. Realizing that Ben was unable to separate.

The two realized this idea may have backfired a little..

"Shit."
135212221.title: Ben-Rex Forever United

The lab van was parked in front of the house, with Baymax and everything he could need already inside.
When he got in, he noticed something weird with the car: The mirrors weren't in the right angle and there wasn't much space for his legs either, which were much more bent than he usually had to...

He drove for 20 minutes until he arrived his destination. Honey was waiting for him. She wasn't going to participate in the exposition, she was there only to provide moral support.

“Baymax has more than 200 adaptive protocols for each possible emergency. The...”

It seemed much lower than he remembered. He bent his torso to reach a switch, and then he heard that sound again.

*RIP*

In his back, between his broad shoulders, a tear had been created.

“Someone call an ambulance!” One guy shouted.
“I-have-already-made-an-emergency-call” A soft, calm voice answered his petition.

Baymax had been activated a moment before Tadashi’s collapse and had spent a few seconds analyzing his illness. Usually he would ask the patient about that, but his time it was obvious he couldn’t speak and during a potential life-endangering situation there was no time to waste.

“Rising-blood-pressure, swelling, high-heart-rate... Most-likely-diagnostic: atypical-acute-allergic-reaction.”

In a matter of seconds, the robot had grabbed the patient to give him first aid and then move him outside, where the ambulance would eventually pick him up.

“Histamine.” Baymax said as he injected that to his creator. “Small-dose-of-adrenaline.” Another puncture. “Now-I-will-move-you-outside, where-the-ambulance-will-pick-you-up.”

Recently Tadashi had installed some mechanisms to transport patients fast and securely, no matter how heavy they are. That’s why Baymax was able to carry his owner, who at that moment weighted more than 140Kg (308lbs).

The investors were left behind. No one knew if what they had seen was real or staged… either war, they were impressed with Baymax’s flawless actions and when the initial surprise faded they started to applaud Tadashi’s robot.

“Baymax… *ugnh*… stop. It’s an order from Admin-Tadashi. Pass:14fA”

Baymax stopped right there and released Tadashi, who could move again. Honey was there too, she had witnessed everything… The tall blonde, who was almost as tall as his 193cm (6’3”) tall friend Wasabi (with her giant heels, of course), was at Tadashi’s chest level. He was probably over 230cm tall (7’6”) now.

“Tadashi… what….? What happened to you?”

“A growth ray? Isn’t that science fiction…?” Immediately Honey realized that was a silly question after watching him grow like 60cm (2 feet) in seconds. “Look, you have to go to a hospital… this transformation could have damage your health. They could help you...”

He looked like the typical clown in a comically small car.

“No, don’t worry, I got this.” He lied. “I need you to do me a favour… talk to the investors. I can’t face them like this. Tell them some calming lie. And phone the team and tell them to go to the lab. I’m afraid we’re the only ones who can fix this mess...”

He turned on the engine and drove as fast as he can. He was scared of what could happen to his little brother. A dizzy giant driver got out of the car. Thankfully, this growth spurt had been weaker than the first one, but still he almost couldn’t stay up… he didn’t catch his breath and ran.

135232222111111111.content:
As Pidge played with himself and Keith transitioned, Lance whistled in cheer as he moved for the cryo room. The change yet to affect him at the moment. Allura sent him off to see if Shiro's condition worsened, and to get Lance away while she worked.

"Wonder what happened to Shiro?" The blue lion contemplated aloud as he neared the room.

"Maybe I could get some of what grew him too? Show off to any alien girls interested~" Striking a pose as he flexed his arms. His green coat unchanged as his twig arms had nothing to show. "...Yeah right."

Finishing his own thoughts, unaware of the malessence flowing in his veins, the Cuban entered the Cryo Room. The doors automatically opening as he entered. The lights were oddly dim compared to the rest of the Castle, just enough he could make out the outline of Pods and the one that holds Shiro's growing body within.

"Weird. The lights were on earlier. Maybe Keith did it?" He was right. Thouh he hd no idea why as he got closer to Shiro's pod. "Whew....!" Lance let out another whistle as he observed Shiro's frame. Easily over a foot taller than him.

"Man you gotta tell me what you ate when you wake up." He moved a hand, touching the exterior of the Pod when he heard a *GROWL*.

"Shiro. Is. Mine. *GRRRR*." Yellow eyes shined in the dark above Lance from behind.

"Wha-!?" Lance swiftly moved to turn around, when the yellow eyes left hand gripped him by the neck, lifting him in the air.

"Hrrk-" Lance hands dug at the appendage holding him up, yet he couldn't even dent the skin. The figures outline was nearly as tall as the Shiro 7 ft(213 cm) as he sent Lance into the ground with a *THUD*.

"Gef fof fe!" Lance head pulsed in pain as he tried continued to dig at the thick arm pinning him down. His eyes began to water as he looked at into yellow orbs piercing into his very soul.

"P-p-please!" Finally letting out a desperate cry, the eyes of gold widened as the figure suddenly let loose its grasp, standing his full height as the shadow of arms grasped its head. Lance scooted back on the ground, too hurt to think.

"L-lance! P-prot-tect Sh-shiro!" The figure's identity became known to him instantly.

"Keith!?" He slowly rose to his feet, watching as Keith head moved wildly. The exit standing a good dozen feet behind Keith.

"Oh Quiznak" Heading back for a nearby wall, sweat beading down his head, tapping the walls as Keith tried to hold back whatever was infecting him. Moving slowly to not agitate Keith.

After moving steadily across the wall by ten feet, he got what he wanted. A segment of the wall opened, showing a device meant to stun a patient temporarily. Grabbing it and holding it tight, Keith looked up in the darkness where Keith stood as he aimed it in his direction.

"Should I?" He was wary of pulling the trigger, even with the assault.

"Grrrrr....D-do I-It!" A deeper voice emerged as the hunched fogured turned, yellow eyes gazing at him, spurring Lance on.

*ZING* A blast of blue energy erupted forth and washed over Keith, his hunched form drooped down like it was jelly. All tension released from Keith's frame as he fell to the ground with a light *THUD*.

Lance let out a *sigh* of relief. "Whew....that was close! Now where are the lights?" With the danger passed for the moment, he moved to cause the lights to resume operating, seeking answers.

After ten minutes of searching around the walls seeking for a way to turn the lights on, his hand finally moved across the switch. It glowed as the lights across the area began to brigthen. "Finally." Looking over to where Keith lay passed out, head hidden by a mane of hairthe other direction, he sought to see up close exactly what had befallen the Red Lions paladin as he moved closer.

Lance observed purple pigmented skin as he got closer, clothes torn as bulging back muscle on display through tattered. Easily 6'7 ft(201 cm) in height. Getting on his knee, Lance gently moved the unconscious head to see Keith's face. The mess of wild mullet fell to the side as Lance got a view.

*BABUMP* *BABUMP* His face turned red as a his pants began to tighten, feeling some odd overwhelm him as he saw the face of the now half-Galra that resembled his alien parentage more. Lance, who loved Xeno girls, was postively smitten by the sight of Keith's sleeping face. Features enhanced by his purple skin, new ears, and a cute fang emerging from his mouth. The Blue Paladins hormones flaring as his body began to react. Malessence rushing through his body as he moved closer to Keith's face.

Shiro's own slumbering body within the Pod forgotten in the moment of Lust

The malessence flowed from the lions vast counciousness into each pilot, glowing as it was transported into each male pilot. The substance dripping into their body, mind, and soul. *Drip. Drip. Drip.* The sound in their ears but unseen as they piloted the mecha followed rapidly by pain. A bit of the lions element fusing with every drop flowing from Shiro into Voltron as a whole.

"Arg! What is this burning?!" The sturdy Hunk grabbed his stomach with both hands as he felt like his entire body was erupting. Ripping apart muscle and bone, a dull sense of pain as it rapidly healed, before it ripped apart again. Sweat started pouring down his head as he felt his body shifting. "Guys. Something is seriosly wrong with my body!" His eyes soon glowed yellow as he tried to hold back yells of pain. *CRACK* and *RIP* as Sinew and Bone tore, stretch, grew, healed, repeat, etc.

"*UGH*. I know...*HUFF*..... what you mean!" Keith growled as his eyes glowed red, his sleek frame started pushing out slightly as his outfit tightened. "It's like my body is trying, *UGH*, expand!" Trying to keep his normal stoicness, he removed his helmet as he shook his head, sweat drenching his mullet.

"This has been, *GROAN*, to me as well! My clothes are done for!" Shiro called to them, eyes shining purple as the Black Lion was helping him adapt. His body rising even higher as he gained 10cm more (4 in). His head easily surpassing 229 cm (7'5 ft) in height.

"Aaah~" The noise from the Blue Lion was different story. "This feels so good~" Lance was chipper as he flexed his arms, feeling them thicken under his uniform. "To think there was a super easy way to get big like you Shiro!"

"This isn't something to enjoy Lance!" Keith snapped back. His height increasing faster than his own muscles as he gains 20 cm (8 in) in a few seconds.
"My body is in agonizing pain and Im feeling famished. Not a great day." Hunk groaned as he felt his pecs expand, his hefty stomach changing beneath his thickening arms. A strong, powerful musclegut built to eat. "I really need some food in me.
"*NGH* Me too. My body feels like I starved it for a week." Shiro replied, not realizimg his hunger waa mostly his body craving more malessence.
"You gotta EMBRACE the feelings! If you do that taking control of, mmm, and letting it go will make the pain feel GOOD!" Lance was stroking his body, in love with his growing body.
"What should be done about our clothes?" Hunk asked as he felt his growing, bulging biceps and musclegut threatening to burst open his Paladin uniform.
"Rip it off. It'll make things, *NGH*, easier." Shiro was himself feeling his beefy, scarred body as he simply let it happen as Lance suggested. The pain was still there, but was getting easier to deal with as his body grew.
"Thanks for the *UGH* advice Shiro." Keith thanked him as he ripped off his uniform quickly, his body thicker but still pretty lean at the moment. He was trying to let it happen, but the pain and fear of it kept him from embracing it.
"YEAH BABY!" Lance yelled as he flex his body to do a pose, loud *RIPS* and *TEARS* filling the comms as Lance kissed his bulging biceps, easily 61 cm (24 inches) biceps flexing as Lance happily loving every bit of his transformation.
"Can we return to thr castle so I can get undressed?" Hunk asked "Im famished and I dont want to rip through my clothes"
"Good idea Hunk. Everyone! Lets get back to the castle and deal with this. My arm" He reached down and felt the smooth mechanical appendage "Needs investigating".
"Sure thing. Pidge can....wait Pidge hasn't talked at all. Are you okay Pidge?!" Keith called out.

"I'M FINE! I'M FINE!" She called out. Her face was red. She'd been hearing their bodies grow, their groans, the pleasure Lance was deriving from it. Her face beat red as she realkzed she was the only unaffected one. "You guys are just....acting different and it all caught me off guard."

"Happy to know you're okay Pidge. Lets get to the Castle. I need you to see if my arm is okay." Shiro smiled as their female member finally replied. "Now lets go!"

Voltron split as the lions flew towards the ship, unaware of the continuing production of malessence.

“What happened?”
“Are you alright?” Coran and Allura asked in shock.
“Whatever it is, it only seemed to effect the guys.” Pidge said. Coran got a silly smirk across his face.
“Coran!” Him snapping back to reality by Allura. “We need to scan the paladins. Assuming they can fit.” The group went to the cockpits where the originally found Coran and Allura in. Thankfully, the paladins had no problem fitting. “Coran?” Allura asked.
“Using the three of us as a template for the guys, I can see that their bodies appear to have Malessence in them.”
“Is that bad?” Hunk asked.
“Not sure. Judging by your appearances, it seems to have had a positive effect.”
“This isn’t normal Coran.” Said Keith.
“Don’t worry. You four just settle down. Coran, Pidge, and I will try to analyze this further.” The four then left.

Hunk was cooking in the kitchen as his appetite had grown and assumed the others’ did too, so he was making a large lunch or everyone. Hunk kept rubbing his musclegut through his apron while cooking. It was hard to tell if it was because he was hungry, or liked how it felt. It made it a little difficult to get around the kitchen.

Shiro and Keith decided to train to get used to their larger bodies so they wouldn’t be slowed down. In nothing but their tight pants, spard without braking a sweat. At least, not when they usually would. The rippling muscle of their upper bodies would be cover sweet soon enough.

He tried a lot of his clothes, but was now wearing his usual. Pants hugging around his calves, thighs and hips. Shirt stretched by his pecs. And his jacket’s sleeves feeling like they’ll burst by flexing his biceps. He looked like a kid that just outgrew his clothes. 135232222211.content:
Finn Mertens was relaxing in the Tree Fort, the young hero fixing himself food to eat alone in the house. Well not really alone, but poor Neptr is so often forgotten by his maker. Jake had gone to see all his kids and wouldn't be back for a week, while BMO was outside playing whimsical games like usual.

Finn mechanical arm swiped a knife across a piece of bread, butter spreading across its surface as he prepared to make a grilled cheese. "Man I can't wait for Jake to come home" The constant struggles of his life currently gives him a desire to leave and find something to do to distract from Ferns death. Jake usually knew a few good things to serve as a distraction.

"I will slay you mighty dragon!" BMO yelled as he swung a makeshift cardboard sword at a mysterious dragon shaped object in the grass, the dirt at the bottom upheaved as if it it had fallen from the sky. BMO's imagination made the harmless looking figure into a massive and terrifying beast with four heads, sixteen eyes, a sleek black serpentine body, and two stubby wings. One imagined head rushed forth to bite him, only for BMO to clumsily knock it away with a cardboard shield being swung like a sword.

Imaginary growls emanted from it as BMO cockily stood proud, his tiny green robot body trying to impose confidence. "It takes more than that to best me!" As he readied tofight again the little machine tossed his sword by mistake at the object, a switch sound activating as the head popped open.

"Oh no I slew the dragon...Yay I slayed the dragon!" BMO distraight turned to joy as he viewed himself courageously beheading the four headed beast in one fell swoop. "What goodies await inside?" walking over, he reached upwards to grab the opened hatch with both hands, pulling himself up and into the larger object. "Lets see what I get!" BMO saw nothing inside except a small statue of a caped armor with a tag attached.

Walking over and looking at it, BMO read the tag and saw it say "For Finn the Human". "Ah! None for me mister dragon? You're a jerk". Picking it up, not noticing his strangely nonexistent weight, BMO brought it over to the opened hatch, dropping it to the ground before jumping down himself. He proceeded to lift it again and carry it to the Tree Fort.

Finn meanwhile was fixing the second of several grilled cheese sandwiches, a finished one laying on a plate as the door opened. "Hey BMO! Did you have fun outside?" he asked without looking away. Deciding to focus his absolute attention on the pan as he held it with his mechanical right arm and a spatula in the left.

Covered in dirt, the green machine happily responded to the blonde as he walked over to Finn. "Lots of fun! I slayed the mighty dragon and got this from its cavenous innards!" He placed the object next to the stove, right next to Flynns left arm. Moving over to the table to pretend to eat the first sandwich.

"Uh huh. That's nice." Finn had brushed it off as another fanciful delusion of BMO, not noticing the grain of truth as he bumped into the statue with his fleshy arm.

A shockwave of pleasure caused Finn to freeze up in that second, his robot arm bending the pans grip by accident as his reflexs toss the sandwich and it collides with a wall. "What the-!?" His body felt as if something really good had just happened to every cell of his body.

Ten years had passed since Jake Long - The American Dragon- had defeated the Huntsclans, and two since he graduated college (barely). However, all was not well.

"Dammit, why won't anyone fucking hire me!" Jake cursed as he applied for to a twelveth company on Indeed.com

He still couldn't get over how he was twenty-four years old and still be living with mother and father. Looking for a job had become almost insufferable. Worse, since the Huntsclans defeat, the supernatural world gradually became more and more stable until there was almost no need for Jake to keep the balance. Though the hardest of all was Gramps was no longer with him.

Jake shivered as he thought about the last conversation he had with grandfather before he passed away.

"You are destined to eclipse all who came before you. Rember all that I've taught you shall not be devoured?"

It was like he was giving him some dire warning about something he couldn't prevent. Only overcome.

But how can I overcome shit if I can't even find a job!

Jack's hand transformed and was about to slam it into the keyboard when heard a knock on the door.

"Yo Jake its..."

135232222221221.content:
"ACHOO!" The sound of sneezing followed the complete waste of a tissue, fire snot releasing *sizzle sizzle sizzle* as it burnt to a crisp. A tail swiped at the cinders before a fire could ignite. The source: green-black spiky haired teen Jake Long, wrapped in layer and layer of blankets as he nestled as deeply as possible into a chair. The protector of America having to spend the school day at his grandfather Lao Shi's electronic store due to a particularly bad cold, his grandfather left to deal with Jakes duties in his stead. "This is the worse."

Grabbing a new tissue, he slumped deeper into his blankets, only a head and one arm visible in the mass of material. Nearby was a potion said to be the ultimate cure. Bubbling green smoke fuming from a black and red gunk. "Better try Fu Dog's concoction......later." The Shar Pei made a ''Old Family Recipe'' meant to revitalize someone back to full strength. His great-greatx20 or so grandma gave it to some legendary dragon named Wormy(Or Vassy!Ophy), granted he assumed they remembered the names wrong. Fu Dog did in any case.

But the look of it made him think it was more likely to kill him. "ACHOO!" Another burst of fire blazed forth and hit the wall. A eruption of flames peppered the wall from his fire sneeze. "Aw man." He struggled to get the willpower to even try to leave the chair before the fire threatened to consume the store. His only path to stopping this was the potion.

"The Amdrag's going to regret this..." With a loud *GULP* he brought it go his face and swallowed. *Glug glug glug*

His black eyes widened as his lips savored the taste. "Fruity." His eyes widened more as he felt a buzz of energy instantly fill every fiber of his being. The drained weary body began to feel as energetic as a massive sugar rush, bags beneath his eyes disappearing as energy pumped through his veins.

"I feel loads better!"Jake started jumping out of the blankets, only to trip on the thick mass "w-whoa!" crashing hard with a *THUD* as the flames on the wall started expanding, covering a fourth of it.

He got up within a second, the energy coursing through him getting pumped even more. "Yo can't let this stop me! Gonna go see Spud and Tricia! Dra-choo!" He sneezed, sparks erupting and hitting the wall and the floor. It wasn't quite gone yet as the flames erupted and grew.

"Aw man. G will kill me when he gets back" He hadn't even transformed yet! Yet his body was burning with energy. The buzz overflowing as he yelled "Dragon Up!"


====Meanwhile====
"Yo Gran! I made that potion you suggested. I bet it's working wonders right now." Fu Dog, dressed in a purple gaudy shirt with sunglasses on as he walked enjoyed a drink with his current company: The beautiful drider V-V-Veronica! The two enjoying a relaxing meal near some Satyrs.

"......" Her voice was inaudible to his company, but Fu perfectly understood her.

"Yeah the one that makes green fumes. Gotta say that makes me wanna gag just breathing it in. Whoa baby did that feel to me."

"......"

"Human? No grandma he's a dragon remember?"

"........!"

"What? Curse of..... Vasuki? Shesha? Ophis? Apep? Leviathan? Jomunganny?" He flubbed the last one "Yo gotta explain this to me in more detail gran."

"........" As he listened to her, his mouth went agape as his sunglasses tilted on his face.

"Oh crap." Dragging out a bunch of cash "Meal's on me Veronica."

Hearing him without stuttering her name to flirt, she gasped "Fu what's wrong!?"

"Trouble with Jake. I might have made a bit of a mess!" The magical dog got on all fours and started running for the store.....

====Back to Jake====
*BBOOOOMMM*

A long, drawn out explosion erupted at Lao Who's store as head busted through the roof. The long red snout of the red with yellow belly Jake Long had grown through the roof of the small shop. Thick neck muscles throbbing as he started sweating as he saw his poking out behind the building, partly hiding him from the populace on the street in Chinatown.

"Well looks like the fires out!" His giant muscular tail, thicker and longer than ever before had smashed through the burning wall, the end of the tail curling against the next wall in the room behind the new hole, ready to grow through it too.

Thick, bulging feet had completely smothered the flames on the floor. His sharp dark blue-gray clawed toes ready to stab the wall before them at his command..

"Man my chest feels big." Indeed. His already prominent chest was pushing like crazy against the roof to the sounds *GROAN* *CREAK* *CREAK* as it struggled against such a fearsome chest. Easily increasing to 50% its original size. His wings were pressed tightly against him, forcing them to restrict instead of letting loose and tossing aside the ruined shop.

"I pray turning back reverses....this." Jake felt uncomfortable trapped in there. "And hey mom can order me some new duds!"

He'll try exploring the weird side effects MUCH later. Likely when fighting the Huntsclan...
