135232222222211.content:
Jeremy Quartz was a quiet student of the Collège Françoise Dupont. He shared a few classes with Adrien y Marinette, but they barely knew anything about him except his name. This introverted teen lived in a world of his own and rarely talked to any of his classmates.

That made him the perfect target for bulling.

Jeremy had a secret: He liked men, specially the tall, muscular and gifted ones. He had a collection of this type porn hidden in his laptop.

One day, he had to go to the bathroom fast, leaving his computer unprotected in the classroom. The nossy Chloe took a look to all his files and eventually discovered his hidden porn folder.

When the student came back, he saw all the class knew his little secret, some of them looked at him with disgust and another part of the student actively made fun of him for hours until the class was dismissed. Chloe took care of making sure even the teachers heard about his unusual tastes.

He had never feel so humiliated. He ran to his house, empty as usual because his parents were overseas, and then cried bitterly till a beautiful dark butterfly entered in his room.

The lepidopterous touched something, and then his blue feelings transformed into rage and sadism.

"Greetings, young man... I'm Hawk Moth, the only true friend you have right now... I'll give you power to avenge yourself, but in exchange I want Ladybug and Cat Noir's magic Miraculous."
"I'll do your bidding, master"

Jeremy body was surrounded for darkness, and emerged with a darker skin tone, some kind of sport clothes (equally dark sleeveless shirt, wristbands, and shorts) and a weird spiky haircut.

"...wait, what are your powers, exactly?" For once, Hawk Moth didn't know what exactly he had created.
"I'm the Builder of Bodies, master. I have the power of strengthen the bodies of my enemies."
"That sounds counter-productive. Why would I want to do that...?"

His minion couldn't find a satisfactory answer.

"Ugg, what a waste of my time... I'll take your akuma butterfly now"
"Wait, master! I need this power to get revenge... And I believe it could be useful to discover the secret identity of your masked enemies."
"How?"
"I could change dramatically their bodies. When they assumes their civil identities, they'll stand out a lot. It will be easy to identify them."
"Mmm... it's an unconventional plan, but it might work... but you still need to create chaos to draw them"
"That won't be a problem"

Jeremy flexed his bodies, tensing all his muscles, and then he started to shine. Like a Dragon Ball character, his muscles started to bulge, his baggy shirt and shorts got progressively tighter as the girth of his torso and thighs increased... his pecs silhouette under the cloth were like two hills, his shoulders had become extremely broad in contrast with his narrow hip (with a full set of abs), forming a perfect V back. He was reaching his perfect idea of his ideal man. And his tiny cock grew until becoming a fat python shut in his shorts.

"Mooore..."

There wasn't much space left for his muscles to grow more, so he had to make more room by stretching his bones, increasing his height fast, jumping from 160cm (5'4") to 190cm (6'4") and finally ended up to 220cm (7'4") with muscular beyond bodybuilders' build.

He jumped to the street and with his new superstrength he lifted some cars and throw them to the buildings.

1352322222222122.content:
"At last!" The sinister smile of Hawk Moth was on display as he was dressed in his silver mask and purple suit, cane in hand as the butterflies of his Miraculous flapped about under the light from the ceiling. "You are my greatest creation. The Ultimate tool that shall get me Chat Noir and Ladybugs Miraculous." He clenched his fist tight as he slammed The end of his cane into the ground, his smile widening further.

"In exchange I want to find all of France together in perfect harmony!" The high pitched voice of his latest Akumatized Victim, exploiting her despair about her fracturing friendships as she sat upon a balcony alone with drinks next to her, a broken necklace that glowed black. A plain woman whose body was soon enveloped in a swirl of magical energy as skin turned dark blue, a skintight dark red suit covering her body as she had Plus and Minus signs engraved upon her hands. Her necklace now turned into a radiant ebony choker around her neck.

"Yes. You my dear Magnetizer will magnetically bind people and objects to each other. Ending all animosity across the country! Now go forth and use your powers to take the Miraculous!"

"As you command!" Her voice, shrill and scratchy responded to her new master as she jumped into the air. Lending upon the roof of a nearby house before jumping from building to building.

"First you must deal with Ladybug. Her miraculous allows her to spawn lucky items that turn the tide against us. I won't let her succeed this time."

"I know just the place Hawk Moth" a smirk crossed her face as she ran for a nearby store.

====Chat and Ladybug====
The two heroes of Paris ran and jumped across buildings, having seen the Magnetizer on TV calling out to them as she destroyed a store.

"So M'lady what's the plan?" Chat smiled as he winked to Ladybug. The two getting near their target destination.

"We're going to see what her power is and then we'll take her by surprise!"

"And if she threatens anyone?"

"Then we'll jump in and save them!"

"As expected of M'Lady. I expect no less!"

The two soon reached their target, the Akumatized villain was standing around, pointing her hands at others. A flash of yellow followed and the targets were...suddenly up close to one another and being very friendly. The two couldn't hear them from so far away, but it was clear these former we're much closer than before.

"Looks like her power makes everyone super friendly to each other Ladybug. Want me to get right up in her face and go Claws out?"

"Wait for me to-wait is she looking this way?"

Magnetizer had turned away from her targets to look over in their direction, a smile crossing pale blue lips as she touched Her ear with her Minus hand as the other was pointed towards Ladybug.

Looking to dodge, the two saw the TV I News Helicopter overhead "Oh no the news reported seeing us!"

"That Means Hawk Moth must have learned about us and informed her!" Chat gripped the side of a pile as he flipped himself up onto a building, Ladybug using her yoyo to follow suit.

======
"I found it Master Hawk Moth." Magnetized was in the wreckage of the store she had run into, breaking right through the glass window. In her palm resided a replica earring based on Ladybugs' own, a recently sold store product.

"Yes. With your powers attracting her earrings based on their superficial similarity will finally get it within my grasp." Smiling, Hawk Moth clenched his fist as his Sigil connected them. "Then with Ladybugs Miraculous taking Chat Noirs will be a cinch!"

"Sir." Hawk Moth turned to see Natalie had entered.

"What is it?"

"The news has caught site of Ladybug and Chat Noir" Showing her boss her tablet, the two hiding behind an empty bus to ready themselves for taking on the Akumatized Villain.

"Good work." Bowing, she returned to oversee her work As his personal assistant as his public persona, Fashion Designer Gabriel Agreste. The grin widened as Hawk Moth returned his sight back to his plan. "Poor Ladybug and Chat Noir. The public you seek to protect has become the bane that shall be your undoing! Magnetized! Ladybug and Chat Noir are behind the bus to your right. Time to put your power into action!"

"Yes Hawk Moth".
======

"Let's go for her Chat!" She swung her yo-yo as a rope once again as she swung herself via pole behind the villain.

"As you command M'lady! Claws out!" The cat themed hero charged forward towards the target.

"Ladybug. Your Miraculous is mine. Magnetize!" Ignoring Chat, she aimed Her hand at Ladybugs ears. Leading to......

*SCHING!*

"Ahhh!" Blood spilled as the earrings forcibly ripped out of her ears, flying towards Magnetizer.

"LADYBUG!" Chat called out as her appearance started to change To her civilian attire. A small red creature popping out.

"Focus on her Chat! She has to be stopped!" She prayed. desperate the news, Chat, and Hawk Moth won't find out her true identity as Marinette Dupain-Cheng, running to hide as they were all distracted, hiding behind a tree on the sidewalk..

"Roger my pretty bug!" He kept charging forward as the earrings reached the open palm of the villain.

"Now should I obtain Chat Noirs?"

"First invoke the Miraculous. I know the invocation thanks to a few trade secrets. I don't want them to easily obtain it ever again after past failures. Now invoke The Kwami and The Miraculous activation. Tiki, Spots On!"

"Yes Hawk Moth. O' Kwami I awaken your power within me-"

"What are you doing Magnetizer!? This is no time to become dramatic on me! Invoke Ladybugs power!"

Hearing that, and with Chat only a few feet away, Marinette thought fast. "Chat! Invoke my Kwami to stop her! It's Tikki Spots On!" She called out in desperation.

"Gotcha!" A green eyed winked as he jumped forth.

"so I can make the world a better, happier place no matter the cost or sacrifice. Grant me that power Ladybug Miraculous. Ti-"

She was stopped in the nick of time as Chat Noir grabbed it "Tikki, Spots On!"

The power of creation and destruction, able to shape the universe to its users whims, were now one as a light enveloped Chat Noir.

And with it, a subconscious, hungry desire of Adrien Agreste bottled and sealed away, now dumped itself over existence to paint all of reality in his wish.

"No!" Magnetized desperately tried to reach forward to grab it all in futility as the light engulfed her.

"Oh no. I know our power was dangerous. What did you wish for-" Marinette was engulfed.

Paris was soon consumed in a vast pillar of light that expanded across Tokyo.

"No!" Hawk Moth smashed his cane so hard into the metal floor it dented the metal beneath, the bottom of the cane split in two with a *SNAP*. Hawk Moth collapsed, landing on one knee as Natalie dropped her tablet to head her boss.

"Hawk Moth!" A frown crossed his face as he solemnly closed his eyes

"The Miraculous of Creation and Destruction have been used, I was connected to that light.for but a second and saw what will come to be!. To think all my plans would come to this Natalie. I will never again see my wife, yet she....."

She placed a hand on his back, rubbing it softly in a slow, circular motion as the light engulfed them.

Soon France, then England/Germany/Spain, followed by all of Europe, then Asia and Africa, then the entire world, the moon, followed by mars and Venus, to the Sun and Pluto, Milky Way, and beyond.


All consumed in that which shall be Adrian Agrestes' Truth.

=====Far into the Future=====
Bunnyx was witnessing the disastrous events go down in the past using her time based abilites, her pocket dimension showing different portals of the future. Each one slowly disappeared, her own form blinking in and out of existence.

"I've got to hurry. If I travel back far enough I can stop-"

[Can't let you do that little bunny~]

A voice penetrated every fiber of her being.

"Who is there!? How did you get here?

[Well that's a secret for me to know and you to never find out!]

"Well too bad! I will set things right!"

[Tsk tsk tsk! The baby funny is in over it's head. But don't you worry! There's no plans on dooming your boring little timeline with this clearly superior one.]

"Wha-?" She wasn't allowed to finish as her entire pocket dimension was engulfed like a spherical object, held tightly in a black clawed hand that appeared from nowhere. A giant green cat's eye appeared above, yet nothing connected hand nor are.

[Now sit tight as I split your world from the new one. Adrien will definitely have to award me with cheese]

=====In Adrien Agreste's room=====
"Ah!" The blonde head of Adrien Agreste instantly jumped out of the sheets as sweat dripped down his forehead. His hair matted down by so much salty liquid.

He looked around his room. Everything looked normal. "Just a nightmare"

A nightmare about gaining the power of Creation and destroying reality to make a new one was just too absurd. His yellow furred ears twitched on his head, leading him to scratch The right while rubbing his left human ear. A yellow cursed tail peeked out of the sheets.

A Creation Kwami doesn't exist, after all.
1352322222222122.title: All things perfectly balanced. As it should be.

13523222222221221.content:
"Mmnn."

Adrien stretched his arms and back on his big double bed before getting up. He still felt a bit sleepy, so he walked to his personal bathroom to refresh himself.
His new tail rippled with each step.

After washing his face he took a look at the mirror. An impossibly handsome young man was there, with the build of a bulky swimmer that over-stretched the sleeveless shirt and well-padded boxers. Despite his looks, his feline ears and eyes clearly hinted wasn't humane anymore.

"Just the old me." Adrien smiled and left the room and got prepared for a new day of school and work.

He met Nathalie in his way to the dining room. For a moment, the teenager felt slightly confused when he saw how small she seemed, as her head was below his chest... but then Adrien remembered he was the one with an abnormal size, 220cm (7'3") tall, towering her and everyone else since 6th grade.

"I don't know why I found our size difference strange... I must be still half-asleep." He dismissed the thought and paid attention to her.
"I brought you this quater's balances, sir. The profits of the fashion firm increased another 10%."
"Great. I can't wait to tell father."

Adrien reached the dining table and sat. It was a big chestnut table specially made for him, so he could bend his legs under it without problem.
The boy waited patiently for a minute until he heard hasty steps coming closer.

"I'm sorry, Adrien! The breakfast took me a little longer than I expected!"

His father appeared with a pink apron, carrying a platter loaded with croassants, coffee, french toasts, enough for 4 people. Gabriel put 3/4 of the food in front of his son and tried to sit in his spot, in front of the boy, but it took him a while climbing to one, as all the chairs were adapted for Adrien's size (actually, they were a bit bigger than what Adrien's needed, foresighting future growth spurts).

"Dad, if you need help, I can..."
"Don't worry, son, it's done." Gabriel had finally climbed the chair and sat, although he still had the problem the table was too tall to eat on it comfortably, even on that big chair, he pretended it wasn't a issue.
"Nathalie has just told me the firm's sales had increased again. I'm doing a good job, don't you think, father?"
"That's... wonderful, son." Gabriel's word sounded a bit false...
"The profits ascend to 130% since you took the control of the company, sir." Nathalie continued reporting data to Adrien. "It had almost paid the debt left by the previous owner."
"THANKS for the information, Nathalie." The previous owner, Gabriel, was clearly quite irritated for the last statement, but immediately hid it to avoid bother his son and boss.
"Yeah, thanks." Adrien's congratulations were more sincere. The teen continued to devour the montain of food he had in front of him.
"Son, I was thinking, now the family firm is doing so well, maybe I could rejoin to the board of directors..."
"I'd like to do that, but the shareholders are still a bit angry after the... 'butterfly incident'. I think they need more time to forget it."
"Oh... What about a position as chief designer?"
"Well..."
"That post is currently occupied by Marinette Dupain-Cheng, and her designs are the flagship of the refounded company." Nathalie reminded "The board would never approve demoting her."
"But I think I could arrange a smaller job as a designer asistant. What would you think about working for Marinette, father?"

"I'll... consider the offer..." The great designer Gabriel Agreste, humbled himself to work for a teenager girl. He had indeed hit rock bottom.

Once his giant plates were empty, Adrien stood up, got his backpack and got ready for school, but when he was leaving his head hit the top of the tall doorframe of the frontdoor with so much strength he left a hole in the wall.

"Adrien, are you okay?" His father asked, worried.
"Yeah..." He said, rubbin his unharmed forehead. Not even a cut nor a bruise, more than we could say of the wall of concrete "I guess I'm still a growing boy..." Our protagonist said with an innocent smile.
"I'll call the builders. I calculate in a few days they will have lengthened the door... again." Nathalie mentioned.
"Okay, take care of the preparations. I have to go to school. Today we have sex-ed, and I don't want to miss it."

choices: Before he can, Tom grows big enough to fill Star's room. Tom gets him out!

13523222222222211.content:
Marco Diaz was in the royal palace of Mewni, taking care of Star's room for his friend/master. The room shined brilliantly without a speck of dirt as light flowed in from the open windows. The Mewman princess wand safely tucked into his pocket as he finished setting her blankets in place without a single wrinkle. "There! Now she'll have no reason to leave me behind. Again"

It had been less than thirty minutes ago when Ponyhead rushed in "Hey bestie! I, like, need you to come with me for a sec. Not you Marco just us girls." Pushing Star off into a portal made via the Dimensional Scissors faster than Marco could rebuttal.

"Wait Marco my wands on the bed!" The golden haired princess called out before vanishing. Not even enough time for him to toss it, the wand turn green as bat wings grew forth from him holding it.

Now here he was, withnothing to do for Star until she gets back. Her room clean and any plans they had ruined by Ponyhead. It was only several minutes before-"Well I'm bored. I might as well call someone." He walked over to the mirror and said "Call Tom Lucitor" underworld through the mirror. The reflection of Marco in Star's bedroom shifting to the fiery and earthern dwelling of Tom Lucitor, who sat before him.

The three eyed demon prince was in zen meditation. Taking a lesson from his life coach Brian for tempering the natural born rage born from thousands of demonic spirits residing within. Which he's improved considerably on all things considered.

"Hey Tom!"

Opening his eyes, the three eyed prince smiled "Hey Marco. Calling me from Stars room?"

"Yeah. Ponyhead nabbed her for something and wouldn't let me come along. Even left the wand." He pulled it out to show. "And well the adventure we were about to go on involving an ancient wyrmslaying was kiboshed. What about you?"

"Since I have no plans of doing any more exorcisms, Brian's been having me do this instead. It's pretty boring." Tom, who had never used the wand before, had an idea. "I want to try something. I'll be there in a second." The mirror turned to normal as Tom a portal opened up in the room and Tom appeared.

"So what do you want to to do?" Marco asked.

"I want you to use the wand on me. Help me get more tougher so my rage won't swallow me if I get mad enough."

"The wand? Nuh-uh! There's no way I can use it without Stars permission." He crossed his arms to flatly declare no.

"Haven't you used it before?"

"Yeah but it was to try and find Star."
"Think of it this way: You can practice should you ever need to use it again, and you can even get back that older bod you love so much."
"I did love having abs in Hekapoos dimension." He shook his head "My answers still no."
The pink haired demon tried to sweetn the pot "You can not only try it first, but I'll even include a ticket to Love Sentence next concert." in a wisp of flame a ticket appeared in his hand.
"I thought their next concert was all sold out!?" Marcos eyes grew wide with joy as he glimpsed the wonderful treasure in hand.
"It nearly was. I barely got this one. So want to try it out? I might even go with you to slay that wyrm in Stars place." Tom added one more piece to hopefully find a way to curb his anger a tad more.
"Deal!" Taking the ticket, Marco readied himself. "I heard Eclipsa say intent and a few word invocations is sometimes all one needs to cast spells." He thought to the recently free Queen of Darkness and now resident of the Mewni palace with current Butterfly royalty. "So I hope this works."

The boy pointed the wand at the mirror and said "Grow." A beam burst out and bounced off the glass to go straight for Marcos mole. The blast sending down to his feet. "Ow! That hurst worst than I imagined." he rubbed his cheek where the mole was nestled.

"Did it work?" Tom eagerly asked.

"Not sure? Let me try a spell on you next."

choices: He uses more and grows much bigger than Hook, his clothes skin tight.
He puts the dust away goes on with his day (Slow Growth)
13523222222222222211.content:
“What’s the matter Peter?” Slightly Asked since Peter looked lost in thought.
“Oh it’s just what Hook said.”
“What was it?”
“That the only reason I’m able to defeat him is because I use Pixie Dust. That if I didn’t use that, I’d be too weak to handle him.”
“That’s not true! Besides, you can use tricks!”
“He said that was the only thing we used in common. That since I’m smaller than him, that my dagger would stand a chance against him without relying on Pixie Dust for my tricks and getaways.”
“You’re just letting him get to you. Think about it, if you’re mulling over it like this, imagine how Hook is taking it!” Peter looked at Slightly with a smile and pated his head before Slightly ran off to play with the other Lost Boys.
“If only getting bigger didn’t mean getting older.”

Peter was strolling around Neverland when he found Tinkerbell. “Hey Tink, what you got there?” She had some Pixie Dust for his as he was running low. He thought about what Hook said before showing a smile as he accepted the dust.
“Is that Pixie Dust young man?” Peter and Tink turned to see a flower. “I’d LOVE Pixie Dust! It feels SO nice in my roots.”
“Do you use it like fertilizer?”
“I guess you could say that. Do you mind?” Tink looked at Peter with a stubborn look on her face. “Oh, I’m sorry. How rude of me. I’d introduce myself if I had a name. Besides that, it’s also rude not to give something to YOU in exchange! Is there something you’d like?”
“Not unless you had something to make me bigge without getting older.” Peter said to himself, not realizing it was out loud.
“Is THAT all? Here!”
“What? What is that?”
“It’s like a... fertilizer dust of sorts. Plants in the forest and jungle use it more often to grow big and tall. Would it be all right to exchange all this for a little Pixie Dust? I just love the floaty feeling I get when I use it.”
“Deal!” Peter grabbed the, the, ..., Grow Dust! Yeah. And let the flower get a, a, ... “Petal” full of Pixie Dust. “Thanks Dusty!”
“Thank YOU! Wait. I don’t have a name. I guess I do now!”

“Don’t give me that look Tink. I already feel bad about using as much dust from you as I have. If this works, I might not have use it AS often.” Peter then grabbed some of the grow dust from the pack and sprinkled it on himself as would with Pixie Dust. He felt a small tingle. His shirt felt a little tighter, but nothing else seemed to change. (The dust grows his clothes with him)

135232222222222222111.content:
Being the kid that he is, Peter thought it didn’t work. So he grabbed more and slapped it on. His point of view changed as his legs grew longer, as did his arms. His pecs pushed the part in his shirt further as his shoulder broadened. His muscles grew and filled out his pants, sleeves and collar. If he originally came to Hook’s chest or neck, Hook now would come to Peter’s chest.
“This is great!” Peter began to flex with his new mass. Tink was shocked by what happened and concern for his wellbeing. However, he was still the same boy as before. Just, bigger. “Wait until Hook gets a load of me!” Peter then flew with no problems with his new mass. In fact, it seemed he was going faster than before, even if just by a little bit. He then got to Hook’s ship. Lucky for him, it was just Hook and Smee.
“Smee! Where is my telescope?”
“Right here captain.”
“Now, I must locate that codfish Peter Pan.”
“Can’t we just give it a rest for once sir? Remember your blood pressure.”

Aladdin felt a shiver in his body as it grew a few feet in height. His pecs ballooned out, as did his arms and legs. He basically looked just like Genie, except he wasn’t blue and had his own head.
“This feels amazing!” Aladdin said as he flexed. His vest still hanging on, being the only article of clothing he had on his torso.
“Of course it does Al, it’s not everyday your body’s in the spinning image of moi!” Upon walking towards Genie, the two noticed that Aladdin was actually a few inches taller than him. Genie was a pretty tall fellow, if he didn’t fit through something, he’d use magic. Aladdin didn’t have that luxury. He walked by the royal guards that hated him from when he was still a street rat. Their jaws dropped when they saw him. They couldn’t believe it. Some wondered if he would exact revenge on them. After getting a confidence boost, he went to Jasmine’s bedroom. Iago and Abu both fainted when they saw him.
“Aladdin, what happened to you?” Jasmine asked with worry.
“I got stronger! Isn’t great! I was originally going to take the time to do it myself, but Genie decided to just boost me now!” Aladdin walked over to Jasmine, who now only came up to his abs. He picked his lover up. She wrapped her arms around his thick neck while her body partly rested on his pecs.
“Well, as long as you’re happy, I suppose.”

135232222222222222221.content:
Stanford and Stanley were waiting for Mabel and Dipper in the hall, expecting them to open the door in any moment.

It's been a while since the last time they saw them (almost 7 years!), after the Cypher's battle and defeat.

Afterwards, the two old men had traveled around the world, had too many adventures to be summed up here and their damaged fraternal bonds got reinforced... but they never forgot about their two kids, they began to miss them more and more like they were their own. That's the reason why when they received Dipper's email asking them to spent some time with them, they abandon their supernatural project in the Amazonas and got the first plane to Gravity Falls to get ready everything to them.

The old shark required a quite a lot of maintenance before being habitable again after 7 years of abandonment, but the two uncles repaired, cleaned and drive plagues away as much as the original structure allowed, until it became as liveable as 7 years ago (in other words, barely liveable).

Now, the only remaining task was to wait for their guests.

*Tlin*

The bell rang. A beautiful girl with gorgeous and dense brown hair, sparkling eyes and a smile that didn't feel ashamed to show her braces went in and jumped to their arms.

"Grunkle Stan! Uncle Ford!"
"Mabel! You has grown into a beautiful fine lady!"
"And look who comes with me: Waffles!!"

A 350Kg (770Lbs) pink pig came to her and start to lick-kiss her rosy cheek.

"I expected (hoped) that pig would have ended up bacon years ago..." Stan grumbled, but his brother made him stop.
"Oh, don't be that bitter the first day with the kids. Pigs are wonderful pets."
"Then I hope you don't mind to clean the wonderful pet's gifts he leaves over the carpet..." He said with a malicious smile. And then it turned into a more innocent smile as he talked to Mabel.
"Didn't you bring your luggage? And your brother?"
"Oh, I gave all of it to Dipper... here he is!"

A big dark figure appeared in front of the opened door, covering it with his frame, darkening the room.

They heard an "ouch" when his forehead hit the top of the door-frame. He had to duck to go in... and twist his body, because of his broad shoulders and the big travel bags he was carrying.

"Di... Dipper?"
"Hi."

The teen left Mabel's heavy handbags and his own backpack on the floor and said hello to his surprised uncles.
He towered over the two uncles, a head and a half taller. When he hugged them, the uncles felt like their roles had been exchanged and now they were the kids and he the adult uncle. A stupid impression they tried to forget.

"You... you... Wow. You really have changed, kid." Stan commented, getting his shit together, and friendly placing his hand over his nephew's broad shoulder.
"You have grown into a fine man too!"
"Yeah..." Dipper said, a little uncomfortable by the attention. He never got used to it at home as he grew taller and taller...
"And strong as a bull! Thanks to him I can bring half of my room in bags during my travels!" Mabel said as she dragged with great difficulty one of her 25Kg huge bags to the guests room, leaving the three men alone.

They stayed silent for a moment. The old men were still getting over the surprise. They watched Dipper's body in detail, the still childish face with messy hair placed over that large body... his very broad shoulders with quite narrow waist, thick muscular arms and legs, clown feet and, as much the slightly undersized orange t-shirt allowed them to observe, had some good pecs and abs under it.

"How big are you, kid?"
"I was 211cm (6'11") tall last month." He pronounced the last 2 words with a little extra emphasis. The previous month he had to measure himself to order online some clothes, but after 4 weeks it started to feel a little too tight, so he guessed he was taller again...

Dipper was a tired to answer that question to every familiar, friend and even stranger he met... something unavoidable for people that tall... but he had to talk more about his height.

"It's the reason I wanted to see you, Uncle Ford."
"Why?"
"I don't think it's normal. There's no one as tall as me in our family."
"Well, even so, sometimes when the genes lines up, a tall boy is born in a short family." Stanley played it down. His brother took a more serious and scientific approach...
"Did you have a medical check-up?"
"Yes, and they didn't find anything wrong... but..." The kid felt a little unsure and scared "I think they're wrong."

He took some photos and a height chart he had been elaborating since he noticed something was wrong...

"Just after leaving Gravity Falls I had a 5cm (2") growth spurt. Nothing too alarming, I remember I was pretty happy to be the alpha twin at least... I got a few cm more after that and at the end of the school year, months after becoming fourteen, I was roughly 159cm (5'3")."

He showed them a photo of her sister and him happy, he was almost half a head taller than her.

"Not an unusual height for a 14yo boy. Maybe a little on the short side..." Ford pointed out.
"Yes, because I was a shrimp to begin with... but the next year... bang! I got a 10cm growth spurt. And after that another 5cm during Spring, I ended up 174cm (5'9") tall at the end of summer, more or less as tall as you, when I turned fifteen."

Another photograph, both Mabel and Dipper looked older, probably Mabel had grown taller as well but she couldn't match the speed he was growing, so the height difference had increased.

"The next year was strange, I had smaller, less noticeable growth spurts, each one less than 5cm, but more numerous too, and before I realized I was almost 200cm (6'7") tall and the school basketball and volleyball teams wanted me to join..."

In the next pic there was a 196cm (6'5") tall Dipper in the beach wearing a blue swimming trunks which looked small on his long body. He also looked less lankly, kinda buffer, than in the previous photo: His pectorals weren't completely plain anymore and had like 2cm (1") of thickness. His arms seemed a little thicker, but he still was pretty much abs-less.

However, he had developed a considerable bulge on his crotch...

"Between my 16s and 17s, I barely grew a centimeter, but again have to renew my wardrobe every quarter as I started to pack muscle like crazy, even without exercising. I eventually ended up signing on the basketball team, although the football and wrestling clubs also wanted me in. There was another thing that grew even faster during that time... my... ehh..."

Dipper, blushing, couldn't bring himself to explain about those private growth spurts. They were enough to drive all the interested girls away...

"And the third year school year, my last year, I was happy because I hadn't any kind of growth during the first months... but on April-May I had this huge 15cm (6") growth spurt and pack lbs and lbs of muscle every week until I were at the verge of being a 7 bulky footer. And I know it isn't over... my growing pains are getting worse..."

The exposition left his uncles speechless.

"..."
"It started when I left Gravity Falls... So I bet something here is the culprit of my crazy growth." Dipper concluded.
"Well... I can do some checks." Ford finally said something. "I'm a top biologist, physicist and engineer. If there's something natural or supernatural in your growth, I'll find it."
"Thanks, uncle." The boy said moved as he hugged him again.
"And I'll help you in any way I can..." Stanley added. "(Although I don't know how)" He thought unconvinced.

Ford guide his nephew to his underground lab while Stanley tried to grab Mabel's second huge travelbag to their room, but he only get his back hurt. The fact the kid could easily move with three like that bags and its own muscle mass didn't help his self-esteem.
135232222222222222221.title: Dipper's Giant Summer

1352322222222222222233121.content:
*Plop. Plop. Plop. Plopplopplop....*

A white substance was manifesting from nothing in the air above a small bed of nestled around tropical flora. Each bit of vanilla goop dropping into the water, slowly merging with the other white drops on the aquas surface. The last *Plop* bringing forth the final drop of plain sludge, two little black oval shaped dots attached. It slowly came in contact with the rest as it merged into a small ball shape small enough to fit a childs palm. The oval dots moved across the goo before blinking, eyes staring piercing intent straight into the sky.

It would have stayed there for weeks, looking above awaiting the great comet in thr sky, were it not for the rustling of leaves.

Pushing apart tropical plants, a boy with shaved sides and a ponytail. "Sweet! I found water!"

The already unmoving creature froze in place, not even a blink escaping as the kid before him began scrounging up water into bowls.

"Ah so lucky! Toph went around drinking all the water and I saw no fruits near." The blind girl had been woth them when the group was togrther, splitting up to get resources and find info due to a nearby heavy blockade of Fire Nation ships to signal the rest of the kingdom.

As he was happily scooping up more, Sokka saw the white ball floating upon it. Reaching out to grab the ball, Sokka brought it out of the later. Eyeing it suspiciously as it remained motionless. He then got a whiff of it.

"Yuck!" He grabbed his nose and pulled back. The smell was positively rancid. "Whatever this is smells disgisting. Can't believe the only freshwater is contaminated by this thing!"

Sokka carelessly tossed the thing behind him, hitting a tree a few feet away witha heavy *SPLAT*. The being made a nice goopy mess across it as it slie down.

Stretching an arm, Sokka grinned cockily. "I'll have Aang and Zuko work overtime boiling this so I don't get sick!" He scooped up several more cupfuls before comlleting his work. Standing up.

Unfortunately for him, the white slime was now looking at him, its oval eyes turned as it fumed at its treatment. The mess began to move towards each other, reforming itself back into a ball with trails of slime sticking it to the tree.

Slowly it began to make a cavern beneath its eyes, opening up to give form to a mouth whilst tendril stretched out of its body. Then it gave a mighty *GULP* as it put as much air inside itself before releasing its voice.

"_________!"

A loud, static, undecipherable echo screamed out, causing Sokka to cover his ears in pain. Its tendril was growing a ball shape as it began to twirl its tentacle around and round.

"What the heck's that!? Sokka zipped around as he tried to find the source, moving too fast as he tried to locate it before finally turning just right.

With a mighty *THWACK* it released the ball directly for Sokka's face. The goo splattering all over his eyes, nose, and mouth. Some getting inside.

"Mmmff! Gezmf omf emmm!" He tried to speak, only getting more down his thorat as he peeled at it. The stuff stickier than the ball he held snd fighting him.

The ball, agitated by the boy, made another tendril as it stretched it impossibly far to attach to a tree. It detached from the current one as it began swinging from tree fto tree to find a place to rest. Thirty minutes passed before it reached the edge, asome ten mnutes off from the beach.

Unfortunately, it just found more of the creatures that angered it.

A boy with a scar across the side of his face was sitting beside one with short hair and the markings of a tattoo they covered. The ball landed with a small *Thud* beside them.

"What's this?" The scarred boy, Zuko wondered.

"Hmmm...?"The other, Aang, loooked inqusitively as he moved to touch it, poking his finger through one of its eyes. In that moment he felt a great and poowerful energy flowing within in.

"This little guy is a spirit-" In a *FLASH* Aang dodged a ball of slime as it aimed for his face, its tentacles ready as it prepared one to toss at Zuko.

"Hey!" Zuko dodged the one aimed for him as it began to slide across the ground, eyes fixed in place as it began tossing more orbs of slime at them.

"Looks like you shouldn't have touched it!" Zuko unleashed a torrent of fire that dried out the sludge and made them collapse to the ground as the fire slowed their momentum. Crumbling at it did so.

"It looked harmless! Even-" Aang used airbending to blow away three, tossing them into the woods. "Most spirits don't get volatile so easily unless angered!"

That's when it clicked as their third companion had been in the same direction.

"Sokka!"

Takjng a moment to sigh and Aang slap his head, a bit of the substance had now hit them both. Aang on his neck and Zuko's clothes.

"It got a hit in!"
"Nothing major at least. Lets deal with it-"

With its targets now locked and retribution payed, it quickly bounced its way back into the trees faster than they could follow, going a different path than it appeared from.

"Get back here!" Zuko was about to follow before he was stopped.

Aang stood there shaking his head "Sokka probably needs our help! Let's get him out of the mess he made first." Pointing to the woods Zuko nodded.

"Fine. Afterwards we have find it. We don't know how long we'll stay here."

"I know. An angry spirit can be trouble so we best pacify it peacefully" The two began to head into the forest, not noticing the slime on them was slowly slithering up towards their mouths.

13523222222222222222332211.content:
*BOOM* *BOOM* The earth thundered and rumbled beneath the great shadow of a figure in the pitch black of night. It's weight pressing into the earth, compressing the very land beneath its feet into permanent massive foot-shaped valleys.

Beach City, home of the Crystal Gems, was hundreds of miles far from this goliath. Yet its shadow darkened the night of the town even more due to its sheer size! If the giant wished grabbing and eating the moon was within their reach.

Only for a *BABUMP* of a beat as a *GROAN* was heard across the landscapd as the figure expanded ever higher.

Gem? Light based weapon? Corruption? Who could say what it is until.......

===In the Present===
Garnet had been relaxing on the beach, listening to music on a radio as gems and humans went about their business. Today was supposed to be her day off from Little Homeworld.

Yet her mouth had been open wide, shades falling onto the ground as her three eyes looked dumbfounded at what she saw.

"Steven!" Protective instincts on overdrive as she stood with a *CRACK* upon shattered projection glasses. Her mouth agape as she started running for Beach House. Not even Pearl or Amethysr crossing her mind in her panic.

"Don't worry Steven. I know how we can prevent the worst case scenario!" She spoke aloud to herself. The future she saw could be altered, but a growing figure was shown to be predetermined in every possible future.....

====Beach House====
"C-come on!" Steven Universe was strugglimg with his jeans. The zipper wouldn't *zip* together and stay no matter how much he struggled. His curly black hair shone with water after finishing a recent bath. Putting his clothes back on.

Well trying to anyways.

"Argh!" Steven was frustrated as he stopped, not letting his anger boil over that his powers go berserk that he starts glowing pink.

"These are the third pair this week!" the jeans, snug and tighf on his thighs, showed a surprising amount of bulging mass beneath, the cuff of his jeans riding up several inches of where theh normally resided to show a bit of his thickened calves.

"It's not just these accursed jeans either!"

His toes and feet had grown considerably bigger than his sandals, to the point he could squeeze them between the strap being nothing more than a miracle.

He hadn't evee gotten started on his shirt OR jacket!

The jacket now only came down to his belly button, the sleeves riding up his arms to show his thickened triceps that throbbed uncontrollably beneath with the smallest movement.

His black shirt with a gold star was even smaller! It only covered a little of his newly grown 4 pack abs. He moved a hand to feel his lower and, skin bare from his clothes not fitting.

"Nothing has been going right for me all lately!" Steven grumbled as his troubles have worsened in the future. "Just what else could go wrong?"

He didn't want to know, finally giving up on his clothes to toss them all aside. A few *RIP* and *TEAR* happening as he did so. That had happened the last few times as well. Elegantly he swiped his towel, wrapping it around himself to calm down and analyze his ruined clothes.

"Just why are my clothes shrinking?" the normally shirt Steven Universe had yet to realize what was going on. His troubles occupying his mind and leading him astray.

Moving to sit down on his bed to contemplate, a fist being used as a stool for his head to rest on as he began thinking "Can't even take care of myself....."

Thoughts began to eat away until.....

135232222222222222223322111.content:
Laying on his bed, the accumulated tiredness made him shut his eyes down slowly, falling asleep. But those negative thoughts followed him to his dreams, turning them into a nightmare...

"I'm sorry, Steven, but I won't be able to see you anymore. I'm moving to Florida."

...A nightmare based on what happened a few days ago. The last time he saw Connie.
The Steven from the past, who had walked her girlfriend to the bus station, opened his eyes wide-open.

"Aren't you a little bit too dramatic, Connie? That aerospace summer course you're taking only lasts a month and a half... right?"
"The course, yes... but a week ago I received an admission letter from the same academy…” Connie couldn’t break the bad news until then“...telling me I was selected for a full scholarship that covers all high school years. Getting a top notch education, being trained by actual NASA members, with I chance to be selected to work with them… I couldn’t say no. It’s my dream.”

“Oh, no… I mean, that’s great!” Steven lied, trying to maintain a false smile “And you’ll return each holiday, so...”
“My parents will move to Florida too, so I don’t think I could visit Beach city before I get a driving license… and even then, I would rarely have time with so many extracurricular activities.”
“Don’t worry, I still can visit you anytime using Lion! Right, Lion?”

His oversized cat, uninterested by his proposition, walk away without looking at the pair.

“Don’t worry, he’ll do it if I give him one steak or...”
“I don’t want you to visit me!” Connie yelled it. The face of Steven filled with pain. The girl regretted the wording immediately. “Sorry, I didn’t mean… What I want to say is… do you remember the ruckus you caused when you brought Lion to my previous course? Everyone panicked. I got expelled! We can’t repeat that!”

“Then… what is going to happen… to us?”

Connie hated to each word he was about to say, but she couldn’t find another solution…

“We’ve been officially together for over a month… and it has been the sweetest experience of my life… you’re the sweetest, most charming boyfriend anyone could get! But...”

She breathed out.

“A relationship comes with responsibilities with each other, responsibilities I can’t fulfill… and I don’t want to tie you to this and force you to wait years…”

Who felt more pain that day?

“I want to break up.” Connie finally said.

“B-but… … mm… ...o-ok.”

Steven never was good at hiding his emotions. Connie wanted to comfort his (now) best friend, but just then the NASA bus arrived and all the students had to enter. Two classmates of Connie, Sasha and Marcy, ‘kinda friends’, clung to her and forced her to walk forward as they said banalities.

“What were you doing with that boy?” Sasha asked interested.
“Nothing… just being the worst and short lived girlfriend ever...” Connie confessed, ashamed.
“Wait, you were that squirt’s girlfriend? But that rugrat must be in elementary school or something!” Sasha exclaimed loud enough to be heard by everyone, including Steven, who blushed in shame.
“No, he’s older than me… he’s 16!”
“Seriously?? But you’re A BIT TALLER THAN HIM! What a dwarf!”
“Sasha!!” Connie protested, horrified by her words.

========================

Real world:

“I’m not… mmmh! ...a dwarf”

While Steven was reliving that memory in his dreams, the angst had activated his gem, who started to sparkle with pink. His legs started to stretch longer, beyond the mattress.

“...’m not...”

========================

Dream world / Memory:

“You could have choose better… I mean, look at him, he’s not just short, it’s also fat like a toad!” Marcy continued Steven’s mortification.

========================

Real world:

“Nnnnno...” He mumbled as his body bloated, but with muscle instead of fat, almost doubling the girth of all his extremities and trunk in a matter of seconds. He looked like Steg, but without the body hair nor the extra limbs. And it hadn’t ended.

The gem’s glow grew more intense, shining veins appear around it, sending the order of growth to Steven’s organic body, along with all the supernatural energy to make it possible. And so the boy kept growing lengthwise and across at a more stable pace. Soon his knees were hanging at the end of the bed…

========================

Dream world / Memory:

“Look at him, isn’t he crying? Are you sure he’s not a baby?”

========================

Real world:

“I’m not... a baby...”

His growth accelerated. He had surpassed Rose Quartz’s height and getting close to Pink Diamond. In terms of bulk, the same. He looked like a bodybuilder, if there was 8 feet tall (240cm) bodybuilders. His pecs were like big hills, and growing.

“I’m… I’m…”

========================

Dream world / Memory:

“I bet a tiny baby like him also has a tiny baby di--”
“SASHA!”

========================

Real world:

“No... It isn’t…” Steven was talking in dreams when his thick big body (at this point as tall as Pink, with as much body outside the bed as was on it) started to shake.

Under the towel that covered his waist, something started to shine in pink.

His gem sent growth energy to his genitals in pulses. The tissues started to multiply, millions of new nerve endings were created in an orgasmic sensation, igniting an erection. His thing, who during the previous days had gone from “small” to “over the average”, started to rise, sweeping the towel among with it.

21cm… (8”) 24cm… 27cm… 30cm… (a whole foot)

“...it isn’t tiny… mmmmmm!”

Pulsating, the cock grew 5cm (2”) more, and then other extra 5cm. The friction against the cloth that covered it felt so good it began to release impressive amounts of white.

“It’s big. I’M BIG.”

50cm 60cm 70cm 90cm...

The muscles of the blue eyed man were noticeably bulging beneath his clothes, sleeves riding up his thickened arms as it begged for space. His pecs were so desperate for space they forced the buttons apart. Thankfully he wore some loose pants, giving his thighs and quads more room.

For now.

"Heh. Guess mine weren't the only ones that shrunk in the wash!" Smirked the youth as he reached for the huge breakfast his dad prepared, even bigger than the meals of his mom.

The formerly lanky superboy was chuckling as he picked food off plates with a fast pace. The normally lanky kid was noticeably bigger, his slender arms bulging with small but notcieably growing biceps. Unlike his dad the boy already took his shirt off, his sleek clothes became too tight for him and knew his mom would ground him for carelessly destroying his clothes. Now he was left in some blue pants that were clinging tightly to growing thighs.

"You know this isn't normal buddy." Clark chuckled as he ruffled his boys hair before moving to quickly unbutton his shirt. Taking it off, folding it, and setting it down as he moved to sit. A ravenous hunger started hurting his stomach.

His massive and wide body was on full display, his imoressive physique taken to greater heights. He moved to grab food he cooked to feed his hunger, keeping control of himself.

"So we're going to Damian's dad after we eating?" Jon etalked between chewing his omelette and going for some buttered toast to take a bite from it.

"Yes" Clark ate his toast in one bite, his mouth visibly big enough to finish it instantly. Chewing in silence before continuing "Lois will be gone for awhile and we don't need everything to fall into chaos before she gets back".

He didn't actually know when she'd be back. An alternate universe version of himself that became a machine, along with the Justice League where they were all Elementals and Golems of several different realities had needed her help. So she was off having an adventure she'll be happily writing about once she gets back.

"Do you think if I get too big I can't attend school with Damian?" Jon slurped up fruits as he flexed off to look intimidating. Failing hard in the process despite his new mass. Even his newly visible set of abs was only starting to form.

"Bruce and the rest will solve it before that happens." Clark confidently prided his boy to believe in his superfriends. "It'll be hard to keep our identities if it doesn't otherwise. Just imagine me trying to speak to Jimmy only for him to be completely invisible beneath my chest!"

"I bet if I keep growing Damian will be jealous I'm not only taller but wider than he'll ever be!" Jon amused himself at the thought of grouchy and older Damian being forced to ride on him as he fies, so wide the boy wonder could easily hand on his shoulders while grumbling about it. Superboy grabbed half the waffles, dumping loadso f syrpu on it before eating it all as fast as possible.

"Be careful Jon. Eat that fast and you might bite your tongue." His father warned for concern, taking the other batch of waffles to eat at a slower pace.

Neither father nor son had noticed their increase in height. Only a small increase of two inches(5 cm) at this point, but who knows how things shall go for both, especially as their clothes continued to tighten as they grew thicker and wider as they finished breakfast.

"Urp....sorry dad." Jon rubbed his bloated stomach, noticeably bulging out. "That was pretty good. Almost as good as moms."

"I must admit I did not expect to eat so much." Though he had eaten even more than his kid, the man of steel stomach digested it as soon as he consumed it. His perfect cobblestones on display.

"Let's hurry." Father and son zipped in a *FLASH* as they vanished and returned dressed in their costumes.

The notcieable muscle, each one on display in incredibly tight clothes that rode up their calves, abs, and arms. Save for Jons belly being too big and even the hem of his shirt had rode halfway up it. Otherwise every nook and cranny of their growth visible for all to be enthralled by. Jon wanted to feel every one of his muscles, but held back till he can tease Damian.

"Off to Damians!"

With another *FLASH* the two were gone and zipping across the sky as they head for Wayne Manor. The two moving faster than normal.

====Meanwhile at the Secret Sanctuary=====
"This is super embarrassing."

Superboy, aka Conner Kent, clone of Lex Luthor and Clark Kent, was sitting in the Secret Sanctuary. His clothes were completely shredded. Tattered shirt cloth and pants were sprayed all across the floor next to a table. Wrappers and empty bags of were empty across the table. Every scrape of food, even sauces, all gone as the stubbled face of Conner towered next to a table. Easily now Supermans normal height of 6'3 (191 cm) and wider with beefy mass than Supes ever been. His stomach stretched out comically in front of him

"*Urp*...this feels...aweful. *Urp*."

Conner was consumed with ravenous hunger, his speedy friend Impulse watching his beefy body and him groaning for food not longer after they woke up. Begging the speedster to get him nourishment, he came back woth a ton of food, giddy as he saw Conner devour it all and begged for more.

The clone rubbed his belly as Impulse, Bart Allen, zoomed back with a *FLASH* with more bags of take out were put before him in a flash. Conner nodding with a smile to his friend as he reached for the nearest bag, opening the wrapper and taking a bite of a sandwich. Soon followed by a second. Then a third. Then a fourth. Followed by fries, nuggets, and more.

"You just keep getting bigger! Is this the influence of kryptonite!? You got exposed to some funky radiation or magic!?" Impulse aggresively asked before Conner could reply, poking his friends bloated belly who groaned from the contact.

Instantly zipping off with a *FLASH*, Impulse quickly leaving and returning with more food. "You've got a bottomless appetite man!" Bart smirked as he placed more food before him.

"I...*URP*...know" He reluctantly sighed in frustration. Impulse was happily pressing his left hand into the bloated orb, earning more groans while his right was moving lightning fast to massage it.

"So cool! Tim's gonna love this!"

That's when thry hearded a quiet *Zoom* as the door opened for Tim to see his friends. The teen stared awkwardly as he saw a nearly naked Superboy with hulk physique and a giant air balloon inflating from his stomach.

"What...what is this!?"

Impulse zoomed over, grabbing Tims hand.

"I don't know! It's weird! It's cool! I gotta get him more food! Can you massage his belly!? I gotta go the pizza I ordered should be done!"

Before Tim could even reply Impulse was off again. Looking at Conner as he walked over slowly, softly, lovingly, placing a hand on the stomach to a deep *GROAN* as he began to move back and forth to rub it.

"I'm gonna call Batman, Conner."

"*Urp*...thanks Tim. This.*URP*..is the worst."

"I'm back!" Impulse happily came back with a number of pizzas. "I dropped a couple but these should work!"

Impulse went to work, pulling out a cheesy pizza with toppings as he held it before Conner. His head moving up to take a bite. Tim pulled out a phone to call Batman for aid.

"Hey Bruce. I got a problem."

"Is it Conner Kent?"

"I'll assume this is affecting Clark and Jon as well?"

"Correct. I'll have you transported to the Watch Tower with them. Anyone else there?"

"Bart. Bruce transport the nearby food as well, Conner has an insatiable craving."

"Understood."

Soon light enveloped them as all three and half a dozen pizzas were on the Watch Tower...

145123321.content:
"I'm so disappointed with your performance in this raid." After an endless silence, Batman's words felt like stabs for his poor sidekick.
"But Bruce, we stopped the scarecrow's plan of terrorizing the city and caught the scarecrow itself and his band." The teenager tried to defend himself from his mentor's critics. He removed his green eyemask as he left the batmovil, but Batman didn't felt like removing his hood, nor keeping eye contact.
And he didn't need doing it to continuing lecturing.

"You were unable to stop one of scarecrow's henchmen and escaped. Your aim with the batarang was awful."
"But I succeeded in capturing the other 20 and help you with scarecrow! I bet the fugitive is just a mere thug, nobody important..."
"ALL THE DELINQUENTS ARE IMPORTANT. ONE FREE THUG OF TWENTY IS ONE TOO MANY."

For the first time in hours, Batman faced Robin, with a piercing eye contact and all.
His tensed 6' 2" (188cm) muscular body stood at mere centimeters of the slimmer 5'6" (167cm) boy, making Tim to back a little.
Tim didn't know if he was trying to intimidate him like he usually does with the rest of the villains or was only grumpy... but that was the effect he was getting.

Tim lost his voice, and Bruce grew tired of waiting for a new excuse and went to his study, but not before telling him to do a complete session of heavy exercises before dawn.

"Stupid Bruce..." Tim said as he started with with 20lbs weights. was getting sick of this darker and grouchy version of Batman Bruce had turned into during the last year. "He thinks he's so great and everyone else are rookies... I wish I could teach him a lesson or two..."

His sweat had wet his t-shirt to the point he was starting to feel cold. He removed it and got a glimpsed of his body on a nearby mirror: he had a handsome body, with more definition that most kids from his age, nice but thin pectorals and the shade of a 6-pack on his abdomen... but he was still far from Batman and his bodybuilder build. Or most superheroes (for some reason, almost all supers were 6' /180cm and taller). "Damn, even the superhero women are usually taller than me. I hate being short."

He got lost in his dispiriting thoughts until the clock's strokes awakened him. He couldn't believe it was so late, and he was been doing exercise for so long.
He felt tired and his muscles was aching, but also felt a pleasant sensation all over his trained muscles. Also felt like his muscles were slightly bigger, but he just attributed it to the usual toning up effect of a good workout session.

Later, their butler found the 18 year old boy emptying the fridge.

"Sorry, Alfred, but after all the effort of the mission and the training I got really hungry."
"You don't have to say sorry for the appetite of a teenager, master Tim. After all, I've alredy served 5 generations of Robins." The english man said as he picked some rests of food that had fallen to the floor. "You can always call me to prepare you something. Or pick it up."
"Oh, I wouldn't like to bother you."

Then the butler stopping moving for an instant, noticing something.

"Master Tim, I believe your training is starting to yield results. Your uniform is becoming a little too short for you, don't you think?"

He was right. The Robin suit he was wearing (without the mask) didn't cover half of his ankles and wrists. The boy smiled, realizing the eyes of Alfred weren't as high as usual, he must had gained 5cm (2") in height.

"Is your suit still comfortable?"
"Well, it feels a little constricting in the shoulder area." Tim said while rotating one arm.
"You can't go to fight crime in a suit that doesn't adapt to your body. Fortunately, I think Master Bruce prepared a few bigger spare uniforms just in case.

The pair walked down to the batcave and pushed a button to get that suit. Tim made a face of disgust when he saw it was a bigger version of the original Robin suit, the one without trousers.

"I think I'm going to continue with my old uniform until I outgrow it or until I convince Bruce the perks of trousers." He said mockingly, believing this growth spurt was a miracle wasn't going to repeat...
"..." ...Whereas Alfred didn't say anything. As the butler of the Wayne family since decades, he wasn't allowed to comment Bruce's strange fetishes, like making boys fight criminals in green shorts.

Nothing else remarkable happened that day.

1451233221.content:
"RISE AND SHINE TEST SUBJECTS!" A booming voice penetrated the air, loud enough to ring the ears of those who heard it and awaken four test subjects in a cold, brightly lit lab.

"Gah! Who...the hell was that?" A second voice called out as his eyes opened instantly from the noise. Only to see nothing but pitch black Darkness. His arms and legs tightened in place as he attempted to move, staying tight despite his best attempts to shift about and get loose. Chilly air on his bare skin.

"Great! I've been tied up and I have to hear J-Red Hoods voice." The boyish tone and childish antagonism gave away the second individuals identity.

"Just hearing the boy wonders voice alone makes whatever torture about to be inflicted far worse" The third voice, Jason Todd, also known as the Red Hood, called back. The boy he replied too gritting teeth as the older man moved with what little freedom given to see if any of his knives for cutting loose remained. "Thorough bastards. Sans my mask the rest of my clothes have been changed."

"I hate you." Damien Wayne, the current Boy Wonder, proclaimed in a bratty tone as he turned his head in the direction opposite of the voice. Arms attempting to get out of restraints.

"Enough! Now is not the time to pick fights Robin" A fourth voice chastised him.

"N-nightwing." Damien knew that responsible trying to be the adult-in-the-room as soon as he heard it. Having been robin to him for a time when he was Batman during his fathers disappearance. Richard Grayson, also known as Dick and Nightwing. The first Robin.

"They snatched me all the way from Metropolis!" A fifth voice spoke up.

"Red Robin." Nightwing listened as he heard the third robin. "You remember where you were last?" Damian was clearly annoyed blowing raspberries at Tim, but the two ignored the noise.

"Yeah I was with Superboy and Impulse. The three of us were tracking down the blood of the Gods as Captain Marvel/Shazam asked us too, he was dealing with Black Adam at the time. After we got there...I-don't remember." Tim contemplated, eyebrows furrowed as he tried to recall an empty darkness.

"Hopefully your friends are okay Red." Nightwing consoled, wanting to reach out even if there weren't any way to do so with strapped down limbs.

"I was with Arsenal and Artemis. The three of us had tracked down a large supply of venom shipped to Gotham. Arsenal was knocked out and I reached for him. Then I got my head slammed into a wall." Jason spoke up, having reached the conclusion that it might be related.

Realizing it himself, Nightwing replied "Me and-"
"I was forced to take my babysitter Nightwing with me to Metropolis by fa-Batman." Robin interrupted, daggers from Dicks piercing eyes looking in his direction, even as the blindfolds beneath the mask kept him from seeing the youngest Robin. "I'm not allowed to hang out with my Superboy by myself apparently."

"Because you stole a car and took Superboy for a ride in it last time." Three voices chimed in unison.

"Whatever." Grumbled Damian. "Then there was a car crash on the wsy there. While me and Nightwing escaped the limo the truck that rammed into us had loads of kryptonite in the back. Then I got some weird nast spray in my face. Smelled awful!"

"So we all got taken out by targets that were related...." Nightwing and Tim thought.

"No doubt as one of the worlds greatest detectives sidekicks, you've all already figured out all three were connected yes?" The first voice, the one behind this, called out from a speaker in the room.

"Never heard you're voice before bastard! Arsenal and Artemis better be okay or I'll make your death painful!"

"I'd be more worried about yourself Mr. Red Hood." The voice was cheerful as he conversed. "We've got a special experiment my employer wants done on you while he combats Batman in Gotham~"

"It's Bane isn't it?" Tim, whose detective skills were around Bruces level, put together who typically uses Venom and would be brazen enough to think they could fight Batman and be able to keep him out of the way of the experiments. Strong as he is smart, Bane has always been a formidable foe for the Dark Knight.

".....Damn. He"s going to be mad I gave way who tested the new God-Venom on the Bats proteges." Disappointment peppered his words before "Oh well~ I'm still getting paid so it all works out!" *Click*

ZING. Whirrrrrrrrrr. ZIP. CLING. ClANG. BUZZZZZZ. The noises of machines at work filled the four Robins ears after the voice pressed something. The four instinctively began to try harder to release themselves from the bindings holding them down, but attempting to do so only seemed to tightened them even harder!

"Bastard! Tell us what you are going to do!" Damian screamed as he in desperately, dislocated his shoulder. "Hah!" He gritted teeth as his shoulder limped, but the bindings tightened further. "Dammit! Don't dislocate your limbs! These crappy straps actually get tighter!"

"Seriously!?" Jason was on the verge of doing it himself, quickly stopping himself.

"Nightwing do you have anything to get us out!?" Tim pleaded as he tried to get free.

"I...don't." Nightwing stayed calm as he prepared himself for whatever dangerous chemicals were soon to be pumped into them.

"Bane didn't let me learn your identities when he brought you four in, but, when this is done your faces will be fully visible. I can sell your identities for a nice profit~" As he finished, the four simultaneously felt something penetrate their spines.

"Fuck!"
"Helll!"
"S-stay s-stro-ong!"
"Urgh!"

The four bear through the pain of four needles filling them with glowing, sickly green substance that was pumped into their spines. Less than thirty seconds of pouring it in , the needles released themselves from their bone and skin to the sound of a *Whirrrrrr* and *DING*

"That wasn't so bad now was it?"

"Fuck you!" Damian and Jason cursed, disgusted that they've been dumped with who knows what kind of life threatening chemicals this God-Venom was. Richard and Tim stayed composed as they tried to think of a way out...

"Nngh!"
"Something *NGG!* is happening to me!"

Their bodies shook and twisted, not longer trying to get free of their bindings but as a reflex response to their bones cracking and lenghtening. Muscles expanding by painful spasms. Their bodies had stopped obeying them.

"It's working faster than I expected!" The mad scientist couldn’t hide his excitement "Tell me, on a scale from 1 to 10, how much pain do you feel?"
"AAAAGH!" Robin screamed, covered in sweat. He was growing so fast that if he were still wearing his uniform, it wouldn't cover his stomatch, now with a rising 6-pack.
"I'll take that like a 9. Don't worry, only the first growth spurt is that painful, when the God-Venom break apart your growth plates by force for the first time. But once they're fully open, the growth will be nicer than disagreeable."
"*Ungh* ...wait, FIRST growth spurt--? UGG!"

Nightwing couldn't finish the question, an intense sensation in his crotch. His immense calves had almost crushed his relatively big flaccid penis, but then Dick's dick had started to twitch and get hard... but instead of stopping at his usual 16cm (6.2") his altered body continued to pump blood, blood filled with growing drugs...

His penis' cells started to multiply, the tissue increased its capacity, millions of new nerv endings were created in orgasmic expantion, so pleasant it nullified the growth pains... Dick couldn't help himself to moan when his cock surpassed the 20cm (8") mark, precumming.

The others were at the same situation, with Jason a few centimeters ahead of Dick (he had a head start, originally bigger at 18.5cm, but his growth seemed a little slower so it wasn't impossible for Dick to caught him up the next minutes. In terms of height, Dick had already surprassed Jason by almost a head despite starting 2" /5cm shorter.

Half minute later, those two were tied at 25cm (~10").

Damian, smaller than anyone, had grown incredible fast (maybe because he was the youngest and still in development?) and his tiny 11cm (4.3") had reached Tim's 21cm mark. Also he was almost as tall as him, but he had a slimmer build (maybe due to his too fast growth).

"The first one reaching the Foot (30cm) mark wins." The mad cientist joked while watching their transformation without losing any detail. "And then maybe we could start phase two a little sooner and make a race to the 2 feet mark (60cm)."

Dick, whose growth was at last slowing down, wasn't willing to pass for the same shit a second time. He made an effort and tried to break his bindings.
His body had gained a tremendous explosive strength, but couldn't access to it, still weak by all the major changes he experimented.

But he kept trying and, by sheer willforce, was capable of shatter them.

"Oh, but those bindings were supposed to contain a Wonder Woman Level hero." The villain noticed. "A little too soon for you to grow to that point... that makes you the most promising candidate, Dick." Smiled like he didn't care about the consequences.

Nightwing fell to the ground, and for a second he felt tempted to stay there and let his body rest and it ended growing... but he knew everyone depended on him.
Looking ahead, he got a good visual of their kidnapper: He was still behind a crystal screen at the end of the room, watching them with coldness and arms folded.

"Move, legs, move..." Dick begged, trying to get his huge body in movement. Seconds later it responded and the hero started running toward their shared enemy.

145211111.content:
Deep within the heart of a frozen, dark world, hidden in the darkness on the northern of the Milky Way. Too far for the light of a star to even shine upon its surface, nor pulling the world towards a system. It eerily stayed in place. Unchanging as it stayed still, its frozen surface, completely engulfed in thick ice as vast as a great sea, with the occasional impact of meteors crashing into its surface and sending forth chunks of splintered ice.

Far, far below, however, a thriving ecosystem of radiamt, bioluminescent plants lay situated below the tundra. The two kept apart by a mysterious bubble like force field, with itself further split within by walls of energy colored like a rainbow. A large building, situated around a great forest of bizarre flora, tree like plants that grew long glowing pink vines in place of leaves and coral like bark.

Inside was a dark lit lab, light shining from videos on display of a great computer. Watching from a massive throne sat comfortably a great giant, easily thirty feet tall and clad head to toe in Dark Green armor. A singular visor that glowed a sickly neon green as he watched a number of videos of people.:

*A blonde man wearing a dark uniform holding back the hand of a massive purple minigiant.
*Two bearded men in having a onesided pissing contest on a spaceship,
*A normal man trying to let loose a great green giant from within, only for his refusal.
*A man in a dark grey with red helmet and a red and black suit stuck in the Quantum Realm seeking aid.
*There other were ones of a long haired man with a metal arm, a dark skinned king calling to his people, an archer watching his family turn to ash, and a young man dressed as a spider on the ruins of a world, but the scenes of them were paused in place. As if he did not yet desire them.

A great armored glove moved to his side as he watched, picking up a thin like needle attached to a cord. Moving it, the giant pushed it in to an object hidden by shadow, lighting it up as a golden gauntlet with gems positioned in sockets shined. Twitch. Twitch. Twitch.

It moved in response to the needle, the light of the gems shining brighter as it showed the decapitated hand that lay within it. Multiple needles, IVs, and machines dimly shone hooked up to exposed purple flesh, seemingly keeping it alive, and likewise moving it.

"Fortune ensured this limb was preserved when the fool dared to take the Soul Stone by force. All this time, my research to grow life to untold sizes across the universe seemed doomed, even further to have said life go forth and fertilize new worlds for life." The giant stood up. GRIND. GRIND. GRIND. his movements came with the heavy sound of machinery moving. CLANG CLANG CLANG. His heavy footfalls left the sound of metal across the floor as he observed the ones moving in their images. "I need only one to be my willing test subject, then the rest I can influence with the Soul Stone."

Looking across each one, he could only continue to think his thoughts in private. "To think I would stumble upon this by mere chance on the day I chose to leave my abode." He reached for a needle place in the purple hand, only lightly pressed into the flesh residing in the tiny object compared to his own mighty paws. "Too long by myself in my lab, most of my brothers dead, forgotten, or lost. But I will continue my mission. Starting with one who has seen the world on the tiny scale and on a giant one. I call you forth, Scott Lang, Antman!" He smashed the needle in with as much force as possible, the hand THROBBED from the jolt as the fingers moved, coming together to a resounding

*SNAP*
A powerful shkckwave shook the area as the gems glowed brilliantly to answer the wish, the radiation that should fry the already necrotic flesh held at bay by the bizarre concotions flowing through the hand. Fingers fell silent as the movement granted disappeared, collapsing with a light thud.

He turned away from the displays, the man in the quantum realm disappeared appeared as he turned to a display with no one on it. Of a human looking home furnished to ease a coming guest as a *FWWWWWOOOOMMMM!* of a portal of energy ripped open and tossed a man onto a chair.

"Thank God someone finally let me....w-what j-just happend!?" The voice of Scott Lang came from behind the helmet as he surveyed the area, trying to find an answer as he observed a nicely furnished room. "This is not anywhere near where I went subatomic. Too bad they've got some pretty bad taste on top of it. All this looks pretty tacky." Thankfully the alien had no concern in human decor.

"My apologies Lang Scott. I teleported you to my world as I need your help." A deep voice emanated from nowhere to the man.

Quickly turning to see where the voice is coming from. "Is this Hank? I should have known you'd screw me around like that and it's not funny. Whatever you did I couldn't even bring back the container of Particles for Ghost!"

"Alas Lang Scott, the one you call Pym Hank was turned to ash in your world. I am The Grower. A being from the edge of the galaxy."

"Wait I've been kidnapped by aliens? Please don't probe my brain, and especially not my butt. Ive never practiced anal and I-"

"We have little time for your desire to converse, so I shall update your memory with current knowledge." The Grower moved a hand to shift a needle within the arm, causing it to twitch uncontrollably as it once again *SNAP* information into the mind of Scott Lang. At least, info beneficial to the Celestial.

The rush of knowledge to Scotts head, however, felt like he ate a lot of freezing cold ice cream really fast. "Brain freeze! I don't even get to enioy any ice cre-oh dear God they were all turned to ash by that ugly purple guy." The shock widened his eyes as he tried to look for the voice. "Thank God Cassies okay! And Captain America is rocking the beard. Wait don't get distracted! Okay uh Grow guy what does a growth experiment have to do with stopping the jerk with the ugly chin?"

"Thanos is strong, but he will soon try to destroy the stones. I can deposit you upon the world where he will try to destroy them, and by surprise you can squash him flat. He has no means to stop you, as he threw away his powerful battle armor, and great damage has been inflicted by using the Infinity Gauntlet once. 1452331121.content:
The Guardians were having a lazy day. Just cruising the universe, not worried about particularly anything.

“Hey Rocket!” Peter yelled. “Where the hell are we?” “Seems to be the middle of nowhere!” he replied. “Cool lights passing by though. This area has been labeled “dangerous” for some reason. A little light show never hurt anyone.”

“Well, I don’t like it.” Gamora called. “Could be anything.”

“You don’t seem to like anything.” Peter smiled. He was wearing one of his tight shirts to show off for Gamora. “But, what’s not to like about me?” he chuckled. Gamora scoffed.

“Hey! Break it up you lovebirds!” Rocket called from the cockpit. “There’s a panel that’s short-circuited. Get on it!” Gamora walked away mumbling. “Lovebirds... ha.”

Peter shrugged and turned to the wall. At that moment one of the “lights” flew through the side of the ship and hit him square in the back. Everyone whipped around and looked at where it had come from. There was no hole. It had simply phased through.

“Hey!” Rocket called. “Is Peter alright?” Gamora ran over.

“Hey are you okay!?” she yelled. “What?” Peter replied. “The light! The one that hit you!” Gamora sputtered. “I didn’t feel anything.” he replied.

“Huh.” Gamora thought out loud.

“Hey, I’ll be back. I gotta grab a wrench.” Peter said as he stood up.

“Hey... are you... bigger?” Gamora stuttered.

Peter seemed to be taller and... bigger.

“I mean... my shirt does feel a bit tight.” he replied as he fidgeted with it.

“Anyway...” Gamora said as she looked away.

“Yeah... I’ll go get the tools.” he started.

As he walked away, Gamora couldn’t help but notice his shoulders seemed larger and his back looked stronger.

“It’s just the shirt.” she thought.

Meanwhile, an oblivious Drax was chatting with Mantis.

“I’m learning how to scare people.” he stated. “I can’t wait to use it on the others. BLAAH!” he yelled, which made Mantis jump.

Peter came back a few minutes later. After finishing with the panel, he turned and faced Gamora.

He was about to say something when he felt a strange sensation. They both watched in a mix of horror and amazement as Peter’s arms began to swell. It wasn’t inflammation. His muscles were growing. They were getting huge, larger than Drax’s. He groaned as they burst through his sleeves, revealing his massive arms to him and a shocked Gamora. Eventually the growth stopped.

They stood there in shocked silence for a moment.

“What just happened..” Peter breathed. “I think that ray caused some sort of rampant cellular multiplication!” Gamora stammered. Peter flexed a massive bicep. “I could punch through the wall with this monster!” he yelled. “Best not to.” Gamora replied.

145311.content:
“Ladies and Gentlemen!” Caesar Flickerman started, addressing the crowd. “For many years, you have expressed a desire for the Hunger Games to have a bit of a.... desireable element, shall we say.” He grinned. The crowd cheered enthusiastically. “As you are aware,” he continued, “the tributes are already in the arena fighting to the death. While pulling these tributes from the existing pool of victors was a twist, I am here to tell you we have another one planned! And I am sure you will love it!”



“We have to keep moving,” Katniss maintained. “We don’t know what other surprises this place might have in store for us.”

Peeta sighed. “I hate to say it but she’s right. We’re all tired. I mean we’ve been running around all day. But sitting still just makes us vulnerable,” he said to Finnick, getting to his feet. “We need to move.”

The other man followed suit, frowning and picking up his trident. “You’re definitely right about that. We should move. Lead on Katniss.”

The three began to walk through the jungle in silence, the quiet only being disturbed by the crunching of leaves. Suddenly, they were startled by a series of screams echoing around the arena, each of which were abruptly cut off. “This can’t be good,” Finnick mumbled, gripping his weapon as the screams became closer and closer to the trio.

Suddenly, a well-concealed trapdoor opened under Katniss. She screamed as she fell through the hole, which was abruptly cut off as the door slammed shut again.

“Katniss!” Peeta yelled, running to the spot where she had disappeared and searching the ground for any sign of her. Finnick dropped down beside him, searching the patch of ground where the trapdoor was.

“Where’d she go?” Peeta yelled. “There’s not even a seam or anything!” He frantically scratched at the ground, desperate for any way to find her.

“I don’t think there’s anything we can do,” Finnick sighed, looking at Peeta.

“There’s got to be a way to find her!” he argued.

“I’m sorry Peeta but we can’t help her, wherever she is,” Finnick said.

Peeta looked at the ground forlornly before reluctantly standing up. “We’ll find her,” he decided.

“Until then we have to keep moving,” Finnick maintained.

“Fine,” Peeta sighed, casting one last glance at the spot where Katniss had disappeared before continuing on through the jungle.
